# language_name:        Quichua: Canar
# closest ISO 639-3:    qxr
# ISO_15924:            Latn
# year_short:           
# year_long:            
# vernacular_title:     Dios Rimashcata Quillcashcami
# english_title:        The Bible in Quichua: Canar
# URL:                  https://www.bible.com/de/bible/261/gen.1.qca04
# copyright_short:      © United Bible Societies
# copyright_long:       
# notes:                
40001001	Taita Abrahammanta jatun mandac Davidcaman causac Jesucristopac ñaupa taitacunaca caicunami :
40001002	Abrahamca Isaac churitami charirca . Isaacca Jacobo churitami charirca . Jacoboca Judá , shinallatac shuctac churicunata charirca .
40001003	Judaca Tamar huarmipica Fares churita shinallatac Zara ushitami charirca . Faresca Esrom churitami carca . Esromca Arampac churitami charirca .
40001004	Aramca Aminadab churitami charirca . Aminadabca Naasón churitami charirca . Naasonca Salmón churitami charirca .
40001005	Salmonca Booz churitami charirca . Boozpac mamaca Rahabmi carca . Boozca Obed churitami charirca . Obedpac mamaca Rutmi carca . Obedca Isaí churitami charirca .
40001006	Isaica jatun mandac David churitami charirca . Jatun mandac Davidca Salomón churitami charirca . Paipac mamaca Uriasmi carca .
40001007	Salomonca Roboam churitami charirca . Roboamca Abías churitami charirca . Abiasca Asa churitami charirca .
40001008	Asaca Josafat churitami charirca . Josafatca Joram churitami charirca . Joramca Uzías churitami charirca .
40001009	Uziasca Jotam churitami charirca . Jotamca Acaz churitami charirca . Acazca Ezequías churitami charirca .
40001010	Ezequiasca Manasés churitami charirca . Manasesca Amón churitami charirca . Amonca Josías churitami charirca .
40001011	Josiasca Jeconías shinallatac shuctac churicunatami charirca . Chai punzhacunami , israelcunataca Babilonia llactaman prezu apashca carca .
40001012	Shina apashca quipami , Jeconiasca Salatiel churita charirca . Salatielca Zorobabel churitami charirca .
40001013	Zorobabelca Abiud churitami charirca . Abiudca Eliaquim churitami charirca . Eliaquimca Azor churitami charirca .
40001014	Azorca Sadoc churitami charirca . Sadocca Aquim churitami charirca . Aquimca Eliud churitami charirca .
40001015	Eliudca Eleazar churitami charirca . Eleazarca Matán churitami charirca . Matanca Jacobo churitami charirca .
40001016	Jacoboca José churitami charirca . Joseca Mariapac cusami carca . Mariaca Jesuspac mamami carca . Jesusca Cristomi can .
40001017	Chashna cashpami , Abraham causacui punzhamanta David causai punzhacamanca , chunga chuscu taitacuna carca . David causacui punzhamanta israelcunata Babilonia llactaman prezu apai punzhacamanca , chunga chuscu taitacunami carca . Chaimanta Cristo huacharingacamanca , chunga chuscu taitacunami carca .
40001018	Jesucristo huacharinaca cashnami carca : Paipac mama Mariaca Josehuan cazarangapacmi ari nishca carca . Josehuan manarac chayarinacushpami , Mariaca Diospac Espíritu llanducpi , huicsayuc taririrca .
40001019	Cazarangapac ari nishca Joseca cashcata ruhuac cashcamantami mana pimanpish yachachishpa , Mariataca pacalla saquisha nicurca .
40001020	Pai chaita yuyacucpi , Dios cachashca ángel muscuipi ricurishpaca : « Davidpac huahua huahuapura José , Mariahuanca cazarailla , ama manchaichu . Mariaca Diospac Espiritumantami huicsayuc tucushca .
40001021	Paica shuc cari huahuatami charinga . Chai huahuataca JESÚS shutitami shutichingui . Paimi pai acllashcacunataca juchacunamanta quishpichinga . Chaimantami chai shutica canga » nirca .
40001022	Tucui chaicunaca ñaupa Dios paimanta huillacman huillachishca pactachunmi , chashnaca tucurca .
40001023	Chai huillaccunaca : « Manarac carihuan chayarinacushca shuc solterami , huicsayuc tucushpa , shuc cari huahuata charinga . Chai huahuaca Emanuel shutimi canga » nishcami .
40001024	José riccharishpaca , Diospac ángel mandashca shinami Mariahuanca cazararca .
40001025	Joseca chashna cazarashpapish chai huahuata charingacamanmi Mariahuanca mana chayarinacurca . Chai huahuataca JESÚS shutitami shutichirca .
40002001	Judea llacta Belén pueblopimi Jesusca huacharirca . Chai punzhacunaca Herodesmi chai llactataca mandacurca . Chaipimi inti llucshina ladomanta , yachaccuna Jerusalén puebloman shamurca . Paicunaca lucerota ricushpa yachacuccunami carca .
40002002	Paicunaca : — ¿ Israelcunata mandangapac huacharishca huahuaca , maipitac ? Ñucanchicca inti llucshina ladopi , huahua huacharishcata ricuchic lucerotami ricushpa , alli ningapac shamunchic — nirca .
40002003	Chaita uyashpami , mandac Herodesca yallita mancharirca . Jerusalenpi causaccunapish , chashnallatacmi mancharirca .
40002004	Chaimantami Herodesca Israel curacunata mandac curacunatapish , mandashcacunata yachachiccunatapish cayashpaca : — ¿ Maipitac Quishpichic Cristoca huacharinga ? — nirca .
40002005	Chashna nicpimi paicunaca : — Diosmanta ñaupa huillacca : “ Judea llacta Belén pueblopimi huacharinga ” nincunami . Paicuna quillcashca :
40002006	“ Judea llacta Belenlla , canca tucui Judea pueblocunamanta alli nishca pueblomi cangui . Canmantami shuc mandac llucshinga . Paimi ñuca acllashca israelcunataca pushanga ” nishcami — nirca .
40002007	Chashna nicpimi , Herodesca yachaccunata pacalla cayashpa tapushpa , punzha lucero ricurishcata allita yachac chayarca .
40002008	Chaimanta , paicunata Belenman cachashpaca : — Chaiman rishpa , huahuata allita mashcagrichic . Ña tarishpaca huillangapac shamunguichic , ñucapish chai huahuata alli nigringapac — nirca .
40002009	Jatun mandac Herodes chashna nicpica , chai yachaccunaca rircami . Paicuna ricpica , inti llucshina ladopi ricurishca lucerollatacmi ñaupata rishpa , huahua Jesús siricuc huasi jahuapi jarcarirca .
40002010	Yachaccuna chai lucerota ricushpaca , yallitami cushicurca .
40002011	Paicuna chai huasiman yaicushpaca , huahuatami paipac mama Mariandi ricurca . Chaimantami cungurishpa “ allimari cangui ” nircacuna . Shinallatac quipita pascashpami , curitapish , inciensotapish , mirratapish curca .
40002012	Dios yachaccunaman muscuipi ricurishpa “ Herodespacman ama cutichun ” nicpimi , shuctac lado ñanta paicunapac llactamanca cutirca .
40002013	Yachaccuna rishca quipaca , Mandac Dios cachashca ángel muscuipi Joseman ricurishpaca : « Mandac Herodesmi huahuataca huañuchingapac mashcachigricun . Cunanca jatarishpa , huahuata paipac mamandi Egipto llactaman apai . Ñuca ima horas shamuchun ningacaman chaipi cagri » nirca .
40002014	Shina nicpimi , Joseca riccharishpa , chai tutallatac huahuata apashpa , mama Mariandi Egipto llactaman rirca .
40002015	Mandac Dios ñaupa huillacman huillachishca pactachunmi , chai llactapi Herodes huañungacaman causarcacuna . Pai huillachishpaca : « Egipto llactamantami ñuca Churitaca cayarcani » nishcami carca .
40002016	Herodesca yachaccuna umashcamantami , munai piñarishpa , tucui muyundi Belén llactapi causac , manarac ishcai huatata charic cari huahuacunata huañuchichun mandarca . Chashnami yachaccuna lucerota ricushca punzhamanta ñaupaman huacharishca huahuacunata huañuchichirca .
40002017	Chashnami , Diosmanta ñaupa huillac Jeremías quillcashcaca pactarca .
40002018	Paica : « Ramá pueblopica ¡ alau ! nishpa caparishcami uyarirca . Chaica Raquelmi , paipac huahuacunamanta huacacurca . Huahuacuna huañushcamantami Paitaca pipish mana cushichi pudircachu » ninmi .
40002019	Herodes huañushca quipa , Mandac Diospac ángel Egiptopi Joseman muscuipi ricurishpaca .
40002020	« Jatarishpa , huahuata apashpa , mama Mariandi Israel llactaman cuti . Huahuata huañuchishun niccunaca ñami huañushca » nirca .
40002021	Chaimantami Joseca jatarishpa , huahuata apashpa , mama Mariandi Israel llactaman cutirca .
40002022	Ashtahuanpish Herodespac churi Arquelao paipac taitapac randi , Judea llactata mandacushcata yachashpami , chaiman rinataca mancharca . Chaimantami Mandac Dios cutin muscuipi huillacpi , Galilea llactaman rirca .
40002023	Chaiman chayashpaca , ñaupa huillaccuna huillashca pactachunmi Nazaret pueblopi causangapac rirca . Chai huillaccunaca : “ Paica nazareno nishcami canga ” nishca carca .
40003001	Chai punzhacunami Bautizac Juan Judea llacta shitashca pambapi ,
40003002	huillashpaca : « Diosca ñami mandagrin . Chaimanta juchata ruhuanata saquishpa , Diosman cutirichic » nirca .
40003003	Juanmanta Dios ima nishcata huillac Isaías huillashpaca : « Shitashca pambapi shuc runa caparishpaca : “ Quishpichic shamuna ñanta allichichic , quingu ñancunatapish derechaichic ” nicunmi » nirca .
40003004	Juanca camello millmamanta ruhuashca churanatami churashca , cara chumbihuanmi chumbillishcami carca . Paica langostacunata , shinallatac abeja mishquitami micuc carca .
40003005	Paipacmanca Jerusalén pueblomantapish , Judea llactacunamantapish , Jordán yacu cuchulla llactacunamantapishmi shamuc carca .
40003006	Paicunataca llaquirishpa juchacunata huillacpimi , Juanca bautizac carca .
40003007	Achca fariseocunapish , saduceocunapish bautizaringapac shamucpimi Juanca : « ¡ Culebra shina gentecuna ! Dios cachashca llaquimanta quishpirinataca , ¿ pitac huillarcayari ?
40003008	Llaquirishpa Diosman cutirishca cashcata ricuchingapacca , alli pucuc grano shina , allita ruhuashpa ricuchichicyari .
40003009	Ama cancunapac shungupi : “ Ñucanchicca Abrahampac huahua huahuacuna cashcamantaca quishpirishunllami ” nishpa , ama yuyacuichicchu . Ashtahuanpish ñucaca : Diosca cai rumicunatapish Abrahampac huahua huahuacunata ruhuanmanllami .
40003010	Hachaca ñami yura chaquipi churashca . Diosca tucui mana pucuc yurataca , sapipi pitishpami ninapi rupachinga .
40003011	Ñucaca llaquirishpa , Diosman cutirichunmi , yacuhuan bautizacuni , ashtahuanpish ñucapac quipa shamucmi , Diospac Espirituhuan , ninahuan bautizanga . Paica ñucata atishpa , ashtahuan poderyucmi . Ñucaca paipac ushutallatapish mana apaipacchu cani .
40003012	Paica huairachinahuanmi trigota tamomanta chicanyachic shina ñalla chicanyachinga . Granotaca huacaichinapimi huacaichinga . Cutin tamotaca jaicapi mana huañuc ninapimi rupachinga » nirca .
40003013	Jesusca Juan bautizachunmi , Galilea llactamanta Jordán yacuman rirca .
40003014	Juanca Jesusta mana bautizangaraicumi : — ¿ Imapactac shamungui ? Ashtahuanpish canmi ñucata bautizana cangui — nirca .
40003015	Shina nicpimi Jesusca : — Cunanca bautizailla . Ñucanchicca Dios mandashcatami pactachina canchic — nicpimi , Juanca bautizarca .
40003016	Jesús bautizarishpa , yacumanta llucshishpaca , jahua pacha pascarictapish , Diospac Espíritu paloma shina shamushpa paipac jahuapi tiyarictami ricurca .
40003017	Jahua pachamanta rimashpaca : « Caimi ñuca cuyashca Churica . Paillami ñucataca cushichin » nishcami uyarirca .
40004001	Chai quipaca , Diospac Espiritumi Jesustaca diablo shitashca pambaman pusharca . Chaipimi diabloca pandachisha nirca .
40004002	Chaipi chuscu chunga punzhata , chuscu chunga tutata mana micushca cashpami , Jesusca yarcachirca .
40004003	Chashna cacpimi , diablo Jesuspacman cuchuyashpaca : — Can Diospac Churi cashpaca , cai rumicunata tanda tucuchun ni — nirca .
40004004	Chashna nicpimi Jesusca : — Dios quillcachishcapica : “ Gentecunaca mana tandallahuanchu causanga , ashtahuanpish Dios rimashcahuanmi causanga ” ninmi — nirca .
40004005	Chaimantaca diabloca , Diospaclla Jerusalén puebloman Jesusta pushashpa , Diosta mañana huasi jahuapi
40004006	churashpaca : — Can Diospac Churi cashpaca , caimanta shitari . Dios quillcachishcapica : “ Ama huactarichunca , Diosmi paipac angelcunata jarcachun cachanga . Chaquillatapish ama chugririchunca , angelcunami maquipi chasquinga ” ninmi — nirca .
40004007	Chashna nicpimi Jesusca : — Dios quillcachishcapica : “ Canta Mandac Diosta ama pandachisha nichun ” ninmi — nirca .
40004008	Diabloca Jesusta jatun urcuman pushashpa , tucui llactacunapi ima tiyashca sumaccunata ricuchishpaca :
40004009	— Can ñucata cungurishpa adoracpica , cai tucuitami canman cusha — nirca .
40004010	Shina nicpimi Jesusca : — ¡ Anchuri caimanta Satanás ! Dios quillcachishcapica : “ Canta Mandac Diosllata alli ningui , paillata servingui ” ninmi — nirca .
40004011	Shina nicpimi , diabloca saquishpa rircalla . Chai quipami angelcunaca Jesusta servingapac shamurca .
40004012	Jesusca Bautizac Juan prezu cacta uyashpami , Galilea llactaman rirca .
40004013	Shina cashpapish Nazaret pueblopica ña mana causagrircachu , ashtahuanpish Galilea jatun cucha patapi cac Capernaúm pueblopimi causagrirca . Chai puebloca ñaupa taita Zabulonpac , Neftalipac causana llactapimi carca .
40004014	Dios ima nishcata huillac Isaías huillashca pactachunmi , chaipi causagrirca .
40004015	Paica : « ¡ Zabulonpac , Neftalipac causana Galilea llactalla ! ¡ Jordán yacu chimba ladopi cac , jatun cucha patapi tiyac , mana israelcuna causana Galilea llactalla !
40004016	Amsapi causac cancunami shuc jatun luzta ricurca . Amsapi huañunalla caccunatami , chai luzca achicyachirca » nishcami .
40004017	Chaimanta pachami Jesusca : « Diosca ñami mandagrin . Chaimanta juchayuc cashcamanta llaquirishpa , Diosman cutirichic » nishpa , huillai callarirca .
40004018	Jesusca Galilea cucha patata puricushpami , ishcai huauquindi runacunata ricurca . Shucca Simón nishca Pedro , shinallatac Andresmi carca . Paicunaca challuata japiccuna cashpami , linchita yacupi shitacurca .
40004019	Chaipimi Jesusca paicunataca : — Ñucahuan jacuchic . Cancunataca challuata japic shina , gentecunata Diospacman pushamuchunmi yachachisha — nirca .
40004020	Shina nicpica , linchicunata chai pambapi saquishpa , Jesusta catishpa rircacunallami .
40004021	Jesús chaimanta rishpaca , Zebedeopac churi huauquindipura Jacobota , Juantami ricurca . Paicunaca challuata japina linchicunata taita Zebedeohuan siracurca . Jesusca paicunatapish cayarcami .
40004022	Chaimantami canoatapish , paicunapac taitatapish saquishpa , Jesusta catishpa rirca .
40004023	Jesusca tucui Galilea llacta israelcuna tandanacuna huasipimi yachachishpa puricurca . Dios mandanamanta alli huillaita huillashpami , tucuilaya ungüihuan , nanaihuan cac gentecunatapish alliyachishpa puricurca .
40004024	Chai ruhuashcaca tucui Siria llactapimi uyarirca . Shina uyaricpimi , Jesuspacmanca nanaihuan caccunatapish , ungüihuan llaquilla caccunatapish , supai japishca caccunatapish , yuyai illac tucushcacunatapish , paralisis ungüihuan caccunatapish apamurca . Jesusca tucui chai ungushcacunatami alliyachirca .
40004025	Chaimantami Galilea llactamantapish , Decápolis nishca chunga pueblocunamantapish , Jerusalén pueblomantapish , Judea llactamantapish , Jordán yacu chimba ladopi cac llactacunamantapish , achca gentecuna Jesustaca catirca .
40005001	Jesusca achca gentecuna paita caticucta ricushpami , urcu jahuaman rirca . Chaipi tiyacucpimi , paipac yachacuccunaca cuchuyarca .
40005002	Chaipimi Jesusca cashna nishpa yachachi callarirca :
40005003	« Juchayuc cashcamanta Diosta mashcaccuna , ¡ cushicuichic ! Jahua pacha Dios mandacucca cancunapacmi .
40005004	Shungupi llaquilla caccuna , ¡ cushicuichic ! Diosmi cancunataca cushichinga .
40005005	Llaquilla shungucuna , ¡ cushicuichic ! Cancunami Dios cusha nishca llactataca japinguichic .
40005006	Yarcaihuan yacunayaihuan shina , cashcata ruhuanata munaccuna , ¡ cushicuichic ! Diosmi chaita pactachichun saquinga .
40005007	Llaquiccuna , ¡ cushicuichic ! Cancunatapish Diosca llaquingami .
40005008	Shungupi millai yuyaita mana chariccuna , ¡ cushicuichic ! Cancunami Diostaca ricunguichic .
40005009	Piñanacushcata allichiccuna , ¡ cushicuichic ! Cancunami Diospac huahuacuna canguichic .
40005010	Cashcata ruhuashcamanta llaquita apaccuna , ¡ cushicuichic ! Jahua pacha Dios mandacucca cancunapacmi .
40005011	Ñucata caticushcamanta piñashca , pipish llullashpa rimashca , llaquichishca caccuna , ¡ cushicuichic !
40005012	Chashna llaquichicpipish , ¡ cushicuichiclla ! Diosca jahua pachapimi , cancuna japina cashcata yallita cunga . Ñaupa punzhapipish Dios ima nishcata huillaccunataca llaquichircacunami .
40005013	Cancunaca cai pachapi causaccunapacca , cachi shinami canguichic . Cachi gamuyashpaca , ¿ imapactac valinga ? Mana imapac valinchu . Canzhapi gentecuna saruchun shitangapacllami valin .
40005014	Cancunaca cai pachapi causaccunapacca , luz shinami canguichic . Urcu jahuapi tiyac huasicunaca , mana pacallachu .
40005015	Luzta japichishpaca mana cajón ucupi churanchu , ashtahuanpish ucupi caccunata achicyachichunmi , pata jahuapi churan .
40005016	Cancunapish , cai pachapi causaccunapac ñaupapica , allita ruhuashpa causaichic . Chashnami luz shina canguichic . Cancuna chashna cacpimi , jahua pachapi tiyac cancunapac Diostaca ‘ allimari cangui ’ ningacuna .
40005017	Ñucataca ‘ Mandashcacunata , Dios ima nishcata huillaccuna huillashcata anchuchingapacmi shamushca ’ nishpaca , ama yuyanguichicchu , ashtahuanpish mandashcacunata pactachingapacmi shamurcani .
40005018	Cai pacha , jahua pacha tucuringacaman , mandashcacunamantaca shuc rimaillapish , shuc puntollapish mana chingaringachu , tucui pactacungallami . Chaica chashnatacmi canga .
40005019	Maijanpish cai mandashcacunamanta uchilla mandashcata mana cazushpa , gentecunaman yachachicca , jahua pacha Dios mandacucpica uchilla nishcami canga . Maijanpish cai mandashcacunata cazushpa shuccunamanpish yachachicca , jahua pacha Dios mandacucpica , alli nishcami canga .
40005020	Yachachiccunatapish , fariseocunatapish atishpa mandashcacunata mana pactachishpaca , jahua pacha Dios mandacucmanca jaicapi mana yaicunguichicchu .
40005021	Cancunapac ñaupa taitacunaman huillashpa : “ Ama huañuchinguichu . Maijanpish huañuchictaca , juezpacman apashpa llaquichishcami canga ” nishcatami uyarcanguichic .
40005022	Ashtahuanpish ñucaca : Maijanpish piñactaca , juezpacman apashpa llaquichishcami canga . Maijanpish muspa nictaca , mandaccunapura tandanacushcapacman apashpa , llaquichishcami canga . Maijanpish imatapish rimactaca , ucu pacha ninaman shitana nishcami canga ninimi .
40005023	Chaimanta ofrendata altarpi churangapacpish maijanhuan piñanacushca cashcata chaipi yuyarishpaca ,
40005024	ofrendata altar ñaupapi saquishpa , allichimugrichun . Chai quipaca , ofrendata cunguillami .
40005025	Maijan canta juezpacman cayachigricpica , manarac juezpacman chayashpa , canta cayachic-huan alli tucungui . Mana cashpaca juezman cucpi , juezca soldadocunaman cushpa cantaca carcelpi churangami .
40005026	Chaimantaca tucui cullquita cungacaman mana llucshinguichu . Chaica chashnatacmi canga .
40005027	Shinallatac ñaupaca : “ Cazarashca jahua ama huainayanguichu ” nishcatami uyarcanguichic .
40005028	Ashtahuanpish ñucaca : Maijanpish shuc huarmita munashpaca , paipac shungupica ña huainayanmi .
40005029	Chaimanta cambac alli lado ñahui juchapi urmachisha nicpica , surcushpa shitangui . Tucui cuerpo ucu pacha ninaman shitashca canapac randica , chulla ñahuillata chingachinami canmanca ashtahuan alli canga .
40005030	Cambac alli lado maqui juchapi urmachisha nicpica , pitishpa shitangui . Tucui cuerpo ucu pacha ninapi shitashca canapac randica , cambac chulla maquillata chingachinami ashtahuan alli canga .
40005031	Shinallatac ñaupaca : “ Maijanpish cazarashca cashpa , paipac huarmimanta raquirisha nicca , firmata cushpa raquirichunlla ” nishcatami uyashcanguichic .
40005032	Ashtahuanpish ñucaca cashnami nini : Maijan caripish paipac huarmi manapish shuc-huan cacta yachashpa raquiricpica , chai huarmica paimantami shuc-huan huainayanacushpa juchallin . Shinallatac maijanpish chai raquirishca huarmihuan cazarashpaca , juchallinmi .
40005033	Shinallatac cancunapac ñaupa taitacunamanca : “ Diospac shutipi imata ari nishpaca , pactachingui ” nishcatami uyashcanguichic .
40005034	Ashtahuanpish ñucaca cashnami nini : Diospac shutipica shinachari jahua pacha Dios mandashpa tiyarinamantapish ,
40005035	shinachari paipac chaqui saruna cai allpamantapish , shinachari Jerusalén Jatun Mandacpac pueblomantapish ,
40005036	shinachari quiquinllamantapish , pai Diospac shutipica ama rimaichicchu . Ashtahuanpish cancunaca cancunapac shuc acchallatapish yuractaca yanaman , yanataca yuracman mana tigrachi pudinguichicchu .
40005037	Imatapish ari nina cacpica , ari nichic . Mana nina cacpica , mana nichic . Manapish cashcata nina yuyaicunaca , diablomantami shamun .
40005038	Shinallatac ñaupaca : “ Maijanpish ñahuita surcuctaca , paitapish ñahuita surcunami . Quiruta surcuctaca , paitapish quiruta surcunami ” nishcatami uyarcanguichic .
40005039	Ashtahuanpish ñucaca : Piñactaca ama piñanguichu , ashtahuanpish maijan canta alli lado jazhapi huactacpica , lluqui lado jazhapipish huactachun saquingui .
40005040	Maijanpish camisata quichusha nishpa juezpacman cayachicpica , ashtahuan valishca jahualla churanatapish cungui .
40005041	Maijan quipita shuc kilometrota apashpa cui nicpica , ishcai kilometrota apangui .
40005042	Mañacmanca , cunguilla . Maijanpish imata mañacpica , ama misarishpa mañachinguichiclla .
40005043	Ñaupaca : “ Canta cuyactaca cuyangui , piñactaca piñangui ” nishcatami uyarcanguichic .
40005044	Ashtahuanpish ñucaca : Piñaccunata cuyaichic , shinallatac cancunata llaquichiccunamanta Diosta mañaichic ninimi
40005045	Chashnami jahua pacha Diospac huahuacuna canguichic . Paica allicunaman , mana allicunaman , paita cazuccunaman , mana cazuccunamanmi intitapish , tamyatapish cachanlla .
40005046	Cancuna maijan cuyaccunallata cuyashpaca , ¿ ima allitatac Diosmantaca japinguichic ? Chaitacarin Roma llactaman impuestota japiccunapish ruhuancunami .
40005047	Shinallatac cancunapuralla alabadunacushpaca , ima allita mana ruhuanguichicchu . Diosta mana ricsiccunapish chashnaca ruhuancunami .
40005048	Jahua pacha Dios ima shinami allita can , chashnallatac cancunapish allita caichic .
40006001	Ama gentecuna ricucucllapi allita ruhuaichicchu . Chashna ruhuacpica , jahua pacha Diosca , ima allita mana cungachu .
40006002	Chaimanta can huacchacunata ayudashpaca tucuiman parlashpa puringuichu . Chashnaca mishqui shimi , jayac shungucunallami tandanacuna huasicunapipish , mai ñancunapipish parlashpa purincuna . Chashna ruhuashpaca , cai pachapacllami alli nishca cancuna . Chaica chashnatacmi can .
40006003	Huacchacunata can ayudashcata ama pipish yachachun .
40006004	Can chashna pacalla ayudacpica , pacallata ricuc Diosca , can japina cashcataca cungami .
40006005	Cancuna Diosta mañashpaca , ama chai mishqui shimi jayac shungucuna shina mañaichicchu . Paicunaca gentecuna ricuchunmi , plaza esquinacunapi , tandanacuna huasicunapi shayarishpa mañancuna . Chashna ruhuashpaca , cai pachapacllami alli nishca cancuna . Chaica chashnatacmi can .
40006006	Canta Diosta mañashpaca , ucuman yaicushpa , punguta huichcashpa canta Mandac Diosta pacalla mañai . Chashna mañacpica , pacallata ricuc Diosca , can japina cashcata cungami .
40006007	Diosta mañashpaca , ama chai Diosta mana ricsiccuna shina cutin cutin chaillatatac rimashpa mañaichicchu . Paicunaca “ Chashna mañacpica Diosca uyangami ” yuyashpami , chashnaca mañancuna .
40006008	Ama cancunaca paicuna shina mañaichicchu . Cancunapac Diosca imalla illashcataca cancuna manarac mañacpimi , ña yachan .
40006009	Cancuna mañashpaca : “ Jahua pacha ñucanchic Taitalla , cambac shutitaca , tucuilla alli nishca cachun .
40006010	Can mandana punzha shamuchun . Ima shinami jahua pachapi can munashca ruhuaricun , chai shinallatac cai pachapipish ruhuarichun .
40006011	Punzhanta micuna tandataca , cunan punzhapish carai .
40006012	Ima shinami ñucanchic mana allita ruhuaccunata perdonanchic , shinallatac ñucanchic juchacunatapish perdonai .
40006013	Ama ima millaipi urmachun saquinguichu , tucui mana allimanta huacaichingui . [ Canmi huiñai huiñaita tucuita mandacpish , tucuita ruhuacpish , sumaimana cushicuipish cangui . Chashna cachun ] ” nishpa mañanguichic .
40006014	Shuccuna ima mana allita ruhuashcata perdonacpica , jahua pachapi tiyac cancunapac Diospish cancunata perdonangami .
40006015	Ashtahuanpish cancuna ima mana allita ruhuashcata mana perdonacpica , Diosca cancunapac juchacunataca mana perdonangachu .
40006016	Cancuna ayunashpaca , ama chai mishqui shimi , jayac shungucuna shina ayunanguichicchu . Paicunaca gentecuna ricuchunllami llaquilla ñahui tucushpa ayunan . Paicuna chashna ruhuashpaca , cai pachapacllami alli nishca cancuna . Chaica chashnatacmi can .
40006017	Ashtahuanpish cancuna ayunashpaca , ñahuita jahuarichic , umatapish llambucllata ñaccharichic .
40006018	Chaica gentecuna ama ricuchunmi chashnaca ruhuana canguichic . Chashna ruhuacpimi , ima pacallatapish ricuc Diosca cancuna japina cashcata cunga .
40006019	Ama cai pachallapi chayuc canata munaichicchu . Chai charishcacunataca polillapish micunllami , ismunllami . Huasita jutcushpa shuhuanllami .
40006020	Ashtahuanpish jahua pachapi chayuc canata munaichic . Chaipica polillapish mana micunchu , mana ismunchu , mana shuhuanchu .
40006021	Maipimi cancunapac charishca tiyan , chaillatatacmi cancunapac shungupish yuyacun .
40006022	Cuerpopac luz shinaca ñahuimi . Chaimanta cambac ñahui alli cacpica , tucui cuerpomi achicpi canga .
40006023	Cambac ñahui mana alli cacpica , tucui cuerpomi amsapi canga . Cambac cuerpopi achicyachic luz amsayacpicarin , ¡ amsaca yallita amsami canga !
40006024	Maijanpish ishcai amotaca mana servi pudinchu . Chaica , shuc amotaca piñangami , caishuctaca cuyangami . Shuc amo mandashcataca cazungami , cutin caishuc amo mandashcataca mana cazungachu . Chashnami maijanpish charicyana yuyailla cashpaca , Diostaca mana servi pudinga .
40006025	Chaimantami ñucaca : Ama : “ ¿ Imatatac micushun , imatatac ubiashun , imatatac churarishun ? ” nishpa , chai yuyailla canguichicchu . Causaimari micunatapish ashtahuan yalli valin . Cuerpomari , churanata ashtahuan yalli valin .
40006026	Volac animalcunata ricushpa yuyarichic . Chaicunaca mana tarpunchu , mana cosechanchu , grano huacaichinatapish mana huacaichinchu . Chashna cacpipish jahua pachapi tiyac cancunapac Diosca caranllami . Cancunacarin , ¡ zhutacunatapish yallimari valinguichic !
40006027	Maijan yallita unaita causanata munashpapish , shuc horallatapish yallihuan mana causai pudinchu .
40006028	¿ Ima nishpatac churana illac cashcamanta llaquiricunguichic ? Pambapi sisacuna sumacta sisacucta ricushpallapish yuyarichic . Chaicunaca mana puchcanchu , imatapish mana ruhuanchu .
40006029	Chaica , jatun mandac Salomón , pai tucuita charic cashpapish , sisa shina sumacta mana churarircachu .
40006030	¡ Mana tucui shunguhuan cric gentecunalla ! Cunanca sumacta sisacuc , cayaca ninapi shitanalla quihuacunatapish huiñachic Diosca , ¿ manachu cancunamanca ashtahuan yallita churachinga ?
40006031	Shinashpaca : Ama : “ ¿ Imatatac micushun , imatatac ubiashun , imatatac churarishun ? ” nishpa , llaquiricuichicchu .
40006032	Diosta mana ricsiccunami chashna causancuna . Jahua pacha Diosca cancunapac ima illashcataca ña yachanmi .
40006033	Tucuimanta yallica , Dios mandacucta , shinallatac cashcata ruhuanata mashcaichic . Cancunapac ima illashcataca chasquinguichicllami .
40006034	Ama : “ Cayaca , ¿ imashi tucushun ? ” nishpa , llaquiricuichicchu . Llaquicunaca punzhantami tiyan . Chaimanta cayapac ima tucuna cashcataca , cayallatami yuyarina canguichic .
40007001	Ama shuccunata juchanchinguichicchu , pacta cancunatapish Diosca juchanchinman .
40007002	Cancuna ima shinami shuccunata juchanchinguichic , chashnallatacmi cancunatapish Diosca juchanchinga . Ima shinami shuccunata ruhuanguichic , chashnallatacmi cancunatapish ruhuanga .
40007003	¿ Ima nishpatac quiquin ñahuipi tiyacuc caspita mana ricushpa , shucpac ñahuipi tiyacuc uchilla ucshatarac ricungui ?
40007004	Cambac ñahuipi caspi tiyacucpica , ¿ ima shinatac caishuctaca : “ Shamui , cambac ñahuimanta ucshata llucchisha ” ninguiyari ?
40007005	Mishqui shimi , jayac shungu , cambac ñahuimantarac caspita llucchi . Chashna llucchishpami , alli ricushpa , caishucpac ñahuimanta uchilla ucshataca llucchingui .
40007006	Dios cushcataca ama allcucunaman cunguichicchu . Achca valishca perlastapish ama cuchicunaman cunguichicchu . Chashna cucpica , yangamanta sarungacunami . Chai allcucunaca cancunataca mana ricunayachishpa llaquichingami .
40007007	Diosta mañaichic , paica cungami . Mashcaichic , taringuichicmi . Huasiyuc nichic , paica pascangami .
40007008	Maijanpish mañacca japinmi . Maijanpish mashcacca tarinmi . Huasiyuc nictaca yaicuchinmi .
40007009	¿ Cancunapuramanta maijantac huahua tandata mañacpica , rumita cunguichic ?
40007010	¿ Challuata mañacpica , culebrata cunguichicchu ?
40007011	Cancuna millaicuna cashpapish , cancunapac huahuacuna imata mañacpica , allicunatami cunguichic . Ashtahuanpish jahua pacha Dioscarin , maijanpish mañacpica , allicunatami cunga .
40007012	Ima shinami shuccuna cancunaman allita ruhuachun ninguichic , chashnallatac cancunapish shuccunaman allita ruhuaichic . Chaitami Moisés mandashcacunapipish , Dios ima nishcata huillashcapipish nicun .
40007013	Quichqui punguta yaicuichic . Chaica chingarinaman apac ñanpish , pungupish purinalla anchomi . Taucacunami chaitaca yaicun .
40007014	Ashtahuanpish huiñai causaiman apac ñanpish , pungupish quichquimi , mana yaicuipacllachu . Ashallami chaitaca yaicun .
40007015	Cancunapacman shamuc llulla huillaccunamanta cuidaringuichic . Paicunaca oveja carata churarishca , cutin ucu shungupica , atuc shina millaicunami .
40007016	Paicuna ima shina cashcataca , paicunapac ruhuashcata ricushpami ricsinguichic . Casha yuraca mana uvasta pucunchu . Cardos yurapish , higota mana pucunchu .
40007017	Alli yuraca alli granotami pucun . Mana alli yuraca , mana alli granotami pucun .
40007018	Alli yuraca , mana alli granotaca mana pucunchu . Mana alli yurapish , alli granotaca mana pucunchu .
40007019	Mana alli granota pucuc yurataca , tucui pitishpa ninapi shitanami .
40007020	Paicuna ima ruhuashcata ricushpami llullashpa huillac cashcataca yachanguichic .
40007021	Mana tucui ‘ Apunchic Jesús , Apunchic Jesús ’ niccunachu jahua pacha Dios mandacucmanca yaicunga , ashtahuanpish jahua pacha cac ñuca Taita munashcata ruhuaccunallami yaicunga .
40007022	Taripana punzhapica taucacunami : “ Apunchic Jesús , Apunchic Jesús , cambac shutipimi huillacurcanchic , supaicunatapish llucchircanchic , milagrocunatapish ruhuarcanchic ” ningacuna .
40007023	Chashna cacpica ñucaca : “ Cancunataca mana ricsinichu . Anchurichic , millaita ruhuaccuna ” nishami .
40007024	Maijanpish cai nishcata uyashpa cazucca , shuc alli yuyaiyuc , sinchi rumi allpapi huasichic runa shinami .
40007025	Chashna sinchi rumi allpapi ruhuashca huasi cashpami , mashnata tamyacpipish , mashnata huairacpipish mana urmarca .
40007026	Maijanpish cai nishcata uyashpa mana cazucca , shuc yuyai illac runa cabia allpapi huasichic shinami .
40007027	Shina huasichishcataca , yalli tamyacpi , yacu shamucpi , huaira huactacpica , urmashpa llaquimi tucurca » nirca .
40007028	Jesús chashna yachachicpica , tucui uyaccunami mancharishpa saquirirca .
40007029	Jesusca mana mandashcacunata yachachic shinachu yachachirca , ashtahuanpish paillatac mandac cashpami , allita yachachirca .
40008001	Jesús urcumanta cuticpica , achca gentecunami catimurca .
40008002	Chaiman leprahuan ungushca runa shamushpa , Jesuspac ñaupapi cumurishpaca : — Apunchic Jesús , can alliyachisha nishpaca , alliyachinguimanllami — nirca .
40008003	Shina nicpimi Jesusca : — Ari , alliyachisha ninimi . Alliyai — nishpa , maquihuan tuparicpica , lepra ungüica runamanta chingarircami .
40008004	Shinallatac Jesusca : — Riqui , canta alliyachishcataca , pacta piman huillanguiman . Cunanca Israel curaman ricuchishpa , Moisés mandashca shinallatac ofrendata cugringui — nirca .
40008005	Jesús Capernaúm puebloman chayagricucpi , Roma llactamanta pasac soldadocunata mandac cuchuyashpaca :
40008006	— Apunchic Jesús , ñuca huasipimi ñucata servicca paralisis ungüihuanmi llaquita apacun — nirca .
40008007	Shina nicpimi Jesusca : — Shinashpaca , alliyachingapac risha — nirca .
40008008	Shina nicpimi , soldadocunata mandacca : — Apunchic Jesús , ¿ ñuca ima alli cacpitac , ñuca huasimanca risha ninguiyari ? Can caimanta alliyachun nilla . Chashna nicpica , alliyangallami .
40008009	Ñucaca shuc mandacpac mandashcapish , soldadocunata mandacpishmi cani . Maijan soldadota “ ri ” nicpica , rinllami . Cutin maijanta “ shamui ” nicpica shamunllami . Ñuca servicta “ imata ruhuai ” nicpica , ruhuanllami — nirca .
40008010	Chaita Jesús uyashpaca mancharircami . Chaimantami paita caticcunataca : — Cashna cric runataca , israelcunapurapipish mana tarishcanichu . Chaica chashnatacmi .
40008011	Ñucaca ninimi : Achcacunami inti llucshinamanta , inti yaicunamanta tandarishpa , ñaupa taita Abrahamhuan , Isaac-huan , Jacobohuan jahua pacha Dios mandacucpi micungapac tiyaringa .
40008012	Ashtahuanpish Dios mandacucman yaicungapac caccunaca , canzhapimi , purapi huacaihuan quiru caniringa — nirca .
40008013	Chaimantami Jesusca soldadocunata mandactaca : — Huasiman rilla . Can crishca shinallatac alliyangallami — nirca . Chai nishca horasllatacmi , chai servicca alli tucurca .
40008014	Jesusca Pedropac huasiman rishpami , Pedropac suegra fiebrehuan camapi siricucta ricurca .
40008015	Shina ricushpami , Jesusca paipac maquipi tuparirca . Chashna tuparicpi , chai fiebre anchuricpica , jatarishpa paicunaman micunata carai callarircami .
40008016	Chishiyamuctami supai japishcacunata Jesuspacman apamurca . Chashna apamucpica , Jesusca pai rimashcallahuanmi supaicunata llucchishpa cacharca . Shinallatac tucui ungushcacunatapish alliyachircami .
40008017	Chaica , Dios ima nishcata huillac Isaías huillashca pactachunmi , chashnaca tucurca . Pai huillashpaca : « Pai quiquinmi ñucanchic ungüicunatapish alliyachirca , nanaicunatapish aparca » nishcami .
40008018	Jesusca tauca gentecuna muyushpa shayacucta ricushpami , yachacuccunataca yacu cuchata chimbachun mandarca .
40008019	Chaipimi mandashcacunata yachachic runa cuchuyashpaca : — Yachachic , can maita ricpipish , catishami — nirca .
40008020	Chashna nicpimi Jesusca : — Atuccunapish machaita charinmi . Volac animalcunapish cuzhata charinmi . Ashtahuanpish Runa Tucungapac shamushca ñucaca , maipi umata samachinallatapish mana charinichu — nirca .
40008021	Shina nicpimi , yachacuccunapuramanta shucca : — Apunchic Jesús , shuyai , ñuca taitatarac enterramugrisha — nirca .
40008022	Shina nicpimi Jesusca : — Saqui , huañushcacuna huañushcacunata enterrachun . Canca catilla — nirca .
40008023	Jesusca canoapi tiyarishpami , paipac yachacuccunahuan rirca .
40008024	Chashna ricucpimi , yalli huaira jatarishpa , yacuta cuyuchishpa canoata ucuyachigrirca . Chashna cacpipish , Jesusca sueñucurcami .
40008025	Chaimantami paipac yachacuccuna Jesusta ricchachingapac rishpaca : — Apunchic Jesús , ¡ ña ucuyagrinchicca ! ¡ Ñucanchicta quishpichiyari ! — nirca .
40008026	Chaimanta Jesús riccharishpaca : — Mana tucui shunguhuan criccunalla , ¿ ima nishpatac yallita mancharicunguichic ? — nirca . Chaimantami Jesusca jatarishpa yacutapish cuchatapish rimarca . Shina rimacpica , huairapish , cuchapish casilla tucurcami .
40008027	Chaimantami paicunapura mancharinacushpa : — ¿ Pitac cai runaca ? Chaica huairapish , yacupish cazunmi — ninacurca .
40008028	Jesús yacuta pasashpaca , Gadara llactamanmi chayarca . Chaipimi supai japishca ishcai runacunaca panteonmanta Jesuspacman shamurca . Paicunaca yalli millaicunami carca . Chaimantami chai ñantaca , pi mana pasai pudirca .
40008029	Paicuna Jesuspacman chayashpaca : — Diospac Churi Jesús , ¿ imatatac nic shamungui ? ¿ Canca manarac llaquichina punzha chayamucpichu llaquichi shamungui ? — nishpa caparirca .
40008030	Paicunapacmanta carupimi achca cuchicuna micushpa puricurca .
40008031	Chaimantami chai supaicunaca : — Ñucanchicta runacunamanta llucchishpaca , chai cuchicunapi yaicuchun saqui — nishpa mañarca .
40008032	Chashna nicpimi Jesusca : — Richiclla — nirca . Chaimantami supaicunaca chai cuchicunapi yaicungapac rirca . Chashna yaicucpica , cuchicunaca jahua quingraimanta singushpami , yacupi aguarishpa tucui huañurca .
40008033	Chashna tucucta ricushpami , cuchicunata michiccunaca mancharishpa , tucui chai imalla tucushcatapish , supai japishcacuna ima tucushcatapish pueblopi huillagrirca .
40008034	Chashna huillacta uyashpaca , tucui chai pueblopi causac gentecunami Jesuspacman shamurca . Chashna shamushpaca : “ Cai llactamantaca rilla ” nishpami mañarca .
40009001	Chai quipami Jesusca canoapi tiyarishpa , jatun yacu cuchata pasashpa , pai causana puebloman chayarca .
40009002	Chaipimi paralisis ungüi japishca runata chacanapi apamurca . Jambirinata crishpa paicuna shamushcata Jesús ricushpami , chai ungushca runataca : — Huahua , sinchiyailla . Cambac juchacunataca perdonanimi — nirca .
40009003	Chaita maijan mandashcacunata yachachiccuna uyashpaca : — Caica Dios tucushpami , Diosta piñachicun — nishpa , yuyacurca .
40009004	Jesús paicunapac yuyaita yachashpami , paicunataca : — ¿ Ima nishpatac cancunaca mana allita yuyacunguichic ?
40009005	¿ Imata ninatac ashtahuan jahualla : “ Juchacunataca perdonanimi ” nina , mana cashpaca “ jatarishpa , rilla ” nina ?
40009006	Runa Tucungapac shamushca ñucaca cai pachapi juchacunata perdonaclla cashcata cancuna yachachunmi , cai runataca : “ Jatari , canta huandumushca chacanata apashpa , huasiman rilla ” nini — nirca .
40009007	Chashna nicpica , chai runaca jatarishpa , paipac huasiman rircallami .
40009008	Chaita tucui gentecuna ricushpaca , runacunaman poderta cushcamantami mancharinacushpa , Diostaca “ allimari cangui ” nircacuna .
40009009	Chaimanta Jesús rishpaca , Mateotami Roma llactaman mizapi impuestota japishpa , tiyacucta ricurca . Chaimantami paitaca : — Ñucata cati — nirca . Chashna nicpimi , Mateoca jatarishpa catishpa rirca .
40009010	Chaimantaca Jesusca Mateopac huasipimi paipac yachacuccunahuan micucurca . Shinallatac impuestota japic runacunapish , juchayuc cashcamanta chicanyachishca runacunapish chaipimi Jesus-huan mizapi micucurca .
40009011	Chaimantami fariseocunaca : — ¿ Ima nishpatac cancunapac yachachicca impuestota japiccunahuanpish , juchayuc cashcamanta chicanyachishca runacunahuanpish micucunyari ? — nishpa , yachacuccunaman tapurca .
40009012	Chaita Jesús uyashpaca : — Mana ungushcacunaca jambictaca mana mashcanchu , ashtahuanpish ungushcacunallami jambictaca mashcan .
40009013	Diosca : “ Animalcunata ñucaman cushpa rupachinapac randica , shungumanta llaquiccuna cachunmi munani ” ninmi . Ñucaca cashcata ruhuaccunataca mana cayac shamurcanichu , ashtahuanpish juchayuccunatami llaquirishpa Diosman cuti richun cayac shamurcani — nirca .
40009014	Bautizac Juanpac yachacuccuna shamushpaca : — Ñucanchicpish , fariseocunapish tauca cutinmi ayunanchic . ¿ Ima nishpatac cambac yachacuccunaca mana ayunancuna ? — nishpa tapurca .
40009015	Chashna tapucpimi Jesusca : — ¿ Bodapi caccunaca , Novio paicunahuan cacpica , llaquillachu canga ? Ashtahuanpish Novio illaclla cana punzhacunami chayamucun . Chai punzhapimi ayunanga .
40009016	Pipish mauca churanataca , mushuc pañohuanca mana remendanchu . Chashna ruhuacpica , mushuc pañoca uchillayashpa , mauca churanataca ashtahuanmi lliquinman .
40009017	Chai shinallatac pipish cunanlla ruhuashca vinotaca , mauca capachupica mana churanchu . Chashna churacpica , capachuca lliquiringami . Chashna lliquiricpica , vinopish , capachupish tucuringami . Chaimantami cunanlla ruhuashca vinotaca , mushuc capachupi churana . Chashna ishcaitac mushuc cashpaca , imapish mana tucungachu — nirca .
40009018	Jesús chashna nicucpimi , israelcunata mandac chayashpa , cungurishpaca : — Ñuca ushimi ñacalla huañun . Shina huañushca cacpipish , can paipac umapi maquita churacpica , causaringallami — nirca .
40009019	Chashna nicpimi Jesusca jatarishpa , paipac yachacuccunahuan , runahuan rirca .
40009020	Chashna ricucpimi , chunga ishcai huatata yahuar cacharirishpa ungushca huarmi , Jesuspac huashata rishpa , churana tuparirca .
40009021	Paipac shungupica : “ Jesuspac churanapi tuparishpaca alliyashallami ” yuyashpami , chashnaca tuparirca .
40009022	Chaimanta Jesús tigrarishpa , huarmita ricushpaca : — Huahua , sinchiyailla . Can crishcamantaca ñami alli tucungui — nirca . Chai ratollatacmi huarmica alli tucurca .
40009023	Mandacpac huasiman Jesús chayashpa , enterrangapac flautapi tocacuctapish , gentecuna caparishpa huacacuctapish
40009024	ricushpaca : — Caimanta llucshichic . Huambraca mana huañushcachu , sueñucunllami — nirca . Gentecuna chaita uyashpaca Jesusta burlarcami .
40009025	Gentecunata llucchishca quipami , Jesusca ucuman yaicushpa , huambrapac maquipi japirirca . Chashna maquipi japiricpica jatarircallami .
40009026	Jesús chashna ruhuashcaca , tucui chai llactacunapimi yacharirca .
40009027	Jesús chaimanta ricucpimi , ñahui mana ricuc ishcai runacuna catishpa rishpaca : — Mandac Davidpac churi Apunchic Jesús , ¡ ñucanchictaca llaquiyari ! — nirca .
40009028	Jesús huasiman yaicucpi , ñahui mana ricuc chai ishcai runacuna paipacman shamucpimi Jesusca : — ¿ Cancunaca ñuca alliyachinataca cringuichicchu ? — nirca . Shina nicpimi , chai runacunaca : — Apunchic Jesús , crinchicmi — nircacuna .
40009029	Chaimanta Jesús ñahuipi tuparishpaca : — Alliyanata crishcamantaca , cancuna crishca shinallatac alliyaichic — nirca .
40009030	Paicunapac ñahuica pascarircami . Chaimantami Jesusca : — Pacta cancuna alli tucushcata piman huillanguichicman — nirca .
40009031	Ashtahuanpish chai paicuna chaimanta rishpaca , tucui llactacunapimi Jesús imata ruhuashcataca huillarca .
40009032	Ñahui alliyashca runacuna llucshirishca quipaca , supai japishca , mana rimac runatami Jesuspacman apamurca .
40009033	Jesús chai runamanta supaita llucchishpa cachacpica , chai runaca rimai callarircallami . Chaipi caccuna chaita ricushpa , mancharishpaca : “ Cai Israelpica jaicapi mana ricushcatami ricunchic ” ninacurca .
40009034	Ashtahuanpish fariseocunaca : “ Cai runaca supaicunata mandac diablohuan cashpami , supaicunataca llucchishpa cachan ” nircacuna .
40009035	Jesusca tucui pueblocunatapish , llactacunatapish purishpami , israelcuna tandanacuna huasicunapi yachachirca . Dios mandacucmanta alli huillaita huillashpami , tucuilaya ungushcacunatapish alliyachishpa , nanaicunatapish anchuchishpa puricurca .
40009036	Jesusca tauca gentecuna shitashca , michic illaclla ovejacuna shina , caita chaita puricucta ricushpami , yalli llaquirirca .
40009037	Chaimantami paipac yachacuccunataca : — Granota tandanaca achcami . Tandaccunaca ashallami .
40009038	Chaimanta ashtahuan tandaccunata cachachun , Chagrayucta mañaichic — nirca .
40010001	Jesusca paipac chunga ishcai yachacuccunata cayashpaca , supaicunatapish llucchichun , tucuilaya ungüitapish alliyachichun , nanaicunatapish anchuchichunmi poderta curca .
40010002	Chai chunga ishcai apostolcunaca : Pedro nishca Simón , paipac huauqui Andrés , Zebedeopac churicuna Jacobo , Juan ,
40010003	shinallatac Felipe , Bartolomé , Tomás , impuestota japic Mateo , Alfeopac churi Jacobo , Tadeo nishca Lebeo ,
40010004	Celote nishca Simón , Judas Iscariotemi carca . Paimi quipataca Jesustaca japichirca .
40010005	Chai chunga ishcai yachacuccunata Jesús cachashpaca : « Mana israelcunapacmanca ama ringuichicchu . Samaria llacta pueblocunamanpish ama yaicunguichicchu .
40010006	Ashtahuanpish chingarishca ovejacuna shina cac , israelcunapacman ringuichic .
40010007	Cancuna rishpaca : “ Jahua pacha Diosca ñami mandagrin ” nishpa huillanguichic .
40010008	Ungushcacunatapish alliyachinguichic , Lepra ungüitapish pichanguichic , huañushcacunatapish causachinguichic , supaicunatapish llucchishpa cachanguichic . Yangami caita ruhuangapacca poderta chasquircanguichic , chaimantami yanga ruhuana canguichic .
40010009	Curitapish , cullquitapish , cobretapish ,
40010010	cucayu mochilatapish , yanandi churanatapish , ushutatapish , taunatapish ama apanguichicchu . Maipipish imata ruhuacca , japinata charinmi .
40010011	Cancuna mai puebloman , mana cashpaca mai llactaman chayashpaca , alli cuyac runata mashcashpa , paipac huasipi shucman ringacaman chaipi canguichic .
40010012	Chai huasipi chayashpa , chaipi caccunataca saludanguichic .
40010013	Chai huasiyuc cancunata alli chasquicpica , cancuna saludashcaca paicunahuanmi saquiringa . Mana alli chasquicpica , saludashcaca cancunamanmi cutinga .
40010014	Mai pueblopi cashpa , mai huasipi cashpa cancunata mana chasquishpa , cancuna huillashcata mana uyashun nicpica , chaimanta llucshishpa , cancunapac chaquipi catirishca allpatapish chaillapitac chaspishpa ringuichic .
40010015	Taripana punzhapica Sodoma pueblota , Gomorra pueblota llaquichishcatapish yallimi chai pueblopi causaccunaca llaquita apanga . Chaica , chashnatacmi canga .
40010016	Ñucaca cancunataca ovejacunata atuccunapac chaupita cachac shinami cachani . Chaimanta cancunaca culebra shina yuyaisapa , paloma humilde caichic .
40010017	Cuidaringuichic , mandaccunapacmanpish japichingami . Tandanacuna huasicunapimi macanga .
40010018	Ñucata caticushcamantami llactata mandaccunapacmanpish , jatun mandaccunapacmanpish apanga . Shina cacpimi , paicunamanpish , mana israelcunamanpish ñucamanta huillanguichic .
40010019	Mandaccunapacman japichicpica ama : ‘ ¿ Imatashi nishun ? ’ nishpa , llaquiringuichicchu . Cancuna rimai callaricpica , Diosmi yuyaita cunga .
40010020	Mana cancunapac yuyaimantachu rimanguichic , ashtahuanpish Diospac Espiritumi , rimana yuyaita cunga .
40010021	Huauquica quiquin huauquillatatac , taitaca quiquin churillatatacmi huañuchiccunaman japichinga . Huahuacunaca taita mamata piñashpami , huañuchiccunaman japichinga .
40010022	Ñucamantami tucui gentecunapac piñashca canguichic . Maijanpish tucuringacaman llaquita apacmi quishpiringa .
40010023	Maijan pueblopi llaquichicpica , shuctac puebloman ringuichic . Israel llactapi manarac tucuiman huillacpimi , Runa Tucungapac shamushca ñucaca cutimusha . Chaica , chashnatacmi canga .
40010024	Yachacucca yachachicmanta mana ashtahuan yachacchu . Servicpish , amota mana ashtahuan yallichu .
40010025	Yachacuc yachachic shina tucushpaca , allimi canman . Servicpish amo shina tucushpaca , allimi canman . Huasipi taita shina ñucata ‘ supaicunata mandac Beelzebumi ’ nishpaca , cancunatacarin , ¡ imatachari ningacuna !
40010026	Ima pacalla ruhuashcapish ricuringami , Imata pacalla ruhuashcapish yacharingami . Chaimanta gentecunata ama manchanguichicchu .
40010027	Cancunaman pacallapi nishcataca , achicpi huillanguichic . Ringrillapi huillashcataca , huasi jahua pataman huichicushpa huillanguichic .
40010028	Cuerpota huañuchiccunataca ama manchanguichicchu . Cuerpota huañuchishpapish , almataca mana huañuchi pudingachu . Ashtahuancarin almatapish , cuerpotapish ucu pachaman cachac Diosta manchanguichic .
40010029	Ishcai zhutacunataca shuc cullquillapimi catun . Shina cacpipish , cancunapac Taita mana munacpica , shucllapish pambamanca mana urmanchu .
40010030	Cancunapac umapi mashna acchapish yupashcami .
40010031	Chaimanta gentecunata ama manchanguichicchu . Cancunacarin , achca zhutacunatapish yalli valicmari canguichic .
40010032	Maijanpish gentecunaman ñucata caticushcata huillacpica , ñucapish jahua pacha ñuca Taitaman ‘ caticmi ’ nishpa huillashami .
40010033	Maijanpish gentecunapac ‘ mana ricsinichu ’ nicpica , ñucapish jahua pacha ñuca Taitapac ñaupapica : ‘ Mana ricsinichu ’ nishami .
40010034	Ñucataca ama ‘ sumac causaita cungapacmi , cai pachamanca shamurca ’ ninguichicchu . Mana cushi causaita cungapacchu shamurcani , ashtahuanpish piñanacui tiyachunmi shamurcani .
40010035	Churica taitahuan , huarmi huahuaca mamahuan , nueraca suegrahuan piñanacuchingapacmi shamurcani .
40010036	Huasi ucupurallatacmi piñanacunga .
40010037	Maijanpish taita mamata ñucata yalli cuyacca , mana ñucapacchu . Maijanpish paipac huahuacunata ñucata yalli cuyacca , mana ñucapacchu .
40010038	Maijanpish cruzpi chacatashca shina llaquita mana apasha nicca , mana ñucapacchu .
40010039	Maijanpish quiquin causaita llaquicca chingaringami , ashtahuanpish ñucata caticushcamanta quiquin causaita mana llaquicca quishpiringami .
40010040	Maijanpish cancunata chasquicca , ñucatami chasquin . Ñucata chasquicca , ñucata cachac Diostami chasquin .
40010041	Maijanpish Dios ima nishcata huillacta chasquicca , Dios ima nishcata huillac japinatami japinga . Cashcata ruhuacta chasquicca , cashcata ruhuac japinatami japinga .
40010042	Maijanpish ñucata catic , yangalla runaman asha chiri yacuta cucca , Diosmanta japina cashcata japingami . Chaica chashnatacmi canga » nirca .
40011001	Jesús paipac chunga ishcai yachacuccunata yachachishpaca , Galilea llacta pueblocunapi yachachishpa , alli huillaita huillangapacmi rirca .
40011002	Juanca carcelpi cashpami Quishpichic Cristo imata ruhuashcataca yachac chayarca . Chaimantami paipac yachacuccunapuramanta ishcaita Jesusman tapuchun cacharca .
40011003	Paicuna rishpaca : — ¿ Canchu chai shamuna cashca Quishpichic Cristoca cangui ? Mana cashpaca , ¿ shuctachu shuyana canchic ? — nirca .
40011004	Chashna tapucpimi Jesusca : — Caipi imata ricushcatapish , uyashcatapish Juanman huillagrichic .
40011005	Ñahui mana ricuccuna ricucushcatapish , suchucunapish puricushcatapish , leprahuan ungushcacuna alliyashcatapish , ringri mana uyaccuna uyacushcatapish , huañushcacunata causachishcatapish , huacchacunaman alli huillaita huillashcatapish huillagrichic .
40011006	Cushicuichic , ñuca ima ruhuacushcata ricushpa , mana pandariccuna — nircami .
40011007	Juanpac yachacuccuna cutiricpi , Jesús Juanmanta gentecunaman parlashpaca : « Shitashca pambapica , ¿ imatatac ricungapac rircanguichic ? ¿ Huairahuan caiman chaiman cuyuricuc carrizollatachu ricugrircanguichic ?
40011008	Mana cashpaca , ¿ imatatac ricungapac rircanguichic ? ¿ Shuc alli churanata churarishca runatachu ricugrircanguichic ? Alli churanata churarishcaca chayuccunahuanmi cushicushpa , jatun mandaccunapac huasicunapi causan .
40011009	Shinashpaca , ¿ imatatac ricugrircanguichic ? ¿ Dios ima nishcata huillactachu ricugrircanguichic ? Ari , chaitami ricugrircanguichic . Juanca Dios ima nishcata huillactapish yallimi .
40011010	Dios quillcachishcapi Juanmanta rimashpaca : “ Ñuca ima nishcata huillactaca , Quishpichic shamuna ñanta allichichunmi , ñaupachishpa cachani ” nicunmi .
40011011	Cai pachapica Bautizac Juanmanta yallica manatac tiyashcachu . Chashna cacpipish jahua pacha Dios mandacucpica , yangalla imapish mana cacmi , Juanta yalli alli nishcaca . Chaica , chashnatacmi can .
40011012	Bautizac Juan huillai callarishca punzhamanta cunan punzhacamanmi jahua pacha Dios mandacucman yaicusha niccunataca millai gentecunaca chingachinata yuyashpa llaquichin .
40011013	Moisés mandashcapipish , Dios ima nishcata huillaccuna huillashcapipish , Juanmantami huillashca .
40011014	Chashquisha nishpaca , chasquichic . Dios ima nishcata huillac Elías nishcaca , Juanmi .
40011015	Maijanpish ringrita charicca , caita alli uyaichic .
40011016	Cai punzhapi causaccunataca , ¿ imahuantac chimbapurasha ? Paicunaca plaza pambapi huambracuna , caishuc chaishuc caparinacushpa :
40011017	“ Flautapi tocacpipish , mana bailarcanguichicchu . Llaquillata cantacpipish , mana huacarcanguichicchu ninacuc shinami ” ninmi .
40011018	Vinotapish mana ubiac , mana achcata micuc Juan shamucpica : “ Paica supaihuanmi ” ninguichicmi .
40011019	Runa Tucungapac shamushca ñuca imatapish micuc , vinotapish ubiacpica : “ Cai runaca yalli micucmi , vinotapish ubiacmi , impuestota japiccunahuanpish , caishuc juchayuccunahuanpish tandaricmi ” ninguichicmi . Cancuna chashna nicucpipish , Dios yachac cashcataca paita cazuccunami ricuchicun » nirca .
40011020	Jesusca tauca pueblocunapimi , achca milagrocunata ruhuarca . Chashna ruhuacpipish , gentecunaca Diosman mana cutirircachu . Chaimantami , sinchita rimashpaca :
40011021	« ¡ Aij , Corazín pueblolla , Betsaida pueblolla ! Cancunapac pueblocunapi ruhuashca shinata Tiro pueblopi , Sidón pueblopi ruhuashca cacpica , llaquirishpa , sharpa churanata churarishpa , uchupahuan cahuirishpa , Diosman cutirinmanmi carca .
40011022	Taripana punzhapica , Tiro pueblopi , Sidón pueblopi causaccunata yallimi cancunaca llaquichishca canguichic .
40011023	Capernaúm pueblopi causaccuna , ¿ jahua pachaman rishunmi yuyanguichicchu ? Ashtahuanpish ucu pachamanmi shitashca canguichic . Cancunapac pueblopi milagrocunata ruhuashca shina , Sodoma pueblopi ruhuashca cacpica , cunan punzhacamanmi tiyanman carca .
40011024	Taripana punzhapica Sodoma pueblopi causac millai gentecunata yalli cancunaca llaquichishca canguichic , ninimi » nirca .
40011025	Chai quipami Jesusca : « Jahua pachata , cai pachata Mandac ñuca Taitalla , cantaca “ allimari cangui ” ninimi . Canca , cai yachanacunataca alli yuyaiyuc , alli yachaccunamanta pacashpami , huahuacuna shinamanmi , yachana yuyaita cushpa yachachishcangui .
40011026	Ari , ñuca Taitito , chaitami munashcangui .
40011027	Ñuca Taitaca tucuitami ñucamanca curca . Ñuca pipac Churi cashcataca , pi mana yachanchu , ñuca Taitallami yachan . Ñuca Taita pi cashcataca , pi mana yachanchu , ñucallami yachani . Pipish ñuca yuyaita cucllapimi , ñuca Taita pi cashcataca yachan .
40011028	Aparishca , shaicushca shina causaccuna , tucuilla ñucapacman shamuichic . Ñucami cancunataca samachisha .
40011029	Yugota apac shina , ñucata catichic , ñucamanta yachacuichic . Ñucaca mana piñaric , alli shungumi cani . Samaringuichicmi .
40011030	Ñuca yugoca pangallami . Ñuca cushca aparinapish aparinallami » nirca .
40012001	Samana punzhami Jesusca paipac yachacuccunahuan trigo chagra chaupita ricurca . Paipac yachacuccunaca yarcaihuan cashpami , trigo umata cacushpa micui callarirca .
40012002	Chaita fariseocuna ricushpami , Jesustaca : — Uyai , cambac yachacuccunaca samana punzhapi mana ruhuana cashcatami ruhuacun — nirca .
40012003	Shina nicpimi Jesusca : — David paihuan puriccunahuan yarcaihuan imata ruhuashcataca Dios quillcachishcapica , ¿ manachu ricushcanguichic ?
40012004	Paicunaca Diosta mañana huasiman yaicushpami , Diosman cushca tandataca mana micuna cacpipish micurcacuna . Chaitaca curacunami micuc carca .
40012005	Samana punzhapipish curacuna Diosta mañana huasiman yaicushpa , trabajashpapish mana juchallishcataca , ¿ manachu mandashcapica ricushcanguichic ?
40012006	Chaica , Diosta mañana huasitapish yallimi caipi can ninimi .
40012007	Dios quillcachishcapi : “ Animalta cushpa rupachinapac randica , shuccunata llaquiccuna cachun ” nishcataca , ¿ manachu entendinguichic ? Chaita entendishca cashpaca , mana faltayucta mana juchanchinguichicmanchu .
40012008	Runa Tucungapac shamushca ñucami , samana punzha cacpipish , imata ruhuanataca yachani — nirca .
40012009	Jesús chaimanta rishpaca , israelcuna tandanacuna huasimanmi yaicurca .
40012010	Chaipimi maqui chaquishca shuc runa tiyacurca . Chaipi cac gentecuna Jesusta juchanchingaraicu tapushpaca : — Mandashcapica , ¿ samana punzhapipish ungushcata alliyachichun ninchu ? — nirca .
40012011	Shina tapucpimi Jesusca : — Maijan cancuna samana punzhapi shuc oveja jutcupi urmacpica , ¿ manachu llucchinguichicman ?
40012012	Runaca ovejatapish yalli valinmi . Chaimanta samana punzhapica , imapish allitaca ruhuanallami — nirca .
40012013	Chashna nishpami , chai runataca : — Maquita chutai — nirca . Pai maquita chutacpica , alliyashpa , caishuc maqui shinallatacmi saquirirca .
40012014	Chaita fariseocuna ricushpa , canzhaman llucshishpaca , ima shina Jesusta huañuchinatami yuyarinacurca .
40012015	Jesús chaita yachashpaca chaimanta rircami . Achca gentecunami catishpa rirca . Jesusca tucui ungushcacunata alliyachishpapish
40012016	paimanta ama piman huillachunmi mandarca .
40012017	Chashnami Dios ima nishcata huillac Isaías huillashca pactarca . Isaías huillashpaca :
40012018	« Caipimi ñuca acllashca servicca . Paitami ñucaca cuyani . Paimi ñucata cushichin . Paimanmi Espirituta cusha . Tucui llactacunapi cashcata ruhuashpa mandanamanta huillanga .
40012019	Paica pihuanpish mana rimarinacungachu , ñancunapipish pai caparishcaca mana uyaringachu .
40012020	Cashcata ruhuashpa taripangacaman huishtuyashca cañatapish mana paquingachu , ashalla japiricuc mechatapish mana huañuchingachu .
40012021	Tucui llactacunami paipi shunguta churashpa shuyanga » nishcami .
40012022	Shuc punzhami supai japishca , ñahui mana ricuc , mana rimaric runata Jesuspacman apamurca . Chashna apamucpica , Jesusca alliyachircami . Chaimantami ñahuipish ricurca , shimipish rimarca .
40012023	Chaimantami tucui gentecuna mancharishpa , caishuc chaishuc : « ¿ Paichu Davidpac aillupuramanta canga ? » nishpa tapunacurca .
40012024	Chaita uyashpami fariseocunaca : « Cai runaca supaicunata mandac Beelzebuhuan cashpami , supaicunataca llucchishpa cachan » nircacuna .
40012025	Chashna yuyacushcata yachashpami Jesusca : « Shuc llactata mandaccunapura piñanacushpa macanacucpica , chai llactaca tucuringami . Shuc pueblopi , mana cashpaca shuc huasipi causaccunapura piñanacushpa macanacucpica tucuringami .
40012026	Satanás mandashca supaicuna piñanacushpa , llucchishpa cachanacucpica , pai mandanaca tucuringami .
40012027	Ñuca Beelzebuhuan supaicunata llucchishpa cachacpica , cancunapac yachacuccunaca , ¿ pihuantac supaicunata llucchin ? Chashna cacpica , paicunallatacmi cancuna pandaricushcataca ricuchincuna .
40012028	Ñucaca Diospac Espirituhuanmi supaicunataca llucchishpa cachani . Chashna ruhuashpami , cancunapurapi Dios mandacushcata ricuchicuni .
40012029	Pipish shuc sinchi runapac huasiman yaicushpa , imata shuhuangapacca , huasiyuc runataracmi chacnanman . Paita chacnashpallami , imatapish shuhuanman .
40012030	Maijanpish mana ñucahuan cashpaca , ñucata piñacmi . Maijanpish ñucahuan mana cashpaca , ñuca tandachishcacunata tucuchicmi .
40012031	Chaimantami cancunataca : Ima juchata ruhuashcatapish , camishcatapish Diosca perdonangami . Ashtahuanpish Diospac Espirituta camishpa rimactaca , Diosca manatac perdonangachu .
40012032	Runa Tucungapac shamushca ñucata rimactaca Diosca perdonangami . Ashtahuanpish Diospac Espirituta rimactaca , cai pachapipish , quipa punzhapipish Diosca manatac perdonangachu .
40012033	Caita yuyarishun : Alli yuraca alli granotami pucun . Mana alli yuraca mana alli granotami pucun . Ima yurapish pucushpami imalaya cashcataca ricuchin .
40012034	Culebrapac huahuacuna , cancunallatac millai cashpaca , ¿ ima shinatac allita rimaringuichic ? Shungupi ima yuyaicuna tiyashcatami , shimica riman .
40012035	Alli runaca paipac shungupi alli yuyai tiyashcamantami , allita riman . Mana alli runaca paipac shungupi millai tiyashcamantami , mana allita riman .
40012036	Ñucaca : Dios taripana punzhapimi shuccunata mana alli rimashcacunaca yacharinga ninimi .
40012037	Chaica , cambac rimashcahuanmi alli nishca cangui . Mana cashpaca cambac rimashcallahuantacmi , llaquichishca cangui » nirca .
40012038	Fariseocunapish , mandashcacunata yachachiccunapish Jesuspacman shamushpaca : — Yachachic , ima milagrota ruhuashpa ricuchi — nirca .
40012039	Chashna nicpimi Jesusca : — Cai mana cric millai gentecunaca milagrota ruhuashpa ricuchichunmi mañancuna . Chashna mañashpapish imata mana ricungacunachu , ashtahuanpish Dios ima nishcata huillac Jonás ima shina tucushcallatami ricunga .
40012040	Ima shinami Jonás quimsa tutata , quimsa punzhata shuc jatun challuapac huicsapi carca , chashnallatacmi Runa Tucungapac shamushca ñucaca , quimsa tutata , quimsa punzhata allpa ucupi casha .
40012041	Nínive pueblopi causaccunaca Dios ima nishcata Jonás huillacpica , llaquirishpa , Diosman cutirircami . Ñucacarin Jonastapish yallimi caipica cani . Dios taripana punzhapica , Ninivepi causaccunami cunan punzhapi causaccuna mana allita ruhuashcamantaca juchanchingapac jataringacuna .
40012042	Sabá llactata jatun mandac huarmipish alli yachac Salomón ima nishcata uyangapacmi , caru llactamanta shamurca . Cunan ñucaca Salomontapish yallimi caipica cani . Chaimantami Dios taripana punzhapica , chai huarmipish cunan punzhapi causaccuna mana allita ruhuashcamantaca juchanchingapac jataringa .
40012043	Shuc runamanta supai llucshishpaca , shitashca pambacunapi samarinata mashcashpami purin . Samarinata mana tarishpaca :
40012044	“ Ñuca llucshimushca huasimanmi cutisha ” nishpami yuyarin . Ña cutimushpaca , sumacta pichashpa , allichishca huasi shinatami chai runataca tarin .
40012045	Chaimantami paita yalli ashtahuan millai caishuc canchis supaicunata pushashpa , chai runapica causangapac shamun . Chaimantami chai runaca ñaupa causacushcatapish yalli ashtahuan millai tucun . Shinallatacmi cunan punzhapi causac millai gentecunapish tucunga — nirca .
40012046	Jesús huillacucpimi , paipac mamapish , huauquicunapish paihuan parlasha nishpa , canzhapi shayacurca .
40012047	Chashna cacpimi , chaipi caccunapuramanta shucca : — Cambac mamapish , cambac huauquicunapish canhuan parlasha nishpami , canzhapi shuyacun — nirca .
40012048	Shina nicpimi Jesusca : — ¿ Pitac ñuca mama , ñuca huauquicunaca ? — nirca .
40012049	Shina nishpa paipac yachacuccunata ricuchishpaca : — Caicunami ñuca mama , ñuca huauquicunaca .
40012050	Maijanpish jahua pacha ñuca Taita munashcata ruhuaccunallami , ñuca mama , ñuca pani , ñuca huauqui — nirca .
40013001	Chai punzhallatacmi Jesusca huasimanta rishpa , cucha patapi tiyarirca .
40013002	Chaiman achca gentecuna cuchuyacpimi , Chaimantami Jesusca shuc canoapi tiyarirca . Achca gentecunami yacu patapi tiyacurca .
40013003	Chaipi Jesús tauca rimaicunata chimbapurashpa yachachishpaca : « Shuc tarpuc runami trigota tarpungapac llucshirca .
40013004	Pai tarpucucpica , maijan muyuca ñanpimi urmarca . Chai muyutaca zhutacuna shamushpami mururca .
40013005	Maijan muyuca rumi allpapimi urmarca . Ashalla allpapi cashcamantami utca huiñarca .
40013006	Chashna cacpipish , chai yuraca mana ucuman sapita charishcamantami , inti rupachicpica chaquirca .
40013007	Maijan muyuca casha chaupipimi urmarca . Casha huiñashpaca aguachircami .
40013008	Ashtahuanpish maijan muyuca alli allpapimi urmarca . Chaimantami allita pucushpa , maijanca shucmanta pasacta , maijanca sucta chungata , maijanca quimsa chungata pucurca .
40013009	Maijanpish ringrita charicca , caita allita uyachun » nirca .
40013010	Chaimantami paipac yachacuccunaca Jesuspacman cuchuyashpaca : — ¿ Imamantatac chimabapurashpa parlangui ? — nishpa tapurca .
40013011	Chashna tapucpimi Jesusca : — Cancunaman Dios mandacucmanta yachachishpaca , pimanpish mana yachachishcatami yachachini , ashtahuanpish shuccunamanca mana chashna yachachishcanichu .
40013012	Maijan alli yuyaita charicmanca , ashtahuanmi cunga . Chashna cucpica , ashtahuanmi charinga . Ashtahuanpish mana charicmantaca , pai ashalla charishcatapish quichungami .
40013013	Chaimantami paicunamanca chimbapurashpa parlani . Paicunaca ricushpapish , mana ricushca shina , uyashpapish mana uyashca shinami , mana entendincuna .
40013014	Paicuna chashna cacpimi , Dios ima nishcata huillac Isaiasca : “ Mashnata uyashpapish , mana entendinchu . Mashnata ricushpapish , mana ricunchu .
40013015	Cai gentecunapac shunguca , rumiyashcami . Paicunapac ringripish tapashca shinami , ñahuipish huichcashca shinami . Mana chashna cacpica , ñahuipish ricunmanmi , ringripish uyanmanmi , shungupi yuyarishpa , ñucapacman cutirinmanmi . Ñucapacman cutiricpica , alliyachimanmi ” nishcami .
40013016	Cushicuichic , cancunapac ñahuipish ricucunmi , ringripish uyacunmi .
40013017	Dios ima nishcata huillaccunapish , cashcata ruhuaccunapish , cunan cancuna ricushcataca ricusha nishpapish mana ricurcachu . Uyasha nishpapish , mana uyarcacunachu . Chaica chashnatacmi .
40013018	Tarpuc runahuan chimbapurashpa parlashca imata nisha nishcata , cancunaca alli uyaichic :
40013019	Ñanpi urmashca muyu shinaca , Dios mandacucmanta huillashcata , uyashpapish mana entendicmi . Dios rimashcata paipac shungupi chasquishcataca , diablo shamushpami chingachinlla .
40013020	Rumi allpapi urmashca muyu shinaca , Diosmanta huillashcata cushicushpa , utca chasquicmi .
40013021	Chaica , mana shungupi sapiyashca cashpami , llaquicuna japicpi , mana cashpaca alli huillaita chasquishcamanta piñacpica cutirinlla .
40013022	Casha chaupipi urmashca muyu shinaca , Dios rimashcata uyashpapish , ima llaquicunamanta , charina yuyaimanta chai uyashcataca saquicmi . Chashnami aguarishpa , mana pucuc muyu shina tucun .
40013023	Alli allpapi urmashca muyu shinaca , Dios rimashcata allita entendicmi . Chaica allita pucushpa maijanca shucmanta quimsa chungata , maijanca sucta chungata , maijanca pasacta pucuc shinami tucun — nirca .
40013024	Jesús chimbapurashpa parlashpaca : « Jahua pacha Dios mandacucca , shuc runa paipac allpapi alli muyuta jichacpi ,
40013025	paita piñac runa shamushpa , gentecuna sueñucucpi , mana alli muyuta jichac shinami .
40013026	Trigo huiñashpa , grano ricuricpica , mana alli quihuapish ricurircami .
40013027	Chashna mana alli quihua ricuricpimi , serviccunaca amotaca : “ Amito , ¿ ima shinatac cai mana alli quihuaca ricurin ? ¿ Manachu cambac allpapica alli muyuta jicharcanchic ? ” nirca .
40013028	Chashna nicpimi paica : “ Maijan ñucata piñac runami mana alli quihuata tarpushca canga ” nirca . Chashna nicpimi , chai serviccunaca : “ ¿ Manachu chai mana alli quihuata trigo chagramanta pilashpa anchuchigrishun ? ” nirca .
40013029	Chashna nicpimi paica : “ Mana , mana alli quihuata pilacushpaca , trigondi pilanguichicmi .
40013030	Trigota cosechana punzhacaman huiñachun saquichiclla . Chai punzhami trigota piticcunataca : ‘ Chai mana alli quihuata pitishpa , rupachingapac huataichic . Ashtahuanpish trigotaca grano huacaichinapi huacaichichic ’ nishpa mandashallami ” nirca » nirca .
40013031	Jesús chimbapurashpa parlashpaca : « Jahua pacha Dios mandacucca , shuc runa paipac allpapi mostaza muyuta tarpushca shinami .
40013032	Mostaza muyuca tucui muyumanta yalli ñutumi . Cutin huiñashpaca , tucui yuracunamanta yallimi tucun . Chai yurapimi , zhutacunapish cuzhancuna » nirca .
40013033	Jesús cutin chimbapurashpa parlashpaca : « Jahua pacha Dios mandacucca , shuc huarmi quimsa taza harinata ashalla levadurahuan chapushpa , punguillichic shinami » nirca .
40013034	Jesusca tucui caicunataca , chimbapurashca parlocunallahuanmi yachachirca . Chashnaca ,
40013035	Dios ima nishcata huillac nishca pactachunmi , tucuita yachachirca . Chai huillacca : « Chimpapurashca parlohuanmi parlasha . Cai pachata ruhuashca punzhamanta pacha , pi mana yachachishcatami huillasha » nishcami .
40013036	Jesús gentecunata cachashpaca , huasimanmi yaicurca . Chaipi cacpi , paipac yachacuccuna cuchuyashpaca : — Trigopi huiñashca chai mana alli quihuan chimbapurashpa parlo imata nisha nishcata yachachi — nirca .
40013037	Chashna tapucpimi Jesusca : — Alli muyuta jichac shinaca , Runa Tucungapac shamushca ñucami cani .
40013038	Allpa shinaca , cai pachapi causac gentecunami . Alli muyu shinaca , Dios mandacucpi causaccunami . Mana alli quihua shinaca , diablo mandashca causaccunami .
40013039	Trigo chagrapi mana alli quihuata jichac shinaca , diablomi . Cosechana nishpaca , cai pacha tucurinatami nisha nin . Trigota cosechaccunaca angelcunami .
40013040	Mana alli quihuata pitishpa rupachic shinami , cai pacha tucuri punzhapica canga .
40013041	Runa Tucungapac shamushca ñucami , mandashca causaccunapuramanta mana allita ruhuaccunatapish , shuccunata pandachiccunatapish tandachichun , angelcunata cachasha .
40013042	Chashna tandachishpami nina hornopi shitanga . Chaipimi huacaihuan quiru caniringa .
40013043	Ashtahuanpish cashcata ruhuaccunaca inti shinami , Dios mandacucpica achic nicunga . Maijanpish ringrita chariccunaca , cai nishcata alli uyaichic .
40013044	Jahua pacha Dios mandacucca curita allpapi pacashca shinami . Chai pacashcata shuc runa tarishpaca , chaillapitacmi pacashpa saquinman . Quipaca cushicushpami pai tucui charishcacunata catushpa , chai allpata randinman .
40013045	Shinallatac jahua pacha Dios mandacucca achca valishca perlasta randingapac mashcac runa shinami .
40013046	Sumac perlasta tarishpaca , paipac tucui charishcacunata catushpami randinman .
40013047	Shinallatac jahua pacha Dios mandacucca linchita yacupi shitacpi , tucuilaya challuacunata apamuc shinami .
40013048	Linchipi challuacuna jundacpica , yacu pataman llucchishpami , allitaca tazapi huacaichishpa , mana allitaca shitan .
40013049	Chashnami cai pacha tucuri punzhapica canga . Chaica angelcuna shamushpami allita ruhuaccunapuramanta mana allicunata chicanyachishpa ,
40013050	jatun ninapi shitanga . Chaipimi huacaihuan quiru caniringa — nirca .
40013051	Jesús paipac yachacuccunata tapushpaca : — ¿ Tucui caicunataca entendinguichicchu ? — nirca . Shina nicpimi , paicunaca : — Ari — nirca .
40013052	Chashna nicpimi Jesusca : — Shinashpaca , jahua pacha Dios mandacucmanta yachachicpica , shuc taita paipac huasimanta huacaichishpa charishcacunata mushuctapish , maucatapish canzhaman llucchic shinami — nirca .
40013053	Jesús chai chimbapurashpa parlashca quipaca , chaimanta rircallami .
40013054	Chashnami Nazaret puebloman chayashpa , tandanacuna huasipi yachachi callarirca . Chaita paicuna uyashpaca : — ¿ Maipitac cai tucuitaca yachacurca ? ¿ Ima shinatac paica milagrocunatapish ruhuanyari ?
40013055	Paica carpinteropac churillami . Paipac mamapish Mariami . Paica Jacobopac , Josepac , Simonpac , Judaspac huauquimi .
40013056	Paipac panicunapish caillapitacmi ñucanchic-huan causancuna . ¿ Maipitac cai tucuitaca yachacurca ? — nishpa mancharinacurca .
40013057	Jesustaca mana crisha nircacunachu . Chaimantami Jesusca : — Dios ima nishcata huillactaca , maipipish allimi chasquin . Ashtahuanpish quiquin llactapi , quiquin familiapurapica mana uyashun nincunachu — nirca .
40013058	Chaimantami Jesusca paipac llactapica mana achca milagrocunata ruhuarca .
40014001	Chai punzhacunapi Galilea llactata mandac Herodes Jesusmanta parlanacucta uyashpa ,
40014002	serviccunata cayashpaca : « Chai Bautizac Juanmi , huañushcacunapuramanta causarishca canga . Chaimantami milagrocunata ruhuacunga » nirca .
40014003	Herodesca paipac huauqui Felipepac huarmi Herodías nishcata uyashpami , Juantaca cadenahuan huatashpa , carcelpi churachishca carca .
40014004	Herodesca Herodias-huanmi apanacushpa causacurca . Chaimantami Bautizac Juanca Herodestaca : « Shucpac huarmihuan causanaca mana allichu » nishca carca .
40014005	Herodesca Juanta huañuchisha nicushpapish , gentecunata manchashpami , mana huañuchirca . Chaica , Juantata Dios ima nishcata huillacmi nicmi carca .
40014006	Herodesca pai huacharishca punzhata yuyarishpami cayashcacunahuan cushicucurca . Chaipimi Herodiaspac huahuaca , tucuipac ñaupapi bailarca . Chaica ricushpami , Herodesca cushicurca .
40014007	Chaimantami Herodesca pai imata mañashca cungapac ari nirca .
40014008	Paipac mama yachachishca cashcamantami , chai huambraca : « Cunanllatac shuc platopi Bautizac Juanpac umata cui » nirca .
40014009	Chaimantami mandac Herodesca mai llaquiricushpapish chaipi caccunapac ñaupapi ari nishcamantaca ,
40014010	Juanpac umata pitimuchun carcelman cacharca .
40014011	Umataca shuc platopi apamushpami , chai solteraman curca . Paica mamamanmi curca .
40014012	Chai quipami Juanpac yachacuccuna shamushpa , paipac cuerpotaca apashpa enterrarca . Chaimantami Jesusman huillangapac rirca .
40014013	Jesús , Bautizac Juan huañushcata yachashpaca , paillami canoapi tiyarishpa , shitashca pambaman rirca . Shina ricpipish , achca gentecunami paicunapac pueblocunamanta llucshishpa , chaquillahuan catirca .
40014014	Jesús canoamanta uricushpa , achca gentecunata ricushpaca , llaquirishpami maijan ungushcacunata alliyachirca .
40014015	Ña amsayamucucpi , yachacuccuna Jesuspacman cuchuyashpaca : — Ña amsayacunmi . Caipica ima huasillapish mana tiyanchu . Gentecuna pueblocunaman rishpa , ima micunatapish randichun cachai — nirca .
40014016	Shina nicpimi Jesusca : — ¿ Imapactac maiman ricunga ? Cancunallatac caraichic — nirca .
40014017	Shina nicpimi paicunaca : — Pichca tanda , ishcai challuallatami charinchic — nircacuna .
40014018	Shina nicpimi Jesusca : — Caiman apamuichic — nirca .
40014019	Chaimantami gentecunata quihua pambapi tiyarichun mandashpa , chai pichca tandata , ishcai challuata japishpa , huichailla ricushpa , Diosta pagui nishpaca , chaupishpa , paipac yachacuccunaman curca . Paicunaca gentecunamanmi cararca .
40014020	Shina caracpica , tucui gentecunami mana nicta micurca . Cutin puchushcataca paipac yachacuccunami chunga ishcai taza jundata tandarca .
40014021	Chai micuccunaca huarmicunata , huahuacunata mana yupashpami , pichca huaranga shina carca .
40014022	Chaimantaca Jesusca paipac yachacuccunata canoapi huichicushpa , cucha chimba ladoman ñaupachishpa cacharca . Shinallatac gentecunatapish huasicunaman cacharcami .
40014023	Shina cachashca quipaca , pailla urcuman rishpami , Diosta mañagrirca . Chaipica tutayangacamanmi pailla carca .
40014024	Canoaca ña chaupi cuchapimi carca . Huaira ñaupamanta jarcacpimi , canoaca yacupi caiman chaiman cuyuricurca .
40014025	Jesusca ña punzhayamucucpimi , yacu jahuata purishpa yachacuccunapacmanca cuchuyacurca .
40014026	Cucha jahuata puricta ricushpami mancharishpa : — ¡ Almatami ricunchic ! — nircacuna .
40014027	Shina mancharicucpimi Jesusca : — Ama mancharichicchu , sinchicuichic , ñucami cani — nirca .
40014028	Shina nicpimi Pedroca : — Apunchic Jesús can cashpaca , ñucatapish yacu jahuata cambacman shamuchun ni — nirca . Shina nicpimi Jesusca :
40014029	— Shamui — nirca . Chaimantami Pedroca canoamanta uricushpa , yacu jahuata paipacman ri callarirca .
40014030	Shina ricushpapish , yalli huairata ricushpami , mancharishpa yacupi ucuyagrirca . Chaimantami : — ¡ Apunchic Jesús , quishpichiyari ! — nishpa caparirca .
40014031	Shina caparincami Jesusca , Pedrota maquimanta japishpaca : — ¿ Ima nishpatac ñucata mana tucui shunguhuan crishpa , mancharcangui ? — nirca .
40014032	Paicuna canoaman huichicucpica , huairaca pararircami .
40014033	Chaimantami canoapi caccunaca Jesuspac ñaupapi cungurishpa : — Canca Diospac Churitacmi cangui — nishpa , alli nircacuna .
40014034	Cucha chimba ladoman pasashpaca , Genesaret llactamanmi chayarcacuna .
40014035	Chaipi causac gentecunaca Jesús cashcata ricsishpami , tucui chai llactacunapi huillarcacuna . Chaimantami ungushcacunata paipacman apamurca .
40014036	Chai ungushcacunaca Jesuspac churana puntallapipish tuparichun saquichunmi mañarcacuna . Jesuspac churanapi tupariccunaca , tucuimi alliyarca .
40015001	Jerusalenmanta shamuc maijan fariseocunapish , mandashcacunata yachachiccunapish Jesuspacman cuchuyashpaca :
40015002	— ¿ Ima nishpatac cambac yachacuccunaca , ñaupa taitacuna yachachishcata mana cazushpa , maquita mana jahuashpa micuncuna ? — nirca .
40015003	Chaimantami Jesusca : — ¿ Cancunapish ima nishpatac Dios mandashcata mana cazushpa , ñaupa taitacuna yachachishcallata catinguichic ?
40015004	Dios mandashpaca : “ Cambac taita mamata cuyangui ” shinallatac “ Maijanpish taita mamata mana alli nicca , huañuchishcami canga ” ninmi .
40015005	Chashna nicucpipish , cancunaca : “ Taita mama imata huahuacunaman mañacpica : ‘ Caica Diosman cuna ofrendami . Chaimantami mana cui pudini ’ ninallami ” ninguichicmi .
40015006	Chashnami taita mamata mana ayudashpa , Dios mandashcata mana cazushpa , yanga yachachishcallata catinguichic .
40015007	¡ Cancunaca mishqui shimi , jayac shungucuna ! Dios ima nishcata huillac Isaías cancunamanta huillashpaca , allitami nirca . Paica :
40015008	“ Cai gentecunaca shimillahuanmi ñucataca alli nincuna . Ashtahuanpish shunguca , ñucamanta carupimi .
40015009	Yangallami ñucata alli nincuna . Paicuna yachachishpapish , runacuna mandashcallatami yachachincuna ” nishcami — nirca .
40015010	Chai quipami Jesusca gentecunata cayashpaca : — Allita uyashpa entendichic :
40015011	Imapish shimita yaicucca mana juchayucta ruhuanchu , ashtahuanpish shungumanta llucshishca , mana alli rimaicunami , runataca juchayucta ruhuan — nirca .
40015012	Chaimantami yachacuccuna Jesuspacman cuchuyashpaca : — Can chashna nicpi , ¿ fariseocuna piñarishcataca yachanguichu ? — nirca .
40015013	Chashna nicpimi Jesusca : — Jahua pacha ñuca Taita mana tarpushca yuraca , ima yura cashpapish sapindi pitishcami canga .
40015014	Ñahui mana ricuc shina pushaccunataca saquichiclla . Ñahui mana ricucpura pushanacushpaca , ishcaitacmi jutcupi urmanga — nirca .
40015015	Chaimantami Pedroca Jesustaca : — Chimbapurashpa parlashcata entendichi — nirca .
40015016	Shina nicpimi , Jesusca : — ¿ Cancunapish manaracchu entendi pudinguichic ?
40015017	Tucui ima micushcapish , huicsamanmi rin . Cutin chaimantaca llucshinmi . ¿ Chaitaca manachu entendinguichic ?
40015018	Ashtahuanpish millai rimashcacunaca shungumanta llucshishpami , runataca juchayucta ruhuan .
40015019	Shungumantami millai yuyaicuna llucshin . Chaimantami huañuchincuna , huainayancuna , ima millaita ruhuancuna , shuhuancuna , llullancuna , millaita rimancuna .
40015020	Cai mana alli yuyaicunami juchayucta ruhuan . Ashtahuanpish maquita mana jahuashpa micunallaca , mana juchayucta ruhuanchu — nirca .
40015021	Jesús chaimanta rishpaca , Tiro , Sidón llactacunamanmi rirca .
40015022	Jesús chaipi cacpimi , Canaán llacta huarmi caparishpaca : — Mandac Davidpac aillupuramanta Apunchic Jesús , ¡ ñucata llaquiyari ! Ñuca huahuatami supai japishpa , llaquichicun — nirca .
40015023	Ashtahuanpish Jesusca imata mana nircachu . Chaimantami yachacuccuna Jesuspacman shamushpaca : — Huashata caparishpa catic huarmita caimanta richun niyari — nishpa mañarca .
40015024	Chashna nicpimi Jesusca : — Diosca ñucataca , oveja chingarishca shina , israelcunapacmanllami cacharca — nirca .
40015025	Chaimanta chai huarmi , paipac ñaupapi cungurishpaca : — Apunchic Jesús , ñucata ayudaiyari — nirca .
40015026	Shina nicpimi Jesusca : — Huahuacunamanta tandata quichushpa , allcucunaman cunaca , mana allichu — nirca .
40015027	Shina nicpimi , chai huarmica : — Ari , Apunchic Jesús . Amocuna mizamanta urmachishca micunataca allcucuna micunllami — nirca .
40015028	Shina nicpimi Jesusca : — ¡ Huarmi , canca tucui shunguhuanmi crishcangui ! Chaimanta can munashca shina ruhuarichun — nirca . Shina nincami , chai huarmipac huahuaca alli tucurca .
40015029	Jesús chaimanta rishpaca , Galilea cucha patamanmi chayarca . Chaimantaca urcuman rishpami , chaipi tiyarirca .
40015030	Chaipi tiyacucpimi , achca gentecuna suchucunatapish , ñahui mana ricuccunatapish , maqui illaccunatapish , mana rimaccunatapish , shuctac ungushcacunatapish apamushpa , Jesuspac ñaupapi churarca . Chashna apamucpica , tucuitami alliyachirca .
40015031	Chaimantami mana rimariccunapish rimarirca , maqui illaccunapish alliyarca , suchucunapish purirca , ñahui mana ricuccunapish ricurca . Chaita ricushpami , gentecunaca cushicushpa , israelcunapac Diostaca “ allimari cangui ” ni callarirca .
40015032	Jesús paipac yachacuccunata cayashpaca : — Cai tucui gentecunami quimsa punzhata caipi ñucahuan cancuna . Paicunaca ima micunata mana charinchu . Paicunataca llaquinayanmi . Mana carashpa , huasiman cachacpica , yalli yarcaihuan , ñanpi tigrangami — nirca .
40015033	Shina nicpimi yachacuccunaca : — Cai tucuiman carangapacca , ¿ maipitac micunataca tarishun ? Caipica pipish mana causanchu — nirca .
40015034	Shina nicpimi Jesusca : — ¿ Cancunaca mashna tandatatac charinguichic ? — nirca . Shina nicpimi paicunaca : — Canchis tanda , asha challuallatami charinchic — nirca .
40015035	Shina nicpimi , Jesusca gentecunata chai pambapi tiyachichun mandarca .
40015036	Chaimantami canchis tandata , asha challuata japishpa , Diosta pagui nirca . Chai quipaca chaupishpa chaupishpami , paipac yachacuccunaman curca . Paicunaca gentecunamanmi cararca .
40015037	Chashna caracpica , mana nictami micurcacuna . Chai puchuchishcataca canchis taza jundatami yachacuccunaca tandarca .
40015038	Chaipi micuccunaca huarmicunata , huahuacunata mana yupashpami , chuscu huaranga carca .
40015039	Chai quipami Jesusca gentecunata cachashpami , canoapi tiyarishpa , Magdala llactaman rirca .
40016001	Fariseocunapish , saduceocunapish shamushpa , Jesusta pandachisha nishpaca : — Jahua pacha Dios cachashcata ricuchingapacca milagrota ruhuashpa ricuchi — nirca .
40016002	Chashna nicpimi Jesusca : « Cancunaca : “ Chishita inti pucayashpa yaicucpica , cayaca sumac punzhami canga ” ninguichicmi .
