40016003	Shinallatac : “ Tutamanta jahuata puyu pucayashca cacpica , cunanca mana alli punzhami cagrin ” ninguichicmi . Cancunaca chaicunata ricushpaca , imalaya punzha cagricushcataca yachanguichicmi . Ashtahuanpish cunan punzha ima tucucushcataca mana yachanguichicchu .
40016004	Diosta mana cazuc , millai gentecuna milagrota ruhuashpa ricuchichunmi ninguichic . Chashna cashpapish imata mana ricunguichicchu , ashtahuanpish Dios ima nishcata huillac Jonás ima tucushcallatami ricunguichic » nirca . Chashna nishpaca chaimanta rircallami .
40016005	Jesuspac yachacuccuna cuchata pasashpaca , tandatami cungarishpa rishca carca .
40016006	Chaipimi Jesusca : — Fariseocunapac , saduceocunapac levaduramanta cuidaringuichic — nirca .
40016007	Chashna nicpimi paicunaca : — Ñucanchic tandata mana apamushcamantami , chashnaca nicunga — ninacurca .
40016008	Chaimantami Jesusca : — Mana sinchi cric runacunalla , ¿ ima nishpatac “ manamari tandata apamushcanchic ” ninacunguichic ?
40016009	Pichca tandata pichca huaranga yalli gentecunaman carashcatapish , chaimanta mashna taza puchushcatapish ¿ manachu yuyaringuichic ? ¿ Manaracchu entendinguichic ?
40016010	Shinallatac canchis tandallata chuscu huaranga yalli gentecunaman carashcatapish , mashna taza puchushcatapish ¿ manachu yuyaringuichic ?
40016011	Ñucaca mana tandamantachu nicuni . Ashtahuanpish fariseocunapac , saduceocunapac levadura shina yachachishcamanta cuidarichunmi nicuni . Chaitaca , ¿ manachu entendinguichic ? — nirca .
40016012	Jesús chashna nicpimi , yachacuccunaca mana tandapi churana levaduramanta nicushcata , ashtahuanpish fariseocunapac , saduceocunapac yachachishcamanta cuidarinamanta yachac chayarcacuna .
40016013	Jesús cuchulla Filipo mandacuc Cesarea puebloman chayashpa , paipac yachacuccunataca : — Runa Tucungapac shamushca ñucataca , ¿ pi cashcatatac gentecunaca yuyan ? — nirca .
40016014	Chashna tapucpimi paicunaca : — Maijan : “ Bautizac Juanmi cangui ” cutin maijan : “ Ñaupa huillac Eliasmi canga ” cutin maijanca : “ Ñaupa huillac Jeremiasmi canga , mana cashpaca , Dios ima nishcata huillaccunamanta maijanmi canga ” nincunami — nirca .
40016015	Shina nicpimi Jesusca : — Cutin cancunaca ñucataca , ¿ pi cashcatatac yuyanguichic ? — nirca .
40016016	Shina tapucpimi Simón Pedroca : — Canca causac Diospac Churi , Quishpichic Cristomi cangui — nirca .
40016017	Shina nicpimi Jesusca : — Jonaspac churi Simón cushicui . Caitaca pi mana yachachishcachu , ashtahuanpish jahua pacha ñuca Taitami yachachishca .
40016018	Ñucapish cantaca Pedromi cangui ninimi . Cai rumi jahuapimi iglesiata chayachisha . Chai iglesiataca huañuipish mana ati pudingachu .
40016019	Canmanmi jahua pacha Dios mandacucman yaicuna llavecunata cusha . Can cai pachapi mana alli nishcataca , jahua pachapipish mana allichu ningami . Can cai pachapi allimi nishcataca , jahua pachapipish alli ningami — nirca .
40016020	Chaimanta Jesús paipac yachacuccunataca : “ Pacta piman ñuca Quishpichic Cristo cashcataca huillanguichicman ” nirca .
40016021	Chashna nishca quipa Jesús paipac yachacuccunata yachachishpaca : — Jerusalén pueblomanmi rina cani . Chaipimi curacunata mandac curacunapish , pushac yuyaccunapish , mandashcacunata yachachiccunapish llaquichicpi , llaquita apashpa huañunami cani . Shina cashpapish quimsa punzhapica causarishallami — nirca .
40016022	Chashna nicpimi Pedroca paillata cayashpaca : — Apunchic Jesús , ¡ Dios ama munachun ! ¡ Chaica manatac tucungachu ! — nirca .
40016023	Chashna nicpi , Jesús Pedrota rimashpaca : — ¡ Satanás caimanta anchuri ! Canca , Dios munashcata ñuca ama ruhuachunmi jarcasha ningui . Canca , Dios imata ruhuasha nishcataca mana yachanguichu , ashtahuanpish gentecuna yuyashcallatami yuyangui — nirca .
40016024	Chaimanta Jesús paipac yachacuccunataca : — Maijanpish ñucata catisha nishpaca , quiquin causaita mana llaquishpa , cruzta apac shina llaquita apana cashpapish , ñucata catichun .
40016025	Maijanpish quiquin causaita llaquicca chingaringami , ashtahuanpish ñucata caticushcamanta quiquin causaita mana llaquicca causangami .
40016026	Maijanpish cai pachapi tucui ima tiyashcata charishpapish , huiñai causaita chingachishpaca , ¿ ima allitac cangayari ? Pai quishpiringapacca , ¿ imatatac cui pudinga ?
40016027	Ashtahuanpish Runa Tucungapac shamushca ñucaca , ñuca Taitapac sumaimana achic nicuc-huan , paipac angelcunahuan cutimushpaca , tucuimanmi imata ruhuashca shina cusha .
40016028	Runa Tucungapac shamushca ñuca mandacucta ricungacamanmi , maijan caipi caccunaca manarac huañunguichic . Chaica chashnatacmi canga — nirca .
40017001	Sucta punzha quipami , Jesusca Pedrotapish , Jacobotapish , paipac huauqui Juantapish pushashpa , shuc jatun urcuman rirca .
40017002	Chaipimi Jesusca paicunapac ñaupapi shuctaclaya tucushpa , ñahuica inti shina jagan nicuc , churanaca luz shina yurac achicyachicuc ricurirca .
40017003	Chaipimi Moisespish , Eliaspish , Jesus-huan parlanacucta ricurcacuna .
40017004	Chaimantami Pedroca Jesustaca : « Apunchic Jesús , ñucanchicca allimi caiman shamushcanchic . Can munacpica , quimsa chucllata ruhuasha , shuctaca canman , shuctaca Moisesman , shuctaca Eliasman » nirca .
40017005	Pedro rimacucpillatacmi , yuranlla puyu paicunata taparca . Chai puyu ucumanta rimashpaca : « Caimi ñuca cuyashca Churi . Paimi ñucataca cushichin . Paita uyanguichic » nirca .
40017006	Yachacuccuna chaita uyashpaca , manchaihuanmi pambacaman cumurirca .
40017007	Chaimanta Jesús cuchuyashpa , tuparishpaca : « Jatarichic , ama mancharichicchu » nirca .
40017008	Paicuna jatarishpaca pitapish mana ricurcachu . Chaipica Jesusllami cashca carca .
40017009	Jesús yachacuccunahuan urcumanta cutishpaca : — Cai ricushcataca Runa Tucungapac shamushca huañushpa , causaringacaman paimanta ama huillanguichicchu — nishpami mandarca .
40017010	Chaimanta yachacuccuna Jesustaca : — ¿ Imamantatac mandashcacunata yachachiccunaca : “ Eliasracmi shamunga ” ninyari ? — nirca .
40017011	Shina nicpimi Jesusca : — Ari , Eliasracmi shamunga . Pai shamushpami , tucuita allichinga .
40017012	Shina cacpipish ñucaca : Eliasca ñami shamurca . Paita mana ricsishpami piñashpa , paicuna munashcata ruhuarca . Shinallatacmi Runa Tucungapac shamushca ñucapish , paicunapac maquipi llaquita apana cani — nirca .
40017013	Jesús chashna nicpimi , yachacuccunaca Bautizac Juanmanta parlacushcata entendirca .
40017014	Jesús achca gentecunapacman chayacpi , shuc runa paipac ñaupaman shamushpa , cungurishpaca :
40017015	— Apunchic Jesús , ñuca churita llaquiyari . Paica yuyaita chingachishpami yacupi , ninapi urmashpa , llaquita apacunlla .
40017016	Cambac yachacuccunapacmanca , ñami apamushpa ricuchircani , ashtahuanpish mana alliyachi pudircachu — nirca .
40017017	Chaimantami Jesusca : — ¡ Aij , mana cric millai gentecunalla ! ¿ Ima horacamantac cancunamanca yachachicushalla ? ¿ Maicamantac cancunahuanca llaquita apacushalla ? Huambrata pushamuichic — nirca .
40017018	Pushamucpica , Jesusca sinchita rimashpami , huambramanta supaitaca llucchishpa cacharca . Huambraca chai ratollatacmi alli tucurca .
40017019	Chaimantami yachacuccuna Jesusta pacalla tapushpaca : — ¿ Ima nishpatac ñucanchicca supaita mana llucchi pudircanchic ? — nirca .
40017020	Shina nicpimi Jesusca : — Cancunaca , mana tucui shunguhuan cricchu canguichic . Cancuna crishca shuc uchilla mostaza muyu shinallapish cacpica , cai urcuta “ caimanta chimbaman ri ” nicpica , rinmanllami . Chashna ashallatapish cric cashpaca , imapish ruhuanguichicmanmi . Chaica chashnatacmi can .
40017021	Cai shina supaicunataca ayunashpa , Diosta mañashpallami llucchina — nirca .
40017022	Jesusca paipac yachacuccuna Galilea llactapi cacpimi , paicunataca : « Runa Tucungapac shamushca ñucataca , runacunaman japichingacunami .
40017023	Paicunami ñucataca huañuchinga . Shina huañuchicpipish , quimsa punzhapica causarishami » nirca . Chaimantami yachacuccunaca munai llaquirirca .
40017024	Jesús Capernaúm puebloman chayacpimi , Diosta mañana huasimanta impuestota japiccuna Pedropacman cuchuyashpaca : — Cancunata yachachicca , ¿ Diosta mañana huasimanta impuestota paganllachu ? — nishpa tapurca .
40017025	Shina nicpimi Pedroca : — Ari , paganllami — nirca . Pedro huasiman chayacpi , Jesús tapushpaca : — ¿ Simón imatatac yuyangui ? Cai pacha jatun mandaccunaca , ¿ paicunapac llactacunamantachu , mana cashpaca , shuctac llactacunamantachu impuestotaca chasquincuna ? — nirca .
40017026	Shina nicpimi Pedroca : — Shuctac llactacunamantami chasquin — nirca . Shina nicpimi Jesusca : — Shinashpaca , quiquin llactapi causaccunaca mana paganachu canchic .
40017027	Ashtahuanpish impuestota japiccunata mana piñachingapacca , cuchaman ri . Chaiman chayashpaca , anzuelota shitangui . Punta japishca challua shimipimi cullquita taringui . Chaita canmantapish , ñucamantapish impuestota cungui — nirca .
40018001	Chai punzhacuna yachacuccuna Jesuspacman cuchuyashpaca : — Jahua pacha Dios mandacucpica , ¿ Pitac ashtahuan alli nishca canchic ? — nishpa tapurca .
40018002	Chaimantami Jesusca shuc huahuata cayashpa , paicunapac ñaupapi churashpaca :
40018003	— Cancuna huahuacuna shina mana tucushpa , huahuacuna ruhuac shina mana ruhuashpaca , jahua pacha Dios mandacucmanca mana yaicunguichicchu . Chaica chashnatacmi canga .
40018004	Maijanpish cai huahuacuna shina humildemi jahua pacha Dios mandacucpica tucuimanta yalli alli nishcaca canga .
40018005	Maijanpish ñuca shutipi shuc huahuata chasquicca , ñucatami chasquin .
40018006	Maijanpish cai huahuacuna shina ñucata caticcunata juchapi urmachictaca , cutana rumita cungapi huatashpa , jatun cuchapi shitanami ashtahuan alli canman .
40018007	Cai pachapica , juchapi urmachiccunaca tiyangallatacmi . Mana tucuringachu . Shina cacpipish , ¡ juchapi urmachicca , imachari tucunga !
40018008	Chaimanta cambac maqui , cambac chaqui juchapi urmachicpica , pitishpa shitangui . Ishcai chaquindi , ishcai maquindi mana huañuc ninapi shitashca canapac randica , chulla chaquilla , chulla maquilla jahua pachaman yaicunami canmanca ashtahuan alli canga .
40018009	Cambac ñahui juchapi urmachicpica , llucchishpa shitangui . Ishcai ñahuindi ucu pacha ninapi shitashca canapac randica , chulla ñahuilla jahua pachapi yaicunami canmanca ashtahuan alli canga .
40018010	Cai huahuacuna shinapuramanta maijanta ama mana valichinguichicchu . Ñucaca : Paicunata jahua pacha Taitapac ñahuita ricuc angelcunami cuidacun ninimi .
40018011	Runa Tucungapac shamushca ñucaca , chingarishcacunata quishpichingapacmi shamurcani .
40018012	¿ Imatatac yuyanguichic ? Shuc runa patsac ovejata michicushpa , shuc ovejata chingachishpaca , ¿ manachu iscun chunga iscunta michinapi saquishpa mashcagrinman ?
40018013	Ña tarishpaca , mana chingarishca iscun chunga iscun ovejamanta yallimi cushicunman . Chaica chashnatacmi can .
40018014	Chashnallatacmi jahua pachapi cac Taitapish , cai huahua shinacunamanta shucllapish ama chingarichun munan .
40018015	Maijan cric canta llaquichishpa juchallicpica , paillata cayashpa , paillahuan rimangui . Pai can rimashcata uyashpaca , cutinllatacmi Diospacman cutinga .
40018016	Can rimashcata mana uyacpica , shucta , mana cashpaca ishcaita pushashpa ringui . Ishcai , mana cashpaca quimsa rishpa uyashpami , cierto cashcata huillanga .
40018017	Paicunata mana uyacpica , tandanacushca criccunaman huillangui . Paicunatapish mana uyacpica , Diosta mana cricta shina , impuestota japicta shina charinguichic .
40018018	Cai pachapi cancuna allimi nishcaca , jahua pachapipish alli nishcallatami canga . Cai pachapi mana allichu nishcaca , jahua pachapipish mana alli nishcallatami canga . Chaica chashnatacmi canga .
40018019	Cutinllatacmi nini : Cancunapuramanta maijanhuan shuc yuyailla tucushpa , cai pachapi imata ruhuachun Diosta mañacpica , jahua pachapi cac ñuca Taitaca cungami .
40018020	Maipimi ishcai , mana cashpaca quimsa ñuca shutipi tandanacucpica , ñucaca chaipimi cani — nirca .
40018021	Chaimanta Pedroca Jesuspacman shamushpaca : — Apunchic Jesús , ¿ mashna cutincamantac ñucata piñachictaca perdonasha ? ¿ Canchis cutinchu perdonasha ? — nirca .
40018022	Shina nicpimi Jesusca : — Mana canchis cutinllachu perdonana cangui , ashtahuanpish canchis cutin canchis chunga cutinmi perdonana nini .
40018023	Jahua pacha Dios mandacucca , shuc jatun mandac paita serviccuna mashna debishcata tapungapac cayac shinami .
40018024	Tapungapac cayacpica , chunga huaranga talento cullquita debic shuc runatami pushamurca .
40018025	Pai cutichingapac cullquita mana charicpimi , chai mandacca huarmitapish , huahuacunatapish , tucui charishcacunatapish catuchun mandarca .
40018026	Chaimantami chai debic runaca mandacpac ñaupapi cumurishpaca : “ Amito , ashallitota shuyai , ñuca debishcataca cutichishallami ” nishpa , mañarca .
40018027	Shina nicpimi , mandac paita llaquishpaca : “ Shinashpaca saquilla , ama cutichichu ” nirca .
40018028	Chai servic chaimanta rishpaca , paiman ashalla cullquita debic runahuanmi tuparca . Chashna tupashpaca : “ ¡ Debita cutichi ! ” nishpami , cungapi japirishpa sipi callarirca .
40018029	Chashna ruhuacpimi , chai ashalla cullquita debic runa paipac ñaupapi cungurishpaca : “ Ashata shuyai , ñuca debishcataca cutichishallami ” nishpa , mañarca .
40018030	Chashna mañacpipish , chai runaca mana uyarcachu , ashtahuanpish carcelpimi debita cutichingacaman churarca .
40018031	Caishuc serviccuna chaita ricushpaca , mai llaquirishpami , tucui ima tucushcata jatun mandacman huillagrirca .
40018032	Chaimantami chai mandacca chai debic runata cutin cayachishpaca : “ ¡ Millai runa , can mañacpica , achcata debishcatapish saquircanillami !
40018033	¿ Ima nishpatac ñuca canta llaquishpa debita saquishca shinallatac , canpi caishuc servic runata mana saquircangui ? ” nirca .
40018034	Chashna piñarishpami , tucui debishcata cutichingacaman carcelpi llaquita apachun churachirca — nirca .
40018035	Jesusca : — Chashnallatacmi jahua pacha Taitapish cancunapura tucui shunguhuan mana perdonanacucpica ruhuanga — nirca .
40019001	Chaicunata nishca quipami , Jesusca Galilea llactamanta rishpa , Jordán yacu chimba lado Judea llactaman rirca .
40019002	Achca gentecunami Jesusta caticurca . Chaipimi Jesusca ungushcacunata alliyachirca .
40019003	Chaimantami maijan fariseocuna Jesuspacman cuchuyashpa , paita pandachisha nishpaca : — ¿ Cusaca huarmimanta raquirinaca allichu canga ? — nishpa , tapurca .
40019004	Chashna nicpimi Jesusca : — Dios cai pachata ruhuashpaca , caritapish , huarmitapish ruhuarcami . ¿ Chaitaca manachu Dios quillcachishcapica ricushcanguichic ?
40019005	Dios quillcachishcapica : “ Carica taita mamata saquishpa , paipac huarmihuanmi tandaringa . Chashna tandanacushpaca , shucllami tucunga ” nircami .
40019006	Chashna cashcamantaca ña mana ishcaichu , ashtahuanpish shucllami can . Chaimanta Dios tandachishcataca , pi mana chicanyachinachu can — nirca .
40019007	Fariseocuna Jesusta tapushpaca : — ¿ Ima nishpatac Moisesca firmata cushpaca , huarmimanta raquirichunlla nishpa mandarca ? — nirca .
40019008	Chashna nicpimi Jesusca : — Moisesca cancuna sinchi shungu cacpimi , huarmimanta raquirichun saquirca , ashtahuanpish callaripica , mana chashnachu carca .
40019009	Shina cacpipish ñucaca : Manapish huarmi huainayacpi , huarmimanta raquirishpa shuc-huan cazaracca , juchallinmi ninimi — nirca .
40019010	Chashna nicpimi yachacuccunaca : — Huarmimanta mana raquirinalla cacpica , cazaranaca mana allichu — nirca .
40019011	Chashna nicpimi Jesusca : — Mana tucui caricunachu caita entendincuna , ashtahuanpish Dios yuyaita cushcacunallami caitaca entendin .
40019012	Maijancunaca capashca shinami huacharin . Cutin maijancunaca capashcatacmi cancuna . Cutin maijancunaca jahua pacha Dios mandacucpi servingapacmi , capashca shina tucun . Chashnami tauca runacuna mana cazarashpa causancuna . Maijanpish cai shina casha nishpaca chashna cachunlla — nirca .
40019013	Huahuacunapac uma jahuapi maquita churashpa Diosta mañachunmi Jesuspacman pushamurca . Chaita ricushpami paipac yachacuccunaca piñarirca .
40019014	Chaimantami Jesusca : — Huahuacuna ñucapacman shamuchun , ama jarcaichicchu . Cai huahuacuna shina caccunami Dios mandacucmanca yaicunga — nirca .
40019015	Jesusca huahuacunapac uma jahuapi maquita churashpa mañashpaca , chaimanta rircallami .
40019016	Shuc runa Jesuspacman shamushpaca : — Yachachic , huiñai causaita charingapacca , ¿ ima allitatac ruhuana cani ? — nishpa tapurca .
40019017	Shina nicpimi Jesusca : — ¿ Ima nishpatac allimanta tapungui ? Allica , shucllami tiyan . Huiñai causaita charisha nishpaca , mandashcacunata pactachingui — nirca .
40019018	Chashna nicpimi chai mosoca : — ¿ Maijan mandashcacunatatac pactachina cani ? — nirca . Chashna nicpimi Jesusca : — Ama huañuchingui , ama shuhuangui , ama llullangui , ama huainayangui ,
40019019	taita mamata cuyangui . Can ima shinami cuyaringui , chashnallatac shuccunatapish cuyangui — nirca .
40019020	Chashna nicpimi , chai mosoca : — Chaicunataca tucuitami pactachishcani . Ashtahuanca , ¿ imatatac ashtahuan ruhuana cani ? — nirca .
40019021	Chashna nicpimi Jesusca : — Diospac ñaupapi alli canata munashpaca , tucui charishcacunata catushpa , huacchacunaman cugri . Chashna ruhuashpami , jahua pachapica achcata charingui . Chashna ruhuashpaca , ñucata catilla — nirca .
40019022	Chai mosoca yalli chayucmi carca . Chaimantami chashna nicpica , yallita llaquirirca .
40019023	Chaimantami Jesusca paipac yachacuccunataca : — Chayuccuna Dios mandacucman yaicunaca sinchimi canga . Chaica chashnatacmi .
40019024	Shuc chayuc runa , Dios mandacucman yaicunapac randica , shuc camellomi auja ringrita pasarinman — nirca .
40019025	Chaita yachacuccuna uyashpaca , ashtahuan mancharishpami : — Chashna cacpica , ¿ pitac quishpiri pudingayari ? — ninacurca .
40019026	Chashna nicpi , Jesús paicunata ricurashpaca : — Gentecunapac yuyaipica , maita mana quishpiripacchu , ashtahuanpish Diosmanca imapish ruhuaipacllami — nirca .
40019027	Chashna nicpimi Pedroca : — Ñucanchicca tucui charishcacunata saquishpami , cantaca caticunchic . ¿ Chaimantaca imatatac japishun ? — nishpa tapurca .
40019028	Chaimantami Jesusca : — Cai pachata Dios mushucta ruhuacucpimi , Runa Tucungapac shamushca ñucaca , sumaimana achicllapi mandai callarisha . Chaipica cancunapish ñucata caticcuna cashcamantaca , chunga ishcai mandaccuna mandashpa tiyarinapi tiyarishpami , chunga ishcai Israel aillucunata mandanguichic . Chaica chashnatacmi canga .
40019029	Maijanpish ñucata catingaraicu huasita , huauquicunata , panicunata , taita mamata , huarmita , huahuacunata , allpata saquicca , chaicunamanta patsac yallihuanmi japinga . Huiñai causaitapish japingami .
40019030	Chaica cunan punzhapi ‘ allimi cani ’ niccunaca , yangallami tucunga . Cutin , cunan punzhapi yangalla caccunaca , alli nishcami canga .
40020001	Jahua pacha Dios mandacucca , shuc amo paipac uvas chagrata pallachingapac , tutamanta gentecunata mashcangapac llucshic shinami .
40020002	Ña tarishpaca , shuc punzhapi mashnata paganata parlashpami , uvasta pallachun cacharca .
40020003	Cutin punzhallata puebloman llucshishpaca , taucacuna plazapi yangalla tiyacuctami ricurca .
40020004	Paicunata ricushpaca : “ Cancunapish ñuca chagrapi uvasta pallangapac richic . Mashnata pagana cashcataca pagashallami ” nirca . Shina nicpica , paicunapish rircallami .
40020005	Cutinllatac chaupi punzhata , quimsa pacha chishita rishpapish , chashnallatacmi ruhuarca .
40020006	Cutinllatac pichca pacha chishita plazaman rishpapish , taucacuna yangalla tiyacuctami ricurca . Chashna ricushpaca : “ ¿ Ima nishpatac cancunaca yanga tucui punzha caipi canguichic ? ” nirca .
40020007	Shina nicpica paicunaca : “ Pipish mana trabajota cunchu . Chaimantami yangalla caipi tiyacunchic ” nirca . Chashna nicpimi amoca : “ Cancunapish richic , ñuca chagrapi uvasta pallagrichic ” nirca .
40020008	Ña tutayamucucpi , amo mayordomota cayashpaca : “ Pallaccunata cayashpa , quipata yaicuccunamanpish , punta yaicuccunacamanpish mashnata pagana cashcata pagai ” nirca .
40020009	Pichca pacha chishita yaicuccunapish tucui punzha trabajomantami cullquita chasquirca .
40020010	Shinallatac tutamanta pallangapac yaicuccuna chayashpaca : “ Ñucanchicca yallitami japishun ” nishpami yuyacurca . Ashtahuanpish shuc punzha trabajollamantami japirca .
40020011	Chashna shuc punzhallamanta japishpami chagrayuc amotaca :
40020012	“ Cai quipata yaicuccunaca shuc horasllatami trabajashca , ashtahuanpish ñucanchicca tucui punzhami rupaipi llaquita apashpa , trabajashcanchic . ¿ Chashna cashca jahuachu , paicunamanpish ñucanchic-huan pacta pagangui ? ” nirca .
40020013	Chaimantami amo paicunapuramanta shucta cayashpaca : “ Uyai , cantaca ima mana allita mana ruhuacunichu . ¿ Manachu shuc punzha mashnata paganata parlanacurcanchic ?
40020014	Cunanca cambac pagota japishpa ri . Ñucaca cai quipata pallangapac yaicuccunamanpish , canhuan pacta paganatami munani .
40020015	Ñuca cullquihuanca , imata ruhuasha nishpapish ruhuashallami . ¿ Chashna allita ruhuacpichu envidiahuan piñaringui ? ” nirca .
40020016	Chai shinallatacmi punta caccunaca quipa cangacuna , cutin quipa caccunaca punta cangacuna — nishpami , Jesusca yachachirca .
40020017	Jesús Jerusalén puebloman ricushpa , paipac chunga ishcai yachacuccunallata cayashpaca :
40020018	« Cunanca Jerusalenmanmi ricunchic . Chaipimi Runa Tucungapac shamushca ñucataca , curacunata mandac curacunaman , mandashcacunata yachachiccunamanmi japishpa cungacuna . Paicunami “ huañunami cangui ” nishpa ,
40020019	mana israelcunaman cungacuna . Paicunaca ñucata pucllashpa asingami . Macashpa , cruzpi chacatashpami huañuchinga . Chashna huañuchicpipish , quimsa punzhapica causarishallami » nirca .
40020020	Zebedeopac huarmimi Jesuspacman shamushpa , paipac ñaupapi cungurishpa mañarca .
40020021	Chashna mañacpimi Jesusca : — ¿ Imatatac ningui ? — nirca . Chashna nicpimi chai huarmica : — Ñuca huahuacunata can mandanapi shuctaca cambac alli maquiman , shuctaca cambac lluqui maquiman tiyachingui — nirca .
40020022	Chashna nicpimi Jesusca : — Cancunaca imata mañacushcatapish mana yachanguichicchu . ¿ Cancunaca jayacta ubiac shina llaquita ñuca shina apai pudinguichicchu ? — nirca . Chashna nicpimi paicunaca : — Ari , apashunllami — nirca .
40020023	Chashna nicpimi Jesusca : — Ari , cancunaca ñuca shina llaquita apanguichicmi . Ashtahuanpish maijanta ñuca alli maquiman , lluqui maquiman tiyachinataca , Diosmi maijanman allichishcata charicun . Chaitaca mana ñucachu ruhuasha — nirca .
40020024	Chaita caishuc chunga yachacuccuna uyashpaca , chai huauquicunahuanca piñarircami .
40020025	Chaimanta Jesús paicunata cayashpaca : — Cai pachapi mandaccunaca quiquin munashcata ruhuachishpami , gentecunataca charincuna . Chai mandaccunatapish shuctac ashtahuan jatun mandacca mandanllami . Chaitaca yachanguichicmi .
40020026	Cancunapurapica mana chashnachu cana canguichic , ashtahuanpish cancunapurapi maijan mandac casha nishpaca , caishuccunata servinami canguichic .
40020027	Maijanpish cancunapurapi punta casha nishpaca , yangalla tucushpami , caishuccunata servina canguichic .
40020028	Chai shinallatacmi Runa Tucungapac shamushca ñucaca , mana servichingapac shamurcani , ashtahuanpish servingapac , huañushpa achcacunata quishpichingapac shamurcani — nirca .
40020029	Jesús paipac yachacuccunahuan Jericó pueblomanta llucshicucpica , achca gentecunami caticurca .
40020030	Ñanpi tiyacuc , ñahui mana ricuc ishcai runacuna Jesús chaita pasacucta uyashpaca : — ¡ Mandac Davidpac aillupuramanta Apunchic Jesús , ñucanchictaca llaquiyari ! — nishpa , mañarca .
40020031	Gentecuna upallai nicpipish paicunaca : — ¡ Mandac Davidpac aillupuramanta Apunchic Jesús , ñucanchictaca llaquiyari ! — nishpami , ashtahuan caparirca .
40020032	Chaimanta Jesús shayarishpa , paicunata cayashpaca : — ¿ Imatatac ruhuachun ninguichic ? — nirca .
40020033	Chashna nicpimi paicunaca : — Apunchic Jesús , ñucanchic ñahuicuna ricuchunmi munanchic — nirca .
40020034	Chaimantami Jesusca paicunata llaquishpa , paicunapac ñahuipi tuparirca . Chashna tuparicpica , ñapish ñahuicuna ricucpi , Jesusta catishpa rircacunallami .
40021001	Jerusalén puebloman chayamucushpaca , Olivos urcu ladopi cac Betfagé uchilla pueblo chimba ladomanmi chayarca . Chaiman chayashpa , ishcai yachacuccunata Jesús cachashpaca :
40021002	« Chai chimba llactaman richic . Chaipimi shuc mama burro , huahua burrondi huatashca shayacunga . Chaita cacharishpa apamugrichic .
40021003	Cancuna cacharicucpi , maijan imata nicpica cancunaca : “ Apunchic Jesusmi apamuchun cachan . Ñallami saquic shamushun ” ninguichic » nirca .
40021004	Tucui caicunaca Dios ima nishcata huillac huillashca pactachunmi , chashnaca tucurca . Pai huillashpaca :
40021005	« Sión pueblopi causaccunataca : “ Jatun Mandacca cuyai shunguhuanmi burropi montashca cancunapacman shamucun . Paica aparic burropac huahua burritopimi montashca shamucun ” nishcami » nirca .
40021006	Yachacuccuna rishpaca , Jesús nishca shinallatacmi ruhuarca .
40021007	Burrota , huahua burrondi apamushpa , churanacunata burropi churacpica , Jesusca montarcami .
40021008	Achca gentecunami churanacunata ñanpi churarca . Maijancunaca sacha ramacunata pitishpami , ñanpi churarca .
40021009	Chashnami huashata riccunapish , ñaupashpa riccunapish : « ¡ Mandac Davidpac aillupuramanta Apunchic Jesús quishpichiyari ! ¡ Dios cachashca shamucca , alli nishca cachun ! ¡ Jahua pachapipish alli nishca cachun ! » nishpa caparircacuna .
40021010	Jesús Jerusalenman yaicucpi , tauca gentecuna mancharinacushpaca : — ¿ Pitac caica ? — nishpa tapurca .
40021011	Shina tapucpimi Jesus-huan shamuccunaca : — Galilea llacta Nazaret pueblomanta , Diosmanta huillac Jesusmi — nircacuna .
40021012	Jesús Diosta mañana huasiman yaicushpaca , chai ucupi catushpa , randishpa tiyaccunatami llucchishpa cacharca . Cullquita cambiana mizacunatapish , paloma catuna mizacunatapish
40021013	tigrachishpaca : « Dios quillcachishcapica : “ Ñuca huasica , ñucaman mañana huasimi ” ninmi . Ashtahuanpish cancunaca shuhuaccuna miticuna machaitami ruhuashcanguichic » nirca .
40021014	Jesús Diosta mañana huasipi cacpica , ñahui mana ricuccunapish , suchucunapishmi shamurca . Jesusca paicunataca alliyachircami .
40021015	Curacunata mandac curacunapish , mandashcacunata yachachiccunapish chaipi Jesús milagrota ruhuacta ricushpa , huahuacuna : “ ¡ Mandac Davidpac aillupuramanta Apunchic Jesús quishpichiyari ! ” nicta uyashpaca , yallitami piñarirca .
40021016	Chaimantami Jesustaca : — Chai huahuacuna ima nicuctaca , ¿ manachu uyangui ? — nirca . Chashna nicpimi Jesusca : — Ari , uyanimi . Cancunaca , ¿ manachu Dios quillcachishcapi ima nicushcataca ricushcanguichic ? Chaipica : “ Uchilla huahuacunatapish , chuchucuc huahuacunatapish canta alli nichunca rimachishcanguimi ” ninmi — nirca .
40021017	Jesusca paicunata chaipi saquishpami , Jerusalenmantaca Betania puebloman rishpa , chaipi pacarirca .
40021018	Tutamanta Jerusalén puebloman Jesús cuticushpaca yarcachircami .
40021019	Jesusca ñan ladopi shuc higo yurata ricushpami , higota pactangapac cuchuyarca . Ashtahuanpish chai yuraca pangacuna jundashcami cashca carca . Chaimantami chai yurataca : “ Jaicapi ama pucuchun ” nirca . Chashna nincami , chai yuraca chaquirca .
40021020	Chaita paipac yachacuccuna ricushpa , mancharinacushpaca : — ¿ Ima shinatac cai higoca tigrai chaquirca ? — nircacuna .
40021021	Chaimantami Jesusca : — Tucui shunguhuan crishpa , mana caita chaita yuyashpaca , mana cai higo yurallatachu chaquichinguichic , ashtahuanpish cancuna urcuta : “ ¡ Caimanta anchuri , mama cuchaman shitari ! ” nicpica , rinmanllami . Chaica chashnatacmi .
40021022	Tucui shunguhuan crishpa , Diosta mañashpaca japinguichicmi — nirca .
40021023	Jesús Diosta mañana huasiman yaicushpa , yachachicucpimi , Israel curacunata mandac curacunapish , pushac yuyaccunapish cuchuyarca . Chashna cuchuyashpaca : — ¿ Ima poderhuantac chashna ruhuacungui ? ¿ Pitac cantaca chashna ruhuachun mandarca ? — nishpa tapurca .
40021024	Shina nicpimi Jesusca : — Ñucapish cancunata tapusha , cancuna ñuca tapushcata cutichicpica , ñuca ima poderhuan ruhuacushcata huillashallami .
40021025	¿ Bautizac Juantaca Dioschu cacharca ? Mana cashpaca , ¿ runacunallachu cacharca ? — nirca . Shina nicpimi , paicunapura parlanacushpaca : — Ñucanchic : “ Diosmi cachashca ” nicpica , paica : “ ¿ ima nishpatac Juan huillashcataca mana crircanguichic ? ” ningami .
40021026	Cutin : “ Runacunallami cacharca ” nicpica , gentecuna piñaringami . Juantaca tucui gentecunami ‘ Dios ima nishcata huillacmi ’ nincuna — ninacurca .
40021027	Chaimantami Jesustaca : — Mana yachanchicchu — nircacuna . Shina nicpimi Jesusca : — Shinashpaca , ñucapish pi ima poderhuan ruhuacushcataca mana huillashachu — nirca .
40021028	Jesusca : — Caitami parlagrini . Chaimanta ¿ imatatac yuyanguichic ? Shuc taitami ishcai churita charirca . Chaimantami shuc churitaca : “ Huahua , chagrapi trabajangapac ri ” nirca .
40021029	Shina nicpica chai churica : “ ¡ Mana risha ninichu ! ” nircami . Chashna nishpapish , quipata yuyarishpaca rircami .
40021030	Caishuc churitapish chashnallatacmi nirca . Shina nicpica paica : “ Ari , taitito , ñami rigrini ” nircami . Shina nishpapish mana rircachu .
40021031	Cai ishcaimantaca , ¿ maijantac taita mandashcataca ruhuarca ? — nishpa tapurca . Chashna tapucpimi paicunaca : — Punta churiyari — nircacuna . Shina nicpimi Jesusca : — Chai shinallatacmi Dios mandacucmanca , impuestota japiccunarac , cullquimanta huainayac huarmicunarac yaicunga . Chaica chashnatacmi .
40021032	Chaica , Bautizac Juan cashcata ruhuanata yachachingapac shamucpica , cancunaca mana crircanguichicchu , ashtahuanpish impuestota japiccunarac , cullquimanta huainayac huarmicunaracmi crirca . Cancunaca chaita ricushpapish Juanta mana crircanguichicchu , llaquirishpa mana Diosman cutirircanguichic — nirca .
40021033	Jesusca : « Cai yuyaita japina parlota uyaichic . Chaica , shuc runami paipac allpapi uvasta tarpurca . Chai quipaca chagra muyundi pircatapish , chagrata chapana torretapish , uvasta cutanatapish ruhuarcami . Shina ruhuashpami uvas pucucpi , chaupinacungapac shuc runacunaman saquishpa , caru llactaman rirca .
40021034	Uvas pallana punzha chayacpica , chai allpayuc runaca serviccunatami pai japina cashcata chaupichun cacharca .
40021035	Ashtahuanpish chai serviccuna chayacpica , chai chagrahuan saquiric runacunaca shuctaca macarcami , shuctaca huañuchircami , cutin shuctaca rumihuan shitashpami catishpa cacharca .
40021036	Chagrayucca shuctac serviccunatami cacharca . Shina cachacpipish , chashnallatacmi llaquichishpa cacharca .
40021037	Chai quipaca : “ Ñuca churitaca alli chasquingapishchari ” nishpami , churita cacharca .
40021038	Ashtahuanpish churi shamucucta chai chagrahuan saquiric runacuna ricushpaca “ Paimi taita charishcataca japinga . Paipac randi ñucanchic japingapac huañuchishunchic ” ninacurcami .
40021039	Chaimantami japishpa , chagramanta canzhaman llucchishpa huañuchirca .
40021040	Chagrayuc shamushpaca , ¿ chai chagrahuan saquiric runacunataca imatashi ruhuanga ? » nirca .
40021041	Shina nicpimi paicunaca : — Mana llaquishpami , chai runacunataca huañuchinga . Chashna huañuchishpami , chagrayucca chagrata chaupina punzha chayamucpi , chaupishpa cuclla shuctac runacunaman cunga — nirca .
40021042	Shina nicpimi Jesusca : — ¿ Manachu cancunaca Dios quillcachishcataca ricushcanguichic ? Chaipica : “ Huasita ruhuaccuna mana nishca rumillatacmi , huasita ruhuangapac callaripi churana , tucuimanta yalli alli rumi tucushca . Mandac Diosmi chashnaca ruhuashca . Chaita ricushpami , yallita cushicunchic ” nicunmi .
40021043	Chaimantami cancunamanta Dios mandanata quichushpa , pai munashcata ruhuaccunaman cushca canga .
40021044	Maijanpish cai rumipi mitcaricca polvoringami . Cai rumi maijanpac jahuapi urmashpaca , tucui ñutuchingami — nirca .
40021045	Jesús yuyaita japina parlocunahuan parlashcata uyashpaca , curacunata mandac curacunapish , fariseocunapish paicunamanta rimashcatami yuyarcacuna .
40021046	Chaimantami Jesustaca prezu japishun nircacuna . Gentecunaca Jesustaca Dios ima nishcata huillacmi nicmi carca . Chaimantami manchashpa mana imata ruhuashpa saquirca .
40022001	Jesús cutinllatac yuyaita japina parlohuan parlashpaca :
40022002	« Jahua pacha Dios mandacucman yaicunaca shuc jatun mandac paipac churita cazarachishpa ,
40022003	paipac serviccunata bodaman cayac cachacpi , mana shamusha nic shinami .
40022004	Mana shamusha nicpi , cutinllatac shuctac serviccunata cachashpaca : “ Jatun huagracunatapish , shuctac huira animalcunatapish huañuchishpami , jatun micuita ruhuashcani . Ñami tucui allichishca . Bodaman shamuichic nicunmi nigrichic ” nishpa cacharca .
40022005	Chashna cayacpipish , mana uyashpami maijancunaca trabajangapac , maijancunaca catungapac rircacuna .
40022006	Maijancunacarin jatun mandac cachashca serviccunata macashpami huañuchirca .
40022007	Chashna ruhuacpimi , jatun mandacca yallita piñarishpa , chai huañuchic runacunataca huañuchishpa , chai pueblotapish rupachichun soldadocunata mandarca .
40022008	Chaimantami jatun mandacca serviccunataca : “ Bodaca tucui allichishcami . Cayashcacuna mana shamusha nishcachu .
40022009	Chaimanta cancuna mai ñancunaman llucshishpa , pipish ricuricta pushamuichic ” nishpa cacharca .
40022010	Chaimantami serviccunaca ñancunaman llucshishpa , pipish ricuricta alli cachun , mana alli cachun bodaman cayamurca . Chashnami boda huasipica jundachirca .
40022011	Jatun mandac ucuman yaicushpaca , boda churanata mana churarishca runatami ricurca .
40022012	Chaita ricushpaca : “ Uyai , ¿ ima nishpatac boda churanata mana churarishca caipica cangui ? ” nirca . Chashna nicpica , chai runaca upallami carca .
40022013	Chaimantami jatun mandacca serviccunataca : “ Cai runataca chaqui maquita huatashpa , canzha puraman shitaichic . Chaipica huacaihuan quiru canirinami tiyan ” nirca .
40022014	Achcami cayashcacunaca , cutin acllashcacunaca ashallami » nirca .
40022015	Chai quipami fariseocunaca , Jesusta ima shina pandachishpa juchanchinata yuyarinacurca .
40022016	Chashna yuyarishpami , paicunapac yachacuccunatapish , mandac Herodespac runacunatapish tapuchun cacharca . Shina cachacpi , paicuna rishpaca : — Yachachic , canca imapish cashcallatami yachachingui . Dios munashca shina causachunmi allita yachachingui . Canca mana manchashpa , mana piman tucushpami yachachingui .
40022017	Canca , ¿ imatatac ningui ? ¿ Roma llactata jatun mandac Cesarman impuestota paganachu canga ? Mana cashpaca , ¿ manachu pagana canga ? — nishpa tapurca .
40022018	Jesusca , paicuna mana alli yuyaihuan tapuc shamushcata yachashpami paicunataca : — Mishqui shimi jayac shungu , ¿ ima nishpatac ñucataca pandachishun nicunguichic ?
40022019	Impuestota pagana cullquita ricuchichic — nirca . Shina nicpimi , shuc denariota ricuchirca .
40022020	Chashna ricuchicpimi Jesusca : — Cai cullquipica , ¿ pipac ñahuitac , pipac shutitac tiyacun ? — nishpa tapurca .
40022021	Chashna tapucpimi paicunaca : — Jatun mandac Cesarpacmi — nirca . Shina nicpimi Jesusca : — Shinashpaca jatun mandac Cesarpac cashcataca , jatun mandac Cesarllamantac cuichic , Diospac cashcataca , Diosllamantac cuichic — nirca .
40022022	Chaita uyashpaca , mancharishpami upalla rircacuna .
40022023	Chai punzhapimi huañushcacuna causarinata mana cric maijan saduceocuna Jesuspacman shamushpa tapushpaca :
40022024	— Yachachic , Moisesca : “ Maijanpish manarac huahuata charishpa huañucpica , huauquimi chai viudahuan cazarana can . Chashnami huañushca huauquipac randi huahuata charina can ” nishcami .
40022025	Ñucanchicpurapimi canchis huauquicuna tiyarca . Chai huauquicunamanta punta huauquimi manarac huahuata charishpa huañurca . Saquiric viudahuanca huauquimi cazararca .
40022026	Quipa huauquipish , ashtahuan quipa huauquipish cazararcami . Chashnami tucui canchis huauquicuna cazararca .
40022027	Quipaca chai huarmipish huañurcami .
40022028	Chashna canchis huauquicunahuan cazarashca cashcamantaca , huañushcacuna causarina punzhapica , ¿ maijanpac huarmitac canga ? — nirca .
40022029	Chashna nicpimi Jesusca : — Cancunaca , Dios quillcachishcatapish , Diospac podertapish mana yachashpami , yalli pandaricunguichic .
40022030	Huañushcacuna causarina punzhapica , mana cazarangacunachu , mana cazarachingachu , ashtahuanpish jahua pacha angelcuna shinami cangacuna .
40022031	Huañushcacuna causarinamantaca , ¿ manachu Dios huillashcapica , ricushcanguichic ? Diosca :
40022032	“ Ñucaca Abrahampac , Isaacpac , Jacobopac Diosmi cani ” ninmi . Diosca mana huañushcacunapac Dioschu , ashtahuanpish causaccunapac Diosmi — nirca .
40022033	Jesús yachachishcata gentecuna uyashpaca mancharircami .
40022034	Saduceocunata Jesús upallachishcata yachashpami , fariseocunaca tandanacurca .
40022035	Paicunapuramanta mandashcata shuc yachachic , Jesusta pandachisha nishpa tapushpaca :
40022036	— Yachachiclla , mandashcacunamantaca , ¿ maijantac ashtahuan yalli cazunaca ? — nirca .
40022037	Shina nicpimi Jesusca : — “ Canta Mandac Diosta tucui shunguhuan , tucui almahuan , tucui yuyaihuan cuyangui ” ninmi .
40022038	Cai mandashcami tucuimanta yalli ashtahuan cazunaca .
40022039	Quipa mandashcapish , chai shinallatacmi : “ Can ima shinami cuyaringui , chashnallatac shuccunatapish cuyangui ” ninmi .
40022040	Cai ishcai mandashcacunami tucui mandashcacunapac , Dios ima nishcata huillaccuna huillashcacunapac sapi shinaca — nirca .
40022041	Fariseocuna chaipi tandanacushca cacpimi Jesusca :
40022042	— Cristomantaca , ¿ imatatac yuyanguichic ? ¿ Pipac churi cashcatatac yuyanguichic ? — nishpa tapurca . Shina nicpimi , paicunaca : — Mandac Davidpac aillupuramantami can — nircacuna .
40022043	Chashna nicpimi Jesusca : — Chashna cacpica , ¿ ima nishpatac Davidllatac Diospac Espíritu yuyaita cucpica , Cristoca : “ Ñucata Mandacmi ” nirca ? Davidca :
40022044	“ Mandac Diosca ñucata Mandactaca : Canta piñaccunata cambac chaquipi churangacaman , canca ñuca alli maquiman tiyacuilla ” nishcami .
40022045	Davidllatac “ ñucata Mandac ” nicpica , ¿ ima shinatac Cristoca Davidpac aillupura cangayari ? — nirca .
40022046	Jesús chashna nicpica , pi imata mana cutichircachu . Chai punzhamanta pachami pi ashtahuan mana tapurca .
40023001	Jesús gentecunatapish , paipac yachacuccunatapish rimashpaca :
40023002	« Mandashcacunata yachachiccunapish , fariseocunapish Moisés mandashcata yachachiccuna tiyarinapimi tiyarin .
40023003	Chaimanta tucui paicuna mandashcata cazunguichic . Ashtahuanpish ama paicuna ruhuashcata catinguichicchu . Paicunaca yachachishpapish , mana chai yachachishca shina causancunachu .
40023004	Paicunaca maita mana aparipac llashacta apachic shinami , imatapish ruhuachunlla nincuna . Ashtahuanpish paicunaca dedollahuanpish mana tuparinchu .
40023005	Gentecunapac ricuillapimi imatapish ruhuac tucuncuna . Dios quillcachishcata huacaichina jatun cajacunatami frentepipish , rigrapipish apancuna . Jatun flecosyuc churanatami churashca purincuna .
40023006	Paicunaca micungapac mizapi tiyarishpapish , tandanacuna huasicunapipish punta alli tiyarinapimi tiyarinata munancuna .
40023007	Ñancunapipish gentecunapac alli nishca canata , gentecuna : “ Yachachicmi ” nichunmi munancuna .
40023008	Cancunaca ama “ yachachicmi ” nichun munanguichicchu . Shuclla Yachachicmi tiyan . Shinallatac huauquipurami canguichic .
40023009	Cancunapac taitaca , jahua pacha Diosmi . Chaimanta cai pachapica , ama pita “ taitami ” ninguichicchu .
40023010	Ama “ mandacmi ” nichun munanguichicchu . Mandacca Quishpichic Cristollami .
40023011	Cancunapuramanta maijan alli casha nishpaca , caishuccunata servichun .
40023012	Maijanpish jatun tucushcaca , yangalla nishcami canga . Cutin yangalla caccunaca , alli nishcami canga .
40023013	¡ Mishqui shimi , jayac shungu fariseocunalla , mandashcacunata yachachiccunalla , imachari tucunguichic ! Cancunami jahua pacha Dios mandacucman yaicusha niccunata jarcanguichic . Chashnami cancunapish mana yaicunguichic , yaicuchunpish mana saquinguichic .
40023014	¡ Mishqui shimi , jayac shungu fariseocunalla , mandashcacunata yachachiccunalla , imachari tucunguichic ! Cancunaca viuda huarmicunapac huasicunata quichuccunami canguichic . Chashna ruhuashpaca , unaicamanmi Diosta mañac tucunguichic . Chaimantami cancunaca yallita llaquichishca canguichic .
40023015	¡ Mishqui shimi , jayac shungu fariseocunalla , mandashcacunata yachachiccunalla , imachari tucunguichic ! Cancunata caticcunata mashcashpami , mama cuchata , allpata puringuichic . Tarishpaca , cancunata yalli ucu pachaman rinallatami ruhuanguichic .
40023016	¡ Ñahui mana ricuc pushaccunalla , imachari tucunguichic ! Cancunaca : “ Diosta mañana huasimanta ari nishpapish mana imachu , ashtahuanpish Diosta mañana huasipi tiyac curimanta ari nishpaca , pactachinatacmi ” nishpami yachachinguichic .
40023017	¡ Ñahui mana ricuc , yuyai illaccunalla ! ¿ Maijantac ashtahuan alli ? ¿ Curi , mana cashpaca curita Diospacllata ruhuac paipac huasi ?
40023018	Shinallatac cancunaca : “ Diosta mañana huasipi tiyac altarmanta ari nishpaca , mana imachu , ashtahuanpish altarpi tiyacuc ofrendamanta ari nishpaca pactachinatacmi ” nishpami yachachinguichic .
40023019	¡ Ñahui mana ricuc , yuyai illaccunalla ! ¿ Maijantac ashtahuan alli ? ¿ Ofrenda , mana cashpaca ofrendata Diospacllata ruhuac altar ?
40023020	Maijanpish altarmanta ari nishpaca , altarmantapish , chaipi tiyac ofrendamantapishmi ari nin .
40023021	Maijanpish Diosta mañana huasimanta ari nishpaca , chai huasipi causac Diosmantapishmi ari nin .
40023022	Maijanpish jahua pachamanta ari nishpaca , Dios mandashpa tiyarinamantapish , Diosmantapishmi ari nin .
40023023	¡ Mishqui shimi , jayac shungu fariseocunalla , mandashcacunata yachachiccunalla , imachari tucunguichic ! Cancunaca mentatapish , anistapish , cominotapish patsacmanta chungatami cunguichic . Chashna cashpapish Dios mandashcacunatapish , cashcata ruhuanatapish , llaquic canatapish , Diosta crinatapish cungaringuichicmi . Caicunatami ashtahuan ruhuana canguichic . Ofrendata cunatapish mana saquinachu canguichic .
40023024	¡ Ñahui mana ricuc pushaccunalla ! Cancunaca micunamanta chuspita anchuchishpa micushpapish , camellotaca mana anchuchishpami micunguichic .
40023025	¡ Mishqui shimi , jayac shungu fariseocunalla , mandashcacunata yachachiccunalla , imachari tucunguichic ! Cancunaca vasotapish , platotapish jahuallatami jahuanguichic . Ucupica shuhuana yuyai , chayucyana yuyai jundami canguichic .
40023026	¡ Ñahui mana ricuc fariseocunalla ! Vasotapish , platotapish ucutarac jahuaichic . Shina ruhuacpimi , jahuapish chuyanlla canga .
40023027	¡ Mishqui shimi , jayac shungu fariseocunalla , mandashcacunata yachachiccunalla , imachari tucunguichic ! Cancunaca huañushcata enterrashca jutcu shinami , jahuataca sumaimana allichishca , ucutaca huañushca tullucuna , mapacuna junda canguichic .
40023028	Gentecunapac ricuipica cashcata ruhuaccuna shinami canguichic , ashtahuanpish ucu shungupica llullana yuyai , mapa yuyaicuna jundami canguichic .
40023029	¡ Mishqui shimi , jayac shungu fariseocunalla , mandashcacunata yachachiccunalla , imachari tucunguichic ! Cancunaca Dios ima nishcata huillaccunata enterrashca bovedata allichiccunami canguichic . Cashcata ruhuaccuna huañushcata yuyaringapacmi sumacta pircacunata ruhuanguichic .
40023030	Shina ruhuashpaca : “ Ñaupa taitacuna causai punzhapi ñucanchic causanchicman carca , Dios ima nishcata huillaccunataca mana huañuchinchicmanchu carca ” ninguichicmi .
40023031	Chashna nishpaca , cancunallatacmi Dios ima nishcata huillaccunata huañuchiccunapac huahuacuna cashcataca ricuchicunguichic .
40023032	¡ Cancunapac ñaupa taitacuna ruhuai callarishcataca tucuchichicyari !
40023033	¡ Culebracuna , culebrapac huahuacunalla ! ¡ Maitatac ucu pacha ninamantaca quishpiringuichicyari !
40023034	Chaimantami Dios ima nishcata huillaccunatapish , alli yachaccunatapish , yachachiccunatapish cachagrini . Paicunamanta maijantaca chacatashpa huañuchinguichicmi . Maijancunataca tandanacuna huasicunapimi macanguichic , shinallatac pueblo pueblotami llaquichishpa puringuichic .
40023035	Cashcata ruhuaccunata huañuchishcamantaca , cancunatami Diosca llaquichinga . Abelpac yahuarmanta callarishpa , Berequiaspac churi Zacariaspac yahuarcamanmi cancunataca taripashpa llaquichinga . Zacariastaca Diosta mañana huasipi tiyac altar ladopimi huañuchirca .
40023036	Diosca tucui chaicunamantami cunan punzha gentecunataca llaquichinga . Chaica chashnatacmi canga .
40023037	¡ Jerusalén , Jerusalén ! ¡ Canmi Dios ima nishcata huillaccunata huañuchingui ! Dios huillachun cachashcacunatapish rumihuanmi shitangui . Tauca cutinmi mama huallpa chuchicunata ucllac shina , tandachisha nircani . Chashna tandachisha nicucpipish , mana uyarcanguichu .
40023038	Chaimantami cambac huasica shitashca saquiringa .
40023039	Ñucaca : Cunanmanta pacha Dios cachashca ñuca cutimucpi “ ¡ allimari cangui ! ” ningacaman , ñucataca manatac ricunguichu ninimi » nirca .
40024001	Jesusca Diosta mañana huasimantami llucshishpa ricurca . Chaipimi paipac yachacuccuna cuchuyashpa , Diosta mañana huasita ricuchirca .
40024002	Chashna ricuchicpimi Jesusca : — ¿ Tucui caicunallata ricushpachu mancharicunguichic ? Caipica , shuc rumillapish mana saquiringachu , tucui urmachishcami canga . Chaica chashnatacmi tucunga — nirca .
40024003	Olivos urcupi Jesús tiyaricpi , yachacuccuna cuchuyashpaca : — ¿ Ima punzhatac can huillashcaca pactangayari ? Can shamunatapish , cai pacha tucurinatapish , ¿ imata ricushpatac yachashunyari ? — nishpa , tapurcacuna .
40024004	Chashna nicpimi Jesusca : — Pacta pi cancunata pandachinman , cuidaringuichic .
40024005	Taucacunami ñuca shutipi shamushpa : “ Ñucami Quishpichic Cristoca cani ” nishpa , achcacunata pandachinga .
40024006	Cancunaca quiquin llactapipish , caru llactapipish jatun macanacuitami uyanguichicmi . Chaita uyashpapish , ama mancharinguichicchu . Chashna llaquicunaca tiyangallatacmi . Ashtahuanpish cai pachaca manarac tucuringachu .
40024007	Llactacunapurapish , jatun mandaccunapurapishmi macanacunga . Maijan llactapica allpa chucchuipish , yarcaipish tiyangami .
40024008	Chai llaquicunaca callari llaquicunallami canga .
40024009	Chai punzhapica cancunata prezushpa mandaccunapacman apangami . Chashnami huañuchinga . Ñucata caticushcamantaca , tucui llactacunapimi piñanga .
40024010	Chai punzhacunapica , taucacunami crinata saquishpa , caishuc chaishuc piñanacushpa prezuchinga .
40024011	Tauca llullac huillaccuna shamushpami , achca gentecunata pandachinga .
40024012	Chashna yallita millai miraricpimi , taucacuna cuyanatapish saquinga .
40024013	Chaica , pipish tucuricaman llaquicunata apactaca quishpiringami .
40024014	Dios mandacucmanta alli huillaica tucui llactacunapimi huillashca canga . Chai quipami cai pachaca tucuringa .
40024015	Dios ima nishcata huillac Daniel quillcashca shina , Diosta mañana huasipi millana tiyacuctami ricunguichic . ( Caita rezacca alli entendichun ) .
40024016	Judea llactapi causaccunaca urcucunapi miticugrichun .
40024017	Maijanpish huasi jahuapi cashpaca , ama huasi ucumanta imata apangapac uricuchun .
40024018	Chagrapi cashpaca , ama huasimanta churanata apangapac cutichun .
40024019	¡ Chai punzhacunapi huicsayuc huarmicunalla , chuchucuc huahuayuc huarmicunalla , imachari tucunguichic !
40024020	Cancuna miticuna punzha ama tamya cachun , ama samana punzha cachun , Diosta mañaichic .
40024021	Chai punzhacunaca achca llaquimi canga . Cai pacha callari punzhamanta , cunancamanmi , chashna llaquica mana tiyashca . Quipapish mana tiyangachu .
40024022	Chai llaqui punzhacunata Dios mana chaupicpica , pipish mana quishpirinmanchu . Diosca pai acllashcacunata cuyashcamantami , chai llaqui punzhacunataca chaupinga .
40024023	Maijanpish : “ ¡ Riquichic , Quishpichic Cristoca caipimi , chaipimi ! ” nicpipish , ama cringuichicchu .
40024024	Llullac cristocunapish , llullac huillaccunapish ricuringami . Paicunaca milagrocunatapish , mancharinacunatapish ruhuashpa ricuchingami . Chashnami Dios acllashcacunatapish pandachinga .
40024025	Chaicunataca utcamanmi cancunaman huillarcani .
40024026	Maijan : “ Riquichic , Cristoca shitashca pambapimi ” nicpipish , ama cringuichicchu . Mana cashpaca : “ Cristoca caipimi miticushca tiyacun ” nicpipish , ama cringuichicchu .
40024027	Chaica , Runa Tucungapac shamushca ñuca cutimuna punzhaca , inti llucshic ladomanta , inti tigrana ladocaman relampa achicyachic shinami canga .
40024028	Maipimi huañushca tiyan , chaipimi ullachucunaca tandanacun .
40024029	Chai llaqui punzhacuna tiyashca quipaca , intipish amsayangami , quillapish mana achicyachingachu . Lucerocunapish urmangami . Jahua pachapi tiyac jatuncunapish chucchungami .
40024030	Chashna tucucpimi , Runa Tucungapac shamushca ñuca cutimucuc señalca jahua cielopi ricuringa . Chaita ricushpami , tucui cai pachapi causaccunaca mancharishpa huacanga . Runa Tucungapac shamushca ñucataca poderhuan , sumaimanata achicyachishpa puyupi shamucucta ricunga .
40024031	Ñuca angelcunata cachashpami . Paicunami trompetapi sinchita tocashpa , ñuca acllashcacunataca tucui cai pachamanta tandachinga .
40024032	Higo yura ima tucucta ricushpa , yuyaita japichic . Yurapi ramacuna cutin huiñashpa , pangacuna ricuricpica , usyai chayamucucta yachanguichic .
40024033	Tucui caicunata cancuna ricushpaca , Runa Tucungapac shamushca ñuca cutimuna ña pungullapi cashcatami yachanguichic .
40024034	Cai ñuca huillashcaca pactangacaman , cai punzha causaccunaca manarac huañungachu . Chaica chashnatacmi canga .
40024035	Jahua pachapish , cai pachapish tucuringami . Ashtahuanpish ñuca huillashcaca pactacungallami .
40024036	Ima horas , ima punzha , ñuca cutimunataca pi mana yachanchu . Jahua pachapi cac angelcunapish mana yachanchu . Ñucapish mana yachanichu , ashtahuanpish ñuca Taitallami yachan .
40024037	Ima shinami Noé causai punzhacunapi tucurca , chashnallatacmi Runa Tucungapac shamushca ñuca cutimuna punzhapish canga .
40024038	Chai punzhapi manarac yacu juizhu callaricpica , gentecunaca micushpa , ubiashpa , cazarashpa causacurca . Chashnami Noé huambuc huasiman yaicungacamanca carca .
40024039	Chashnami mana entendishpa , yacu juizhu tucui paicunata tapangacaman causarca . Chashnallatacmi Runa Tucungapac shamushca ñuca cutimuna punzhapipish canga .
40024040	Ishcai runami chagrapi canga . Paicunamantaca shucca pushashca , shucca saquishcami canga .
40024041	Ishcai huarmipish cutacungami . Paicunamantaca shucca pushashca , shucca saquishcami canga .
40024042	Mandac ima horas chayamunata mana yachashcamanta , alli yuyaihuan chaparacuichic .
40024043	Caita yuyarichic : Ima horas shuhuac shamunata huasiyuc yachashpaca , mana sueñushpami chapanman . Chashnami huasimanta imatapish mana shuhuachinman .
40024044	Runa Tucungapac shamushca ñucaca , cancuna mana yuyashca horasmi chayamusha . Chaimanta allichirishpa shuyacuichic .
40024045	¿ Maijantac alli cazuc , alli yuyaiyuc servic runaca canga ? Paipac amo mandashcata cazushpami , serviccunaman micuna horas caranga .
40024046	Mandashcata pactachishpa causacucpi amo cuticpica , ¡ chai servicca cushicungami !
40024047	Chashna alli cazucmanca amoca tucui charishcacunatami minganga . Chaica chashnatacmi canga .
40024048	Ashtahuanpish mana cazuc servicca : “ Ñuca amoca mana utca shamungachu ” yuyashpami ,
40024049	caishuc serviccunata macashpa , machaccunahuan tandarishpa micushpa , ubiashpa puri callaringa .
40024050	Chai servicpac amoca mana yuyashca punzha , mana yuyashca horasmi chayamunga .
40024051	Chashna shamushpami llaquichishpa , mishqui shimi jayac shungu gentecunahuan churanga . Chaipica huacaihuanmi quiru caniringa .
40025001	Jahua pacha Dios mandacucca , chunga solteracuna lamparata japichishpa , noviohuan tupangapac llucshic shinami .
40025002	Paicunamanta pichcacunaca allichirishca , alli yuyaiyucmi carca . Cutin caishuc pichcacunaca mana allichirishca , mana alli yuyaiyucchu carca .
40025003	Chai mana alli yuyaiyuccunaca lamparata apashpapish , aceitetaca mana aparcachu .
40025004	Ashtahuanpish caishuc pichcacunaca alli yuyaiyuc cashpami , lamparatapish , tucuricpi churana aceitetapish aparca .
40025005	Novio mana utca shamucpica , tucui paicunami sueñurca .
40025006	Chashna sueñucucpimi , chaupi tutataca : “ ¡ Ñami novio shamun , tupangapac llucshichic ! ” nishca uyarirca .
40025007	Chaita uyashpami , chunga solteracunaca jatarishpa , lamparata allichi callarirca .
40025008	Shinami chai mana alli yuyaiyuc solteracunaca chai alli yuyaiyuc solteracunataca : “ Ñucanchic lamparacunaca ñami huañugrin . Asha aceiteta convidaichic ” nirca .
40025009	Shina nicpimi , chai alli yuyaiyuc solteracunaca : “ Ñucanchicmanpish , cancunamanpish faltangami . Catuccunapacman rishpa , cancunallatac randigrichic ” nirca .
40025010	Chai pichca solteracuna randingapac ricpica , ñami novioca chayamurca . Chashna chayamucpimi , pichca allichirishca solteracunaca noviohuan boda huasiman yaicushpa , punguta huichcarca .
40025011	Chai quipa , caishuc pichca solteracuna chayamushpaca : “ Amito , punguta pascai ” nirca .
40025012	Chashna cayacpi , novioca : “ Mana ricsinichu ” nircami .
40025013	Chai shinallatac Runa Tucungapac shamushca ñuca ima punzha , ima horas cutimunata mana yachashcamanta allichirishpa shuyacuichic .
40025014	Jahua pacha Dios mandacucca , shuc amo caru llactaman ringapac paipac serviccunata cayashpa , cullquita saquic shinami .
40025015	Serviccuna imata ruhuaipacta ricushpami , shucmanca pichca talento cullquita , shucmanca ishcai talento cullquita , shucmanca shuc talento cullquita cushpa rirca .
40025016	Chai pichca talento cullquita japicca chai cullquihuanca randishpa catushpami , pichca talento cullquihuan mirachirca .
40025017	Ishcai talento cullquita japicpish , chai shinallatacmi mirachirca .
40025018	Ashtahuanpish shuc talento cullquita japicca amo saquishca cullquitaca allpata jutcushpami pacarca .
40025019	Chai amo tauca huatacuna quipa cutimushpaca , paipac serviccuna mashna cullquita mirachishcatami tapurca .
40025020	Pichca talento cullquita japic runa chayashpaca : “ Amito , canca pichca talento cullquitami saquircangui , pichca talento cullquihuanmi mirachircani ” nirca .
40025021	Chashna nicpimi amoca : “ Allitami ruhuashcangui . Ashallapipish allita ruhuashcamantaca , achcatami canmanca mingasha . Cunanca ñucahuan cushicungapac ucuman yaicui ” nirca .
40025022	Ishcai talento cullquita japic runa chayashpaca : “ Amito , canca ishcai talento cullquitami saquircangui , ishcai talento cullquihuanmi mirachircani ” nirca .
40025023	Chashna nicpimi amoca : “ Allimi , canca allita ruhuac , cazuc servicmi cangui . Ashallapipish allita ruhuashcamantaca , achcatami canmanca cusha . Cunanca ñucahuan cushicungapac ucuman yaicui ” nirca .
40025024	Shuc talento cullquita japic runa chayashpaca : “ Amito , canca piñami cangui . Manapish cushpa chasquiclla , manapish tarpushpa cosechaclla cashcata yachanimi .
40025025	Chaimantami can saquishca cullquitaca allpapi huacaichircani . Caipimi , cambac cullquica ” nirca .
40025026	Shina nicpimi amoca : “ ¡ Canca , mana valic , quilla servicmi cangui ! Ñuca manapish tarpushpa cosechac , manapish cushpa chasquic cashcataca yacharcanguimi .
40025027	Chaimanta cullquitaca bancopi churashpa mirachinami carcangui . Ñuca cutishpaca , saquishca cullquitapish , interestapish japimanmi carcani ” nirca .
40025028	Shina nishpami caishuc serviccunataca : “ Chai cullquita quichushpa , chunga cullquita charic runaman cuichic .
40025029	Achcata charicmanmi , ashtahuan cushca canga . Chaimantami ashtahuan charinga . Cutin mana charicmantaca , ashalla charishcatapish quichushcami canga .
40025030	Cai mana valic servictaca canzhaman llucchishpa purapi shitaichic . Chaipica huacaihuanmi quiru caniringa ” nirca .
40025031	Runa Tucungapac shamushca ñuca sumaimana achic nicuc-huan achicyachishpa , tucui angelcunahuan shamushpaca , jatun mandac tiyarinapimi tiyarisha .
40025032	Chaipimi tucui llacta gentecuna ñucapac ñaupaman shamushpa tandaringa . Chashna tandaricpimi , paicunataca shuc michic ovejacunata chivocunamanta chicanyachic shina chicanyachisha .
40025033	Ovejacunataca ñuca alli maquimanmi churasha . Cutin chivocunataca lluqui maquimanmi churasha .
40025034	Ñuca alli maquiman caccunataca : “ Ñuca Taita alli nishcacuna , ñucahuan mandangapac shamuichic . Cai mandanataca Diosmi cai pacha callari punzhamanta , cancunaman cungapac allichishpa charicushca .
40025035	Ñuca yarcaihuan cacpica , cararcanguichicmi . Yacunayaihuan cacpipish , ubiachircanguichicmi . Samarinata mana charicpipish , pozachircanguichicmi .
40025036	Churana illac cacpipish , churachircanguichicmi . Ungushca cacpipish , carcelpi cacpipish , ricuc shamurcanguichicmi ” nishami .
40025037	Shina nicpica , cashcata ruhuaccunaca : “ Apunchic Jesús , ¿ maipitac yarcaihuan cacpi cararcanchic , yacunayaihuan cacpi ubiachircanchic ?
40025038	¿ Maipitac mana samarinata charicpi pozachircanchic , churana illaclla cacpi churachircanchic ?
40025039	¿ Maipitac ungushca cacpi , carcelpi cacpi ricuc shamurcanchic ? ” ningacunami .
40025040	Shina nicpimi ñucaca : “ Cai uchilla ñuca huauquicunaman ruhuashpaca , ñucamanmi ruhuarcanguichic . Chaica chashnatacmi ” nishami .
40025041	Lluqui maquiman caccunataca : “ Millaicuna , caimanta anchurichic . Diabloman , paita servic angelcunaman allichishca , mana huañuc ninapimi shitashca canguichic .
40025042	Cancunaca ñuca yarcaihuan cacpipish , mana cararcanguichicchu . Yacunayaihuan cacpipish , mana ubiachircanguichicchu .
40025043	Samarinata mana charicpipish , mana pozachircanguichicchu . Churana illac cacpipish , mana churachircanguichicchu . Ungushca cacpipish , carcelpi cacpipish , mana ricugrircanguichicchu ” nishami .
40025044	Chashna nicpimi paicunaca : “ Apunchic Jesús , ¿ ima horatac can yarcaihuan cacta , yacunayaihuan cacta , samarinata mana charicta , churana illacta , ungushca cacta , carcelpi cacta , imalla illacta ricushcanchic ? ” ningacunami .
40025045	Shina nicpimi ñucaca : “ Cai uchillacunaman mana ruhuashpaca , ñucamanmi mana ruhuarcanguichic . Chaica chashnatacmi ” nishami .
40025046	Paicunaca jaicapi mana tucuric , jatun llaquimanmi ringa . Ashtahuanpish cashcata ruhuaccunaca , huiñai causaimanmi ringa — nirca .
40026001	Jesusca tucui chaicunata nishpami , paipac yachacuccunataca :
40026002	— Caimanta ishcai punzha quipa , Pascua punzha cashcataca cancunallatac yachanguichicmi . Chai punzhapimi , Runa Tucungapac shamushca ñucataca , cruzpi chacatachun japichingacuna — nirca .
40026003	Chai punzhami Israel curacunata mandac curacunapish , pushac yuyaccunapish , curacunata jatun mandac Caifaspac huasipi tandanacushpa ,
40026004	Jesusta umashpa pacalla japishpa huañuchinata yuyarinacurca .
40026005	Ashtahuanpish paicunaca : « Cai fiesta punzhapica mana japishpa , saquishunlla , gentecuna ñucanchicta llaquichingapac jataringami » ninacurca .
40026006	Jesusca Betania pueblopi causac , lepra ungüihuanmi nishca Simonpac huasipimi carca .
40026007	Jesús mizapi tiyacucpimi , shuc huarmica achca valishca mishquilla ashnacucta yurac rumi botellapi apamurca . Chaitami Jesuspac umapi tallirca .
40026008	Chaita yachacuccuna ricushpaca , yallita piñarishpaca : — ¿ Ima nishpatac caitaca yangamanta tallinyari ?
40026009	Chaita achca cullquipi catushpa huacchacunaman cunachari , alli canman carca — ninacurca .
40026010	Jesús chaita uyashpaca : — ¿ Ima nishpatac cai huarmitaca rimaricunguichic ? Saquichic . Paica ñucamanca allitami ruhuashca .
40026011	Huacchacunaca punzhantami cancunahuan , ashtahuanpish ñucaca mana cancunahuanca causacushallachu .
40026012	Cai mishquilla ashnacucta ñucapi tallishpaca , ñuca cuerpo sumacta enterrashca cachunmi allichichishca .
40026013	Cai pachapi quishpirinamanta alli huillaita maipipish huillacushpaca , cai huarmi ruhuashcatapishmi huillanga . Pai ruhuashcaca yuyarishcami canga . Chaica chashnatacmi canga — nirca .
40026014	Chunga ishcai yachacuccunapuramanta Judas Iscariote , curacunata mandac curacunapacman rishpaca :
40026015	« Jesusta cancunaman cucpica , ¿ imatatac ninguichic ? » nirca . Chashna nicpimi , chai curacunaca quimsa chunga cullquita curca .
40026016	Chaimanta pachami Judasca , ima shina Jesusta japichinata yuyaricurca .
40026017	Levadura illac tandata micuna fiesta callari punzha , yachacuccuna Jesuspacman cuchuyashpaca : — ¿ Maipitac Pascuata yuyarishpa , micunataca allichigrishun ? — nirca .
40026018	Chashna nicpimi Jesusca : — Puebloman rishpa , shuc runahuan tupashpaca : “ Ñucanchic yachachicca : ‘ Ñucata japichina pachami chayamucun . Cambac huasipimi ñuca yachacuccunahuan Pascuata yuyarishpa micugrini ’ ninmi ” nigrichic — nirca .
40026019	Shinami yachacuccunaca Jesús mandashca shina Pascua micuita allichirca .
40026020	Ña tutayamucuctami Jesusca chunga ishcai yachacuccunahuan micungapac tiyarirca .
40026021	Chashna micushpa tiyacushpami Jesusca : — Cancunapuramanta shucmi , ñucataca japichinga . Chaica chashnatacmi canga — nirca .
40026022	Chaimanta yallita llaquirishpa , cada shuc tapushpaca : — Apunchic Jesús , ¿ ñucachu japichicca cani ? — nishpa tapurca .
40026023	Chashna tapucpimi Jesusca : — Cai ñuca micucuc platopi tandata jucuchishpa micucmi japichigrin .
40026024	Runa Tucungapac shamushca ñucataca , Dios quillcachishcapi nishca shinami huañuchinga . Ashtahuanpish ñucata japichic runaca , ¡ aij , imachari tucunga ! Chai runaca mana huacharishca cashpachari alli canman carca — nirca .
40026025	Chashna nicpimi , japichic Judasca Jesustaca : — Yachachic , ¿ japichicca ñucachu cani ? — nishpa , tapurca . Chashna tapucpimi Jesusca : — Ari , canmi cangui — nirca .
40026026	Chashna micucushpami , Jesusca tandata japishpa , Diosta pagui nishpa , chaupishpa yachacuccunaman cushpaca : — Japichic , micuichic . Caica ñuca aichami — nirca .
40026027	Vino vasota japishpa , Diosta pagui nishpa , yachacuccunaman cucushpaca : — Tucuilla cai vasomanta ubiaichic .
40026028	Caica , Dios cancunahuan mushuc ari nishca yahuarmi . Caimi achca runacunapac juchacunata perdonangapac jichana ñuca yahuarmi .
40026029	Ñucaca : Ñuca Taita mandacucpi , cancunahuan mushuc vinota ubiangacaman , cai uvas vinotaca mana ubiashachu nini — nirca .
40026030	Himnota cantashca quipami , Olivos urcuman rircacuna .
40026031	Chaipimi Jesusca : — Dios quillcachishcapica : “ Michictaca huañuchishami . Ovejacunaca caita chaitami ringa ” ninmi . Chaimantami cancunaca cunan tutallatac ñucata saquishpa , caita chaita ringuichic .
40026032	Shina cacpipish causarishca quipaca , cancunapac ñaupatami Galilea llactaman risha — nirca .
40026033	Chashna nicpimi Pedroca : — Caishuccuna canmanta caruyacpipish , ñucaca manatac saquishachu — nirca .
40026034	Chashna nicpimi Jesusca : — Cunan tutallatacmi gallo manarac cantacpi , quimsa cutin negangui . Chaica chashnatacmi canga — nirca .
40026035	Chashna nicpimi Pedroca : — Canhuan pacta huañuna cacpipish , mana negashachu — nirca . Chashnallatacmi tucui yachacuccunaca nirca .
40026036	Jesús , yachacuccunahuan Getsemaní huertaman chayashpaca : — Ñuca chainicpimi Diosta mañangacaman , cancunaca caillapi tiyacuichic — nirca .
40026037	Jesusca Pedrotapish , Zebedeopac ishcai churicunatapish pushashpa , rishpami , shungupi yallita llaquiri callarirca .
40026038	Chashna cashpami Jesusca : — Ñuca shungupica , huañuna nanaihuan shinami yallita llaquiricuni . Cancunaca mana sueñushpa , caipi ñuca shinallatac chaparacuichic — nirca .
40026039	Jesusca ashata chainicman rishpa , pambacaman cumurishpa , Diosta mañashpaca : « Ñuca Taitalla , cai llaquita ñucamanta anchuchiyari . Shina cacpipish ama ñuca munashcata ruhuaichu , ashtahuanpish can munashcata ruhuai » nirca .
40026040	Jesús chashna mañashpa , yachacuccunapacman cutimushpaca , paicuna sueñucuctami ricurca . Chaimantami Pedrotaca : — ¿ Manachu ashallatapish ñuca shinallatac riccharishca cai pudircanguichic ?
40026041	Mana pandachishca cangapacca , Diosta mañashpa chaparacuichic . Cancunapac yuyaica sinchimi , ashtahuanpish cancunapac cuerpomi shaicushca — nirca .
40026042	Cutinllatac Jesús mañangapac rishpaca : — Ñuca Taitalla , llaquita ñuca apanatac cacpica , can munashca shina cachun — nirca .
40026043	Jesús cutimushpaca , yachacuccuna cutinllatac sueñucuctami ricurca . Paicunapac ñahuicunaca sueñuihuan cashpami , mana pascarisha nirca .
40026044	Jesús paicunata chaipi saquishpa , cutinllatac Diosta mañangapac rishpaca , puntaman mañashca shinallatacmi mañarca .
40026045	Chashna mañashpa , yachacuccunapacman cutimushpaca : — ¿ Samarishpa sueñucunguichicllachu ? Ña jatarichic , ñami Runa Tucungapac shamushca ñucata , juchayuc runacunaman japichina horasca pactamushca .
40026046	¡ Jatarishpa jacuchic ! Ñucata japichicca ñami chayamucun — nirca .
40026047	Jesús chashna nicucpiracmi , chunga ishcai yachacuccunapuramanta Judasca , tauca runacunahuan shamurca . Chai runacunaca curacunata mandac curacunapish , cunac yuyaccunapish cachacpimi espadacunahuan , caspicunahuan shamurcacuna .
40026048	Jesusta japichic Judasca , chai runacunataca : « Maijantami ñuca muchani , chaimi Jesusca . Chaita japinguichic » nishcami carca .
40026049	Judas chayashcahuan , Jesuspacman cuchuyashpaca : — Yachachic , ¿ allillachu cangui ? — nishpami mucharca .
40026050	Chaimantami Jesusca : — Uyai . ¿ Imapactac shamurcangui ? — nirca . Shina nicpimi , Jesusta prezurcacuna .
40026051	Chaipimi Jesus-huan caccunapuramanta shucca , espadata llucchishcahuan jatun mandac curapac servicta huactashpa ringrita pitirca .
40026052	Chaimantami Jesusca : — Espadata maipi huacaichinallapitac huacaichi . Maijanpish espadahuan macanacucca , espadallapitacmi huañunga .
40026053	Ñuca Taitaman huaranga huaranga angelcunata ñucata cuidachun mañacpica , cunanllatacmi cachanman . Chaitaca , ¿ manachu yachangui ?
40026054	Chashna ruhuacpica , ¿ ima shinatac Dios quillcachishcapi nishcaca pactangayari ? — nirca .
40026055	Shinallatac Jesusca paita japiccunataca : — ¿ Shuhuacta shinachu espadacunahuan , caspicunahuan japingapac , shamunguichic ? Punzhantami Diosta mañana huasipi yachachishpa cancunahuan carcani . Chaipica mana japircanguichicchu .
40026056	Ashtahuanpish Dios ima nishcata huillac quillcashca pactachunmi , chashna tucushca — nirca . Chaipimi yachacuccunaca Jesusllata saquishpa , tucui miticushpa rircacuna .
40026057	Jesusta japishpaca , curacunata mandac Caifaspac huasimanmi aparca . Chaipimi mandashcacunata yachachiccunapish , pushac yuyaccunapish tandanacushca carca .
40026058	Pedroca caru carutami chai huasi pungu pambacaman Jesusta catishpa rirca . Chaipimi Diosta mañana huasita cuidaccunahuan Jesusta ima ruhuacta ricushpa tiyacurca .
40026059	Curacunata mandac curacunapish , tandanacushca mandaccunapish , Jesusta huañuchingapacmi llullashpa huillaccunata mashcarca .
40026060	Tauca runacuna llullashpa huillacucpipish , ima juchata mana tarircacunachu . Shina cacpipish quipata ishcai llullashpa huillac runacuna shamushpaca :
40026061	— Cai runaca : “ Diosta mañana huasita urmachishpapish , quimsa punzhapica cutin shayachimanllami ” nircami — nirca .
40026062	Chaimantami curacunata mandac cura jatarishpa Jesustaca : — Caita nishcamantaca , ¿ manachu imata ningui ? — nirca .
40026063	Ashtahuanpish , Jesusca imata mana nircachu . Chaimantami mandac curaca : — Causac Diospac shutipi huillai . ¿ Canchu Diospac Churi Cristoca cangui ? — nirca .
40026064	Shina nicpimi Jesusca : — Ari , canllatac nishcanguimi . Ashtahuanpish ñucaca : Cunanmanta pachami Runa Tucungapac shamushca ñucataca , poderyuc Diospac alli maquiman tiyacucta ricunguichic . Shinallatac jahua pachamanta puyupi shamucuctapishmi ricunguichic ninimi — nirca .
40026065	Shina nicpimi , mandac curaca yallita piñarishpa , paipac churanata lliquishpaca : — ¡ Cai runaca Diostami piñachishca ! ¿ Imapactac shuctac huillaccunaman tapushun ? ¡ Cancunallatacmi Diosta piñachishpa rimashcataca uyashcanguichic !
40026066	Cancunaca , ¿ imatatac ninguichic ? — nishpa tapurca . Shina nicpimi , chaipi caccunaca : — ¡ Juchallishcami , huañunami can ! — nircacuna .
40026067	Chaimantami maijancunaca ñahuipi tucashpa macarca . Cutin maijancunaca huactashpami :
40026068	— Cristo cashpaca , pi canta huactacta huillai — nircacuna .
40026069	Pedro canzha pambapi tiyacucpimi , shuc servic huarmi cuchuyashpaca : — Canpish Galilea llactamanta Jesus-huan puricmi cangui — nirca .
40026070	Pedro tucui chaipi caccunapac ñaupapi negashpaca : — Mana ricsinichu , pimantachari nicungui — nirca .
40026071	Pedro chai pungu pambamanta llucshicucpi , cutinllatac shuc servic huarmi ricushpaca : — Cai runapish Nazaret pueblomanta Jesus-huan puricmi carca — nishpami , chaipi caccunaman parlarca .
40026072	Cutinllatac Pedro negashpaca : — ¡ Chai runataca mana ricsinichu ! — nirca .
40026073	Chai quipallatac , chaipi caccuna Pedropacman cuchuyashpaca : — Canpish chaipurallatami cangui . Cambac rimaipish ricsinallami — nirca .
40026074	Shina nicpimi , cutinllatac Pedroca : — ¡ Pimantatacpish rimacunguichicchari ! ¡ Chai runataca mana ricsinichu ! Ñuca llullacucpica , Diosllatac llaquichichun — nirca . Chai ratollatacmi galloca cantarca .
40026075	Chaipimi Pedroca , Jesús : « Manarac gallo cantacpimi , quimsa cutin negangui » nishcata yuyarirca . Chaimantami Pedroca canzhaman llucshishpa , yallita llaquirishpa huacarca .
40027001	Pacarimucucpimi , curacunata mandac curacunapish , israelcunata pushac yuyaccunapish Jesusta ima shina huañuchinata yuyarinacurca .
40027002	Shina yuyarishpami , Jesusta huatashpa , chai llactata mandachun mandac Pilatopacman aparca .
40027003	Japichic Judasca Jesusta huañuchigricucta yachashpami , llaquirishpa , chai quimsa chunga cullquita curacunata mandac curacunaman , pushac yuyaccunaman cutichingapac rirca .
40027004	Paica : — Mana faltayuc runata japichishpaca , juchallishcanimi — nirca . Chashna nicpimi paicunaca : — Ñucanchicmanca , ¿ imatac curinyari ? Chaitaca canchari ricungui — nirca .
40027005	Shina nicpimi , Judasca Diosta mañana huasi ucupi cullquita shitashpa , sipiringapac rirca .
40027006	Curacunata mandac curacuna chai cullquita japishpaca : “ Caica shuc runata huañuchingapac randishca cullquimi . Chaimanta ofrendata tandanapica , mana churanachu canchic ” nirca .
40027007	Shina ninacushpami , caru llacta runa huañucpi enterrangapac , mangata ruhuacpac allpata randirca .
40027008	Chaimantami chai pambataca cunancaman Yahuar Allpa nishpa cayancuna .
40027009	Chashnami Dios ima nishcata huillac Jeremías huillashcaca pactarca . Paica : « Quimsa chunga cullquitami japirca . Israelcunaca chaitami paimantaca paganga nishca carca .
40027010	Ima shinami Dios nishca shinami , chaihuanca mangata ruhuacpac allpata randirca » nishcami .
40027011	Jesustaca Mandac Pilatopacmanmi aparca . Chaipimi Pilatoca : — ¿ Canchu israelcunata Jatun Mandac cangui ? — nirca . Shina nicpimi Jesusca : — Ari , canllatac nishcanguimi — nirca .
40027012	Curacunata mandac curacunapish , pushac yuyaccunapish juchanchicucpica , Jesusca imata mana nircachu .
40027013	Chaimantami Pilatoca : — Canta cai tucuita juchanchicuctaca , ¿ manachu uyangui ? — nirca .
40027014	Shina nicpipish , Jesusca imata mana nircachu . Chaimantami Pilatoca yallita mancharirca .
40027015	Pascua punzhapica , gentecuna munashca shuc prezutami mandac Pilatoca cacharic carca .
40027016	Chai punzhapica , shuc yalli millai Barrabás runami prezu tiyacurca .
40027017	Pilatoca tandanacushca gentecunataca : — ¿ Maijantatac cacharichun ninguichic ? ¿ Barrabasta ? Mana cashpaca , ¿ Cristo nishca Jesusta ? — nishpa tapurca .
40027018	Pilatoca Jesustaca envidiamanta apamushcatami yacharca .
40027019	Pilato , pai mandanapi tiyacucpimi , paipac huarmica : — Chai allita ruhuac runamantaca , shuc mancharinatami tutaca muscurcani . Paitaca ama imata ruhuanguichu — nichun cacharca .
40027020	Utcamanmi curacunata mandac curacunapish , pushac yuyaccunapish gentecunataca : “ Barrabasta cacharichun , Jesustaca chacatachun ninguichic ” nishca carca .
40027021	Pilato paicunata cutin tapushpaca : — Cai ishcai runacunamantaca , ¿ maijantatac cacharichun ninguichic ? — nirca . Shina nicpimi paicunaca : — ¡ Barrabasta cachari ! — nircacuna .
40027022	Chaimantami Pilatoca : — Shinashpaca , Cristo nishca Jesustaca , ¿ imatatac ruhuachun ninguichic ? — nirca . Shina nicpimi , tucui paicunaca : — ¡ Paitaca chacatailla ! — nircacuna .
40027023	Shina nicpimi Pilatoca : — ¿ Ima mana allitatac ruhuashcayari ? — nirca . Shina nicpipish , paicunaca ashtahuanmi : — ¡ Chacatailla ! — nishpa caparircacuna .
40027024	Tucui gentecuna mana uyashun nishpa , ashtahuan caparinacui callaricpimi , Pilatoca yacuta japishpa , maquita jahuashpaca : — Cai runata huañuchishpaca mana ñucachu juchayuc casha , ashtahuanpish cancunami juchayuc canguichic — nirca .
40027025	Shina nicpimi paicunaca : — Ari , pai huañushcamanta ñucanchicmi juchayuc cashun — nircacuna .
40027026	Chashna nicpimi , Pilatoca Barrabasta cacharishpa , Jesustaca azotichishpa cruzpi chacatachun Roma llacta soldadocunaman curca .
40027027	Shina cucpimi , soldadocunaca Jesusta Pilato mandashpa tiyana jatun ucuman apashpa , caishuc soldadocunata Jesuspac muyundipi tandachirca .
40027028	Chaipimi soldadocunaca Jesuspac churanata surcuchishpa , amsa puca churanata pachallichirca .
40027029	Cashamanta ahuashca coronata umapi churachishpami , shuc taunata alli maquipi charichirca . Chashna nic tucushpalla , paipac ñaupapi cungurishpaca : — ¡ Israelcunata Jatun Mandac , canca allimari cangui ! — nircacuna .
40027030	Chaimantaca tocashpami , paipac taunallahuantac umapi huactarca .
40027031	Chashna burlashca quipaca , amsa puca churanata surcuchishpami , paipac churanallatatac churachishpa , cruzpi chacatangapac aparca .
40027032	Chaimanta ricushpami , Cirene pueblomanta Simón runahuan tuparca . Paimanmi Jesuspac cruzta apachishpa rircacuna .
40027033	Chaimantaca Gólgota nishca urcumanmi chayarca . Gólgota nishcaca , Uma Tullu nisha ninmi .
40027034	Chaipimi jayac-huan chapushca vinota Jesusman curca . Chashna cucpica , Jesusca ashata mallishpa mana ubiasha nircachu .
40027035	Jesusta cruzpi chacatashpaca , suerteta ruhuashpami paipac churanacunata japircacuna .
40027036	Chaipimi soldadocunaca Jesusta cuidangapac tiyarirca .
40027037	Cruz jahuapica , imamanta huañuchishcata quillcashcatami churarca . Chai quillcapica : « Caimi israelcunata Jatun Mandac Jesús » nicurcami .
40027038	Jesustaca ishcai shuhuac runacunatami shuctaca alli maquiman , shuctaca lluqui maquiman chacatarca .
40027039	Chaita pasaccunaca umata cuyuchishpa , Jesusta
40027040	camishpaca : « Diosta mañana huasita urmachishpapish , quimsa punzhapica cutin shayachishallami nircanguimi . Can Diospac Churi cashpaca , ¡ cruzmanta uricuiyari ! » nircami .
40027041	Shinallatac curacunata mandac curacunapish , mandashcacunata yachachiccunapish , pushac yuyaccunapish burlashpa :
40027042	« Shuccunataca quishpichircami . Cunan paillatacca mana quishpiri pudinchu . Israelcunata Jatun Mandac cashpaca , cruzmanta uricunmanmi . Chashna uricucpica , ñucanchicpish crinchicmanmi .
40027043	Paica : “ Diospac Churimi cani ” nishpami , Dios yuyailla puricurca . Shina cacpica , Dios cuyashpaca quishpichinmanmi » nircacuna .
40027044	Chai shinallatacmi Jesus-huan chacatashca shuhuac runacunapish camircacuna .
40027045	Chaupi punzhamanta quimsa horas chishicamanmi , tucui cai pachaca amsayarca .
40027046	Chai horasllatacmi Jesusca : « Elí , Elí , ¿ lama sabactani ? » nishpa , caparirca . Chaica : “ Ñuca Dios , ñuca Dios , ¿ ima nishpatac ñucallata saquinguiyari ? ” nisha ninmi .
40027047	Chaipi caccuna chaita uyashpaca : — Paica huillac Eliastami cayacun — nircacuna .
40027048	Chashna caparicta uyashcahuanmi shuc runaca , esponjata apamungapac callparca . Chaitaca jayac vinopi satishpami , caspi puntapi churashpa , Jesús ubiachun shimiman chayachirca .
40027049	Ashtahuanpish maijancunaca : — Saquichic , Eliasca quishpichingapac shamucta ricungapac — nircacuna .
40027050	Jesusca cutinllatac sinchita caparishpaca huañurcallami .
40027051	Chai ratomi Diosta mañana huasi tiyac lienzoca , jahuamanta uraiman chaupita lliquirirca . Allpapish chucchurcami , jatun rumicunapish chictarircami .
40027052	Shinallatac enterrashca jutcucunapish pascarircami . Chashna pascaricpica , Diospaclla caccunaca causarircami .
40027053	Chai enterrashcamanta causariccunaca Jesús causarishca quipami Jerusalén puebloman shamurcacuna . Paicunataca achca gentecunami ricurca .
40027054	Patsac soldadocunata mandacpish , Jesusta cuidaccunapish allpa chucchucta , shuctac ima tucushcacunata ricushpaca yallita mancharishpami : — Cai runaca Diospac Churitacmi cashca — nircacuna .
40027055	Chaipica tauca huarmicunami carullamanta ricucurca . Paicunaca Galilea llactamantami Jesusta ayudashpa shamurca .
40027056	Paicunapurapica Magdala pueblomanta Mariapish , Jacobopac , Josepac mama Mariapish , Zebedeopac churicunapac mamapishmi carca .
40027057	Ña tutayamucucpica , Arimatea pueblomanta chayuc Josemi shamurca . Paipish Jesusta caticmi carca .
40027058	Paimi mandac Pilatopacman rishpa , Jesuspac cuerpota enterrangapac mañarca . Chashna mañacpica , Jesuspac cuerpota cuchunmi Pilatoca mandarca .
40027059	Chaimantami Joseca Jesuspac cuerpota mushuc lienzo pañohuan pillurca .
40027060	Chashnami cunanlla ruhuashca enterrana jutcupi churarca . Chai jutcutaca Josellatacmi ruhuachishca carca . Chaipimi Jesuspac cuerpota churashpa , jatun rumihuan jarcashpa rirca .
40027061	Chai jutcu ñaupapica Magdala pueblomanta Mariami , caishuc Mariahuan tiyacurca .
40027062	Allichirina punzhamanta cayandi samana punzhapimi curacunata mandac curacunapish , fariseocunapish Pilatopacman rircacuna .
40027063	Chaiman rishpaca : — Jatun mandaclla . Cai llullac runa causacushpa : “ Quimsa punzhapica causarishami ” nishcatami yuyarinchic .
40027064	Chaimanta quimsa punzhacaman cuerpo enterrashcata cuidachun cachai . Pacta yachacuccuna tuta shamushpa , paipac cuerpota shuhuanman . Chashna shuhuashpaca : “ Jesusca ñami causarishca ” nishpami , gentecunata crichinga . Chashna ruhuashpacarin , punta llullashcata atishpami ashtahuan llullanga — nircacuna .
40027065	Chashna nicpimi Pilatoca : — Caipimi , cai soldadocunata cachani . Paicunata pushashpa , ima shinapish allita cuidanguichic — nirca .
40027066	Chashnami chai jutcuta huichcashca rumita ama pipish cuyuchichun , sellota churashpa , soldadocunatapish cuidachunmi saquirca .
40028001	Samana punzha cayandi domingo pacarinatami Magdala pueblomanta Mariaca caishuc Mariahuan Jesusta enterrashcata ricungapac rirca .
40028002	Paicuna chayacucpimi , cungailla allpa yallita chucchurca . Mandac Diospac angelmi jahua pachamanta shamushpa , Jesusta enterrashcata huichcashca rumita anchuchishpa , chai rumi jahuapi tiyarirca .
40028003	Chai angelca relampa shinami carca . Paipac churanaca rasu shina yuranllami carca .
40028004	Chaita ricushpami , soldadocunaca manchaihuan chucchushpa , huañushca shina saquirirca .
40028005	Angelca huarmicunataca : « Ama mancharichicchu . Cruzpi chacatashca Jesusta mashcacushcataca yachanimi .
40028006	Paica mana caipichu . Pai nishca shinami ña causarirca . Paita maipi churashcata ricuc shamuichic .
40028007	Cunanca : “ Jesusca ñami huañushcacunapuramanta causarishpa , Galilea llactaman rishca . Chaipimi paita ricunguichic ” nishpa , utca paipac yachacuccunaman huillagrichic . Chaitami ñucaca cancunaman huillana carcani » nirca .
40028008	Chaimantami huarmicunaca manchaihuan cashpapish cushilla jutcumanta llucshishpa , yachacuccunaman huillangapac callparca .
40028009	Chashna ricucpimi , Jesusca paicunaman ricurishpa alabadurca . Chaipimi huarmicunaca cushicushpa , Jesuspacman cuchuyashpa chaquipi ucllarishpa , “ allimari cangui ” nircacuna .
40028010	Chashna ruhuacpica Jesusca : — Ama mancharichicchu . Cunanca , Galilea llactapi ñucata ricugrichun ñucata catic huauquicunaman huillagrichic . Chaipimi ñucata ricunguichic ninmi nigrichic — nirca .
40028011	Huarmicuna huillangapac ringacamanca , enterrashca jutcuta cuidaccunapuramanta maijancuna Jerusalén puebloman rishpa , curacunata mandac curacunamanmi tucui imalla tucushcata huillarca .
40028012	Chashna huillacpimi , curacunata mandac curacunahuan , pushac yuyaccunahuan tandanacushpa parlanacurca . Chaimantami soldadocunaman achca cullquita cushpa ,
