40028013	cashna yuyaita curca : « Cancunaca : “ Ñucanchic sueñucucpimi , tuta paipac yachacuccuna shamushpa , cuerpotaca shuhuashca ” ninguichic .
40028014	Chaita mandac Pilato yachashpa , cancunata llaquichisha nicpica , ñucanchic cancunamanta paihuan parlashunllami » nirca .
40028015	Soldadocuna cullquita japishpaca , paicuna nishca shinami ruhuarca . Chashna nishcataca , cunan punzhacamanmi israelcunaca parlanacun .
40028016	Chunga shuc yachacuccunaca Jesús maiman tupachun nishpa mandashca shinami , Galilea llactapi tiyac urcuman rirca .
40028017	Jesusta chaipi ricushpaca , “ allimari cangui ” nircami . Ashtahuanpish maijancunaca pai cashcata mana yuyacurcachu .
40028018	Jesús paicunapacman cuchuyashpaca : « Diosca ñucamanmi cai pachatapish , jahua pachatapish mandachun poderta curca .
40028019	Chaimanta tucui cai pacha llactacunaman rishpa , ñuca yachacuccunata ruhuaichic . Paicunataca Taitapac , Churipac , Espiritupac shutipi bautizanguichic .
40028020	Ñuca cancunaman mandashpa yachachishcacunata paicunapish cazuchun yachachinguichic . Ñucaca cai pacha tucuringacamanmi , cancunahuanca casha » nirca .
41001001	Diospac Churi Jesucristomanta alli huillanaca , cashnami callarin .
41001002	Dios ima nishcata huillac Isaías quillcashpaca : « Ñuca huillactaca Quishpichic shamuna ñanta allichichunmi , ñaupachishpa cachani .
41001003	Shitashca pambapi shuc runa caparishpaca : “ Quishpichic shamuna ñanta allichichic , quingu ñancunatapish derechaichic ” nicunmi » nirca .
41001004	Bautizac Juanca shitashca pambapimi bautizarinamanta , juchayuc cashcamanta llaquirishpa , Diosman cutirinamanta alli huillaita huillacurca .
41001005	Chashna huillacucpimi , tucui Jerusalén pueblomantapish , Judea llactamantapish pai huillashcata uyangapac shamurca . Juanca paicuna llaquirishpa , juchacunata huillacpimi , Jordán yacupi bautizarca .
41001006	Juanca camello millmamanta ruhuashca churanata churashca , cara chumbihuan chumbillishcami carca . Shinallatac langostacunata , abeja mishquitami micuc carca .
41001007	Juanca huillashpaca : « Ñucapac quipata shamucmi ñucata yalli poderyuc . Ñucaca cumurishpa , paipac ushuta huatashcallatapish mana pascaipacmi cani .
41001008	Ñucaca yacullahuanmi bautizani , ashtahuanpish ñucapac quipata shamucmi Diospac Espirituhuanmi bautizanga » nirca .
41001009	Chai punzhacunapimi Jesusca Galilea llacta Nazaret pueblomanta Juanpacman shamurca . Chaimantami Juanca Jordán yacupi Jesustaca bautizarca .
41001010	Yacumanta llucshicushpami , Jesusca jahua pacha pascarictapish , Diospac Espíritu paloma shina paipac jahuaman urai shamucuctapish ricurca .
41001011	Shinallatac jahua pachamanta rimashpaca : « Canmi ñuca cuyashca Churica cangui . Canmi ñucataca yallita cushichingui » nirca .
41001012	Bautizashca quipaca , Diospac Espiritumi Jesustaca shitashca pambaman pusharca .
41001013	Jesusca chuscu chunga punzhatami shitashca pambapi carca . Chaipimi Satanaspish pandachisha nirca . Sacha animalcunapish tiyarcami . Chaipica angelcunami Jesustaca servicurca .
41001014	Bautizac Juan carcelpi cacpimi , Jesusca Galilea llactaman rirca . Chaipi Dios mandacucmanta alli huillaita ,
41001015	huillashpaca : « Alli huillai punzhaca chayamushcami . Diosca ñami mandagrin . ¡ Chaimanta juchata saquishpa , Diosman cutirishpa , alli huillaita crichic ! » nirca .
41001016	Jesusca Galilea cucha patata puricushpami , Simontapish , Simonpac huauqui Andrestapish linchita yacupi shitacucta ricurca . Paicunaca challuata japiccuna carca .
41001017	Jesusca paicunataca : — Ñucata catichic . Cancunataca challuata japic shinallatac , gentecunata Diospacman pushamuctami ruhuasha — nirca .
41001018	Paicunaca linchicunata saquishpa , Jesus-huan rircallami .
41001019	Chaimanta ashtahuan chainicman rishpaca , Zebedeopac churicunatami Jacobotapish , Juantapish ricurca . Paicuna canoapi linchicuna lliquirishcata siracucpimi ,
41001020	Jesús paicunatapish cayarca . Chaimantami paicunapac taita Zebedeotapish caishuc challuata japic runacunatapish canoapi saquishpa , Jesusta catishpa rircacuna .
41001021	Chaimantaca Capernaúm puebloman chayashpami , samana punzhapi Jesusca israelcuna tandanacuna huasipi yachachi callarirca .
41001022	Jesusca mandac cashpami , mandashcacunata yachachiccuna shinallaca mana yachachirca . Chaimantami tucui uyaccunaca mancharirca .
41001023	Chai tandanacuna huasipica , supai japishca runami tiyacurca . Chai runa caparishpaca :
41001024	— Nazaret pueblomanta Jesús , ¿ ñucanchictaca imatatac ruhuagringuiyari ? ¿ Canca llaquichingapacchu shamungui ? Canca Dios cachashca Jucha Illacmi cangui . Canta ricsinimi — nirca .
41001025	Jesusca paitaca : — ¡ Upallai , paimanta llucshi ! — nishpami , sinchita rimarca .
41001026	Chai supaica chai runata munai chucchuchishpa , sinchita caparishpami llucshi rirca .
41001027	Chaimantami tucui gentecuna mancharinacushpa : “ ¿ Caica imatac ? ¿ Mushuc yachachinatachu yachachicun ? Millai supaita llucshi nicpica , cazushpa llucshinllami ” nishpami tapunacurca .
41001028	Jesusmantaca Galilea llacta muyundipi tucui causaccunami chayarcacuna .
41001029	Jesús tandanacuna huasimanta llucshishpaca , Jacobohuan , Juanhuanmi Simonpac , Andrespac huasiman rirca .
41001030	Chai huasipica , Simonpac suegrami fiebrehuan ungushca carca . Chaitami Jesusmanca huillarca .
41001031	Chaimantami Jesusca ungushcapacman cuchuyashpa , maquimanta japishpa jatarichirca . Fiebre paimanta anchuricpimi , paicunaman micunata carai callarirca .
41001032	Inti tigrashpa tutayamucucpimi , tucui ungushcacunatapish , supai japishcacunatapish Jesuspacman pushamurca .
41001033	Tucui pueblocunamantami Jesús tiyacuc huasi punguman tandanacumurca .
41001034	Jesusca ima ungüihuan caccunatapish , taucatami alliyachirca . Runacunamantapish , supaicunata llucchishpa cacharcami . Supaicunaca Jesús pi cashcataca yacharcami . Chaimantami mana rimarichun saquirca .
41001035	Jesusca tutamanta utca , manarac achicyamucpimi , shitashca pambapi Diosta mañangapac rirca .
41001036	Chaimantami Simonca paihuan caccunahuan Jesustaca mashcangapac rirca .
41001037	Jesusta tarishpaca : — Tucui gentecunami cantaca mashcacun — nirca .
41001038	Shina nicpimi Jesusca : — Cuchulla llactacunamanpish jacuchic . Chaicunapipish huillangapacmi shamurcani — nirca .
41001039	Jesusca tucui Galilea llacta israelcuna tandanacuna huasicunapimi huillarca . Runacunamantapish supaicunata llucchishpa cacharcami .
41001040	Lepra ungüihuan ungushca runa Jesuspacman cuchuyashpa , cungurishpaca : — Can ñucata alliyachisha nishpaca , alliyachinguimanllami — nishpa mañarca .
41001041	Jesusca chai runata llaquishpami , maquihuan tuparishpaca : — Ari , alliyachisha ninimi , alliyai — nirca .
41001042	Rimarincami lepra ungüica chai runamanta anchurirca .
41001043	Chai runata Jesús cachacushpaca :
41001044	— Riqui , pi canta alliyachishcataca , pacta piman huillanguiman . Cunanca , Israel curaman ricuchigri . Can alliyashcata paicuna ricuchunca , Moisés mandashca shinallatac ofrendata cugringui — nishpami mandarca .
41001045	Ashtahuanpish chai runaca , ima shina alliyashcataca tucuimanmi parlai callarirca . Chaimantami Jesusca mai pueblomanpish mana yaicui pudishpa , shitashca pambacunapi puricurca . Shina cacpipish , tucui llactacunamantami paipacman shamuc carca .
41002001	Asha punzhacuna quipami , Jesusca cutinllatac Capernaúm puebloman yaicushpa , shuc huasipi carca . Chaipi cacta yachashpami ,
41002002	achca gentecuna tandanacurca . Huasi pungupipish maita mana shayaripacmi carca . Chaipimi Jesusca quishpirinamanta alli huillaita huillarca .
41002003	Chaimanmi paralisis ungushca shuc runata , chuscu tucushpa chacanapi apamurca .
41002004	Achca gentecuna cashcamantami Jesuspacmanca mana cuchuyai pudirca . Chaimantami huasi catata pascashpa , ungushca runataca huandumushcandi Jesuspacman uricuchirca .
41002005	Tucui shunguhuan crishcata ricushpami Jesusca : — Huahua , cambac juchacunataca ña perdonanimi — nirca .
41002006	Maijan mandashcacunata yachachiccunapish chaipimi tiyacurca . Paicunapac shungupica :
41002007	« ¿ Ima nishpatac caica chashna riman ? ¡ Paica Diostami piñachin ! Juchacunata pipish mana perdonai pudinchu , Diosllami perdonan » nishpami yuyacurca .
41002008	Paicuna chashna yuyacucta yachashpami , Jesusca : — ¿ Ima nishpatac chashna yuyacunguichic ?
41002009	Cai ungushca runataca , ¿ ima ninatac ashtahuan jahualla : “ Cambac juchacunataca ña perdonanimi ” nina , mana cashpaca “ jatari , canta huandumushca chacanata apashpa rilla ” nina ? — nishpa tapurca .
41002010	Runa Tucungapac shamushca ñuca cai pachapi juchacunata perdonaclla cashcata yachachunmi , cai runataca :
41002011	“ Jatarishpa , huandumushca chacanata apashpa , cambac huasiman rilla ” nini — nirca .
41002012	Chashna nicpimi , chai ungushca runaca jatarishpa , huandumushca chacanata apashpa , tucuipac ñaupamanta llucshishpa rirca . Chaimantami tucui mashna mancharinacushpa : “ Jaicapi mana ricushcatami ricunchic ” nishpa , Diostaca “ allimari cangui ” nircacuna .
41002013	Chai quipaca Jesusca cutinmi Galilea cucha pataman rirca . Achca gentecuna paipacman shamucpimi , yachachirca .
41002014	Chaimanta rishpaca , impuestota chasquina mizapi Alfeopac churi Leví tiyacuctami ricurca . Paita ricushpaca : — Ñucata cati — nirca . Shina nicpimi , Levica jatarishpa , Jesusta catishpa rircalla .
41002015	Jesusca Levipac huasipimi micucurca . Chaipimi impuestota japic runacunapish , yallita juchayuc nishca gentecunapish , paipac yachacuccunapish paihuan micushpa tiyacurca . Jesustaca achcacunami caticurca .
41002016	Jesús impuestota japiccunahuanpish , juchayuc gentecunahuanpish micucta ricushpami , Mandashcacunata yachachiccuna , fariseocuna Jesuspac yachacuccunataca : — ¿ Ima nishpatac cancunapac yachachicca impuestota japiccunahuanpish , juchayuc gentecunahuanpish micucunyari ? — nishpa tapurca .
41002017	Chaita Jesús uyashpaca : — Allicunaca jambictaca mana mashcanchu , ashtahuanpish ungushcacunallami jambicta mashcan . Ñucaca , mana cashcata ruhuac runacunatachu cayac shamurcani , ashtahuanpish juchayuccunatami cayac shamurcani — nirca .
41002018	Bautizac Juanpac yachacuccunapish , fariseocunapac yachacuccunapishmi ayunacurca . Chaimantami maijancuna Jesuspacman shamushpaca : — Bautizac Juanpac yachacuccunapish , fariseocunapac yachacuccunapish ayunacunmi . Cambac yachacuccunaca , ¿ ima nishpatac mana ayunancunayari ? — nishpa tapurcacuna .
41002019	Chashna tapucpimi Jesusca : — ¿ Bodapi caccunaca Novio paicunahuan cacpica , ayunangachu ? Novio paicunahuan cacpica , mana ayunanchu .
41002020	Noviota apana punzhacuna chayamucunmi . Chai punzhacunapimi ayunangacuna .
41002021	Pipish mauca churanataca , mushuc pañohuanca mana remendanchu . Chaica , mushuc paño uchillayashpaca , mauca churanataca ashtahuan lliquinmanmi .
41002022	Cunanlla ruhuashca vinotapish , mauca cara capachupica pi mana churanchu . Chaica , cunanlla ruhuashca vino mauca capachuta tucyachicpica , vinopish , capachupish tucuringami . Chaimantami cunanlla ruhuashca vinotaca , mushuc capachupi churana — nirca .
41002023	Samana punzhapimi , Jesusca paipac yachacuccunahuan trigo chagra chaupita ricurca . Chaita ricushpami , yachacuccunaca trigo umata piti callarirca .
41002024	Chaimantami fariseocunaca Jesustaca : — Uyai , cambac yachacuccunaca , ¿ ima nishpatac samana punzhapi Dios ama ruhuachun cashcataca mana cazuncuna ? — nishpa tapurca .
41002025	Chashna nicpimi Jesusca : — Mandac David paihuan puriccunahuan yarcaihuan cashpa , imata ruhuashcataca Dios quillcachishcapica , ¿ manachu ricushcanguichic ?
41002026	Abiatar curacunata mandacui punzhapimi , Davidca Diosta mañana huasiman yaicushpa , Diosman cushca tandacunata paihuan puriccunahuan micurca . Chai tandataca pipish mana micunallachu carca , curacunallami micuna carca — nirca .
41002027	Cutinllatacmi Jesusca : — Samana punzhataca , gentecunapac allipacmi churarca . Runataca mana samana punzhapac allipacchu Diosca churarca .
41002028	Chaimanta Runa Tucungapac shamushca ñucaca , samana punzha cacpipish mandai pudinimi — nirca .
41003001	Jesusca cutinllatacmi israelcuna tandanacuna huasiman yaicurca . Chaipimi shuc maqui chaquishca runa tiyacurca .
41003002	Fariseocunaca Jesusta juchanchingaraicumi chai runata samana punzhapi allichicta ricuracurcacuna .
41003003	Jesusca chai maqui chaquishca runataca : — Jatari , caipi caccunapac chaupipi shayari — nirca .
41003004	Jesús chaipi caccunata tapushpaca : — ¿ Samana punzhapica allita ruhuanachu alli canga , mana cashpaca mana allita ruhuanachu alli canga ? ¿ Huañuimanta quishpichinachu alli canga , mana cashpaca huañuchinachu alli canga ? — nirca . Ashtahuanpish paicunaca upallami carcacuna .
41003005	Chaimantami muyundipi caccunata ricushpa piñarirca . Jesusca paicuna sinchi shungu cashcamantami yallita llaquirishpa , chai maqui chaquishca runataca : — Maquita chutai — nirca . Chai runa maquita chutacpica , maquica alli tucurcallami .
41003006	Fariseocunaca chai ucumanta llucshishpaca , mandac Herodespac runacunahuanmi Jesusta ima shina huañuchinata yuyarinacurca .
41003007	Jesús paipac yachacuccunahuan cucha pataman ricpimi , Galilea llacta achca gentecuna paitaca catishpa rircacuna .
41003008	Shinallatac Judea llactamantapish , Jerusalén pueblomantapish , Idumea llactamantapish , Jordán yacu chimba lado llactacunamantapish , Tiro , Sidón pueblocunamantapishmi achca gentecuna shamurca . Chai gentecunaca Jesús allicunatami ruhuacucta uyashpami shamurca .
41003009	Chashna achca gentecuna shamushpa , ama ñitimuchunmi , Jesusca paipac yachacuccunataca canoata apamushpa charicuchun mandarca .
41003010	Jesusca achca ungushcacunatami alliyachirca . Chaimantami ungushpa llaquilla causaccuna Jesuspi tuparingapac ñitirimurca .
41003011	Millai supaicuna Jesusta ricushpa , paipac ñaupapi cungurishpaca : — ¡ Canca Diospac Churimi cangui ! — nishpa caparircacuna .
41003012	Chaimantami Jesusca pai pi cashcata ama huillachun mandarca .
41003013	Jesusca , pai acllasha nishca runacunallata cayashpami urcuman rirca . Chashna cayacpica shamurcacunami .
41003014	Chunga ishcai runacunatami paihuan purichun , alli huillaita huillachun cachangapac acllarca .
41003015	Paicunamanca supaicunata llucchichun , ungushcacunata alliyachichunmi poderta curca .
41003016	Paicunaca : Simón , ( Paitami Pedrota shutichirca ) .
41003017	Zebedeopac churicuna Jacobopish , Juanpishmi carca . Paicunataca “ Boanergesta ” shutichirca . Chaica : “ Rayo shina sinchi ” nisha ninmi .
41003018	Andrespish , Felipepish , Bartolomepish , Mateopish , Tomaspish , Alfeopac churi Jacobopish , Tadeopish , Celote nishca Simonpish ,
41003019	Judas Iscariotepishmi carca . Paimi quipamanca Jesustaca japichirca .
41003020	Chaimantaca huasimanmi cutimurca . Cutinllatac huasipi achca gentecuna jundaricpimi , micunallatapish mana pudircacuna .
41003021	Jesús chaipi cacpimi , paipac familiacunaca : « Yuyai illacmi tucushca » nishpa , pushangapac shamurca .
41003022	Jerusalén pueblomanta mandashcacunata yachachiccuna shamushpaca : « Cai runaca supaicunata mandac Beelzebuhuan cashpami , supaicunataca llucchishpa cachan » nircami .
41003023	Jesús paicunata cayashpa , yuyaita japina parlohuan parlashpaca : — ¡ Maitatac Satanasca , Satanasllatatac llucchishpa cachangayari !
41003024	Llactata mandaccunapura macanacucpica , chai llactaca chingaringami .
41003025	Huasipi causaccuna paicunapura macanacucpica , chai huasica tucuringami .
41003026	Satanaspura caita chaita mandacpica , paicuna mandanaca tucuringami .
41003027	Shuc sinchi runapac huasiman shuhuangapac yaicugricushpaca huasiyuctami huatanman . Paita huatashpallami , imatapish shuhuai pudinman .
41003028	Caica pactangatacmi : Diosca ima juchatapish , ima rimashcatapish perdonangami ,
41003029	ashtahuanpish jucha illac Espirituta piñashpa rimactaca manatac perdonangachu . Paica huiñaitami juchayuc canga — nirca .
41003030	Paicuna : « Supai japishca runami cangui » nishcamantami , Jesusca chashna nirca .
41003031	Chaicamanca Jesuspac mamapish , huauquicunapish shamushpami , canzhallamanta cayac cacharca .
41003032	Jesuspac muyundipi tiyacuccunaca Jesustaca : — Cambac mama , huauquicunami canzhapi canta mashcacun — nirca .
41003033	Chashna nicpimi Jesusca : — ¿ Pitac ñuca mama , ñuca huauquicunaca canga ? — nirca .
41003034	Muyundipi tiyaccunata ricuchishpaca : — Caicunami ñuca mama , ñuca huauquicunaca .
41003035	Maijanpish Dios munashcata ruhuacmi ñuca huauqui , ñuca pani , ñuca mamaca — nirca .
41004001	Cutinllatacmi Jesusca cucha patapi yachachi callarirca . Chaimanmi achca gentecuna tandanacurca . Chaimantami Jesusca yacupi cac canoapi yaicushpa tiyarirca . Gentecunaca yacu patapimi carca .
41004002	Chaipimi chimbapurashca parlocunahuan achcata yachachirca . Pai yachachishpaca :
41004003	“ ¡ Caita uyaichic ! Shuc tarpuc runami tarpungapac llucshirca .
41004004	Pai tapucucpica , maijan muyuca ñanpimi urmarca . Chai muyutaca zhutacuna shamushpami mururca .
41004005	Maijan muyuca rumi allpapimi urmarca . Chai muyuca jahualla allpa cacpimi , utca huiñarca .
41004006	Chai yuraca mana ucuman sapiyuc cashpami , inti llucshishpa rupachicpica chaquircalla .
41004007	Maijan muyuca casha chaupipimi urmarca . Casha huiñashpa aguachicpica , mana pucurcachu .
41004008	Maijan muyuca alli allpapi urmashpami alli huiñashpa , shucmanta quimsa chungata , maijanca sucta chungata , maijanca patsac granota pucurca ” nirca .
41004009	Shinallatac Jesusca : — Ringrita chariccunaca , alli uyaichic — nirca .
41004010	Jesús pailla saquiricpimi , paipac chunga ishcai yachacuccunapuramanta maijan chuchullapi tiyacuccunaca : — Chimbapurashca parloca , ¿ imatatac nisha nin ? — nishpa tapurca .
41004011	Chaimantami Jesusca : — Diosca pai mandacucmantaca cancunamanca pacashcatami yachachishca . Ashtahuanpish caishuc gentecunamanca chimbapurashca parlocunallahuanmi yachachini .
41004012	Paicuna ricushpapish , ama ricuchun , uyashpapish ama entendichunmi , chashnaca yachachicuni . Shinallatac Diosman ama cuti richun , paicunapac juchacunata ama perdonachunmi , chashna nini — nirca .
41004013	Chaimantami Jesusca : — Cai chimbapurashca parlocunahuan parlashcataca , mana entendishpaca , ¿ ima shinatac shuctac parlocunata yachachicpica , entendinguichicyari ?
41004014	Tarpuc runa shinaca , alli huillaita huillacmi .
41004015	Ñanpi urmashca muyu shinaca , alli huillaita uyaccunami . Shina uyacpipish , Satanás shamushpami shungumanta anchuchircalla .
41004016	Rumi allpapi urmashca muyu shinaca , alli huillaimanta huillashcata cushilla chasquiccunami .
41004017	Shina cashpapish , mana sapiyuc shina cashcamantami , llaquicuna japicpi , mana cashpaca alli huillaita crishcamanta gentecuna piñacpica , crinata saquincunalla .
41004018	Casha chaupipi urmashca muyu shinaca , alli huillaimanta huillashcata alli uyaccunami .
41004019	Chashna uyashpapish , cai causaipaclla munaihuan , charicyana munaihuan , charishpapish ashtahuan charina munaihuanmi pandarincuna . Chai munaicunami alli huillaita uyashcataca aguachic shina cungachin . Chaimantami grano mana pucuc shina ricurincuna .
41004020	Alli allpapi tarpushca muyu shinaca , alli huillaita shungupi chasquiccunami . Chaimantami shuc muyumanta quimsa chungata , maijancunaca sucta chungata , maijancunaca patsac granota pucuc shina tucuncuna — nirca .
41004021	Jesús ashtahuan parlashpaca : — Luzta japichishpaca , ¿ pitac cajón ucupi , mana cashpaca cama ucupi churangayari ? Ashtahuanpish pata jahuapi achicyachichun churan .
41004022	Chaica , ima pacashcapish mana pacalla saquiringachu , tucuimi ricuringa . Mana yachashcapish tucuimi yacharinga .
41004023	Ringrita chariccunaca , alli uyaichic — nirca .
41004024	Shinallatac Jesusca : — Caita uyashpa , allita entendichic . Shuccunaman ima shinami cunguichic , chashnallatacmi cancunamanpish Diosca cunga . Cancuna uyaccunamancarin ashtahuanmi cunga .
41004025	Maijanpish chariccunamanca ashtahuanmi cunga , ashtahuanpish mana chariccunamantaca , ashalla charishcatapish quichungami — nirca .
41004026	Chashnallatac Jesusca : — Dios mandacucca , shuc runa allpapi muyuta tarpuc shinami .
41004027	Chai runaca tutaca sueñunmi , punzhaca jatarinmi . Tarpushca muyuca pai mana yachacpimi , huiñashpa catin .
41004028	Allpaca , paillami granota ricuchin . Chaica , puntaca pangacunarac ricurin . Quipaca espiga ricurin , cutin espigapica grano ricurin .
41004029	Ña pucushpa , cosechana punzha chayamucpica , hoces-huanmi pitingapac rin — nirca .
41004030	Cutinllatac Jesusca : — Dios mandacuctaca , ¿ ima shina cashcatatac nisha ? ¿ Ima parlohuantac chimbapurasha ?
41004031	Dios mandacucca , tarpushca mostaza muyuta shinami . Chai muyuca tucui muyucunamanta ashtahuan ñutumi ,
41004032	ashtahuanpish ña tarpushca huiñashpaca , tucui huertapi tiyac yuracunamanta yallimi tucun . Chai ramacunapimi volac animalcuna shamushpa , llandurincuna — nirca .
41004033	Jesusca chimbapurashca parlocunahuanmi quishpirinamanta yachachirca . Chashna yachachicushpaca , gentecuna entendinallatami parlacurca .
41004034	Paicunamanca chimbapurashca parlocunallahuanmi imatapish yachachirca . Paipac yachacuccunallahuan cashpaca , ima nisha nishcatapish tucuimi entendichirca .
41004035	Chai punzha , ña tutayacucpimi Jesuaca : — Cai cucha yacuta pasashun — nirca .
41004036	Gentecunata cachashca quipami Jesusta canoapi tiyachishpa pusharca . Maijancunaca shuctac canoapimi Jesusta catishpa rirca .
41004037	Chashna ricucpimi , huaira sinchita jatarishpa , yacuta caiman chaiman cuyuchi callarirca . Chaimantami canoapi yacu jundai callarirca .
41004038	Jesusca canoa huasha ladopimi saunarishpa sueñucurca . Chaimantami paipac yachacuccunaca : — Yachachic , ¡ ñucanchicca ñami ucuyagrinchicca ! ¿ Manachu llaquingui ? — nishpa ricchachirca .
41004039	Jesús jatarishpa , huairatapish cuchatapish rimashpaca : — ¡ Casilla cai ! — nishpami , nircami . Shina nicpimi , huairapish , cuchapish casilla tucurca .
41004040	Jesusca , paipac yachacuccunataca : — ¿ Ima nishpatac yalli mancharinguichic ? ¿ Manaracchu ñucataca alli cringuichic ? — nirca .
41004041	Shina nicpimi , mancharishpa , paicunapura parlanacushpaca : — ¿ Pitac caica ? Paitaca huairapish , yacupish cazunmi — ninacurca .
41005001	Paicunaca cuchata pasashpaca , Gerasa llactamanmi chayarca .
41005002	Canoamanta Jesús llucshincami , supai japishca runaca panteonmanta llucshishpa , Jesus-huan tupac shamurca .
41005003	Paitaca pipish mana cadenacunahuan huatai pudircachu . Chaimantami panteonllapi causac carca .
41005004	Tauca cutinmi huatana fierrohuanpish , cadenahuanpish huatac carca . Shina cacpipish chaicunata polvoshpa , pitishpami ric carca . Paitaca pipish mana huatai pudircachu .
41005005	Tutapish , punzhapish urcucunapi , panteoncunapi sinchita caparishpa , paillatac rumihuan chugririshpami puric carca .
41005006	Jesusta carumanta ricushcahuanmi , callpashpa paipac ñaupapi cungurirca .
41005007	Cungurishpa , caparishpaca : — Jahua pacha Diospac Churi Jesús ¿ imatatac nic shamunguiyari ? ¡ Diosmantami mañani , ñucata ama llaquichichu ! — nirca .
41005008	Jesús : « ¡ Millai espíritu , cai runamanta llucshi ! » nishcamantami chashna nirca .
41005009	Jesús paita tapushpaca : — ¿ Ima shutitac cangui ? — nircami . Chaimantami chai runaca : — Achcacuna cashcamanta , huaranga huaranga shutimi cani — nirca .
41005010	Supaicunaca ama caruman cachachunmi mañarca .
41005011	Chai urcu cuchullapimi , achca cuchicuna micucurca .
41005012	Chaimantami supaicunaca : — Ñucanchictaca chai cuchicunapi yaicuchun cachaiyari — nishpa , mañarca .
41005013	Chaimantami Jesusca chaiman richun saquirca . Supaicuna chai runamanta llucshishpaca , cuchicunapimi yaicugrirca . Shina yaicucpimi , chai cuchicunaca jahuamanta cuchaman singushpa , yacupi aguarishpa huañurca . Chai cuchicunaca ishcai huaranga shinami carca .
41005014	Cuchicunata michiccunaca paicunapac pueblopi , llactacunapimi huillangapac callparca . Shina huillacpimi , ima tucushcata ricungapac tucui gentecuna shamurca .
41005015	Jesuspacman chayashpaca , achca huaranga supaicuna llaquichishca runa alli tucushpa , churanatapish alli churarishca , alli yuyaipi tiyacuctami ricurca . Chaita ricushpami , yallita mancharirca .
41005016	Chaita ricuccunaca supai japishca runa alli tucushcatapish , cuchicuna ima tucushcatapishmi paicunaman parlarca .
41005017	Chaimantami Jesustaca chai llactamanta richun mañarca .
41005018	Jesús canoapi tiyaricpimi , supaicunata llucchishca runaca paitapish pushashpa richun mañarca .
41005019	Jesusca mana pushashpa risha nircachu , ashtahuanpish : — Cambac huasiman rishpa , Dios llaquishpa , canta alliyachishcata cambac familiacunaman huillagri — nirca .
41005020	Chai runa rishpaca , paita Jesús alliyachishcatami Decápolis pueblocunapi huillai callarirca . Shina huillacpica , tucui gentecunami cushicurca .
41005021	Jesús cutinllatac canoapi yacuta pasashpa , cucha patapi cacpica , achca gentecunami paipacman tandanacurca .
41005022	Chaimanmi , israelcuna tandanacuna huasita mandac Jairo shamurca . Chai mandac Jesusta ricushpa ,
41005023	paipac ñaupapi cungurishpaca : — Ñuca ushimi huañugricun . Can rishpa , ñuca ushipac uma jahuapi maquita churacpica , mana huañungachu , alliyangami — nishpa mañarca .
41005024	Chaimantami Jesusca chai runapac huasiman rirca . Shina ricucpica , achca gentecunami Jesus-huan pacta rircacuna .
41005025	Chai riccunapurapica , chunga ishcai huatata yahuar cacharirishpa ungushca huarmimi ricurca .
41005026	Chai huarmica tauca jambiccunapacman rishpami , llaquita apashpa puricurcalla . Jambiricushpallami pai charishcatapish tucui tucuchirca . Ima jambipish mana allichircachu , ashtahuanmi anchayashpa caticurca .
41005027	Chaimantami Jesusmanta parlashcata uyashpa , gentecunapac chaupita rishpa , Jesuspac churanapi huashamanta tuparirca .
41005028	Paipac shungupica : « Jesuspac churanapi tuparishpaca , jambirishallami » nishpami yuyacurca .
41005029	Churanapi tuparicpica , chai ratomi yahuarca jarcarirca . Chaimantami huarmica ña alli tucushcata yacharca .
41005030	Jesusca alliyachic poder paimanta llucshicpimi , huashaman tigrarishpaca : — ¿ Maijantac ñuca churanapi tuparin ? — nishpa tapurca .
41005031	Chaimantami paipac yachacuccunaca : — ¿ Manachu cai tucui gentecuna ñitirinacushpa , shamucuctaca ricungui ? ¿ Chashna cashca jahuachu “ ¿ pitac ñucapi tuparin ? ” nishpa tapungui ? — nirca .
41005032	Jesusca pi tuparishcata yachangapacmi muyundita ricucurca .
41005033	Chashna ricucucpimi , chai huarmica manchaihuan chucchushpa , Jesuspac ñaupapi cungurishpa , ima tucushcata tucuita huillarca .
41005034	Chaimantami Jesusca : — Huahua , can crishcamantami alliyashcangui . Cunanca , cushicushpa rilla . Ungüimantaca jambirishcanguimi — nirca .
41005035	Jesús shina nicucllapitacmi , mandac Jairopac huasimanta maijan runacuna shamushpa Jairotaca : — Yachachictaca , ¿ imapactac yanga piñachicungui ? Cambac ushica ñami huañun — nishpa huillarca .
41005036	Shina nicpipish , Jesusca tandanacuna huasipi mandactaca : — Ama mancharichu . Ashtahuanpish cri — nirca .
41005037	Jesusca caishuc gentecunata chaillapi saquishpa , Pedrota , Jacobota , Jacobopac huauqui Juanllata pushashpami ,
41005038	chai mandacpac huasiman rirca . Chaipimi caparishpa , huacanacucucta ricurca .
41005039	Jesús ucuman yaicushpaca : — ¿ Ima nishpatac cancunaca caparishpa huacanacucunguichic ? Huambraca mana huañushcachu , sueñucunllami — nirca .
41005040	Jesús shina nicpica , burlashpa asircacunami . Chaimantami Jesusca chai ucumanta tucui gentecunata llucchishpa cachashpa , huambrapac taita mamata , quimsa yachacuccunata pushashpa , chai huambra siricuc ucuman yaicurca .
41005041	Huambrapac maquita japishpaca : — Talita , cumi — nirca . Chaica : “ Huambra jatari , cantami nini ” nisha ninmi .
41005042	Shina nicpica , huambraca jatarishpa , puri callarircami . Chaimantami gentecunaca yallita mancharirca . Chai huambraca chunga ishcai huatayucmi carca .
41005043	Jesusca huambrata causachishcata ama piman huillachunmi cutin cutin mandarca . Shinallatac huambraman carachunpish mandarcami .
41006001	Jesús chaimanta rishpaca , paipac llactamanmi paipac yachacuccunahuan cutimurca .
41006002	Jesusca samana punzha chayamucpimi , israelcuna tandanacuna huasipi yachachi callarirca . Pai yachachishcata uyaccuna mancharishpa , caishuc chaishuc tapunacushpaca : — ¿ Maipitac cai runaca caita yachacurcayari ? ¿ Ima shinatac caita yachacurca ? ¿ Pitac milagrocunata ruhuanata yachachirca ?
41006003	¿ Manachu Mariapac huahua carpintero ? ¿ Manachu Jacobopac , Josepac , Judaspac , Simonpac huauqui ? ¿ Manachu paipac panicunaca cai llactapi ñucanchic-huan causan ? — nishpami , mana crircacuna .
41006004	Chaimantami Jesusca : — Dios ima nishcata huillactaca maipipish allimi chasquin . Ashtahuanpish quiquin llactapica , quiquin familiacamanmi mana uyashun nin — nirca .
41006005	Chaimantami chaipica , ima milagrocunatapish mana ruhuarca . Maijan ungushcacunallatami paicunapac jahuapi maquita churashpa alliyachirca .
41006006	Jesusca chai gentecuna mana crishcamantami yallita llaquirishpa , chai muyundi llactacunapi yachachishpa puricurca .
41006007	Jesusca paipac chunga ishcai yachacuccunata cayashpa , supaicunata llucchichun poderta cushpami , ishcai ishcaita cacharca .
41006008	Paicunata cachacushpaca : — Ñanpi micunatapish , cullquitapish ama apanguichicchu ashtahuanpish , taunallata apanguichic .
41006009	Ushutata churarishpapish , ama yanandi churanata apanguichicchu — nirca .
41006010	Shinallatac Jesusca paicunata : — Cancuna mai huasiman chayashpaca , shuc llactaman ringacaman chaillapi canguichic .
41006011	Maijan llactapi cancunata mana chasquishpa , cancuna huillashcatapish mana uyashun nicpica , llucshishpa ringuichiclla . Chai llacta llaquita apana cashcata ricuchingapacca , cancunapac chaquipi catirishca allpatapish chaspishpa ringuichic — nirca .
41006012	Yachacuccuna rishpaca , juchayuc cashcamanta llaquirishpa , Diosman cutirichunmi gentecunaman huillarca .
41006013	Achca supaicunatami gentecunamanta llucchishpa cacharca . Achca ungushcacunatami aceiteta umapi churashpa alliyachirca .
41006014	Tucui llactacunapimi Jesús imata ruhuashcaca yacharirca . Chaimantami mandac Herodesca : — Bautizac Juanmi huañushcacunapuramanta causarishca canga . Chaimantami paica milagrocunata ruhuacunga — nirca .
41006015	Cutin maijanca : — Dios ima nishcata huillac Eliasmi canga — nircami . Maijanca : — Dios ima nishcata ñaupa huillaccunapuramanta maijanmi canga — nircami .
41006016	Chaita Herodes uyashpaca : — Chai runaca Juanmi canga . Paitaca ñucami cungata pitishpa , huañuchichun mandarcani . Paimi huañushcacunapuramanta causarishca canga — nirca .
41006017	Herodesllatacmi Herodías huarmi nishcata uyashpa , Juantaca cadenahuan huatashpa carcelpi churachishca carca . Herodesca , paipac huauqui Felipepac huarmi Herodias-huanmi apanacushpa causacurca .
41006018	Juanca Herodestaca : « Huauquipac huarmihuan causanaca , mana allichu » nishcami carca .
41006019	Herodiasca Juantaca huañuchinatami munarca . Shina cashpapish mana huañuchi pudircachu .
41006020	Herodesca Juantaca cashcata ruhuac , Diospaclla causactami yacharca . Chaimantami paita manchashpa , cuidashpa charirca . Imata ruhuanata yuyacushpapish , Juan huillacpica , cushillami uyac carca .
41006021	Herodías munashca punzhami chayarca . Chaica , Herodesmi pai huacharishca huata pactacpi , fiestata ruhuashpa , llactata mandaccunatapish , soldadocunata mandaccunatapish , Galilea llactata pushaccunatapish jatun micuiman cayarca .
41006022	Chai ucuman yaicushpami , Herodiaspac huahua solteraca bailarca . Chaitaca , Herodespish , chaipi caccunapish cushicushpami ricucurca . Chaimantami mandac Herodesca chai solterataca : — Can imata munashcata mañailla . Ñucaca cushallami .
41006023	Ñucami : Can mañacpica , ñuca mandacushcamanta chaupi llactatapish cushami — nishpa , ari nini .
41006024	Soltera chaimanta llucshishpaca mamataca : — ¿ Imatatac mañasha ? — nishpa tapurca . Shina tapucpica mamaca : — Bautizac Juanpac umata mañaiyari — nirca .
41006025	Chai soltera mandac Herodespacman utca rishpaca : — Cunanllatac Bautizac Juanpac umata shuc platopi cui — nirca .
41006026	Mandac Herodesca yallitami llaquirirca . Shina cashpapish , chaipi caccunapac ñaupapi ari nishcamantami “ mana cushachu ” ninataca , mana pudirca .
41006027	Chaimantami mandac Herodesca Juanpac umata pitishpa apamuchun , shuc soldadota cacharca .
41006028	Chai soldadoca carcelman rishpami , Juanpac umata platopi apamushpa , chai solteraman curca . Paica paipac mamamanmi curca .
41006029	Juanpac yachacuccuna chaita yachashpaca shamurcami . Chashnami Juanpac cuerpota enterrangapac aparca .
41006030	Jesús huillachun cachashcacuna cutimushpaca , yachachishcatapish , imata ruhuashcatapish Jesusman tucuimi parlarca .
41006031	Achca gentecuna rin , cutin puricucpimi , ima shina micunallatapish mana pudircacuna . Chaimantami Jesusca yachacuccunataca : — Shitashca pambaman shamushpa , samarichic — nirca .
41006032	Chaimantami paicunalla canoapi cuchata pasashpa , shitashca pambaman rircacuna .
41006033	Paicuna ricuctaca achca gentecuna ricushpaca ricsircami . Chaimantami tucui pueblocunamanta chaquillahuan paicunata mishashpa , chaiman chayarcacuna .
41006034	Canoamanta Jesús llucshishpaca , achca gentecunatami ricurca . Paicuna michic illac ovejacuna shina cashcamantami Jesusca llaquirishpa , paicunaman tucuita yachachi callarirca .
41006035	Tutayamucpi , Jesuspac yachacuccuna paipacman cuchuyashpaca : — Ñami tutayamun . Caipica pipish mana causanchu .
41006036	Cai gentecunaca micunatapish mana charinchu . Paicunataca chai muyundi uchilla llactacunapi randishpa micuchun cachaiyari — nirca .
41006037	Shina nicpimi Jesusca : — Cancunallatac micunata caraichic — nirca . Shina nicpimi paicunaca : — ¿ Ishcai patsac denario cullquihuanchu tandata randimugrichun ningui ? — nirca .
41006038	Jesusca : — Cancunaca , ¿ mashna tandatatac charinguichic ? Ricungapac richic — nirca . Paicuna cutimushpaca : — Pichca tanda , ishcai challuallatami charinchic — nirca .
41006039	Shina nicpimi Jesusca : — Chai gentecunata chai quihua pambapi asha asha raquishpa tiyachichic — nishpa mandarca .
41006040	Chaimantami tucui chaipi caccunaca maipica patsac , maipica pichca chunga tiyarirca .
41006041	Chai quipami Jesusca pichca tandata , ishcai challuata japishpa , jahua pachata huichailla ricushpa , Diosta pagui nirca . Shinami pichca tandata , ishcai challuata chaupishpa chaupishpa , gentecunaman carachun paipac yachacuccunaman curca .
41006042	Chaitaca tucui gentecunami mana nicta micurca .
41006043	Puchuchishcataca chunga ishcai taza jundatami tandatapish , challuatapish tandarca .
41006044	Chai micuccunaca , caricunallami pichca huaranga carca .
41006045	Chai quipaca , Jesusca paipac yachacuccunatami canoapi huichicuchishpa , cuchata pasashpa , Betsaida puebloman ñaupachun cacharca . Chaicamanca Jesusca gentecunatami cachacurca .
41006046	Jesusca gentecunata cachashpaca urcumanmi Diosta mañangapac rirca .
41006047	Ña tutayacuctaca paipac yachacuccunaca chaupi yacupimi canoapi carca . Jesusca paillami urcupi saquirirca .
41006048	Yachacuccunaca huaira ñaupamanta jarcacpimi , canoata mana purichi pudicurca . Chaitami Jesusca ricurca . Ña punzhayacuctami Jesusca yacu jahuata rishpa , paicunapac ñaupata rigrirca .
41006049	Yachacuccuna chaita ricushpaca “ ¡ ayami canga ! ” yuyashpami caparirca .
41006050	Chaica , tucui paipac yachacuccuna ricushpami , yallita mancharirca . Chaimantami Jesusca paicunata rimashpaca : — ¡ Ama mancharichicchu ! Ñucami cani , sinchicuichic — nirca .
41006051	Jesús paicuna ricuc canoapi huichicucpica , huairaca pararcami . Chaimantami paipac yachacuccunaca yallita mancharirca .
41006052	Paicunaca rumi shungu cashcamantami tandata mirachishcatapish manarac entendircachu .
41006053	Cuchata pasashpaca , Genesaret llactaman chayashpami , chai cucha patapi canoata huatarca .
41006054	Canoamanta llucshincami , gentecunaca Jesusta ricsirca .
41006055	Shina ricsishpami , chai muyundi llactacunapi huillagrirca . Shina huillacpimi , Jesús maipi cacta uyashpaca , ungushcacunata huandushpa apamurca .
41006056	Mai puebloman , mai llactaman , mai huasicunaman Jesús chayacpica , ñancunapimi ungushcacunata churarca . Shina churashpaca churana puntallapipish tuparichun saquichunmi mañarca . Jesuspac churanapi tupariccunaca , tucuimi alliyarca .
41007001	Jerusalenmanta shamuc fariseocunapish , maijan mandashcacunata yachachiccunapish Jesuspacmanmi cuchuyarca .
41007002	Paicunaca Jesuspac maijan yachacuccuna maquita mana jahuashpa micucucta ricurca .
41007003	( Fariseocunapish , tucui israelcunapish ñaupa taitacuna yachachishcata catishpami , maquita jahuashpalla micuc carca .
41007004	Plazamanta cutimushpapish , maquita mana jahuashpaca , mana micucchu carca . Shinallatac shuctac yachachishcacunatapish pactachiccunami carca . Chaimantami vasocunatapish , jarrocunatapish , platocunatapish jahuac , shinallatac camacunatapish tacshac carca ) .
41007005	Chaimantami fariseocunapish , mandashcacunata yachachiccunapish Jesusta tapushpaca : — ¿ Ima nishpatac cambac yachacuccunaca ñaupa taitacuna yachachishcata mana cazushpa , maquita mana jahuashpa micun ? — nirca .
41007006	Shina nicpimi , Jesusca paicunataca : — ¡ Mishqui shimi , jayac shungucuna canguichic ! Allimi , Dios ima nishcata huillac Isaías cancunamanta quillcashpaca : “ Cai gentecunaca shimillahuanmi ñucataca alli nincuna . Ashtahuanpish shunguca ñucamanta carupimi .
41007007	Paicunaca yangallami ñucata alli nincuna . Runacuna yachachishcallatami yachachincuna ” nishcami .
41007008	Cancunaca Dios mandashcacunata saquishpami , runacuna yachachishcallata caticunguichic — nirca .
41007009	Shinallatac Jesusca : — Dios mandashcacunataca saquishpami , ñaupa taitacuna yachachishcallata cazunguichic .
41007010	Moisés yachachishpaca : “ Taita mamata cuyangui . Maijanpish taita mamata mana alli nicca , huañunami canga ” nishcami .
41007011	Ashtahuanpish cancunaca : “ Taita mama imata mañacpica , ‘ ñuca charishcacunaca Diosman cushca ofrendami . Chaimanta mana ayudai pudinichu ’ ninallami ” nishpami yachachinguichic .
41007012	Chashna yachachishpami , taita mamata ayudachunca mana saquinguichic .
41007013	Chashnami Dios mandashcacunata saquishpa , runacuna yachachishcallata catinguichic . Shinallatac shuctac chai shinacunatami catinguichic — nirca .
41007014	Jesús tucui gentecunata cayashpaca : — Tucui mashna uyashpa , alli entendichic :
41007015	Imapish shimita yaicucca mana juchayucta ruhuanchu , ashtahuanpish shungumanta llucshic mana alli yuyaimi juchayuctaca ruhuan .
41007016	Ringrita chariccunaca , alli uyaichic — nirca .
41007017	Jesús gentecunamanta raquirishpa , huasiman yaicucpica , paipac yachacuccunaca chimbapurashpa parlashcamantami tapurca .
41007018	Chaimantami Jesusca paicunataca : — Cancunapish ñuca huillacushca imata nisha nishcataca , ¿ manaracchu entendinguichic ? Ima micunapish shimita yaicucca mana juchayucta ruhuac cashcataca , ¿ manachu entendinguichic ?
41007019	Micunaca shunguman mana yaicushpami , huicsallaman yaicun . Quipamanca llucshinllami — nirca . Chashna nishpaca , ima micunatapish micunallami nishpami yachachirca .
41007020	Jesús cutin rimashpaca : « Shungu ucumanta llucshicmi juchayucta ruhuan .
41007021	Shungu ucumanta millai yuyaicuna llucshicpimi , huainayancuna , millaita ruhuancuna , huañuchincuna ,
41007022	shuhuancuna , charicyanata munancuna , pitapish llaquichincuna , umancuna , mana pingancuna , envidiancuna , llullancuna , jatun tucuncuna , yuyai illac tucuncuna .
41007023	Tucui cai yuyaicunami shungumanta llucshishpa , juchayuctaca ruhuan » nirca .
41007024	Jesusca chaimanta rishpaca Tiro llacta , Sidón llactamanmi chayarca . Chaipi cashcata pipish ama yachachunmi , shuc huasiman yaicurca . Chashna cacpipish gentecunaca Jesús maipi cashcata yachac chayarcami .
41007025	Shuc huarmimi Jesús chaipi cashcata yachashpa shamurca . Chai huarmica supai japishca shuc huarmi huambratami charirca .
41007026	Chai huarmica mana israelcunapuramantachu carca . Ashtahuanpish Sirofenicia llacta huarmimi carca . Paimi , paipac huambramanta supaita llucchishpa cachachun mañarca .
41007027	Shina nicpimi , Jesusca huarmitaca : — Huahuacunarac micuchun saqui . Huahuacunamanta micucucta quichushpa , allcunaman caranaca , mana allichu — nirca .
41007028	Shina nicpimi , chai huarmica : — Apunchic Jesús , chashnami . Shina cacpipish allcunaca huahuacuna micucushpa urmachishcataca micunllami — nirca .
41007029	Shina nicpimi Jesusca : — Canca allitami nishcangui . Cambac huahuamantaca , supaica ñami llucshirca . Cunanca huasiman rilla — nirca .
41007030	Huarmi huasiman cutishpaca , huambra camapi siricuctami ricurca . Supaica huambramantaca ñami llucshishca carca .
41007031	Jesusca Tiro llactamanta llucshishpaca , Sidón llactata , Decápolis llactata rishpami , Galilea cuchaman chayarca .
41007032	Chaiman ringri mana uyac , mana rimac runata pushamushpami , Jesús chai runapac uma jahuapi maquita churashpa , alliyachichun mañarca .
41007033	Shina mañacpimi , Jesusca chai runata gentecunamanta caruyachishpa , callupi tucata churashpa , ishcai ringripi dedota satirca .
41007034	Chashna ruhuashpami , Jesusca jahua pachata ricushpa , shungupi llaquirishpa : — ¡ Efata ! — nirca . Chaica : “ Pascari ” nisha ninmi .
41007035	Chashna nicpica , chai runapac ringricunaca pascarircami . Callupish alli tucucpimi , ña rimarcalla .
41007036	Ña alliyachishpaca , Jesusca piman ama huillachunmi cutin cutin rimashpa mandarca . Chashna nicpipish , ashtahuanmi pimanpish parlashpa purirca .
41007037	Chashna parlacpica , tucui gentecunami mancharishpami : “ Paica allita ruhuan . Ringri mana uyaccunatapish uyachin , mana rimaccunatapish rimachinmi ” nircacuna .
41008001	Chai punzhacunapica , achca gentecunami tandanacurca . Paicuna micunata mana charicpimi , Jesusca paipac yachacuccunata cayashpa :
41008002	— Cai gentecunaca quimsa punzhatami ñucahuan caipi cancuna . Paicunaca ima micunallata mana charinchu , chaimanta llaquinayanmi .
41008003	Maijancunaca caru llactacunamanta shamushca . Paicunaman mana carashpa huasiman cachacpica , yarcaihuan ñanpi tigrangami — nirca .
41008004	Yachacuccunaca : — Cai shitashca pambapica , ¿ maimantatac tucui gentecunamanca carashunyari ? — nirca .
41008005	Shina nicpimi Jesusca : — ¿ Mashna tandatatac charinguichic ? — nirca . Shina tapucpimi , paipac yachacuccunaca : — Canchis tandallatami charinchic — nirca .
41008006	Shina nicpimi , Jesusca chai tucui gentecunata pambapi tiyarichun mandarca . Chashna tiyachishpami , Jesusca chai canchis tandata japishpa , Diosta pagui nirca . Chai tandataca chaupishpa chaupishpami , tucuiman carachun yachacuccunaman curca . Paicunaca tucui gentecunamanmi cararca .
41008007	Shinallatac asha challuacunatapish charircami . Chai challuacunamantapish Diosta pagui nishpami , carachun mandarca .
41008008	Chai gentecunaca mana nictami micurca . Shinallatac puchuchishcataca canchis taza jundatami tandarca .
41008009	Micuccunaca chuscu huaranga shinami carca . Chai quipaca Jesusca paicunapac huasicunamanmi cacharca .
41008010	Chai quipaca Jesusca paipac yachacuccunahuanmi canoapi tiyarishpa , Dalmanuta llactaman rirca .
41008011	Fariseocuna shamushpami , Jesusta pandachisha nishpa “ jahua pacha Dios cachashca cashpaca , milagrota ruhuashpa ricuchi ” nishpa , rimari callarirca .
41008012	Chaimantami Jesusca shungupi llaquirishpa : — Cai causaccunaca , ¿ ima nishpatac milagrota ruhuashpa ricuchichun ninyari ? Paicunaca milagrota ricushun nishpapish , manatac ricungachu . Chaica chashnatacmi canga — nirca .
41008013	Jesusca fariseocunata chaillapi saquishpami , cutinllatac canoapi tiyarishpa chimba ladoman rirca .
41008014	Jesuspac yachacuccunaca tandata apanata cungarishpami rishca carca . Shuclla tandami canoapi tiyacushca carca .
41008015	Jesús paipac yachacuccunata mandashpaca : — Uyaichic , fariseocunapac , Herodespac levadurataca ama chasquinguichicchu — nircami .
41008016	Chashna nicpimi yachacuccunaca : — Tandata mana apamushcamantami , chashna nicunga — ninacurca .
41008017	Jesús chaita yachashpaca : — ¿ Ima nishpatac “ tandataca manamari apamushcanchicchu ” nishpa , rimanacunguichic ? ¿ Manaracchu entendinguichic ? ¿ Manaracchu alli yuyaita japinguichic ? Cancunapac shunguca , ¿ chairac sinchiracchu ?
41008018	Ñahuita charishpapish , ¿ manachu ricunguichic ? Ringrita charishpapish , ¿ manachu uyanguichic ? ¿ Manachu yuyaringuichic ?
41008019	Pichca tandata pichca huaranga gentecunaman ñuca caracpica , chai puchuchishcataca , ¿ mashna tazatatac tandarcanguichic ? — nirca . Chashna nicpica : — Chunga ishcai tazata — nirca . Shina nicpimi Jesusca :
41008020	— Shinallatac canchis tandata chuscu huaranga gentecunaman ñuca caracpica , puchuchishcataca , ¿ mashna tazatatac tandarcanguichic ? — nirca . Shina nicpica paicunaca : — Canchis tazata — nirca .
41008021	Chashna nicpimi Jesusca : — ¿ Chashna ruhuashca jahuachu manarac entendinguichic ? — nirca .
41008022	Chai quipaca Betsaida pueblomanmi Jesusca paipac yachacuccunahuan chayarca . Chaiman shuc ñahui mana ricuc runata pushamushpami , Jesús maquihuan tuparishpa , alliyachichun mañarca .
41008023	Chaimantami Jesusca chai ñahui mana ricuc runata maquimanta aisashpa , pueblomanta caruman pusharca . Chai runapac ishcai ñahuipi tucata churashpa , maquita paipac uma jahuapi churashpaca : — ¿ Ñachu imallatapish ricungui ? — nirca .
41008024	Chai ñahui mana ricuc runa ña ricui callarishpaca : — Gentecunaca sacha yuracunaman ricchami ricurin . Shina cashpapish puricunmi — nirca .
41008025	Jesús cutin chai runapac ñahuipi maquita churacpica , tucuita alli ricurcallami .
41008026	Jesús chai runata huasiman cachashpaca : — Cai puebloman ama yaicushpa , pimanpish ama huillashpa cambac huasiman rilla — nirca .
41008027	Chai quipaca Jesusca paipac yachacuccunahuanmi Filipo mandana Cesarea cuchulla llactacunata ricurca . Chashna ricushpami , paipac yachacuccunataca : — Gentecunaca , ¿ pi cashcatatac ñucataca yuyancuna ? — nishpa tapurca .
41008028	Chashna tapucpimi paicunaca : — Maijancunaca Bautizac Juan cashcata , maijancunaca Dios ima nishcata huillac Elías cashcata , maijancunaca Dios ima nishcata huillaccunapuramanta maijan cashcatami yuyancuna — nirca .
41008029	Shina nicpimi Jesusca : — Cutin cancunaca ñucataca , ¿ pi cashcatatac yuyanguichic ? — nirca . Shina tapucpimi Pedroca : — Canca , Dios cachashca Cristomi cangui — nirca .
41008030	Shina nicpica Jesusca , pai pi cashcata pimanpish ama huillachunmi cutin cutin mandarca .
41008031	Jesusca paipac yachacuccunataca : “ Runa Tucungapac shamushca ñucaca , achca llaquita apanami cani . Curacunata mandac curacunapish , pushac yuyaccunapish , mandashcacunata yachachiccunapish ñucata piñashpa huañuchingami . Shina huañuchicpipish , quimsa punzhapica causarishallami ” nishpami yachachirca .
41008032	Paipac yachacuccunaman chashna canatatac huillacpimi , Pedroca paillata cayashpa , ama chashna tucuchun nishpa rimarca .
41008033	Ashtahuanpish Jesús paipac yachacuccunata ricushpa , Pedrota piñarishpaca : — ¡ Caimanta anchuri , Satanás ! Canca Diospac munaitaca mana entendinguichu , ashtahuanpish gentecuna yuyashcallatami yuyangui — nirca .
41008034	Jesusca paipac yachacuccunatapish , caishuc gentecunatapish cayashpaca : — Maijanpish ñucata catisha nishpaca , quiquin causaita mana llaquishpa , cruzpi huañuna shina llaquita apana cashpapish , ñucataca catichunlla .
41008035	Maijanpish quiquin causaita llaquicca chingaringami . Maijanpish alli huillaita cazushcamanta quiquin causaita chingachicca quishpiringami .
41008036	Shuc runa cai pachapi tucui imata charicyashpapish , huiñai causaita chingachishpaca , ¿ ima allitac cangayari ?
41008037	Huiñai causaitaca , ¿ imahuan randi pudingachu ?
41008038	Maijanpish cai pachapi Diosta mana cazuc , juchayuc gentecunapac ñaupapi ñucamanta , ñuca huillashcacunamanta huillanata pingacpica , Runa Tucungapac shamushca ñucapish ñuca Taitapac poderhuan , paipac sumac jucha illac angelcunahuan achicyachishpa cutimushpa pingashami — nirca .
41009001	Shinallatac Jesusca : — Maijan caipi caccunaca Dios , paipac poderhuan shamushpa , mandacucta ricungacaman manarac huañunguichicchu . Chaica chashnatacmi canga — nirca .
41009002	Sucta punzha quipami , Jesusca Pedrotapish , Jacobotapish , Juantapish pushashpa , alto urcupi paicunalla cangapac rirca . Chaipimi paicunapac ñaupapi Jesusca shuctaclaya tucurca .
41009003	Churashcapish yuranlla , jagan nicucmi tucurca . Cai pachapica pipish mana chashna yuranllata tacshanchu .
41009004	Yachacuccunaca Eliastapish , Moisestapish Jesus-huan parlacuctami ricurca .
41009005	Shina ricushpami , Pedroca Jesustaca : — ¡ Yachachic , mai allimi caipica canchic ! Quimsa chucllatami ruhuashun ninchic , shuctaca canman , shuctaca Moisesman , shuctaca Eliasman — nirca .
41009006	Yallita manchaihuan cashpami , Pedroca pai imata rimacushcatapish mana yacharca .
41009007	Shina rimacucpimi puyu llandushpa , paicunata llandurca . Chai puyu ucumanta shuc rimashca uyarishpaca : — Caimi ñuca cuyashca Churi . Pai ima nishcata uyanguichic — nirca .
41009008	Yachacuccuna muyundita ricushpaca , pitapish mana ricurcachu , Jesusllatami ricurca .
41009009	Chai urcumanta cutimushpaca , Jesusca chai quimsa yachacuccunataca chai ricushcataca , Runa Tucungapac shamushca Huañushcacunapuramanta causaringacaman ama piman huillachunmi mandarca .
41009010	Chaimantami pimanpish mana huillashpa , paicunapuralla parlanacushpaca : “ ¿ Imamantatac huañushcacunapuramanta causarina nin ? ” nishpa tapunacurca .
41009011	Chaimantami Jesustaca : — ¿ Ima nishpatac mandashcacunata yachachiccunaca : “ Ñaupa huillac Eliasracmi shamunga ” nincuna ? — nishpa tapurca .
41009012	Shina tapucpimi , Jesusca paicunataca : — Ari , Eliasracmi tucuita allichingapac shamunga . ¿ Manachu Dios quillcachishcapica : “ Runa Tucungapac shamushcataca mana ricunayachishpa llaquichingami ” nicun ?
41009013	Ashtahuanpish ñucaca : Eliasca ñami shamurca . Paitaca Dios quillcachishcapi nishca shinami piñashpa , munashcata ruhuarcacuna ninimi — nirca .
41009014	Jesusca caishuc yachacuccunapacman cutimushpaca , paicunata achca gentecuna muyushpa shayacuctami ricurca . Mandashcacunata yachachiccunaca yachacuccunahuanmi sinchita rimaricurca .
41009015	Chai gentecuna Jesús shamucucta ricushpaca , cushicushpami “ allillachu cangui ” ningapac callpamurca .
41009016	Shina shamucpimi Jesusca : — ¿ Imatatac paicunahuanca rimarinacucunguichic ? — nirca .
41009017	Chashna nicpi , chai gentecunapuramanta shuc runaca Jesustaca : — Yachachic , ñuca churitami cambacman pushamurcani . Paitaca supai japishpami , upayachishpa charicun .
41009018	Chai supaimi maipipish japishpa urmachinlla . Quiru canirishpa , shimiman puscuta shitashpami , mana cuyurishpa siricunlla . Cambac yachacuccunamanpish supaita llucchichun mañarcani . Paicunaca supaita mana llucchi pudircachu — nirca .
41009019	Shina nicpimi Jesusca : — ¡ Aij , mana cric gentecunalla ! Cancunahuanca , ¿ maicamantac yachachishpa causacushalla ? ¿ Maicamantac llaquita apacushalla ? Huambrata caiman apamuichic — nirca .
41009020	Ña apamucpica , supai Jesusta ricushpaca , huambrata chucchuchishpami urmachirca . Huambraca shimiman puscuta shitashpami singurca .
41009021	Jesús huambrapac taitata tapushpaca : — ¿ Ima horamantatac huambraca cashna causan ? — nirca . Shina tapucpi taitaca : — Huahuamanta pachami cashna causan .
41009022	Tauca cutinmi supaica huañuchisha ninapipish , yacupipish urmachicunlla . Can allichi pudishpaca , ñucanchicta llaquishpa ayudaiyari — nirca .
41009023	Shina nicpimi Jesusca : — ¿ Ima nishpatac “ allichi pudishpaca ” ningui ? Tucui shunguhuan cricca , imatapish ruhuai pudinmi — nirca .
41009024	Shina nicpimi , chai huambrapac taita caparishpaca : — Ari , crinimi . ¡ Ashtahuan cringapac ayudai ! — nirca .
41009025	Achca gentecuna tandarimucta ricushpami , Jesusca chai supaitaca : — ¡ Mana uyacta , upata ruhuac supai , ñucami cai huambramanta llucshi nini ! ¡ Ama cutin paipi yaicunguichu ! — nishpa , sinchita rimarca .
41009026	Chashna rimacpimi , supaica caparishpa , huambrata chucchuchishpa llucshirca . Huambraca huañushca shinami pambapi saquirirca . Chaita gentecuna ricushpaca : — Ña huañun — ninacurca .
41009027	Ashtahuanpish Jesús huambrata maquimanta jatarichicpica , chai alliyashpa shayarircallami .
41009028	Jesús shuc huasiman yaicucpi , paipac yachacuccunaca : — ¿ Ima nishpatac ñucanchicca chai supaitaca mana llucchi pudircanchic ? — nishpa , paillaman tapurca .
41009029	Chashna tapucpimi Jesusca : — Chai shina supaicunataca ayunashpa , Diosta mañashpallami llucchishpa cachai pudinchic — nirca .
41009030	Chaimanta llucshishpaca , Galilea llactatami rirca . Jesusca chaita ricushcata pipish ama yachachunmi munarca .
41009031	Paipac yachacuccunata yachachishpaca : “ Runa Tucungapac shamushca ñucataca runacunaman japichingami . Paicunami ñucataca huañuchinga . Chashna huañuchicpipish , quimsa punzhapica causarishallami ” nircami .
41009032	Paicunaca chai rimashcacunataca mana entendircachu . Chashna mana entendishpapish , manchashpami mana tapurca .
41009033	Jesús Capernaúm puebloman chayashpa , shuc huasipi yaicushpaca paipac yachacuccunataca : — Cancunaca , ¿ imatatac ñanpica rimanacushpa shamucurcanguichic ? — nishpa tapurca .
41009034	Paicunaca ñanta shamucushpaca : “ ¿ Maijantac ashtahuan alli canchic ? ” nishpami rimanacushpa shamurca . Chaimantami upalla saquirircacuna .
41009035	Jesús tiyarishpa , paipac chunga ishcai yachacuccunata cayashpaca : — Cancunapuramanta maijan ashtahuan alli nishca casha nishpaca , tucuimanta yalli yangalla tucushpami , tucuita servina canguichic — nirca .
41009036	Shina nishpami , shuc huahuata paicunapac chaupipi churashpa , chai huahuata Jesús marcashpaca :
41009037	— Maijanpish ñuca shutipi shuc huahuata shina chasquicca , ñucatami chasquin . Shina chasquishpaca , mana ñucatachu chasquin , ashtahuanpish ñucata cachac Taitatami chasquin — nirca .
41009038	Shina nicpimi Juanca : — Yachachic , cambac shutipimi shuc runaca supaicunata llucchishpa cachacucta ricurcanchic . Paica mana ñucanchicpura cacpimi , jarcarcanchic — nirca .
41009039	Chashna nicpimi Jesusca : — Ama jarcanguichicchu , saquichiclla . Maijanpish ñuca shutipi milagrota ruhuashpaca , mana ñucataca piñangachu .
41009040	Maijanpish ñucanchicta mana piñacca , ñucanchic-huan alli cashcatami ricuchin .
41009041	Cancunaca Quishpichic Cristo ñucata caticcunami canguichic . Chaimanta maijanpish cancunaman shuc vaso yacullatapish cucmanca , Diosca japina cashcata cungami . Chaica chashnatacmi — nirca .
41009042	Maijanpish cai uchilla shina ñucata criccunata pandachictaca , jatun cutana rumita cungapi huatashpa , jatun cuchapi shitanami ashtahuan alli canman .
41009043	Chaimanta cambac maqui juchapi urmachisha nicpica , pitishpa shitangui . Ishcai maquindi mana huañuc ucu pacha ninaman rinapac randica , shuclla maquihuan jahua pachapi yaicunami canmanca ashtahuan alli .
41009044	Ucu pachapica curucunapish mana huañunchu , ninapish huiñaita rupacunllami .
41009045	Cambac chaqui juchaman apasha nicpica , pitishpa shitangui . Ishcai chaquindi ucu pachapi shitashca canapac randica , shuclla chaquihuan jahua pachapi yaicunami canmanca ashtahuan alli canga .
41009046	Ucu pachapica curucunapish mana huañunchu , ninapish huiñaita rupacunllami .
41009047	Cambac ñahui juchapi urmachisha nicpica , surcushpa shitangui . Ishcai ñahuindi ucu pachapi shitashca canapac randica , Dios mandacucpi shuclla ñahuihuan yaicunami canmanca ashtahuan alli canga .
41009048	Ucu pachapica curucunapish mana huañunchu , ninapish huiñaita rupacunllami .
41009049	Tucuimi ninahuan chuyayachishca canga .
41009050	Cachica allimi . Ashtahuanpish gamuyashpaca , ¿ ima shinatac cutinca alli canga ? Cancunaca caishuc chaishuc-huan sumacta causashpa , cachi shina caichic — nirca .
41010001	Jesusca Capernaúm pueblomanta llucshishpaca , Jordán yacuta pasashpa , Judea llactamanmi rirca . Jesusca achca gentecuna tandanacumucpimi , pai yachachic cashca shinallatac cutin yachachi callarirca .
41010002	Fariseocuna pandachingaraicu Jesuspacman cuchuyashpaca : — Mandashcacunapi nishca shinaca , ¿ cusaca huarmimanta raquirinachu canga ? — nishpa tapurca .
41010003	Shina tapucpi Jesusca : — Moisés mandashcapica , ¿ imatatac nin ? — nirca .
41010004	Shina tapucpimi fariseocunaca : — Moisesca : “ Firmata cushpaca , huarmimanta raquirinallami ” ninmi — nirca .
41010005	Shina nicpimi Jesusca : — Cancuna sinchi shungu cacpimi , Moisesca chashna mandashpa quillcashca .
41010006	Diosca cai pachata ruhuashpaca , caritapish , huarmitapishmi ruhuarca .
41010007	Chaimantami carica taita mamata saquishpa , huarmihuan tandarishpa ,
41010008	ishcaimanta shuclla tucunga . Shinashpaca ña mana ishcaichu , ashtahuanpish shucllami can .
41010009	Chaimanta Dios tandachishcataca , pi mana chicanyachingachu — nirca .
41010010	Paipac yachacuccuna huasipi cashpami , chaillamantatac cutin Jesusta tapurca .
41010011	Chaimantami Jesusca : — Maijanpish paipac huarmimanta raquirishpa shuc-huan cazarashpaca juchallinmi .
41010012	Chashnallatac huarmipish paipac cusamanta raquirishpa , shuc-huan cazarashpaca , juchallinmi — nirca .
41010013	Huahuacunapac umapi Jesús tuparichun pushamucpimi , yachacuccunaca chai pushamuccunahuan piñarirca .
41010014	Jesús chaita ricushpa , yachacucuccunahuan piñarishpaca : — Huahuacuna ñucapacman shamuchunca saquichiclla , ama jarcaichicchu . Cai huahuacuna shinacunami Dios mandacucmanca yaicunga .
41010015	Maijanpish shuc huahua shina , Dios mandacucta mana chasquicca , Dios mandacucmanca mana yaicungachu . Chaica chashnatacmi canga — nirca .
41010016	Shina nishpami , Jesusca huahuacunata marcashpa , uma jahuapi maquita churashpa bendiciarca .
41010017	Chaimanta llucshishpa , Jesús ñanta ricucpimi , shuc moso callpamushpa , paipac ñaupapi cungurishpaca : — Alli yachachiclla , ñuca huiñai causaita charingapacca , ¿ imatatac ruhuana cani ? — nirca .
41010018	Shina nicpimi Jesusca : — ¿ Ima nishpatac “ alli ” ningui ? Shucllami allica tiyan , chaica Diosmi .
41010019	Mandashcacunataca canllatac yachanguimi . Chaipica : “ Ama huainayangui , ama huañuchingui , ama shuhuangui , ama llullangui , ama umangui , cambac taita mamata cuyangui ” nicunmi — nirca .
41010020	Jesús chashna nicpimi , chai runaca : — Yachachic , tucui caicunataca huahuamanta pachami pactachicuni — nirca .
41010021	Chaimantami Jesusca cuyaihuan paita ricushpaca : — Shina cashpapish , caitami ruhuanarac cangui : Cambac tucui charishcacunata catushpa , huacchacunaman cugri . Chashna cushpaca , jahua pachapimi achcata charingui . Chashna cushpaca , ñucata catilla — nirca .
41010022	Chai runaca yalli chayucmi carca . Chaimantami llaquilla rirca .
41010023	Chaimanta Jesús muyundita ricushpa , paipac yachacuccunataca : — ¡ Chayuccunapacca Dios mandacucman yaicunaca sinchimi ! — nirca .
41010024	Yachacuccuna chaita uyashpaca yallitami mancharirca . Ashtahuanpish Jesús cutinllatac rimashpaca : — ¡ Huahuacunalla , charishcallapi shunguta churaccunapacca , Dios mandacucman yaicunaca sinchimi !
41010025	Chayuc runa Dios mandacucman yaicunapac randica , shuc camellomi auja ringrita pasarinman — nirca .
41010026	Chaita yachacuccunaca uyashpaca ashtahuan mancharishpami : — Shinashpaca , ¿ pitac quishpiringayari ? — nishpa , tapunacurca .
41010027	Jesús paicunata ricushpaca : — Gentecunaca maita mana quishpiripacmi , ashtahuanpish Diosmanca imapish ruhuaipacllami — nirca .
41010028	Chashna nicpimi Pedroca : — Ñucanchicca tucui charishcacunata saquishpami , canta caticunchic — nirca .
41010029	Shina nicpimi Jesusca : — Maijanpish alli huillaita huillangapac , ñucata catishcamanta huasita , huauquicunata , panicunata , taita mamata , huarmita , huahuacunata , allpata saquishpaca ,
41010030	cai pachapica patsac cutinhuanmi huasicunata , huauquicunata , panicunata , mamacunata , huahuacunata , allpacunata chasquinga . Chashnallatac ñucata caticushcamanta gentecunapac piñashca , llaquichishca cashpaca shamuc punzhapica huiñai causaitami charinga . Chaica , chashnatacmi canga .
41010031	Jatun tucushcacunaca yangallami canga . Yangalla nishcacunaca , alli nishcami canga — nirca .
41010032	Jesusca Jerusalén puebloman ñanta ricushpaca , paipac yachacuccunapac ñaupatami ricurca . Yachacuccunaca manchai manchaillami Jesustaca catishpa ricurca . Chaimantami Jesusca chunga ishcai yachacuccunallata cayashpa , pai ima tucunata huillai callarirca . Pai huillashpaca :
41010033	— Cunanca , Jerusalenmanmi ricunchic . Chaipimi Runa Tucungapac shamushca ñucataca , curacunata mandac curacunamanpish , mandashcacunata yachachiccunamanpish japichinga . Paicunami huañuchingapac juchanchishpa , mana israelcunaman cunga .
41010034	Paicunaca ñucata burlangacunami , macangacunami , tucangacunami , huañuchingacunami . Chashna huañuchicpipish , quimsa punzhapica causarishallami — nirca .
41010035	Zebedeopac churicuna Jacobopish , Juanpish Jesuspacman cuchuyashpaca : — Yachachic , ñucanchic mañashcata uyachunmi munanchic — nirca .
41010036	Shina nicpimi Jesusca : — ¿ Imatatac ruhuachun ninguichic ? — nirca .
41010037	Chashna nicpimi paicunaca : — Cambac sumaimana mandanapica , shuctaca cambac alli maquiman , shuctaca lluqui maquiman tiyachingui — nirca .
41010038	Shina nicpimi Jesusca : — Cancunaca imata mañacushcataca mana yachanguichicchu . Jayacta ubiac shina , bautizaric shina llaquicunataca , ¿ ñuca shina apai pudinguichicchu ? — nirca .
41010039	Chashna nicpimi paicunaca : — Ari , chaita apashunllami — nirca . Chashna nicpimi Jesusca : — Ari , cancunaca jayacta ubiac shina , bautizaric shina llaquicunataca , ñuca shina apanguichicmi .
41010040	Ashtahuanpish maijanta ñuca alli maquiman , lluqui maquiman tiyachinataca , Diosmi allichishpa charicun , mana ñucaca — nirca .
41010041	Chaita caishuc chunga yachacuccuna uyashpaca , Jacobohuanpish , Juanhuanpish piñarircami .
41010042	Jesús paicunata cayashpaca : — Cai pacha mandaccunallami , llactapi causaccunata quiquin munashcata ruhuashpa mandan . Paicunapurapipish maijan jatun mandac cashpaca , paicunatapish mandanllami . Chaitaca cancunallatac yachanguichicmi .
41010043	Cancunapurapica , mana chashnachu cana canguichic . Ashtahuanpish cancunapurapi maijan alli nishca casha nishpaca , caishuccunata servinami canguichic .
41010044	Cancunapurapi maijan mandangapac alli nishca casha nishpaca , caishuccunata servinami canguichic .
41010045	Runa Tucungapac shamushca ñucaca , mana servichingapacchu shamurcani , ashtahuanpish servingapac , huañushpa achca runacunata quishpichingapacmi shamurcani — nirca .
41010046	Chaimantaca Jericó pueblomanmi chayarcacuna . Chaimanta Jesús paipac yachacuccunahuan , shuctac gentecunahuan ricucpimi , Timeopac churi Bartimeo runa ñanpi caridadta mañashpa tiyacurca .
41010047	Nazaret pueblomanta Jesús cashcata uyashpami chai runaca : — Mandac Davidpac aillupuramanta Apunchic Jesús , ¡ ñucataca llaquiyari ! — nishpa , capari callarirca .
41010048	Taucacuna upallai nishpa piñaricucpipish , chai runaca : — Mandac Davidpac aillupuramanta Apunchic Jesús , ¡ ñucata llaquiyari ! — nishpami , ashtahuan caparirca .
41010049	Chaimantami Jesús chaillapi shayarishpaca : — Paita cayamugrichic — nirca . Cayangapac riccuna chai runataca : — Jatari , ama manchaichu . Jesús cayacunmi — nirca .
41010050	Chashna nicpimi , chai runaca pai pillurishcata chaillapi shitashpa , jatarishcahuan Jesuspacman callparca .
41010051	Chashna chayaricpimi Jesusca : — ¿ Imatatac ruhuachun ningui ? — nirca . Shina nicpimi , ñahui mana ricuc runaca : — Yachachic , ñuca ñahuicunata alliyachishpa cui — nirca .
41010052	Shina nicpimi Jesusca : — Rilla , can crishcamantaca , ñami alliyashcangui — nirca . Chashna nicpimi , ñahui ña ricucpi , Jesusta catishpa ñanta rircalla .
41011001	Jerusalén puebloman chayagricushpaca , Betfagé pueblohuan , Betania pueblohuan tupanacui Olivos urcu chaquimanmi chayarca . Chaipi Jesús paipac yachacuccunapuramanta ishcaita
41011002	cachashpaca : — Chimba uchilla llactaman rishpaca , pi manarac montashca shuc burro huatashca shayacuctami ricunguichic . Chai burrota cacharishpa apamugrichic .
41011003	Cancuna cacharicucpi maijan : “ ¿ imapactac cacharicunguichic ? ” nicpica : “ Apunchic Jesusmi apachun cachan , ñallami saquic shamushun ” ninguichic — nirca .
41011004	Paicuna rishpaca , huasi lado ñanpi shuc burro huatashca shayacucta tarishpami cacharicurca .
41011005	Chaipi cac maijan caccunaca : — ¿ Ima nishpatac burrotaca cacharicunguichic ? — nirca .
41011006	Ishcai yachacuccunaca Jesús imata nichun nishcatami nirca . Chashna nicpica , apachun saquircacunallami .
41011007	Burrota Jesuspacman apamucpica , churanacunahuanmi sudarca . Ña sudashca burropimi , Jesusca montashpa rirca .
41011008	Achcacunami paicunapac churanacunata Jesús rina ñanpi tendirca . Maijancunaca sacha ramacunatami pitishpa , ñanpi tendirca .
41011009	Chashna churashpami , Jesuspac ñaupata riccunapish , huashata catishpa riccunapish : — ¡ Dios cachashca shamucucca , alli nishca cachun ! ¡ Sumac cushicui cachun !
41011010	¡ Ñucanchic ñaupa mandac David mandashca shina mandangapac shamucucca , alli nishca cachun ! ¡ Jahua pachapipish alli nishca cachun ! — nircacuna .
41011011	Jesusca Jerusalenman chayashpaca , Diosta mañana huasimanmi yaicurca . Chai ucupi tucuita ricushpaca , ña tutayagricpimi , paipac chunga ishcai yachacuccunahuan Betania puebloman rirca .
41011012	Cayandi punzha Betania pueblomanta llucshicushpaca Jesusca yarcachircami .
41011013	Chaimantami carumanta shuc pangasapa higo yurata ricushpa , “ ñami pucushca canga ” yuyashpa , ricungapac rirca . Chai yuraman chayashpa ricucpica , manarac pucuna punzhacuna cashcamantami chushac pangalla junda cashca carca .
41011014	Chaimantami Jesusca chai yurataca : — Cai yuramantaca , ama pi ashtahuan micuchun — nirca . Chashna rimactaca , paipac yachacuccunaca uyacurcami .
41011015	Jesusca Jerusalén puebloman chayashpami , Diosta mañana huasiman yaicushpa catuccunatapish , randiccunatapish llucchishpa cacharca . Cullquita cambiaccunapac mizacunatapish , palomacunata catuccuna tiyarinacunatapish tigrachishpami shitarca .
41011016	Diosta mañana huasi ucupica imata apashpa purichunca mana saquircachu .
41011017	Jesusca chaipi caccunataca yachachishpaca : — Dios quillcachishcapica : “ Ñuca huasica tucui llactamanta shamuccuna ñucata mañana huasimi canga ” ninmi , ashtahuanpish cancunaca shuhuaccuna miticuna machaitami ruhuashcanguichic — nirca .
41011018	Chaita uyashpaca , mandashcacunata yachachiccunapish , curacunata mandac curacunapish Jesustaca ima shina huañuchinatami yuyaricurca . Chaica , tucui gentecunami “ Jesusca allitami yachachin ” nic carca . Chaimantami manchashpa huañuchinata munarca .
41011019	Ña chishitaca Jesusca Jerusalenmanta llucshishpa rircami .
41011020	Cayandi tutamanta ñanta ricushpaca , higo yura sapindi chaquishcatami ricurca .
41011021	Chaimanta Pedroca Jesús nishcata yuyarishpaca : — Yachachic ricui . Can llaquichishca yuraca , chaquishcami — nirca .
41011022	Shina nicpimi Jesusca : — Diospi crichic .
41011023	Maijanpish tucui shunguhuan crishpa , mana caita chaita yuyashpa , cai urcuta “ caimanta anchuri , jatun cuchaman shitari ” nicpica , ringallami . Chaica chashnatacmi canga .
41011024	Chaimantami ñucaca nini : Cancuna crishpa , imata mañacushcata japina yuyaihuan Diosta mañashpaca japinguichicmi .
41011025	Cancuna Diosta mañacushpaca , maijanta piñachishca cashpaca perdonaichic . Chashna ruhuacpimi , jahua pachapi cac cancunapac Taitapish cancunapac juchacunata perdonanga .
41011026	Cancuna shuccunata mana perdonacpica , jahua pachapi cac cancunapac Taitapish cancunapac juchacunata mana perdonangachu — nirca .
41011027	Chai quipami Jerusalén puebloman cutimurcacuna . Chaipica Diosta mañana huasipi Jesús puricucpimi , Israel curacunata mandac curacunapish , mandashcacunata yachachiccunapish , cunac yuyaccunapish paipacman cuchuyarca .
41011028	Shina cuchuyashpaca : — ¿ Pi mandacpitac chashna ruhuacungui ? ¿ Pitac canman poderta curca ? — nirca .
41011029	Shina nicpimi Jesusca : — Ñucapish cancunata tapusha , ñuca tapushcata cancuna cutichicpica , ñucapish pi chashna ruhuachun mandashcata huillashallami .
41011030	Bautizac Juan bautizachunca , ¿ Dioschu cacharca , mana cashpaca runacunallachu cacharca ? Huillaichic — nirca .
41011031	Chashna tapucpica , paicunapura rimanacushpaca : — “ Diosmi cachashca ” nicpica : “ Shinashpaca , ¿ ima nishpatac Juan huillashcataca mana crircanguichic ? ” ningami .
41011032	Ñucanchic : “ Runacunallami Juantaca cacharca ” ninapish mana allichu — ninacurca . Tucui gentecuna “ Juanca Diosmantatacmi huillacun ” ninacucta uyashcamantami , manchashpa imata mana ni pudirca .
41011033	Chaimantami Jesustaca : — Mana yachanchicchu — nirca . Shina nicpica Jesusca : — Shinashpaca , ñucapish pi mandacpi chashna ruhuacushcataca mana huillashachu — nirca .
41012001	Jesús chimbapurashca parlocunahuan yachachishpaca : « Shuc runami uvas chagrata tarpushpa , muyundita pircarca . Chai chagrallapitacmi uvasta cutanatapish , chagrata cuidana torretapish ruhuarca . Chai quipaca shuc trabajac runamanmi partir cushpa caru llactaman rirca .
41012002	Uvas pallana punzha chayamucpica , chai allpayuc runaca shuc servictami pai japina cashcata chaupimuchun cacharca .
41012003	Ashtahuanpish chagrahuan saquiric runacunaca chai servicta japishpa , macashpami , imatapish mana cushpa cacharca .
41012004	Cutinllatacmi chai allpayuc runaca shuc servicta cacharca . Paitapish rumicunahuan umata paquishpa , camishpami cacharca .
41012005	Cutinllatacmi chai allpayuc runaca shuc servicta cacharca . Paitaca huañuchircami . Chashna huañuchicpica , allpayucca cutin tauca runacunatami cacharca . Paicunatapish maijantaca macarcami , maijantaca huañuchircami .
41012006	Quipaca paipac cuyashca shuclla churillami saquirirca . Chaimantami “ Ñuca churitaca manchashpa , manapishchari imata ningacuna ” nishpami cacharca .
41012007	Chai runacuna churi shamucta ricushpacarin : “ Paimi taita charishcacunataca tucui japinga . Chaimanta pai japinata ñucanchic japingapac huañuchishunchic ” ninacurca .
41012008	Chaimantami chai churita japishpa huañuchirca . Chaimantaca uvas chagramanta llucchishpami shitarca .
41012009	Chaimantaca chai allpayuc runaca , ¿ imatashi ruhuanga ? Pai shamushpaca , chai runacunata huañuchishpami , chai chagrata shuccunaman cunga .
41012010	Dios quillcachishcapi cashna nishcataca , ¿ manachu ricushcanguichic ? Chaipica : “ Huasita ruhuaccuna mana nishca rumillatacmi , callari esquinapi churana rumi tucushca .
41012011	Mandac Diosmi chashna ruhuashca . Chaita ricushpami yallita cushicunchic ” ninmi » nirca .
41012012	Fariseocunaca chimbapurashca parlocunahuan Jesús parlashpaca , paicunata rimacushcata yachashpami , prezu japinata munarca . Shina yuyacushpapish gentecunata manchashcamantami , mana imata ruhuashpa rircalla .
41012013	Chai quipami maijan fariseocunatapish , Herodespac maijan runacunatapish Jesusta tapushpa pandachichun cacharca .
41012014	Chai runacuna Jesuspacman chayashpaca : — Yachachic , canca imatapish cashcallatami yachachingui . Dios munashca shina , alli causachunmi alli yachachingui . Canca pitapish mana manchashpa , mana piman tucushpami yachachingui . Mandashcapi nishca shinaca , ¿ jatun mandac Cesarman impuestota paganachu canga ? Mana cashpaca , ¿ manachu pagana canga ? ¿ Pagashunchu , manachu pagashun ? — nircacuna .
41012015	Jesusca , paicuna nic tucushpalla tapushcata yachashpami : — ¿ Ima nishpatac ñucata pandachisha ninguichic ? Shuc cullquita ricuchingapac apamuichic — nirca .
41012016	Cullquita apamucpimi Jesusca : — Cai cullquipica , ¿ pipac shutitac , pipac ñahuitac tiyacun ? — nicpimi paicunaca : — Jatun mandac Cesarpacmi — nirca .
41012017	Shina nicpimi Jesusca : — Shinashpaca jatun mandac Cesarpac cashcataca , jatun mandac Cesarllamantac cuichic . Diospac cashcataca Diosllamantac cuichic — nirca . Chaimantami paicunaca yallita mancharirca .
41012018	Chai quipami , huañushcacuna causarinata mana cric saduceocuna shamushpa Jesustaca :
41012019	— Yachachic , Moisés mandashpaca : “ Shuc runa manarac huahuata charishpa huañucpica , paipac huauquillatacmi chai viudahuan cazarashpa , huauquipac randi huahuata charichun ” ninmi .
41012020	Chaica canchis huauquicunami causarca . Chai canchis huauquicunamantaca punta huauquimi cazarashpa , manarac huahuata charishpa huañurca .
41012021	Chaimantaca quipa huauquimi chai viudahuan cazarashpa , manarac huahuata charishpa huañurca . Cutin quipa huauquipish shinallatacmi tucurca .
41012022	Chashnami chai canchis huauquicuna chai viudahuan cazarashpa , manarac huahuata charishpa huañurca . Chai quipaca , chai viudapish huañurcami .
41012023	Chai huarmi chai canchis huauquicunahuan cazarashca cashcamantaca , huañushcacuna causarina punzhapi , pai causarishpaca , ¿ maijanpac huarmitac canga ? — nirca .
41012024	Chaimantami Jesusca : — Cancunaca Dios quillcachishca imata nishcatapish , Diospac podertapish mana yachashpami , yallita pandaricunguichic .
41012025	Huañushcacuna causarina punzhapica mana cazarangacunachu . Mana cazarachingachu . Paicunaca jahua pachapi causac angelcuna shinami canga .
41012026	Zarza yura rupacuc chaupimanta Dios rimashcata Moisés quillcashcataca , ¿ manachu ricushcanguichic ? Dios huañushcacuna causarinamanta chai yura chaupimanta rimashpaca : “ Ñucaca Abrahampac , Isaacpac , Jacobopac Diosmi cani ” nishcami .
41012027	¡ Diosca mana huañushcacunapac Dioschu , ashtahuanpish causaccunapac Diosmi ! Shinashpaca , cancunaca yallitami pandaricunguichic — nirca .
41012028	Mandashcacunata yachachiccunapuramanta shuc runaca , Jesús imata tapucpipish allita cutichic cashcatami yacharca . Chaimantami Jesuspacman cuchuyashpaca : — Mandashcacunamantaca , ¿ maijantac ashtahuan yalli alli ? — nirca .
41012029	Chashna tapucpimi Jesusca : — Tucui mandashcacunamanta ashtahuan yallica caimi : “ Uyaichic israelcuna , ñucanchic Diosca Mandac Diosmi . Paica shucllami .
41012030	Chaimanta Mandac Diosta tucui shunguhuan , tucui almahuan , tucui yuyaihuan , tucui munaihuan cuyangui ” ninmi .
41012031	Shuctac mandashcapish chai shinallatacmi . Chaica : “ Can ima shinami cuyaringui , chai shinallatac shuccunatapish cuyangui ” ninmi . Cai mandashcacunamanta ashtahuan yalli allica mana tiyanchu — nirca .
41012032	Chashna nicpica , chai mandashcacunata yachachicca : — Yachachic , canca mana llullashpa allitami nishcangui . Shuclla Diosmi tiyan , shucca mana tiyanchu .
41012033	Diosta tucui shunguhuan , tucui yuyaihuan , tucui almahuan , tucui munaihuan cuyanaca allimi . Chashnallatac quiquin cuyaric shinallatac shuccunatapish cuyanaca allimi . Cai ishcai mandashcacunata pactachinami , rupachina ofrendatapish ashtahuan yalli allica — nirca .
41012034	Jesús mandashcacunata yachachic alli yuyaihuan cutichishcata uyashpaca : — Canca Dios mandacucmantaca mana carupichu cangui — nirca . Quipaca pingaihuan pipish imata mana ashtahuan tapurcachu .
41012035	Diosta mañana huasipi Jesús yachachicushpaca : « Mandashcacunata yachachiccunaca , ¿ ima nishpatac Cristotaca : “ Mandac Davidpac aillupurami canga ” nincuna ?
41012036	Davidllatacmi Diospac Espíritu yuyaita cucpica : “ Mandac Diosca ñucata Mandactaca : ‘ Canta piñaccunata cambac chaqui sarunapi ñuca churangacaman , canca ñuca alli maquiman tiyacuilla ’ nin ” nishcami .
41012037	Davidllatac paitaca : “ Ñucata Mandac ” nicpica , ¿ ima shinatac Cristoca Davidpac aillupuralla cangayari ? » nirca . Chai yachachishcataca achca gentecunami cushilla sumacta uyarca .
41012038	Gentecunata Jesús yachachicushpaca : « Mandashcacunata yachachiccunamanta cuidaringuichic . Paicunaca pambacaman suni churanata churarinatami munan . Shinallatac plazacunapi alabaduchunmi munan .
41012039	Paicunaca tandanacuna huasicunapipish , jatun micuicunapipish punta tiyarinata mashcashpami , tiyarinata munan .
41012040	Viudacunapac huasicunatapish quichuccunami . Chashna ruhuashpaca , alli ricurishun yuyashpami , Diosta unaita mañac tucuncuna . Chashna ruhuashcamantaca , paicunallatacmi ashtahuan llaquita apangacuna » nirca .
41012041	Jesusca Diosta mañana huasi ucupi cashpaca , ofrendata churana chimbapurapimi tiyacurca . Gentecuna ima shina cullquita churactami ricucurca . Chaipica chayuccunami achca cullquita churarca .
41012042	Cutin shuc huaccha viuda shamushpaca , ishcai ashalla valic cullquitami churarca .
41012043	Chaimantami Jesusca paipac yachacuccunata cayashpaca : — Cai huaccha viudami , caishuccunamanta yalli ofrendata cushca . Chaica chashnatacmi .
41012044	Tucuimi puchushcallata cushca , ashtahuanpish cai huarmica paipac causaipac tucui charishcatami cushca — nirca .
41013001	Diosta mañana huasimanta Jesús llucshicucpimi , paipac yachacuccunamanta shucca : — Yachachic , ¡ cai sumac rumicunata , cai jatun huasicunata riquiyari ! — nirca .
41013002	Chashna nicpimi Jesusca : — ¿ Cai jatun huasicunallata ricushpachu mana mancharicungui ? Caipica shuc rumillapish mana saquiringachu , tucuimi urmachishca canga — nirca .
41013003	Jesusca Diosta mañana huasi chimbapura Olivos urcupimi tiyarirca . Chaipi Jesús tiyacucpimi , Pedropish , Jacobopish , Juanpish , Andrespish Jesuspacman cuchuyashpa , paillata tapushpaca :
41013004	— Can huillashcaca , ¿ ima punzhatac pactangayari ? Chashna tucugricuctaca , ¿ imata ricushpatac yachashun ? — nirca .
41013005	Shina nicpimi Jesusca : — Cuidaringuichic , pacta pi pandachinman .
41013006	Achcacunami ñuca shutipi shamushpa : “ Ñucami Cristoca cani ” nishpa , achcacunata pandachinga .
41013007	Cancunaca “ macanacuimi tiyagrin , ñami macanacucun ” nicpipish ama mancharinguichicchu . Chai llaquicunaca tiyangallatacmi . Chashna tucucpipish , cai pachaca manarac tucuringachu .
41013008	Shuc llactaca , shuctac llactahuan , jatun mandacca shuctac jatun mandac-huanmi macanacunga . Tauca llactacunapimi allpa chucchuipish , yarcaipish tiyangami . Chai llaquicunaca callari llaquicunallami canga .
41013009	Cancunaca alli cuidaringuichic . Cancunataca mandaccunapacman apangami . Tandanacuna huasicunapipish azotingami . Ñucata caticushcamantami mandaccunapacmanpish , jatun mandaccunapacmanpish apangami . Chashna apacpica , paicunaman ñucamanta huillanguichicmi .
41013010	Cai pacha manarac tucuricpimi , cai alli huillaica tucui llactacunapi huillashca canga .
41013011	Mandaccunapacman cancunata pushacpica , “ ¿ imatatac nishun ? ” nishpa , ama manchailla canguichicchu . Cancuna rimai callaricpica , Diosmi rimana yuyaita cunga . Mana cancunapac yuyaimantachu rimanguichic , ashtahuanpish Diospac Espiritumi rimana yuyaitaca cunga .
41013012	Huauquica , quiquin huauquita , taitaca quiquin churitami huañuchichun japichinga . Churicunaca taita mamata piñashpami huañuchichinga .
41013013	Ñucamantami tucuipac piñashca canguichic . Chashna piñacpipish , tucuringacaman llaquita apacca quishpiringami .
41013014	Diosta mañana huasipi yallita millana tucuchic tiyacucta ricushpaca , Judea llactapi causaccunaca urcucunapi miticugrichun . ( Maijanpish cai quillcashcata ricucca , alli entendinguichic ) .
41013015	Maijanpish huasi jahuapi caccunaca , ama uricuchun , ucumanta imata apangapacllapish ama uricuchun .
41013016	Chagrapi caccunaca , churanata apangapac ama huasiman cutichun .
41013017	Chai punzhacunapi huicsayuc huarmicunapish , chuchuchicuc huarmicunapish , ¡ aij , imachari tucunga !
41013018	Chai punzhacuna ama tamya cachun , Diosta mañaichic .
41013019	Chai punzhacunaca mancharina llaquimi canga . Chashna llaquicunaca Dios cai pachata ruhuashca punzhamanta cunancaman mana tiyashcachu . Quipa punzhapipish mana tiyangachu .
41013020	Chai llaqui punzhacunata Dios mana ashata chaupicpica , pipish mana causai pudinmanchu . Ashtahuanpish Diosca pai acllashcacunata cuyashcamantami , chai llaqui punzhacunataca chaupisha nishca .
41013021	Maijanpish : “ ¡ Riquichic , Cristoca caipimi , chaipimi ! ” nicucpipish ama cringuichicchu .
41013022	Chai llulla cristocuna , llullac huillaccunami ricuringa . Chaicunaca pandachingapacmi milagrocunatapish , pi mana ricushcacunatapish ruhuashpa ricuchinga . Chashnami Dios acllashcacunatapish pandachisha ninga .
41013023	Chaimanta cancunaca cuidaringuichic . Tucui chaicunataca ñaupamanmi cancunamanca huillani .
41013024	Chai mancharina llaqui punzhacuna tiyashca quipaca , intipish amsayangami , quillapish mana achicyachingachu .
