41013025	Lucerocunapish jahuamanta urmangami . Jahua cielopi tiyac jatuncunapish chucchungami .
41013026	Chashna tucucpica , Runa Tucungapac shamushca ñucatami poderhuan , sumaimana achiclla cashcahuan puyupi achicyachishpa shamucucta ricungacuna .
41013027	Chaimantaca ñuca angelcunatami ñuca acllashcacunata tucui pacha muyundimanta tandachichun cachasha .
41013028	Higo yura ima tucucta ricushpa , yuyaita japichic . Chai yurapi panga huiñashpa cutin jundarimucta ricushpaca , usyai punzhacuna chayamucuctami yachanguichic .
41013029	Shinallatac cai ñuca huillashcacuna pactamucucta ricushpaca , Runa Tucungapac shamushca cutimuna pungullapi cashcata yachanguichic .
41013030	Cunan punzha causaccuna manarac huañucpimi , cai ñuca huillashcacunaca pactanga . Chaica chashnatacmi canga .
41013031	Jahua pachapish , cai pachapish tucuringami . Ashtahuanpish ñuca huillashcacunaca pactacungallami .
41013032	Shina cacpipish ima punzha , ima horas ñuca cutimuna cashcataca pi mana yachanchu . Jahua pacha angelcunapish mana yachanchu . Ñuca Diospac Churi cashpapish mana yachanichu , ashtahuanpish ñuca Taitallami yachan .
41013033	Ñuca ima horas cutimunata mana yachashcamantaca , alli yuyaihuan riccharishca shina Diosta mañashpa chaparacuichic .
41013034	Caica shuc amo caru llactaman rishpa , paita serviccuna imacunallata ruhuachun mandashpa saquic shinami . Huasita cuidactaca pungupi chaparachunmi mandashpa saquin .
41013035	Cancunapish Huasiyuc ima horas cutimunata mana yachashcamantaca , alli yuyaihuan riccharishca shina chaparacuichic . Paica tutayamuctachari , chaupi tutatachari , gallo cantai horastachari , mana cashpaca pacarinatachari cutimunga .
41013036	Pacta cungailla chayamushpa , cancunataca sueñucucta japinman .
41013037	Cancunata nishpaca , tucui mashnatami ‘ chaparacuichic ’ nini — nirca .
41014001	Levadura illac tandata micuna , Pascua punzhapac ishcai punzha siricpimi , curacunata mandac curacunapish , mandashcacunata yachachiccunapish Jesusta ima shina pacalla japishpa huañuchinata yuyaricurca .
41014002	Chashna yuyaricushpapish , maijanca : « Cai fiesta punzhapica mana imata ruhuanachu canchic . Gentecuna jatarishpa , ñucanchictarac llaquichingami » nirca .
41014003	Jesusca Betania pueblopi lepra ungüihuan nishca Simonpac huasipi micushpa tiyacucpimi , shuc huarmica achca valic nardo mishquilla ashnacucta , alabastro rumi botellapi apashpa shamurca . Chai botella pascashpami , mishquilla ashnacuctaca Jesuspac umapi churarca .
41014004	Chaimantami maijanca shungupi piñarishpa : — ¿ Ima nishpatac chai mishquilla ashnacuctaca yanga tallinyari ?
41014005	Chaitaca quimsa patsac yalli denario cullquipi catushpa , huacchacunaman cushpachari , alli canman carca — nishpami , huarmitaca rimaricurca .
41014006	Chaimantami Jesusca : — ¿ Ima nishpatac cai huarmitaca llaquichicunguichic ? Saquichic , paica ñucamanca allitami ruhuashca .
41014007	Huacchacunaca punzhantami cancunahuan canga . Paicunaman allita ruhuasha nishpaca ruhuanguichicllami , ashtahuanpish ñucaca cancunahuanca mana causacushallachu .
41014008	Cai huarmica pai ruhuai pudishcatami ruhuashca . Ñuca cuerpo sumacta enterrashca cachunmi , utca ruhuashca .
41014009	Tucui cai pachapi maipipish alli huillaita huillacushpaca , cai huarmi ruhuashcatapish huillangami . Chashnami paita yuyaringa . Chaica chashnatacmi canga — nirca .
41014010	Chunga ishcai yachacuccunapuramanta Judas Iscariotemi Jesusta japichingapac curacunata mandac curacunahuan parlangapac rirca .
41014011	Paicuna chaita uyashpaca , cushicushpami cullquita cushun nircacuna . Chaimanta pachami , Judasca Jesusta ima shina japichinata munacurca .
41014012	Levadura illac tandata micuna fiesta callari punzhaca , Pascuata yuyarishpa , pactalla ovejata huañuchina punzhami carca . Chai punzhami yachacuccunaca Jesustaca : — Pascua micuita micungapacca , ¿ maipitac allichigrichun ningui ? — nirca .
41014013	Chashna nicpimi , paipac ishcai yachacuccunata cachashpaca : — Jerusalén puebloman richic . Chaipica , yacu puñu aparishca shuc runahuanmi tupanguichic . Paita catishpa richic .
41014014	Chai runa mai huasiman yaicucpica , chai huasiyuc runataca : “ Yachachicca : ‘ ¿ Maijan ucupitac ñuca yachacuccunahuan Pascua micuita micusha ? ’ ninmi ” ninguichic .
41014015	Chashna nicpica , paica , allichishca shuc jatun ucutami altopi ricuchinga . Chaipi ñucanchic micungapac allichinguichic — nirca .
41014016	Yachacuccuna rishpa , puebloman chayashpaca , Jesús nishca shinallatacmi tarirca . Chai huasipimi , Pascua micuita allichirca .
41014017	Tutayacuctami Jesusca paipac chunga ishcai yachacuccunahuan chai huasiman chayarca .
41014018	Jesús mizapi tiyarishpa micucushpaca : — Cancunapuramanta ñucahuan micucucmi , ñucata huañuchiccunaman japichinga . Chaica chashnatacmi canga — nirca .
41014019	Chashna nicpimi , yachacuccuna yallita llaquirishpa , caishuc chaishuc Jesusta tapushpaca : — ¿ Ñucachu cani ? — nircacuna .
41014020	Chashna tapucpimi Jesusca : — Chunga ishcaipuramanta ñucahuan cai platopi tandata jucuchishpa micucucmi , ñucataca japichinga .
41014021	Runa Tucungapac shamushca ñucataca , Dios quillcachishcapi nishca shinallatacmi huañuchinga . Shina cacpipish , ñucata japichic runaca , ¡ aij , imachari tucunga ! Chai runaca mana huacharishca cashpachari , alli canman carca — nirca .
41014022	Yachacuccuna micucucpi , Jesús tandata japishpa , Diosta pagui nishpa , chaupishpa , paicunaman cushpaca : — Japichic , caica ñuca aichami — nirca .
41014023	Vino vasota japishpa , Diosta pagui nishpa cucpica , tucuimi chai vasomanta ubiarca .
41014024	Chai quipaca Jesusca : — Caica , Dios-huan mushuc ari ninacuita ruhuashca ñuca yahuarmi . Caimi achcacunata quishpichingapac jichana yahuar .
41014025	Dios mandacucpi mushuc vinota ubiangacaman , cai uvas vinotaca cutinca manatac ubiashachu . Chaica chashnatacmi canga — nirca .
41014026	Himnota cantashca quipami , paicunaca Olivos urcuman rirca .
41014027	Chaipimi Jesusca yachacuccunataca : — Cunan tutallatacmi cancunaca ñucata saquishpa , caita chaita ringuichic . Chaica , Dios quillcachishcapica : “ Michicta huañuchishami . Ovejacunaca caita chaitami shic-huaringa ” ninmi .
41014028	Shina cacpipish , ñuca causarishpaca , cancunapac ñaupatami Galilea llactaman risha — nirca .
41014029	Chaimantami Pedroca Jesustaca : — Caishuccuna canta saquishpa ricpipish , ñucaca manatac saquishachu — nirca .
41014030	Shina nicpimi Jesusca : — Cunan tutallatacmi gallo manarac ishcai cutin cantacpi , ñucataca quimsa cutin negangui . Chaica chashnatacmi canga — nirca .
41014031	Chashna nicpipish Pedroca : — Canhuan pacta huañuna cacpipish , manatac negashachu — nirca . Caishuc yachacuccunapish chashnallatacmi nirca .
41014032	Getsemaní huertamanmi , Jesusca paipac yachacuccunahuan rirca . Chaiman chayashpaca : — Ñuca Diosta mañangacaman , cancunaca caillapi tiyacuichic — nishpami ,
41014033	Pedrota , Jacobota , Juanta pushashpa rirca . Shina rishpami , Jesusca shungupi yallita llaquiri callarirca .
41014034	Chaimantami : — Ñuca shungupica huañuna nanaihuan shinami , yallita llaquiricuni . Cancunaca ama sueñushpa , caillapi chaparacunguichic — nirca .
41014035	Jesús ashata ñaupaman rishpa , pambacaman cumurishpa , Diosta mañashpaca : « Cai llaquita ñuca mana apaipac cacpica , cunan anchuchi .
41014036	Ñuca Taitalla , canca imatapish ruhuai pudicmi cangui . Cai jayac ubiana shina llaquita ñucamanta anchuchi . Shina cacpipish , ama ñuca munashcata ruhuaichu , ashtahuanpish can munashcata ruhuai » nirca .
41014037	Jesús mañashpa cutimushpaca , paicuna sueñucucpimi tuparirca . Chaimantami Pedrotaca : — Simón , ¿ sueñucunguillachu ? ¿ Manachu shuc horasllatapish riccharishca cai pudircangui ?
41014038	Mana pandachishca cangapacca , Diosta mañashpa chaparacuichic . Cancunapac yuyaica sinchimi , ashtahuanpish cancunapac cuerpomi shaicushca — nirca .
41014039	Jesusca cutin rishpaca , puntaman mañashca shinallatacmi mañarca .
41014040	Cutimushpaca , paipac yachacuccunataca cutin sueñucucpimi tuparirca . Paicunaca yalli sueñuihuan cashpami , ñahuitapish mana pascai pudirca . Chaimantami imata mana nirca .
41014041	Jesús quimsa cutin cutimushpaca , paicunataca : — ¿ Cancunaca samarishpa sueñucunguichicllachu ? Ña jatarichic , Runa Tucungapac shamushca ñucataca , juchayuc runacunapac maquipi churana horasca pactamushcami .
41014042	¡ Jatarishpa jacuchic ! Ñucata japichicca ñami chayamucun — nirca .
41014043	Jesús chashna nicucpiracmi , chunga ishcai yachacuccunapuramanta Judasca tauca runacunahuan shamurca . Chai runacunaca Israel curacunata mandac curacunapish , mandashcacunata yachachiccunapish , pushac yuyaccunapish cachacpimi , espadacunahuan , caspicunahuan shamurca .
41014044	Jesusta japichicca : « Maijantami ñuca muchani chaimi . Paita japishpa , mana cacharishpa apanguichic » nishcami carca .
41014045	Judas Jesuspacman cuchuyashpaca : — ¡ Yachachic ! — nishpami mucharca .
41014046	Chashna muchacpimi , Jesusta japircacuna .
41014047	Ashtahuanpish chaipi caccunapuramanta shucca espadata llucchishpami , curacunata jatun mandac curapac servictaca huactashpa , ringrita pitirca .
41014048	Jesusca paita japingapac shamuccunataca : — ¿ Shuhuacta shinachu ñucataca espadacunahuan , caspicunahuan japingapac shamunguichic ?
41014049	Punzhantami cancunahuan Diosta mañana huasipica yachachicurcani . Chaipica mana japircanguichicchu . Ashtahuanpish Dios quillcachishcapi nishca pactachunmi , cashna japingapac shamushcanguichic — nirca .
41014050	Chaipimi yachacuccunaca Jesusllata saquishpa , tucui miticushpa rircacuna .
41014051	Shuc mosomi pañohuan pillurishca Jesusta caticurca . Paitapish japircami .
41014052	Chashna japicpica , pillurishca pañota chaipi shitashpami , lluchulla atishpa callparca .
41014053	Jesustaca curacunata jatun mandac curapacmanmi aparcacuna . Chaipimi curacunata mandac curacunapish , pushac yuyaccunapish , mandashcacunata yachachiccunapish tandanacushca tiyacurca .
41014054	Pedroca carutami catishpa , curacunata jatun mandac curapac huasi pungu pambacaman rirca . Chaipimi Diosta mañana huasita cuidaccunahuan ninapi mashashpa tiyacurca .
41014055	Curacunata mandac curacunapish , tandanacushca mandaccunapish Jesusta huañuchingapacmi , llullashpa huillaccunata cayachirca . Chashna cayachishpapish ima mana allita ruhuashcataca mana tarircachu .
41014056	Achca runacunami Jesusta llaquichingaraicu llullashpa huillarca . Shina huillashpapish shucca shuclata , shucca shuclatami huillarca .
41014057	Maijancunaca jatarishpa , Jesusta llaquichishpa llullashpaca :
41014058	— Ñucanchicca : “ Runacuna ruhuashca , cai Diosta mañana huasitaca urmachishpa , quimsa punzhapica mana runacuna ruhuashca shucta huasitami shayachisha ” nictami uyarcanchic — nirca .
41014059	Chashna llullashpapish , mana shuclayallata nircacunachu .
41014060	Chaimantami curacunata jatun mandac cura tucuipac chaupipi jatarishpa , Jesusta tapushpaca : — Cai tucuita nicucpipish , ¿ manachu imata ningui ? — nirca .
41014061	Jesusca imata mana nishpa upallami carca . Chaimanta curacunata mandac curaca Jesustaca : — ¿ Canca alli nina Diospac Churi Cristochu cangui ? — nishpa , cutin tapurca .
41014062	Chashna tapucpimi Jesusca : — Ari , ñucami cani . Runa Tucungapac shamushca ñucataca , poderyuc Diospac alli maquiman tiyacuctapish , puyupi jahua pachamanta shamucuctapishmi ricunguichic — nirca .
41014063	Shina nicpica , curacunata mandac curaca piñarishpa , paipac churanata lliquishpaca : — ¿ Imapactac shuctac huillaccunata mashcashun ?
41014064	Chashna nishpaca Diostami piñachicushca . Chaitaca cancunallatacmi uyashcanguichic . Cunanca , ¿ imatatac ninguichic ? — nishpa tapurca . Shina tapucpica , tucuimi juchanchishpa , “ ¡ huañunami can ! ” nircacuna .
41014065	Chaimantami maijanca Jesusta tucai callarirca . Cutin maijanca ñahuita pañohuan huatashpa , huactashpaca : « ¡ Maijantac huactanchic , huillai ! » nircami . Diosta mañana huasita cuidaccunapish Jesusta ñahuipi huactarcami .
41014066	Pedroca pungu pambapi tiyacucpimi , curacunata jatun mandac curata servic huarmi shamurca .
41014067	Pedro ninapi mashashpa tiyacucta chai huarmi alli ricushpaca : — Canpish Nazaret pueblomanta Jesus-huan puricmi cangui — nirca .
41014068	Shina nicpimi Pedroca : — Paitaca mana ricsinichu . Imatatacpishchari nicungui , mana yachanichu — nirca . Chashna nishpa , canzha pambaman llucshicpica , ñapish galloca cantarcallami .
41014069	Chai servic huarmi cutin Pedrota ricushpaca : — Cai runaca paicunapurami — nishpami , shuccunaman huillarca .
41014070	Shina nicpipish , Pedro cutinmi negarca . Chai quipallami , chaipi caccunaca cutin Pedrotaca : — Canca Galilea llactallamantami cangui . Chaimanta canpish chaipurallatami cangui , rimaipipish ricsinallami — nirca .
41014071	Paicuna chashna nicpimi Pedroca : — ¡ Diospac shutipimi nini , pimantatacpishchari rimacunguichic , chai runataca manatac ricsinichu ! — nirca .
41014072	Pai chashna nicucpica , cutinllatacmi galloca cantarca . Chai horasmi Pedroca Jesús puntaman : “ Manarac gallo ishcai cutin cantacpimi , quimsa cutin negangui ” nishcataca yuyarirca . Chaita yuyarishpami huacarca .
41015001	Tutamanta ña pacarimucucpimi , Israel curacunata mandac curacunaca pushac yuyaccunahuanpish , mandashcacunata yachachiccunahuanpish , caishuc mandaccunahuanpish parlangapac tandanacurca . Chai quipami , mandac Pilatopac ñaupaman Jesustaca huatashpa aparcacuna .
41015002	Chaipimi Pilatoca : — ¿ Canchu israelcunata Jatun Mandac cangui ? — nirca . Shina tapucpimi Jesusca : — Ari , canllatac nishcanguimi — nirca .
41015003	Curacunata mandac curacunaca caita chaita nishpami juchanchirca .
41015004	Pilato cutin tapushpaca : — Canta yallita juchanchicucpipish , ¿ manachu imata ningui ? — nirca .
41015005	Ashtahuanpish , Jesusca upallami carca . Chaimantami Pilatoca mancharirca .
41015006	Pascua fiesta punzhapi gentecuna shuc prezuta cacharichun nicpica , Pilatoca cacharicllami carca .
41015007	Chai punzhapica Barrabasmi prezu carca . Paica caishuc runacunahuan tandanacushpami , jatun mandac-huan piñanacushca carca . Chaipi huañuchishcamantami carcelpi tiyacurca .
41015008	Gentecunaca utcaman ruhuashca shinallatac shuc prezuta cacharichunmi Pilatoman mañangapac chayarca .
41015009	Chashna mañacpimi Pilatoca : — ¿ Israelcunata Jatun Mandactachu cacharichun ninguichic ? — nirca .
41015010	Pilatoca curacunata mandac curacuna envidiamanta Jesusta apamushcata yachashpami , chashnaca nirca .
41015011	Ashtahuanpish chai mandac curacunaca Jesusta cacharinapac randica , Barrabasta cacharichun mañachunmi chaipi caccunamanca yuyaita curca .
41015012	Pilato caccunata cutin tapushpaca : — Israelcunata Jatun Mandac nishca runataca , ¿ imatatac ruhuachun ninguichic ? — nirca .
41015013	Chashna tapucpica : — ¡ Paitaca chacatailla ! — nishpami caparircacuna .
41015014	Chaimantami Pilatoca : — Cai runaca , ¿ ima mana allitatac ruhuashcayari ? — nirca . Chashna nicpicarin : — ¡ Cai runataca chacatailla ! — nishpami , ashtahuan caparircacuna .
41015015	Pilatoca gentecunahuan alli saquiringaraicumi Barrabasta cacharichirca . Jesustaca azotichishpami , chacatachun soldadocunaman curca .
41015016	Chaimantaca Pilato mandana jatun huasi pungu pambaman Jesusta apashpa , soldadocunata tandachirca .
41015017	Chaipimi soldadocunaca morado churanata Jesusman pachallichishpa , casha anguta ahuashca coronata churachirca .
41015018	Chashna churachishpa burlashpaca : — ¡ Israelcunata Jatun Mandac , canca allimari cangui ! — nircami .
41015019	Chashna nishpami , Jesusta caspihuan umapi huactashpa , tucashpa cunguric tucushpa , mañac tucurca .
41015020	Chashna burlashca quipami , morado churanata llucchichishpa , paipac churanallatatac cutin churachishpa , chacatangapac aparcacuna .
41015021	Alejandropac , Rufopac taita , Cirene llacta Simonmi chagramanta shamurca . Paimanmi Jesuspac cruzta apachirca .
41015022	Jesustaca Gólgota urcumanmi pusharcacuna . ( “ Gólgota ” nishpaca , “ Uma Tullu ” nisha ninmi ) .
41015023	Chai urcupimi Jesusmanca , mirrahuan chapushca vinota ubiachishun nirca . Paica mana ubiasha nircachu .
41015024	Jesusta cruzpi chacatashpaca , paipac churanacunata maijanlla japingapacmi suerteta ruhuarca .
41015025	Iscun horastami Jesusta chacatarca .
41015026	Imamanta chacatashcataca caspipimi : “ Caica Israelcunata Jatun Mandacmi ” nishpa quillcarca .
41015027	Jesus-huanca ishcai shuhuac runacunatapish , shuctaca alli maquiman , shuctaca lluqui maquimanmi chacatarca .
41015028	Chashna chacatacpimi , Dios quillcachishcapi : « Juchayuccunahuanmi tandachishca canga » nishcaca pactarca .
41015029	Chaita pasaccunaca umata cuyuchishpa , camishpaca : — ¡ Jai , canca “ Diosta mañana huasita urmachishpaca , quimsa punzhapi cutin shayachishallami ” nircanguica !
41015030	¡ Cunanca , chacatashcamanta uricushpa , canllatac quishpiriyari ! — nircacuna .
41015031	Shinallatac curacunata mandac curacuna mandashcacunata yachachiccunahuan burlashpaca : — Paica shuccunataca quishpichircami . Cunanca paillatacca mana quishpiri pudinchu .
41015032	¡ Israelcunata Jatun Mandac Cristo cashpaca , cunanllatac chacatashcamanta uricui , chaita ricushpaca , ñucanchicpish crinchicmanmi ! — nircacuna . Jesus-huan pacta chacatashca runacunapish , camishpa rimarcami .
41015033	Chaupi punzhamanta quimsa horas chishicamanmi , tucui cai pachaca amsayarca .
41015034	Chai horasllatacmi Jesusca : — Eloí , Eloí , ¿ lama sabactani ? — nishpa , sinchita caparirca . ( Caica : “ Ñuca Dios , ñuca Dios , ¿ ima nishpatac ñucallata saquinguiyari ? ” nisha ninmi ) .
41015035	Chaipi caccunapuramanta maijanca : — Uyaichic , huillac Eliastami cayacun — nirca .
41015036	Cutin shuc runaca esponjata apangapacmi callparca . Chaitaca jayac vinopi satishpami , caspi puntapi churashpa , Jesusman ubiachisha nishpa , shimiman chayachirca . Shina ruhuashpaca : — Saquichic , Eliasca cruzmanta uricuchingapac shamucta ricungapac — nirca .
41015037	Jesusca sinchita caparishcahuan huañurcallami .
41015038	Jesús huañucpica , Diosta mañana huasi ucupi jarcachishca jatun lienzoca jahuamanta uraimanmi chaupita lliquirirca .
41015039	Jesusta cruzpi chacatashca ladopica , patsac soldadocunata mandacmi shayacurca . Chai mandac , Jesús ima shina caparishpa huañucta ricushpaca : — Cai runaca Diospac Churitacmi cashca — nirca .
41015040	Shinallatac tauca huarmicunapish carullamanta ricushpami shayacurca . Chai huarmicunapurapica , Magdala pueblomanta Mariapish , quipa Jacobopac , Josepac mama Mariapish , Salomepishmi carca .
41015041	Paicunami Galilea llactapi Jesús puricucpica , ayudashpa paita catishpa puriccuna carca . Jerusalén puebloman paihuan shamuc huarmicunapish chaipimi carca .
41015042	Cayandi samana punzhapac allichirina punzhaca , ñami chishiyarca .
41015043	Chai chishimi Arimatea pueblomanta Joseca mana manchashpa , mandac Pilatopacman rishpa , Jesuspac cuerpota enterrangapac mañarca . Paica tandanacushca mandaccunapurapica , mai alli nishca runami carca . Paipish Dios mandacucta ricusha nishpami shuyacurca .
41015044	Pilatoca Jesús huañushcata uyashpami , mancharirca . Chaimantami patsac soldadocunata mandacta cayashpa tapurca .
41015045	Patsac soldadocunata mandac huillacpimi , Pilatoca Jesuspac cuerpota enterrachun Joseman curca .
41015046	Chaimantami Joseca shuc jatun lienzo pañota randishpa , Jesuspac cuerpota uricuchishpa , chai lienzohuan pillushpa , rumi quingrai jutcushcapi churarca . Chaimantaca shuc jatun rumita singuchishpami , chai jutcu pungutaca jarcarca .
41015047	Jesusta maipi churactaca , Magdala pueblomanta Mariapish , Josepac mama Mariapishmi ricucurca .
41016001	Samana punzha tucuricpimi , Magdala pueblomanta Mariapish , Jacobopac mama Mariapish , Salomepish mishquilla ashnacucta Jesuspac cuerpopi churangapac randirca .
41016002	Chaita apashpami , semana callari punzha , cunan inti llucshimucucta Jesusta enterrashcata ricungapac rirca .
41016003	Paicuna ricushpaca : — Enterrashca jutcuta tapashca rumitaca , ¿ pitac anchuchingayari ? — ninacushpami ricurca .
41016004	Paicuna chayashpaca , rumica ña anchuchishcami cashca carca . Chai rumica jatun rumimi carca .
41016005	Chai ucuman yaicushpaca , alli ladoman shuc moso suni yurac churanata churashca tiyacuctami ricurca . Paita ricushpaca , yallitami mancharirca .
41016006	Ashtahuanpish chai mosoca : — Ama mancharichicchu . Cancunaca Nazaret pueblomanta cruzpi chacatashca Jesustami mashcacunguichic . Paica ña causarircami , mana caipichu . Maipi paita churashcapi ricuichic .
41016007	Cunanca Pedromanpish , caishuc yachacuccunamanpish : “ Jesusca Galilea llactamanmi cancunapac ñaupata rin . Chaipimi pai nishca shina , ricunguichic ” nishpa , utca huillagrichic — nirca .
41016008	Chai huarmicunaca manchaihuan chucchushpami , jutcumanta utca llucshirca . Chaimantami pimanpish imata mana huillashpa upalla rircacana .
41016009	[ Jesús semana callari punzha , tutamanta causarishpaca , Magdala pueblomanta Mariamanmi punta ricurirca . Chai Mariamantami Jesusca canchis supaicunata llucchishca carca .
41016010	Paimi Jesuspac yachacuccunapacman rishpa huillarca . Paicunaca llaquillami huacacushca carca .
41016011	Paicunaca Jesús causarishcatapish , María ricushcatapish mana crircacunachu .
41016012	Chai quipaca , Jesusca paipac ishcai yachacuccunamanmi shuctaclaya ricurirca . Paicunaca pueblomanta llucshishpami ricurca .
41016013	Paicunaca caishuc yachacuccunamanmi huillagrirca . Paicunapish mana crircachu .
41016014	Chai quipaca , Jesusca paipac chunga shuc yachacuccuna micucucpimi ricurirca . Causarishcata mana crishcamanta , rumi shungu cashcamanta , causarishcata ricushcata mana crishcamantami rimarca .
41016015	Shinallatac paicunataca : — Tucui pachata rishpa , alli huillaita tucui gentecunaman huillagrichic .
41016016	Maijanpish crishpa , bautizaricca quishpiringami . Ashtahuanpish mana cricca , juchanchishcami canga .
41016017	Ñucata criccunaca milagrocunatami ruhuanga : Ñuca shutipimi supaicunata llucchishpa cachanga , mushuc rimaicunatami rimanga .
41016018	Culebracunata maquihuan japirishpapish , ima venenocunata ubiashpapish , mana ima tucungachu . Shinallatac ungushcacunapac uma jahuapi maquita churacpica , alliyangallami — nirca .
41016019	Apunchic Jesús paipac yachacuccunata mandashca quipaca , Diosmi jahua pachaman pusharca . Chaipimi paipac alli lado maquiman tiyarirca .
41016020	Yachacuccuna rishpaca , tucui gentecunamanmi huillarca . Chashna huillacucpica , Apunchic Jesusmi paicunataca ayudac carca . Milagrocunata ruhuachishpami , Jesusca paicunahuan cashcataca ricuchicurca . ]
42001001	Tauca runacunami cai ñucanchic llactapi ima tucushcacunataca , callarimanta allita quillcasha nicurca .
42001002	Callarimanta chaicunata quiquin ñahuihuan ricuccunami huillarca . Paicunaca Diospac shimita huillaccunami carca .
42001003	Alli nishca Teofilolla , ñucapish tucui chaicunata callarimanta alli tapushpa , yachac chayashpami , canman sumacta quillcashpa yachanata yuyacurcani .
42001004	Chashnami canman yachachishcaca cierto cashcata yachangui .
42001005	Judea llactata jatun mandac Herodes mandacui punzhacunapimi , Abías curacunapuramanta Zacarías curapish causarca . Paipac huarmica Aarón curapac huahua huahuapuramanta Elisabetmi carca .
42001006	Zacariaspish , Elisabetpish Diospac ñaupapi cashcata ruhuashpami , allita causarca . Paicunaca Dios mandashcacunatapish , yachachishcacunatapish tucuita pactachicmi carca .
42001007	Elisabetca mana huahuata chari pudircachu . Chaimantami huahua illaclla carcacuna . Ña yuyaccunapishmi carca .
42001008	Shuc punzhaca , Zacarías curacunapuramanta Diosta mañana huasipi Diospacta ruhuanami pactarca .
42001009	Suerteta ruhuacpica , curacuna ruhuac cashca shinallatac , Diosta mañana huasipi , Diospaclla chicanyachishca ucuman yaicushpa , inciensota rupachinami Zacariasman urmarca .
42001010	Pai inciensota rupachicucpica , tucui gentecunami canzha pambapi Diosta mañacurca .
42001011	Mandac Dios cachashca angelmi altar alli ladopi shayacuc Zacariasman ricurirca .
42001012	Chaita Zacarías ricushpaca , manchaihuan imata mana nishpa , upalla saquirirca .
42001013	Ashtahuanpish angelca : — Zacarías , Diosca can mañashcata uyashcami . Ama mancharichu . Cambac huarmi Elisabetca cari huahuatami charinga . Chai huahuataca Juantami shutichingui .
42001014	Yallitami cushicunguimi . Achcacunami pai huacharishcamantaca cushicunga .
42001015	Paica Diospac ñaupapica alli nishcami canga . Paica vinotapish , machachic yacutapish mana ubiangachu . Mamapac huicsamanta pachami , Diospac Espíritu junda canga .
42001016	Achca israelcunatami , Mandac Diospacman cutichimunga .
42001017	Juanca Quishpichicpac ñaupatami ringa . Huillac Elías shinami , Diospac Espirituhuan , poderhuan ringa . Paimi taitacunahuan , huahuacunahuan piñanacushcatapish alli allichinga . Mana cazuccunatapish cashcata ruhuanata yachachishpami , yuyaita cunga . Chashnami Quishpichic shamucpica , alli chasquina yuyaita charinga — nirca .
42001018	Zacariasca angelta : — Ñucapish , ñuca huarmipish ña yuyacmi canchic . ¿ Ima shinatac can huillashca pactanataca yachasha ? — nirca .
42001019	Shina nicpimi angelca : — Ñucaca Diospac ñaupapi , paita servic ángel Gabrielmi cani . Paimi canman cai alli huillaita huillachun cacharca .
42001020	Ñuca huillashcaca pactana punzhami pactanga . Ashtahuanpish canca ñuca huillashcata mana crishcamantaca , cambac huahua huacharingacamanmi upayashpa , imata mana rimai pudingui — nirca .
42001021	Chaicamanca , canzhapimi achca gentecuna shuyacurca . Shinallatac Diospaclla chicanyachishca ucupi Zacarías unaiyashcamantami mancharicurca .
42001022	Zacarías llucshishpaca , imata mana rimai pudishpami , ima tucushcataca señallahuan huillarca . Chaimantami canzhapi cac gentecunaca “ Diospaclla chicanyachishca ucupimi imata ricushca canga ” nishpa yuyarca .
42001023	Zacariasca Diosta mañana huasipi servina punzhacuna ña tucuricpimi , huasiman rirca .
42001024	Chai quipami , paipac huarmi Elisabetca huicsayuc tucushpa , pichca quillacunata mana maiman llucshishpa huasillapi carca . Paica :
42001025	« Ñuca mana huahuayuc cashcamanta pipacpish ama pingaichishca cachunmi , Diosca ñucata chashna ruhuashca » nishpami yuyacurca .
42001026	Elisabet ña sucta quillata huicsayuc cacpimi , Diosca ángel Gabrielta Galilea llacta , Nazaret puebloman cacharca .
42001027	Davidpac huahua huahuapuramanta Josehuan cazarangapac ari nishca , María solteramanmi huillangapac rirca .
42001028	María maipi cashcaman ángel yaicushpaca : — María , Dios canhuan cashcamanta cushicui . Canca tucui huarmicunamanta yalli , alli nishcami cangui — nirca .
42001029	María angelta ricushpa mancharircami . Paipac shungupica , “ ¿ cai rimashcacunaca imatatac nisha nin ? ” nishpami yuyacurca .
42001030	Chashna yuyacucpimi angelca : — María , ama mancharichu . Cantaca Diosmi cuyashpa acllashca .
42001031	Canca huicsayuc tucushpami , shuc cari huahuata charingui . Chai huahuataca JESUSTAMI shutichingui .
42001032	Paica mai alli nishcami canga . Jahua pachapi causac Diospac Churi nishcapishmi canga . Mandac Diosca paitaca ñaupa taita Davidpac mandanapimi churanga .
42001033	Taita Jacobopac huahua huahua israelcunatami huiñaita mandanga . Pai mandanaca manatac tucuringachu — nirca .
42001034	Ángel shina nicpimi Mariaca : — ¿ Ima shinatac chashna cangayari ? Manarac pi carillahuanpish canichu — nirca .
42001035	Chashna nicpimi angelca : — Diospac Espiritumi shamunga . Jahua pacha Diospac podermi cantaca llandunga . Chaimantami jucha illac huahua huacharinga . Diospac Churi nishcapishmi canga .
42001036	Mana huahuayuc cambac familia Elisabetca , yuyac cashpapish ña sucta quillatami cari huahuata huicsayuc tucushca .
42001037	Diosmanca imapish ruhuaipacllami — nirca .
42001038	Chashna nicpimi Mariaca : — Can nishca shina ñucataca ruhuachunlla . Ñucaca Mandac Diosta servicmi cani — nirca . Shina nicpica , angelca paipac ñaupamanta rircallami .
42001039	Chai punzhacunapica Mariaca , Judea llacta urcucuna chaupipi tiyac shuc pueblomanmi utca rirca .
42001040	Zacariaspac huasiman yaicushpami Elisabettaca : — ¿ Allillachu cangui ? — nirca .
42001041	María rimashca uyarincami Elisabetpac huicsapica huahua cuyurirca . Diospac Espiritupish Elisabetpacman shamurcami .
42001042	Chaimantami sinchita caparishpaca : — Canca tucui huarmicunamanta yalli , Dios alli nishcami cangui . Cambac huicsapi cac huahuapish , alli nishcami .
42001043	¿ Ima shinatac ñucata Mandacpac mamaca ricuc shamunguiyari ?
42001044	Can ‘ allillachu cangui ’ nincami , ñuca huicsapi cac huahuaca cuyurirca .
42001045	Canca Dios nishca pactanatami crishcangui . Chaimanta cushicui — nirca .
42001046	Chaimantami Mariaca : « Ñuca yuyaimi Diostaca ‘ allimari cangui ’ nicun .
42001047	Ñuca almapish ñucata Quishpichic Diosmantami cushicun .
42001048	Diosca huaccha servic huarmitami acllashca . Cunanmanta pachami huahua huahuacuna ñucataca ‘ allimari cangui ’ nicunga .
42001049	Imatapish ruhuaclla Diosca mancharinacunatami ruhuashca . Paica jucha illacmi .
42001050	Diosca paita manchaccunataca huahua huahuacaman llaquicungallami .
42001051	Paipac maquihuanmi mancharinacunata ruhuashca . Jatun tucushcacunapac yuyaitapish chingachishcami .
42001052	Jatun mandaccunata mandanamanta anchuchishcami . Huacchacunatami jahuaman churashca .
42001053	Yarcaihuan caccunamanca , allicunatami achcata carashca . Chayuccunataca , chushac maquitami cachashca .
42001054	Paita servic israelcunata llaquinata mana cungarishcachu . Chaimantami ayudashca .
42001055	Chashna llaquingapacmi taita Abrahamhuanpish , paipac huahua huahuacunahuanpish huiñaicaman ari nishca » nirca .
42001056	Mariaca Elisabethuan quimsa quilla shinata cashpami , paipac huasiman cutirca .
42001057	Elisabetca sajuarina punzha pactacpica , cari huahuatami charirca .
42001058	Chaita uyashpaca , Dios cuyac cashcata yachashpami , vecinocunapish , paipac familiacunapish Elisabethuan cushicungapac rirca .
42001059	Ña pusac punzhapimi chai huahuata circuncisionta ruhuachingapac rircacuna . Chashnami taitapac shuti Zacariasta shutichishun nirca .
42001060	Shina nicucpimi Elisabetca : — ¡ Mana ! Juan shutimi canga — nirca .
42001061	Chashna nicpica : — ¿ Imamantatac chaita shutichisha ningui ? Cancunapurapica , Juan shutica mana tiyanchu — nirca .
42001062	Chaimantami taitata señallapi huahua ima shuti canamanta tapurca .
42001063	Shina tapucpimi , taita Zacariasca uchilla tablata mañashpa : “ Juan shutimi canga ” nishpa quillcarca . Chaimantami tucui gentecuna mancharirca .
42001064	Chai ratomi callu huatarishca cachariricpi , Zacariasca Diosta : « allimari cangui » nirca .
42001065	Chashna tucucpica , tucui vecinocunami yallita mancharirca . Chaica tucui Judea llacta urcucunapimi yacharirca .
42001066	Tucui chaita uyaccunaca : « Cai huahua jatunyashpaca , ¿ imalayashi canga ? » nishpami , shungullapi yuyacurca . Mandac Diosmi chai huahuahuan carca .
42001067	Juanpac taita Zacariasca Diospac Espíritu yuyaita cucpi , ima shina canamanta huillashpaca :
42001068	« Israelcunata Mandac Diosca alli nishca cachun . Paimi pai acllashcacunata quishpichingapac shamushca .
42001069	Diosta servic Davidpac huahua huahuapuramanta , imatapish ruhuaclla Quishpichicta cachashca .
42001070	Pai ima nishcata huillac , jucha illac huillaccunamanmi , utcaman huillachishca carca .
42001071	Paicuna huillashca shinami , ñucanchicta piñashpa mana ricunayachiccunapac maquimanta quishpichinga .
42001072	Ñaupa taitacunata llaquishpa , paipac sumac ari nishcata mana cungarishpa pactachicungami .
42001073	Diosmi ñucanchic taita Abrahamhuan ari nishcataca pactachishca .
42001074	Ñucanchic imata mana manchashpa , paipacta ruhuac cachunmi , piñaccunapac maquimanta cacharichinga .
42001075	Tucui ñucanchic causaipi paipac ñaupapi allillata ruhuashpa , causachunmi , chashna cacharichinga .
42001076	Ñuca huahualla , canca jahua Dios ima nishcata huillacmi cangui . Canmi Quishpichic purina ñanta allichishpa ñaupangui .
42001077	Pai acllashcacunapac juchacunata perdonashca cachunmi , quishpirinamanta yachachingui .
42001078	Ñucanchic Diosca , pai cuyashcamantami , tutamanta inti achicyamucuc shina , quishpirinata jahua pachamanta cachanga .
42001079	Amsapi causaccunatapish , purapi huañunalla causaccunatapish achicyachishpami , ñucanchicta sumac causai ñanta pushangami » nirca .
42001080	Chai huahuaca huiñashpami Diosmanta ashtahuan yachacushpa , israelcunaman huillana punzha pactangacaman shitashca pambapi causarca .
42002001	Chai punzhacunapica Roma llactata jatun mandac Augustomi , tucui llactapi causaccuna shuticunata quillcachichun mandarca .
42002002	Chai quillcachinaca , Cirenio runa Siria llactata mandacucpimi callarirca .
42002003	Tucui gentecunami paicuna huacharishca llactapi quillcaringapac rina carca .
42002004	Joseca Davidpac huahua huahuapura cashcamantami , Galilea llacta Nazaret pueblomanta ñaupa mandac Davidca huacharishca Judea llacta Belén puebloman rirca .
42002005	Chaimanca paihuan cazarangapac ari nishca Mariahuanmi , shutita quillcachingapac rirca . Mariaca huicsa jundami carca .
42002006	Paicuna Belenman chayacpimi , María sajuarinaca pactarca .
42002007	Pozana huasi mana pactashcamantami , paipac punta cari huahuataca huagracuna shayana ucupi sajuarirca . Chai huahuataca maitushpami , ucsha jahuallapi sirichirca .
42002008	Chai Belén pueblo lado pambapica , michiccunami ovejacunata tuta cuidacurca .
42002009	Chaipimi Dios cachashca angelca Diospac sumaimana achic nicuc-huan ñapish cungailla paicunapac muyundita achicyachirca . Chaimantami michiccunaca yallita mancharirca .
42002010	Chaimantami angelca : — Ama mancharichicchu . Cancunaman alli huillaita huillangapacmi shamuni . Caita uyashpaca , tucuimi yallita cushicunga .
42002011	Cunanmi David huacharishca Belén pueblopi Quishpichic huacharishca . Paica tucuita Mandac , Quishpichic Cristomi .
42002012	Cancuna rishpaca , huagracuna shayana ucupi maitushca huahua ucsha jahuapi siricuctami ricunguichic — nirca .
42002013	Chashna huillacucllapitacmi , cungailla jahua pacha angelcuna , chai angelhuan Diosta alli nishpaca :
42002014	« ¡ Jahua pacha Diosca , alli nishca cachun ! ¡ Dios cuyashcacunaman cushi tiyachun ! » nirca .
42002015	Jahua pachaman angelcuna rishca quipa , michiccunaca : — Dios huillashca ima cashcata ricungapac , Belenman jacuchic — ninacurca .
42002016	Chashna utca rishpaca , huagracuna shayana ucupi Josetapish , Mariatapish , ucsha jahuapi huahua siricuctapishmi ricurca .
42002017	Chaita ricushpaca , ángel chai huahuamanta paicunaman imata nishcatami parlarca .
42002018	Michiccuna parlacpica , tucui uyaccunami mancharishca saquirirca .
42002019	María tucui chaicunata uyashpaca paipac shungupimi yuyarishpa causacurcalla .
42002020	Michiccunaca paicunaman huillashca shinallatac ricushpa uyashpaca , Diosta “ allimari cangui , sumacmari cangui ” nishpami cutirca .
42002021	Huahua pusac punzha tucucpica , circuncisionta ruhuachishpami , María manarac huicsayuc cacpi , ángel huillashca shina , JESUSTA shutichirca .
42002022	Moisés mandashca shina sajuarishca quipa chuyayana punzhacuna pactacpica , huahua Jesusta Diosman ricuchingapacmi Josehuan Mariahuan Jerusalenman rirca .
42002023	Mandac Dios mandashcapica : « Tucui punta huacharishca cari huahuacunaca , Diospaclla chicanyachishcami canga » nishcamanta ,
42002024	shinallatac : « Ishcai urpita , mana cashpaca ishcai huahua palomata cungui » nishcamantami chashnaca ruhuarca .
42002025	Simeón shuti runami Jerusalenpi causarca . Paica Diosta cazucpish , cashcata ruhuacpishmi carca . Paica israelcunata Dios quishpichingapac shamuctami shuyacurca . Diospac Espiritumi paihuan carca .
42002026	Diospac Espiritumi : “ Dios cachashca Cristota ricungacaman , canca mana huañunguichu ” nishca carca .
42002027	Simeonca Diospac Espíritu pushacpimi , Diosta mañana huasiman rirca . Chaimanmi mandashcapi nishca shina ruhuangapac , taita mamaca huahua Jesusta apamurca .
42002028	Simeón chai huahuata marcashpa , Diosta pagui nishpaca :
42002029	« Dioslla , can mandashpa nishca shina , canta servic runataca cushicuihuan huañuchun saquilla .
42002030	Can cachashca Quishpichictaca , ñuca ñahuihuantacmi ña ricuni .
42002031	Paitaca tucui llactacuna ricuchunmi cachashcangui .
42002032	Mana israelcunamanca , achicyachic luz shinami canga . Pai acllashca israelcunapacca mandacmi canga » nirca .
42002033	Josepish , paipac mamapish huahua Jesusmanta Simeón imata nishcata uyashpaca mancharishpami saquirirca .
42002034	Simeonca paicunata Dios bendiciachun nishca quipa , Mariataca : — Riqui , cai huahuataca achcacuna quishpirichun , cutin maijancunaca chingarichunmi Diosca Israelpi churashca . Pai Diospac munaita ricuchicpimi , yallita piñanga .
42002035	Shinallatac achcacuna yuyacushcapish yacharingami . Llaquica shuc espada shunguta chaupishpa pasac shinami llaquichinga — nirca .
42002036	Shinallatac Dios ima nishcata huillac , yuyac Ana huarmipish chaipimi carca . Paica ñaupa taita Aserpac aillupuramanta Fanuelpac ushimi carca . Paica huambrarac cazarashpapish canchis huatallatami cusahuan causarca .
42002037	Paica pusac chunga chuscu huatatami viuda carca . Chai yuyac huarmica Diosta mañana huasimanta mana llucshishpami , punzhanta Diosta servishpa , mañashpa ayunashpa , causac carca .
42002038	Chai huarmi , chai horasllatac shamushpami , chai huahuamanta Jerusalén llactata Quishpichicta shuyaccunaman parlai callarirca .
42002039	Dios mandashcacunata tucui pactachishpaca , Joseca Mariandimi paicuna causana Galilea llacta Nazaret puebloman cutirca .
42002040	Huahuaca huiñashpa , sinchiyashpa , ashtahuan yachac tucushpami catirca . Diosca yallitami paita cuyarca .
42002041	Jesuspac taita mamaca huatantami Pascua fiestapica Jerusalenman ric carca .
42002042	Chashna ric cashca shinallatacmi , Jesús chunga ishcai huatayuc cacpi , Jerusalenman rirca .
42002043	Fiesta tucuricpi , taita mama huasiman cuticpica , Jesusca Jerusalenpimi saquirishca carca . Chaitaca Josepish , Mariapish mana yacharcachu .
42002044	Paicunaca “ shuctac gentecunahuanmi ricunga ” yuyashpami , tucui punzha rircalla . Chaimanta familiacunapurapi , ricsishcacunapurapi Jesusta mashcashpa ,
42002045	mana tarishpaca , Jerusalenllapitac mashcangapac cutircacuna .
42002046	Ña quimsa punzhapimi , Diosta mañana huasipi mandashcacunata yachachiccunahuan , paicunata uyashpa , tapushpa tiyacucta tarircacuna .
42002047	Jesús yachac cashcamanta , tucui tapushcata cutichicpimi , paita uyaccunaca mancharircacuna .
42002048	Taita mama Jesusta ricushpaca , mancharircami . Chaimantami paipac mamaca : — Huahua , ñucanchicca yallita mancharishpami mashcacurcanchic . ¿ Imamantatac caita ruhuangui ? — nirca .
42002049	Chaimantami Jesusca : — ¿ Imapactac mashcacurcanguichic ? ¿ Manachu Taitapac huasipi ñuca cana cashcataca yacharcanguichic ? — nirca .
42002050	Taita mamaca chai nishcata mana entendircachu .
42002051	Jesusca taita mamahuanmi Nazaret puebloman cutimushpa , paicunata alli cazushpa causarca . Paipac mamaca tucui chaicunacata shungupi huacaichishpami causacurca .
42002052	Jesusca huiñashpa , ashtahuan yachac tucushpami catirca . Diospacpish , gentecunapacpish cuyashcami carca .
42003001	Jatun mandac Tiberioca chunga pichca huatatami Roma llactata mandacurca . Poncio Pilatoca Judea llactata , Herodesca Galilea llactata , paipac huauqui Felipeca Iturea llactatapish , Traconite llactatapishmi mandacurca . Cutin Lisaniasca Abilinia llactatami mandacurca .
42003002	Anaspish , Caifaspish curacunata mandac curacunami carca . Chai punzhacunapimi Diosca Zacariaspac churi Juanman shitashca pambapi huillarca .
42003003	Chaimantami Juanca tucui Jordán yacu cuchulla llactacunapi juchacunata Dios perdonac cashcamanta , juchayuc cashcamanta llaquirishpa , Diosman cutirishpa bautizarinamanta huillashpa purirca .
42003004	Dios ima nishcata huillac Isaías huillashpaca : « Shitashca pambapi shuc caparishpaca : “ Mandac Dios shamuna ñanta allichichic . Quingu ñancunatapish derechaichic .
42003005	Huaicucunapish pamballami tucunga . Urcucunatapish urmachishpa , pamballami canga . Huishtu ñancunapish derechashca , ucu jahua ñancunapish sumacta allichishcami canga .
42003006	Tucui gentecunami Dios quishpichicuctaca ricunga ” ninmi » nirca .
42003007	Achca gentecunami bautizarisha nishpa shamurca . Juanca paicunataca : — ¡ Culebrapac huahuacuna ! ¿ Pitac Dios piñarishpa , cachashca llaquimanta quishpirinata huillarca ?
42003008	Grano allita pucucuc shina , Diosman cutirishca cashcataca ricuchichicyari . Ama cancunapac shungupi : “ Abrahampac huahua huahuacuna cashcamantaca quishpirishunllami ” nishpa yuyacuichicchu . Ñucaca ninmi : Dios cai rumicunatapish Abrahampac huahua huahuacunata ruhuanmanllami .
42003009	Hachaca ñami yura chaquipi churashca . Chaimanta tucui mana pucuc yuracunataca pitishpami , ninapi shitanga — nirca .
42003010	Chai gentecunaca Juantaca : — Shinashpaca , ¿ imatatac ruhuashun ? — nishpa tapurca .
42003011	Chashna nicpimi Juanca : — Ishcai churanata charicca , shucta mana charicman cuchun . Micunata charicpish chai shinallatac mana charicman cuchun — nirca .
42003012	Impuestota japiccuna bautizarisha nishpa shamushpaca : — Yachachic , ¿ imatatac ruhuashun ? — nishpami tapurca .
42003013	Chashna tapucpimi Juanca : — Impuestotaca japina cashcallata cobraichic — nirca .
42003014	Maijan soldadocuna tapushpaca : — Ñucanchicca , ¿ imatatac ruhuashun ? — nirca . Shina tapucpimi Juanca : — Ama manchachishpa , cullquita cobraichicchu . Ama cullquita japingaraicu , pitapish manchachichicchu . Mashna cullquita japicushcallahuan cushilla caichic — nirca .
42003015	Chai llactapi causaccunaca pi cashcata yachasha nishpami Juantaca : “ ¿ Paichu Cristo canga ? ” nishpa yuyacurca .
42003016	Chashna nicucpimi , Juanca chaipi caccunataca : — Ñucaca yacullahuanmi bautizani , ashtahuanpish shucmi Diospac Espirituhuanpish , ninahuanpish bautizangapac shamunga . Paica ñucata atishpa , ashtahuan poderta charicmi . Ñucaca paipac ushuta huatashcallatapish mana pascaipacmi cani .
42003017	Trillana pambapi granota chuyayachingapacmi huairachinata apashca shayacun . Granotaca huacaichinapimi huacaichinga . Tamotaca jaicapi mana huañuc ninapimi shitanga — nirca .
42003018	Cai yuyachinacunahuan , shuctac rimaicunahuanmi alli huillaita huillarca .
42003019	Chashnallatac Juanca mandac Herodestaca paipac huauqui Felipepac huarmi Herodias-huan causacushcamantapish , shuctac mana allicunata ruhuashcacunamantapishmi sinchita rimarca .
42003020	Herodesca tucuilaya millaita ruhuashca jahuapish , Juantaca carcelpimi churarca .
42003021	Juanca manarac carcelpi churacpimi , tucui gentecunata bautizacurca . Chaimantami Jesustapish bautizarca . Jesús Diosta mañacucpimi , jahua pacha pascarirca .
42003022	Chashnallatac Diospac Espiritumi paloma shina jahuamanta paipac jahuaman urai shamurca . Shinallatac jahua pachamanta rimashpaca : « Canmi ñuca cuyashca Churi cangui . Canllami ñucataca cushichingui » nirca .
42003023	Jesús huillanata callarishpaca , ña quimsa chunga huatayuc shinami carca . Gentecuna Jesustaca Josepac churi cashcatami yuyarca .
42003024	Elica Matatpac churi , Matatca Levipac churi , Levica Melquipac churi , Melquica Janapac churi , Janaca Josepac churimi carca .
42003025	Joseca Matatiaspac churi , Matatiasca Amospac churi , Amosca Nahumpac churi , Nahumca Eslipac churi , Eslica Nagaipac churimi carca .
42003026	Nagaica Maatpac churi , Maatca Matatiaspac churi , Matatiasca Semeipac churi , Semeica Josepac churi , Joseca Judapac churimi carca .
42003027	Judaca Joananpac churi , Joananca Resapac churi , Resaca Zorobabelpac churi , Zorobabelca Salatielpac churi , Salatielca Neripac churimi carca .
42003028	Nerica Melquipac churi , Melquica Adipac churi , Adica Cosampac churi , Cosamca Elmodampac churi , Elmodamca Erpac churimi carca .
42003029	Erca Josuepac churi , Josueca Eliezerpac churi , Eliezerca Jorimpac churi , Jorimca Matatpac churimi carca .
42003030	Matatca Levipac churi , Levica Simeonpac churi , Simeonca Judapac churi , Judaca Josepac churi , Joseca Jonanpac churi , Jonanca Eliaquimpac churimi carca .
42003031	Eliaquimca Meleapac churi , Meleaca Mainanpac churi , Mainanca Matatapac churi , Matataca Natanpac churimi carca .
42003032	Natanca Davidpac churi , Davidca Isaipac churi , Isaica Obedpac churi , Obedca Boozpac churi , Boozca Salmonpac churi , Salmonca Naasonpac churimi carca .
42003033	Naasonca Aminadabpac churi , Aminadabca Arampac churi , Aramca Esrompac churi , Esromca Farespac churi , Faresca Judapac churimi carca .
42003034	Judaca Jacobopac churi , Jacoboca Isaacpac churi , Isaacca Abrahampac churi , Abrahamca Tarepac churi , Tareca Nacorpac churimi carca .
42003035	Nacorca Serugpac churi , Serugca Ragaupac churi , Ragauca Pelegpac churi , Pelegca Heberpac churi , Heberca Salapac churimi carca .
42003036	Salaca Cainanpac churi , Cainanca Arfaxadpac churi , Arfaxadca Sempac churi , Semca Noepac churi , Noeca Lamecpac churimi carca .
42003037	Lamecca Matusalenpac churi , Matusalenca Enocpac churi , Enocca Jaredpac churi , Jaredca Mahalaleelpac churi , Mahalaleelca Cainanpac churimi carca .
42003038	Cainanca Enospac churi , Enosca Setpac churi , Setca Adanpac churi , Adanca Diospac huahuami carca .
42004001	Jesusca Jordán yacumantaca Diospac Espíritu jundami cutirca . Diospac Espiritumi shitashca pambaman pusharca .
42004002	Chaipi chuscu chunga punzhata cacpimi , Satanasca pandachisha nirca . Chai punzhacunata mana micushca cashpami , Jesusca yarcachirca .
42004003	Chaipimi Satanasca Jesustaca : — Can Diospac Churi cashpaca , cai rumita tanda tucuchun niyari — nirca .
42004004	Chashna nicpimi Jesusca : — Dios quillcachishcapica : “ Runaca mana tandallahuanchu causanga ” ninmi — nirca .
42004005	Chaimanta Satanasca jatun urcu jahuaman Jesusta pushashpami , shuc ñahui quimllaillapi cai pacha tucui llactacunata ricuchirca .
42004006	Chashna ricuchishpaca : — Cai tucui sumac llactacunata mandanataca ñucamanmi cushca . Chaimanta ñucaca piman cusha nishpaca cushallami .
42004007	Can ñucata cungurishpa adoracpica , tucui caicunata canmanmi cusha — nirca .
42004008	Chashna nicpimi Jesusca : — Dios quillcachishcapica : “ Canta Mandac Diosllata adorangui , paillata servingui ” ninmi — nirca .
42004009	Chaimantaca Satanasca Jesusta Jerusalén puebloman pushashpa , Diosta mañana huasi jahuapi churashpaca : — Can Diospac Churi cashpaca , caimanta shitari .
42004010	Dios quillcachishcapica : “ Ama huactarichunca , Diosca paipac angelcunatami jarcachun cachanga .
42004011	Can ama chaquillatapish rumipi chugririchunca , paicunami maquipi chasquinga ” ninmi — nirca .
42004012	Shina nicpimi Jesusca : — Dios quillcachishcapica : “ Mandac Diosta , ama pandachisha nichun ” ninmi — nirca .
42004013	Satanasca Jesusta pandachisha nicushpapish mana pudishpaca , asha punzhacunacaman saquishpa rircami .
42004014	Jesusca Diospac Espiritupac poderhuanmi Galilea llactaman cutirca . Paimantaca tucui llactacunapimi parlanacurca .
42004015	Jesusca israelcuna tandanacuna huasicunapipish yachachircami . Chaimantami tucui gentecuna paitaca “ alli yachachicmi ” nic carca .
42004016	Jesusca pai huiñashca Nazaret pueblomanmi rirca . Chaipimi utcaman ric cashca shinallatac samana punzhapi israelcuna tandanacuna huasiman yaicurca . Chaipimi Dios quillcachishcata rezangapac shayarirca .
42004017	Pai rezachunca , Dios ima nishcata huillac Isaías quillcashcatami curca . Chaita pascashpa ricushpaca :
42004018	“ Ñucaca Diospac Espirituhuanmi cani . Diosca huacchacunaman alli huillaita huillachunmi ñucataca acllashca . Shungupi llaquilla causaccunata alliyachichunmi cacharca . Prezucunata cacharinata huillachun , ñahui mana ricuccunata ricucta ruhuachun , llaquichishca causacuccunata llaquimanta cacharichichunmi cacharca .
42004019	Chashnallatac Dios quishpichina punzha chayamushcata huillachunmi , ñucataca cacharca ” nishcatami rezarca .
42004020	Chai quillcashcata pillushpa huacaichic runaman cushpami , chaipi tiyarirca . Chaipi caccunaca Jesusta ricuracurcami .
42004021	Chaimantami Jesusca : — Cunanmi , cai cancunapac ñaupapi rezashcaca pactashca — nirca .
42004022	Shina sumacta rimashcamantami , tucui uyaccunaca mancharishpa , Jesusmanta allita rimarcacuna . Chaimantami caishuc chaishuc tapushpaca : — ¿ Caica manachu Josepac churi ? — ninacurca .
42004023	Chashna nicucpimi Jesusca : — Maijancunaca : “ Jambic runa , canllatac jambiri . Capernaúm pueblopi tucui ruhuashcacunatami uyarcanchic . Cai , can huiñashca llactapipish chashnallatac ruhuaiyari ” nicunguichicmi — nirca .
42004024	Shinallatac Jesusca : — Dios ima nishcata huillactaca , quiquin llactapi causaccunallatacmi mana uyashun nincuna . Chaica chashnatacmi can .
42004025	Elías huillacui punzhacunapica , Israel llactapica , achca viuda huarmicunami tiyarca . Chai punzhacunapi quimsa huata , sucta quillata mana tamyacpica , tucui llactacunapimi yarcai tiyarca . Chaica , chashnatacmi carca .
42004026	Chashna Israelpi achca viuda huarmicuna tiyacpipish , Diosca mana Eliasta ayudachun cacharcachu , ashtahuanpish Sidón pueblo cuchullapi tiyac Sarepta pueblopi causac viuda huarmipacllamanmi cacharca .
42004027	Eliseo huillacui punzhacunapi , Israelpi achca lepra ungüihuan caccuna tiyacpipish , Eliseoca shucllatapish mana alliyachircachu , ashtahuanpish Siria llactamanta Naamanllatami alliyachirca — nirca .
42004028	Chaita uyashpami , tucui tandanacuna huasipi caccunaca yallita piñarirca .
42004029	Chaimantami huaica jatarishpa , Jesusta chai pueblomanta llucchishpa , ucu huaicuta shitangapac aparcacuna . Chai puebloca urcu jahuapimi carca .
42004030	Chashna apacpipish , Jesusca paicunapac chaupillatatacmi rirca .
42004031	Jesusca Galilea llacta Capernaúm puebloman rishpami , samana punzhacunapi yachachicurca .
42004032	Jesús poderhuan sinchita yachachicpimi , tucui uyaccunaca mancharishpa saquirirca .
42004033	Israelcuna tandanacuna huasipica , millai supai japishca runami tiyacurca . Chai runa
42004034	caparishpaca : — Nazaret pueblomanta Jesús , ¿ canca imatatac ñucanchictaca nic shamungui ? ¿ Llaquichingapacchu shamungui ? ¡ Ñucanchictaca saquilla ! Ñucaca canta ricsinimi . Canca Dios cachashca Jucha Illacmi cangui — nirca .
42004035	Chashna nicpimi Jesusca : — ¡ Upallai , cai runamanta llucshi ! — nirca . Shina nicpimi , supaica chai runata tucuipac ñaupapi pambaman shitashpa , mana ashtahuan imata ruhuashpa , llucshishpa rircalla .
42004036	Chashna ruhuacpi , chaipi caccunaca : — Cai runaca , ¿ ima shinatac chashna rimarin ? ¿ Ima poderhuantac supaicunataca rimashpalla llucchishpa cachan ? — nishpa tapunacurca .
42004037	Chaimantami tucui llactacunapi Jesusmanta parlanacurca .
42004038	Jesusca chai tandanacuna huasimanta llucshishpaca , Simonpac huasimanmi yaicurca . Chaipimi Simonpac suedra fiebrehuan ancha ungushca carca . Chaimantami Jesusta alliyachichun mañarca .
42004039	Jesusca chai ungushcapacman cuchuyashpami , chai ungüita rimarca . Chai ungüi anchuricpimi , alliyashpa , paicunaman micunata cararca .
42004040	Ña inti tigracucpimi , tucuilaya ungüicunata Jesuspacman apamurca . Jesusca tucui ungushcacunapac uma jahuapi maquita churashpami alliyachirca .
42004041	Achca runacunamantami supaicunaca llucshirca . Chai supaicuna llucshishpaca : — ¡ Canca Diospac Churimi cangui ! — nishpami caparirca . Chaimantami Jesusca : — ¡ Upallaichic ! — nirca . Cristo cashcata yachashcamantami , supaicunataca mana imata rimachun saquirca .
42004042	Jesusca ña achicyamucucpimi , chaimanta llucshishpa , shitashca pambaman rirca . Chaimantami gentecuna mashcashpa , Jesús maipi cashcaman chayashpaca , ama maiman richun jarcanata munarca .
42004043	Ashtahuanpish Jesusca : — Ñucaca shuctac pueblocunapipish Dios mandacucmanta alli huillaitaca huillagrinami cani . Chashna huillachunmi , Diosca cacharca — nirca .
42004044	Chashnami Jesusca Galilea llacta tandanacuna huasicunapi huillashpa purirca .
42005001	Jesús Genesaret cucha patapi Diosmanta huillacucpimi , achca gentecuna ñitirinacushpa paipacman shamurca .
42005002	Shina cacpimi , Jesusca chushaclla ishcai canoacunata cucha patapi shayacucta ricurca . Challuata japiccunaca chai canoacunataca chaipi saquishpami , linchita tacshacurca .
42005003	Jesusca chai ishcai canoamanta Simonpac canoapi tiyarishpami , Simontaca canoata yacu chaupiman purichun mandarca . Chaipi tiyarishpami , tucui chai yacu patapi cac gentecunata yachachirca .
42005004	Yachachishca quipaca Simontaca : — Canoapi chaupi cuchaman rishpa , challuacunata japingapac linchicunata shitaichic — nirca .
42005005	Shina nicpimi Simonca : — Yachachic , tucui tutapish imata mana japircanchicchu . Shina cacpipish can nishcamanta , shitashpa ricushun — nirca .
42005006	Chashna shitacpica , achca challuacunami jundarca . Linchicunaca lliquirinallami tucurca .
42005007	Chaimantami shuc canoapi caccunata llucchinacuchun maquihuan cayarca . Chashna cayacpi shamushpaca , ishcai canoacunapimi jundachirca . Canoacunaca ucuyanallami tucurca .
42005008	Simón Pedro , chaita ricushpa , Jesuspac ñaupapi cungurishpaca : — Apunchic Jesús , ñucaca juchasapami cani . Chaimanta ñucamanta anchurilla — nirca .
42005009	Chashna achca challuata japishcamantami Simonpish , paihuan caccunapish yallita mancharishpa saquirirca .
42005010	Zebedeopac churicuna Simonhuan puric Jacobopish , Juanpish yallitami mancharirca . Chaimantami Jesusca Simontaca : — Ama mancharichu . Canca cunanmantaca challuacunata japic shinami , gentecunata Diospacman pushamuc cangui — nirca .
42005011	Chaimantami canoacunata yacu pataman llucchishpa , chaipi tucuita saquishpa , Jesusta catishpa rircacuna .
42005012	Jesús shuc puebloman chayacpimi , lepra ungüihuan ungushca runa shamurca . Chai runa pambacaman cumurishpaca : — Can alliyachisha nishpaca , alliyachinguimanllami — nishpa mañarca .
42005013	Shina nicpimi Jesusca : — Ari , alliyachisha ninimi . Alliyai — nirca . Shina nishpa , maquihuan tuparicpica , lepra ungüica anchurircallami .
42005014	Chashna alliyachishpami Jesusca : — Pi alliyachishcataca , ama piman huillanguichu . Cunanca , Israel curaman ricuchigri . Can alliyashcamantaca , Moisés mandashca shina , ofrendata cungui . Chashna ruhuacpimi yachangacuna — nirca .
42005015	Ashtahuanpish Jesús alliyachishcaca , punzhantami tucui llactacunapi charishpa catirca . Chaimantami uyangapacpish , ungushcacunata jambichingapacpish achcacuna paipacman shamurca .
42005016	Jesusca paicunamanta caruyashpami , shitashca pambapi Diosta mañangapac ric carca .
42005017	Shuc punzha Jesús yachachicucpimi , fariseocunapish , mandashcacunata yachachiccunapish chaipi tiyacurca . Paicunaca Galilea llactamantapish , Judea llactamantapish , Jerusalén pueblomantapishmi shamurca . Jesusca Diospac poderhuan cashcamantami ungushcacunata alliyachirca .
42005018	Chaimantami maijancunaca paralisis ungüihuan cac runata chacanapi apamushpa , Jesuspac ñaupaman chayachinata munarca .
42005019	Chashna cashpapish , achca gentecuna chai huasipi cashcamantami , Jesuspacmanca mana cuchuyachi pudirca . Chaimantami huasi jahuaman huichicushpa , catata pascashpa , ungushcataca huandumushcandi Jesuspac ñaupaman uricuchirca .
42005020	Jesusca paicuna tucui shunguhuan crishcata ricushpaca : — Riqui huahua , cambac juchacunataca ña perdonanimi — nirca .
42005021	Chaimantami fariseocunapish , mandashcacunata yachachiccunapish : “ Cai runaca , ¿ pi cashpatac Diosta piñachin ? Juchacunata pipish mana perdonai pudinchu , Diosllami perdonan ” nishpa yuyacurca .
42005022	Paicuna chashna yuyacucta yachashpami , Jesusca : — ¿ Ima nishpatac cancunapac shungupica chashna yuyacunguichic ?
42005023	Cai runataca , ¿ ima ninatac ashtahuan alli canga ? Paitaca : “ ¿ Cambac juchacunata ña perdonanimi ” nina , mana cashpaca “ jatari , rilla ” ninachu ashtahuan jahualla canga ? — nishpa tapurca .
42005024	Runa Tucungapac shamushca ñucaca cai pachapi juchacunata perdonaclla cashcata cancuna yachachunmi , cai runataca : “ Jatari , canta huandumushca chacanata apashpa , cambac huasiman rilla ” nini — nirca .
42005025	Chaimantami chai runaca jatarishcahuan , tucui gentecuna ricucucpi , paita huandumushca chacanata apashpa , Diostaca “ sumacmari cangui ” nishpa huasiman rirca .
42005026	Tucui chaipi caccunami yallita mancharishpa : “ Jaicapi mana ricushcatami ricunchic ” nishpa , Diostaca “ sumacmari cangui ” nircacuna .
42005027	Chai quipa , Jesús chaimanta llucshishpaca , Leví runa mizapi impuestota japicuctami ricurca . Paita ricushpaca : — Ñucata cati — nirca .
42005028	Chashna nicpimi , Levica jatarishpa tucuita saquishpa , Jesusta catishpa rircalla .
42005029	Leví Jesus-huan rishpaca , paipac huasipimi jatun micuita ruhuarca . Chaipimi impuestota japic tauca runacunapish , yallita juchayuc nishca runacunapish micucurca .
42005030	Fariseocunapish , mandashcacunata yachachiccunapish chaita ricushpa , Jesuspac yachacuccunataca : — ¿ Ima nishpatac impuestota japiccunahuanpish , caishuc juchayuccunahuanpish micucunguichic , ubiacunguichic ? — nircacuna .
42005031	Chashna nicpimi Jesusca : — Allicunaca mana jambicta mashcanchu , ashtahuanpish ungushcacunallami jambicta mashcan .
42005032	Ñucaca mana cashcata ruhuaccunatachu cayac shamurcani , ashtahuanpish juchayuccunatami Diosman cuti richun cayac shamurcani — nirca .
42005033	Chaimantami chai tapuccunaca : — Bautizac Juanpac yachacuccunapish , fariseocunapac yachacuccunapish tauca cutinmi ayunashpa , Diosta mañan . ¿ Ima nishpatac cambac yachacuccunaca mana ayunashpa micunlla , ubianlla ? — nircacuna .
42005034	Chashna nicpimi Jesusca : — Novio paicunahuan cacpica , ¿ bodaman cayashcacunataca ayunachinmanchu ?
42005035	Novio illaclla cana punzhacuna chayamucunmi . Chai punzhacunami ayunanga — nirca .
42005036	Shinallatac chimbapurashca parlohuan Jesús parlashpaca : — Pipish mushuc churanata lliquishpa , mauca churanata mana remendanchu . Chashna ruhuacpica , mushuc remiendohuanca mana alli saquirinmanchu . Mushucca maucapica mana alli ricurinmanchu .
42005037	Cunanlla ruhuashca vinotapish mauca capachucunapica , pi mana churanchu . Chashna churacpica , cunanlla ruhuashca vinoca mauca capachuta tucyachinmanmi . Chashna tucyachicpica , vinopish , capachupish yangamantami canman .
42005038	Chaimantami vinopish , capachupish ama ima tucuchun , cunanlla ruhuashca vinotaca mushuc capachucunapi churana .
42005039	Maijanpish pucushca vinota ubiacca , llullu vinotaca mana ubiasha ninmanchu . Pucushcami ashtahuan alli ninmanmi — nirca .
42006001	Samana punzhapi Jesús trigo chagra chaupita ricucpimi , paipac yachacuccunaca trigo umata pitishpa , cacushpa micui callarirca .
42006002	Chaimantami maijan fariseocunaca : — ¿ Ima nishpatac samana punzhapi mana ruhuanata ruhuacunguichic ? — nirca .
42006003	Chashna nicpimi Jesusca : — Mandac David yarcaihuan cashpa , paihuan puriccunahuan imata ruhuashcataca , ¿ manachu rezarcanguichic ?
42006004	Paica Diosta mañana huasiman yaicushpami , Diosman cushca tandata micurca . Shinallatac paihuan puriccunamanpish curcami . Chai tandataca mana pipish micunallachu carca , ashtahuanpish curacunallami micuna carca — nirca .
42006005	Shinallatac Jesusca : — Runa Tucungapac shamushca ñucaca , samana punzhapipish mandai pudinimi — nirca .
42006006	Shinallatac shuctac samana punzhapipish Jesusca israelcuna tandanacuna huasiman yaicushpami yachachicurca . Chaipimi alli lado maqui chaquishca shuc runa tiyacurca .
42006007	Mandashcacunata yachachiccunapish , fariseocunapish samana punzhapi chai runata Jesús alliyachictami ricuracurca . Chaica , samana punzhapi alliyachicpica , juchanchingapacmi chaparacurca .
42006008	Jesusca paicuna chashna yuyacucta yachashpami , chai maqui chaquishca runataca : — Jatarishpa , caipi caccunapac chaupipi shayari — nirca . Shina nicpica , chai runaca shayarircallami .
42006009	Jesusca chaipi caccunataca : — Cancunataca caillata tapusha : ¿ Samana punzhapica , allitachu ruhuana , mana cashpaca mana allita ruhuanachu alli canga ? ¿ Huañuimanta quishpichinachu , mana cashpaca , causaita quichunachu alli canga ? — nirca .
42006010	Jesús chaipi caccunata muyundita ricushpa , chai runataca : — Maquita chutai — nirca . Shina nicpi , chai runa maquita chutacpica , maquica alli tucurcallami .
42006011	Chaimantami yallita piñarishpa , Jesusta ima shina huañuchinata yuyarinacurca .
42006012	Chai punzhacunapimi Jesusca Diosta mañangapac urcuman rirca . Chaipica tucui tutami Diosta mañarca .
42006013	Ña punzhayamucpimi , yachacuccunata cayashpa , paicunamantaca chunga ishcaita acllashpa , apostolcunata shutichirca .
42006014	Paicunaca : Pedro nishca Simón , Simonpac huauqui Andrés , Jacobo , Juan , Felipe , Bartolomé ,
42006015	Mateo , Tomás , Alfeopac churi Jacobo , Simón Celote ,
42006016	Jacobopac huauqui Judas , Judas Iscariotemi carca . Quipamanca paimi Jesustaca huañuchiccunaman japichirca .
42006017	Jesús paicunahuan urcumanta shamushpaca , shuc pambamanmi chayarca . Chai pambamanmi paipac yachacuccunapish , Judea llactamantapish , Jerusalén pueblomantapish , mama cucha lado Tiro llactamantapish , Sidón llactamantapish achca gentecuna Jesús yachachishcata uyangapac , ungüicunamanta alliyangapacpish shamushca carca .
42006018	Millai supaicuna japishca cashcamanta llaquihuan caccunatapish alliyachircami .
42006019	Alliyachiclla cashcata yachashpami , tucui gentecuna Jesuspi tuparina yuyailla carca .
42006020	Jesús paipac yachacuccunata ricushpaca : « ¡ Cushicuichic , huacchacuna ! Jahua pacha Dios mandacucca cancunapacmi .
42006021	¡ Cunan yarcaihuan caccunaca cushicuichic ! Mana nictami micunguichic . ¡ Cunan huacaccunaca cushicuichic ! Cushicushpa asinguichicmi .
42006022	Runa Tucungapac shamushca ñucamanta gentecuna piñacpipish , llucchishpa cachacpipish , camicpipish , ima millaita rimacpipish , ¡ cushicuichic !
42006023	Cancunata chashna llaquichicpipish , ¡ cushicuichiclla ! Diosca jahua pachapica , cancuna japina cashcataca achcatami cunga . Dios ima nishcata huillaccunatapish chai shinallatacmi ñaupa taitacunaca llaquichic carca .
42006024	¡ Chayuccunalla , imachari tucunguichic ! Cancunaca ñami charishcahuan cushicushcanguichic .
42006025	¡ Cunan mana nicta micuccunalla , imachari tucunguichic ! Cancunaca yarcaihuanmi canguichic . ¡ Cunan cushicushpa asiccunalla , llaquihuanmi huacanguichic !
42006026	¡ Tucui gentecunapac alli nishcacunalla , imachari tucunguichic ! Chai shinallatacmi ñaupa taitacunapish , llullac huillaccunataca alli nic nirca .
42006027	Caipi ñucata uyaccunataca cashnami nini : Cancunata piñaccunata cuyaichic . Mana ricunayachiccunaman allita ruhuaichic .
42006028	Cancunata sinchita rimacpica , sumac rimaicunahuan cutichichic . Cancunata camiccunamanta Diosta mañanaichic .
42006029	Canta shuc lado jazhapi huactacpica , caishuc ladopipish huactachun saquingui . Cambac jahualla churanata quichucpica , ucu churanatapish apachun saquingui .
42006030	Maijan imata mañacpipish cungui . Maijan canmanta imata quichucpipish , upalla saquingui .
42006031	Ima shinami shuccuna cancunaman allita ruhuachun ninguichic , chashnallatac cancunapish shuccunaman allita ruhuaichic .
42006032	Cancunata cuyaccunallata cuyashpaca , ¿ ima allitatac ruhuanguichic ? Diosta mana cazuccunapish paicunata cuyaccunataca cuyancunami .
42006033	Allita ruhuaccunallata cuyashpaca , ¿ ima allitatac ruhuanguichic ? Diosta mana cazuccunapish chashnaca ruhuancunami .
42006034	Imatapish cutichipaccunallaman mañachishpaca , ¿ ima allitatac ruhuanguichic ? Diosta mana cazuccunapish chashnaca mañachinacuncunami .
42006035	Cancunata piñaccunata cuyaichic , paicunaman allita ruhuaichic . Imata mañachishpaca , ama chasquina yuyaihuan caichicchu . Chashna ruhuashpami , allicunata japinguichic . Jahua pacha Diospac huahuacunapishmi canguichic . Diosca mana paita pagui niccunatapish , millaicunatapish llaquinmi .
42006036	Chashnallatac Dios ima shinami cancunata llaquin , chai shinallatac shuccunata llaquichic .
42006037	Ama shuccunata juzgaichichicchu . Shina mana juzgacpica , Diospish cancunata mana juzgangachu . Ama shuccunata juchanchichicchu . Shina mana juchanchicpica , Diospish cancunata mana juchanchingachu . Shuccunata perdonaichic . Chashna perdonacpica , Diospish cancunapac juchacunata perdonangami .
42006038	Shuccuna ima minishtishcata cuichic , Chashna cucpica , Diospish cancunaman cungami . Paica alli medidapimi jatun cushtalpi alli cuyuchishpa jundachishpa , talliricucta cunga . Cancuna cushca shinallatacmi Diosca cancunamanpish cunga » nirca .
42006039	Jesús chimbapurashca parlohuan parlashpaca : « ¿ Shuc ñahui mana ricuc runaca caishuc mana ricuc runata pushai pudingachu ? ¿ Manachu ishcaitac mai jutcupi urmanman ?
42006040	Yachacucca yachachicta mana yallichu . Shina cashpapish tucuita alli yachacushpaca , yachachic shinallatacmi tucunga .
42006041	¿ Ima nishpatac cambac ñahuipi tiyacuc caspita ricushpa , shucpac ñahuipi tiyacuc ucshatarac ricungui ?
42006042	Cambac ñahuipi tiyacuc caspita manarac ricushpaca , ¿ ima shinatac cambac huauquitaca : “ Shuyai , cambac ñahuipi tiyacuc ucshata llucchisha ” ningui ? Mishqui shimi , jayac shungu , cambac ñahuipi tiyacuc caspitarac llucchi . Chashna llucchishpami , alli ricushpa , cambac huauquipac ñahuipi tiyacuc ucshataca llucchingui .
42006043	Alli yuraca , mana alli granota mana pucunchu . Mana alli yurapish , mana alli granota pucunchu .
42006044	Yuraca pucushpami ima yura cashcata ricuchin . Higoca , mana casha yurapi pucunchu . Uvaspish chini yurapica mana pucunchu .
42006045	Alli runaca , shungupi alli yuyaiyuc cashcamantami allita riman . Mana alli runaca shungupi millai yuyai junda cashcamantami mana allita riman . Shungupi ima tiyashcatami shimica riman .
42006046	Cancunaca , ¿ ima nishpatac Apunchic Jesús , Apunchic Jesús nicushpapish , mandashcataca mana pactachinguichic ?
42006047	Maijanpish ñucapacman shamushpa , ñuca nishcata uyashpa cazucca ,
42006048	ucuta allashpa , rumi allpapi huasichic runa shinami . Chai huasica sinchi rumi allpapimi ruhuashca . Chaimantami achca yacu shamushpa huactarishpapish , yacu jundashpapish mana imata ruhuanchu .
42006049	Maijanpish ñuca nishcata uyashpapish mana cazucca , mana ucuta allashpa , cabia allpapi huasichic runa shinami . Chai huasita achca yacu shamushpa huactarishpaca , tucui urmachinllami . Chaica yalli llaquimi » nirca .
42007001	Jesús chaipi cac gentecunaman tucuita parlashpaca , Capernaúm pueblomanmi rirca .
42007002	Chaipica , Roma llactamanta patsac soldadocunata mandacpac cuyashca , shuc servicmi yallita ungushca carca .
42007003	Chai mandacca Jesusmanta parlanacucta uyashpami , israelcunata pushac yuyaccunata paipac servicta Jesús alliyachingapac , huasiman shamuchun rogachun cacharca .
42007004	Paicuna Jesuspacman chayashpa rogashpaca : — Soldadocunata mandactaca ayudanami cangui .
42007005	Paica ñucanchic llactata cuyacmi . Paillatacmi ñucanchic tandanacuna huasitapish shayachichirca — nishpa mañarca .
42007006	Jesús paicunahuan rishpa , ña huasiman chayagricucpica , chai soldadocunata mandacca paipac ricsishca runacunatami Jesusta tupachun cacharca . Paicunataca : — Apunchic Jesús , mana piñachisha ninichu . ¿ Ñuca ima cacpitac , ñuca huasimanca shamugringuiyari ?
42007007	Ñucaca mana cambac ñaupapi ricuripacmi cani . Chaimantami ñuca quiquin mana rircani . Ñuca servic alliyachun mandailla , chashna mandacpica alliyangallami .
42007008	Ñucapish mandachun churashcallami cani . Maijan soldadota ñuca “ ri ” nicpica , rinllami . Maijanta “ shamui ” nicpica , shamunllami . Ñuca servicta “ imata ruhuai ” nicpica , ruhuanllami ningui — nishpa cacharca .
42007009	Chashna nicta Jesús uyashpaca , macharishpami saquirirca . Chaimantami caticcunata ricushpaca : — Cashna crictaca , israelcunapurapish mana tarishcanichu , chaica chashnatacmi — nirca .
42007010	Chai cachashcacuna huasiman cutimushpaca , servic ña alliyashcatami ricurca .
42007011	Chai quipami Jesusca Naín puebloman paipac yachacuccunahuan , achca gentecunahuan ricurca .
42007012	Jesús chai puebloman ña yaicugricucpimi , shuc huañushca huambrata enterrangapac huandushpa ricurca . Chai huañushcaca viuda huarmipac shuclla cari huahuami carca . Achca gentecunami llaquilla enterrangapac ricurca .
42007013	Apunchic Jesusca chai viuda huarmi huacacucta ricushpa llaquishpaca : — Ama huacaichu — nirca .
42007014	Jesús cuchuyashpa , chai huandushcapi tuparicpica , huandushpa riccunaca shayarircami . Chashna cacpimi Jesusca : — Huambra , cantami jatari nini — nirca .
42007015	Chashna nicpimi , chai huañushca huambraca tiyarishpa , parlai callarirca . Paitaca mamamanmi curca .
42007016	Chaipi caccuna mancharishpa , Diosta pagui nishpaca : — Dios ima nishcata jatun huillacmi ñucanchic chaupipica ricurishca . Diosmi , pai acllashca gentecunata ricungapac shamushca — nircacuna .
42007017	Jesús chashna ruhuashcaca tucui Judea llactapi , muyundi llactacunapimi yacharirca .
42007018	Tucui chaicunataca , Bautizac Juanpac yachacuccunami Juanman huillarca .
42007019	Chaimanta Juan paipac yachacuccunapuramanta ishcaita cayashpa , Jesuspacman cachashpaca : « Cancuna rishpaca : “ ¿ Canchu chai shamuna cashca Cristoca cangui ? Mana cashpaca , ¿ shuctachu shuyana canchic ? ” nishpa tapunguichic » nirca .
42007020	Yachacuccuna Jesuspacman chayashpaca : — Bautizac Juanca : “ ¿ Canchu chai shamuna cashca Cristoca cangui ? Mana cashpaca , ¿ shuctachu shuyana canchic ? ” nishpami , tapuchun cachan — nirca .
42007021	Chai ratollacmi Jesusca tauca ungushcacunatapish , supai japishcacunatapish , ñahui mana ricuccunatapish alliyachirca .
42007022	Jesús paicunata alliyachishpaca : — Juanpacman rishpa , cancuna imata ricushcatapish , uyashcatapish huillanguichic . Ñahui mana ricuccuna ricucushcatapish , suchucuna puricushcatapish , lepra ungüihuan caccuna alliyashcatapish , ringri mana uyaccuna uyacushcatapish , huañushcacunata causachishcatapish , huacchacunaman alli huillaita huillashcatapish huillanguichic .
42007023	Cushicuichic , ñucata caticushcamanta mana pingaccuna — nirca .
42007024	Juanpac cachashcacuna rishca quipa , Jesús Juanmanta gentecunaman parlashpaca : — Shitashca pambapica , ¿ imatatac ricungapac rircanguichic ? ¿ Huairahuan cuyucuc carrizollatachu ricungapac rircanguichic ?
42007025	Chaica , ¿ imatatac ricungapac rircanguichic ? ¿ Shuc alli churashca runatachu ricungapac rircanguichic ? Ashtahuanpish alli churanata churashcacunaca cushillami jatun mandaccunapac huasipi causan .
42007026	Shinashpaca , ¿ imatatac ricungapac rircanguichic ? ¿ Diosmanta huillactachu ricungapac rircanguichic ? Ari , chaitami ricurcanguichic . Juanca Dios ima nishcata huillactapish yallimi .
42007027	Dios quillcachishcapi Juanmanta rimashpaca : “ Ñuca ima nishcata huillactaca , ñaupachishpami cachani . Paimi purina ñantaca allichinga ” ninmi .
42007028	Cai pachapi huacharishcapurapica , Bautizac Juanmanta yalli alli huillacca manatac tiyashcachu . Chashna cacpipish , Dios mandacucpica , yangalla runami Juanta atishpa alli nishcaca . Chaica chashnatacmi can — nirca .
42007029	Jesús chashna nicpica , tucui gentecunapish , impuestota japiccunacamanmi Dios cashcata ruhuac cashcata yacharcacuna . Chaimantami Juan bautizacucpica , paicunapish bautizarirca .
42007030	Ashtahuanpish fariseocuna , mandashcacunata yachachiccunaca Dios ima paicunaman allita ruhuasha nishcataca mana chasquishun nircachu . Shinallatac Juan bautizacucpica , mana bautizarisha nircachu .
42007031	Shinallatac Jesusca : — Cunan punzhapi causaccunataca , ¿ imahuan chimbapurasha ? ¿ Pi shinatac caicunaca ?
42007032	Paicunaca plaza pambapi huambracuna shuc chaishuc caparishpa : “ Flautapi tocacpipish , mana bailarcanguichicchu . Llaquillata cantacpipish , mana huacarcanguichicchu ” nic shinami .
42007033	Vinotapish mana ubiac , micunatapish mana micuc Bautizac Juan shamucpica , cancunaca : “ Supaihuanmi can ” ninguichicmi .
42007034	Cutin , imatapish micuc , vinotapish ubiac Runa Tucungapac shamushca ñucataca : “ Cai runaca imatapish yalli micuc , vinotapish ubiac , impuestota japiccunahuanpish , juchayuc gentecunahuanpish tandariclla ” ninguichicmi .
42007035	Ashtahuanpish Dios yachac cashcataca paita caticcunami ricuchicun — nirca .
42007036	Shuc fariseo runami Jesusta paipac huasipi micuchun pusharirca . Chashnami fariseo runapac huasipi yaicushpa micungapac tiyarirca .
42007037	Jesús fariseopac huasipi cacta shuc juchasapa huarmi yachashpami , alabastro rumi botella junda mishquilla ashnacucta apashpa shamurca .
42007038	Chashnami Jesuspac huashata shamushpa , cungurishpa , huacashca huiquihuan chaquita jucuchirca . Chaimantaca acchahuan chaquichishpami , chaquipi mucharca . Shinallatac pai apamushca mishquilla ashnacuctami Jesuspac chaquipi churarca .
42007039	Chaita , chai micungapac cayac fariseo ricushpaca : « Cai runa , Dios ima nishcata huillac cashpaca , paipac chaquipi tuparicuc huarmi pi cashcata , imalaya huarmi cashcata yachanmanmi . Cai huarmica yalli juchayuc huarmimi » nishpa yuyacurca .
42007040	Chaimantami Jesusca chai fariseotaca : — Simón , caitami nisha nini — nirca . Shina nicpimi fariseoca : — Yachachic , nilla — nirca .
42007041	Chashna nicpimi Jesusca : — Shuc runami ishcai runacunaman cullquita mañachirca . Shuc runamanca pichca patsac denario cullquita , caishuc runamanca pichca chunga denario cullquita mañachirca .
42007042	Paicuna mañashca cullquita mana cutichi pudicpimi , chai mañachic runaca ishcai runatatac perdonarca . Chai ishcai runacunamantaca , ¿ maijantac cullquita mañachic runataca , ashtahuan cuyanga ? Chaita ni — nirca .
42007043	Shina tapucpimi Simonca : — Maijanmi ashtahuan achcata mañac runami ashtahuan cuyanga , yuyanimi — nirca . Shina nicpimi Jesusca : — Ari , allitami nircangui — nirca .
42007044	Chaimantami huarmita ricuchishpa , Simontaca : — ¿ Cai huarmi ruhuashcata ricunguichu ? Ñuca cambac huasiman yaicumucpica , chaquita jahuangapacca yacullatapish mana curcanguichu , ashtahuanpish cai huarmica paipac huiquihuanmi ñuca chaquitaca jucuchishpa acchahuan chaquichin .
42007045	Canca mana mucharcangui , ashtahuanpish cai huarmica yaicumushcahuanmi , ñuca chaquita muchanata mana saquishca .
42007046	Mana ñuca umapi aceiteta churarcanguichu , ashtahuanpish cai huarmica mishquilla ashnacuctami ñuca chaquipica churan .
42007047	Chaimantami cashna nini : Paipac achca juchacunata perdonashca cashcamantami , paica ashtahuan cuyan . Ashtahuanpish ashalla juchacunata perdonashcacunaca , ashallatami cuyan — nirca .
42007048	Shina nishpa , chai huarmitaca : — Cambac juchacunataca ña perdonanimi — nirca .
42007049	Shina nicpimi , Jesus-huan mizapi micucuccunaca : — Cai runaca , ¿ pi cashpatac juchacunatapish perdonan ? — ninacurca .
42007050	Chaimantami Jesusca chai huarmitaca : — Can crishcamantaca , ña quishpichishcami cangui . Cunanca cushicushpa rilla — nirca .
42008001	Chai quipami Jesusca paipac chunga ishcai yachacuccunahuan pueblocunapipish , uchilla llactacunapipish Dios mandacucmanta alli huillaita huillashpa puricurca .
42008002	Maijan huarmicunapish caticurcami . Maijan paicunamantami Jesusca supaicunata llucchishca carca . Maijancunataca ungüicunamantami alliyachishca carca . Chai huarmicunapurapica , Magdala pueblomanta Mariapishmi carca . Paimantami Jesusca canchis supaicunata llucchishca carca .
42008003	Herodespac mayordomo Chuzapac huarmi Juanapishmi carca . Shinallatac Susanapish , shuctac huarmicunapishmi carca . Paicunami imalla charishcacunahuan Jesusta ayudaccunami carca .
42008004	Chican pueblocunamanmi achca gentecuna Jesuspacman shamurca . Paicunata Jesús chimbapurashca parlohuan yachachishpaca :
42008005	« Shuc tarpuc runami tarpungapac llucshirca . Pai tarpucucpica , asha muyuca ñanpimi urmarca . Chaipi sarurishpa siricucpimi , zhutacuna shamushpa mururca .
42008006	Cutin maijan muyuca rumi allpapimi urmarca . Chai muyu huiñashpapish , mana achca allpa tiyashcamantami chaquirca .
42008007	Cutin maijan muyuca casha chaupipimi urmarca . Shina cashpami , casha huiñashpa ñiticpica aguarirca .
42008008	Cutin maijan muyuca alli allpapimi urmarca . Chai muyuca sumacta huiñashpami , shuc muyumanta patsac granota pucurca » nirca . Chaicunata yachachishpami Jesusca : « Maijanpish ringrita chariccunaca , cai ñuca huillashcata alli uyaichic » nishpa , sinchita nirca .
42008009	Yachacuccuna Jesusta tapushpaca : — ¿ Cai chimbapurashca parloca , imatatac nisha nin ? — nishpa tapurca .
42008010	Chashna tapucpica : — Cancunamanca pimanpish mana yachachishca Dios mandacucmantami yachachini . Ashtahuanpish shuctac runacunamanca paicuna ricushpapish , ama ricuchun , uyashpapish , ama uyachun , shinallatac ama entendichunmi , chimbapurashca parlocunahuan yachachini .
42008011	Cai chimbapurashca parloca caitami nisha nin : Muyuca , Dios rimashcami .
42008012	Ñanpi urmashca muyuca uyaccunami . Shina uyacpipish , paicuna crishpa ama quishpirichunmi , Satanás shamushpa cungachin .
42008013	Rumi allpapi urmashca muyuca Dios rimashcata uyashpa cushilla chasquiccunami . Shina cashpapish mana ucuta sapiyashca cashpami , ashacamanlla crincuna . Chaica llaquicuna japicpica , mana catisha nishpa saquirincunami .
42008014	Casha chaupipi urmashca muyuca Dios rimashcata uyaccunami . Chashna uyashpapish ima cai pacha munaicuna , chayucyana yuyaicuna , cai causaillapi cushicuna yuyaicuna shamucpimi , mana pucuc muyu shina tucuncuna .
42008015	Ashtahuanpish alli allpapi urmashca muyuca Dios rimashcata tucui shunguhuan uyashpa , alli cazushpa mana cungariccunami . Chashnami , alli pucuc shina cancuna .
42008016	Maijanpish luzta japichishpaca , mana imahuan tapangapac japichinchu . Shinallatac mana cama ucupi churanchu . Ashtahuanpish ucuman yaicuccunata achicyachichunmi pata jahuapi churan .
42008017	Ima pacashcapish mana pacalla saquiringachu , tucuimi ricuringa . Tucui mana yachashcapish yacharinga .
42008018	Chaimanta cai uyashcata alli yuyarichic . Maijanpish alli yuyaita chariccunamanca ashtahuanmi cushca canga . Mana charicmantaca , pai charinimi nishcatapish quichushcami canga — nirca .
42008019	Jesuspac mamapish , huauquicunapish pai maipi cashcamanmi shamurca . Shina cashpapish achca gentecuna chaipi cacpimi , Jesuspacmanca mana chayai pudirca .
42008020	Chaimantami Jesusmanca : — Cambac mama , cambac huauquicunami canhuan tupasha nishpa , canzhapi shuyacun — nishpa huillarca .
42008021	Chashna huillacpimi Jesusca : — Maijanpish Dios ima nishcata uyashpa , cazuccunami ñuca mama , ñuca huauquicuna — nirca .
42008022	Shuc punzhami Jesusca paipac yachacuccunahuan canoapi tiyarishpaca : — Cai cucha yacuta pasashun — nirca .
42008023	Cuchata canoapi ricushpami , Jesusca sueñurca . Chaipimi cungailla huaira jatarishpa , yacuta yallita cuyuchirca . Canoapipish yacu jundai callarircami . Canoaca ña ucuyanallami tucurca .
42008024	Chaimanta yachacuccuna Jesuspacman cuchuyashpaca : — ¡ Yachachic , Yachachic , ñami ucuyagrinchic ! — nishpa ricchachirca . Jesús riccharishpa , huairatapish , yacutapish rimacpica , casilla tucurcallami .
42008025	Jesusca yachacuccunataca : — ¿ Ima nishpatac ñucata mana cringuichic ? — nirca . Chashna nicpimi , yallita mancharishpa , caishuc chaishuc tapunacushpaca : — ¿ Pitac cai runa ? Huairapish , yacupish pai nishcataca cazunmi — nishpa nircacuna .
42008026	Jesusca paipac yachacuccunahuanmi Galilea llacta chimba lado Gadara llactaman rirca .
42008027	Chaiman chayashpa , canoamanta Jesús uricucpimi , pueblomanta shuc runa Jesuspacman shamurca . Chai runaca unai huatacunatami supaicuna japishca carca . Paica mana huasipi causarcachu . Churana illacllami panteonpi causac carca .
42008028	Chai runa Jesusta ricushpa , paipac ñaupapi cungurishpaca : — Jahua pacha Diospac Churi Jesús , ¿ imatatac nic shamungui ? ¡ Ñucataca ama llaquichichu ! — nishpa caparirca .
42008029	Jesús chai runamanta supaita “ llucshi ” nicucpimi , chashna caparirca . Tauca cutinmi chai supaica llaquichic carca . Chaimantami maquicunatapish , chaquicunatapish cadenacunahuan huatashpa charic carca . Chashna huatacpipish , cadenacunata pitishpami , shitashca pambaman supai apacpi , riclla carca .
42008030	Chai runataca Jesusca : — ¿ Ima shutitac cangui ? — nishpa tapurca . Shina nicpimi paica : — Ñucaca huaranga huaranga shutimi cani — nirca . Huaranga huaranga supaicuna japishca cashcamantami , chashna nirca .
42008031	Chai supaicunaca : — Ama ñucanchicta ucu pacha jutcuman cachaichu — nishpami mañarca .
42008032	Chai urcupica achca cuchicunami micushpa puricurca . Chaimantami supaicunaca chai cuchicunapi yaicuchun saquichun mañarca . Shina mañacpica , Jesusca yaicugrichun saquircallami .
