42020020	Chaimantami ima mana allita nicpica , juchanchishpa llactata mandacman japichingapac , shuc cashcata ruhuac runacunata tapuchun cacharca .
42020021	Paicuna Jesustaca : — Yachachic , canca mana ñahuita ricushpalla , yachachicmi cangui . Gentecuna Dios munashca shina causachunmi , mana llullashpa yachachicungui .
42020022	¿ Jatun mandac Cesarmanca impuestota paganachu , mana cashpaca mana ? — nishpa tapurca .
42020023	Ashtahuanpish paicuna mana alli yuyaihuan tapucushcata yachashpami , Jesusca :
42020024	Cullquita ricungapac apamuichic — nirca . Paicuna ricuchicpica : — Cai cullquipica , ¿ pipac ñahuitac , pipac shutitac ? — nirca . Shina tapucpica : — Jatun mandac Cesarpac ñahuimi — nirca .
42020025	Chashna nicpimi Jesusca : — Shinashpaca jatun mandac Cesarpac cashcataca , jatun mandac Cesarllamantac cuichic . Diospac cashcataca , Diosllamantac cuichic — nirca .
42020026	Gentecunapac ñaupapi Jesús tucuita allita huillacpimi , paicunaca imata mana juchanchi pudishpa , yallita mancharishpa saquirirca .
42020027	Huañushca causarinata mana cric maijan saduceocuna Jesuspacman cuchuyashpaca :
42020028	— Yachachic , chaica Moisés quillcashpaca : “ Shuc runa manarac huahuata charishpa huañucpica , chai huañushcapac huauquillatac chai viuda huarmihuan cazarashpa , huañushca huauquipac randi huahuata charichun ” nicunmi .
42020029	Canchis huauquicunami tiyarca . Chai canchis huauquimantaca punta huauquimi cazarashpa , manarac huahuata charishpa huañurca .
42020030	Quipa huauqui chai huarmihuan cazarashpapish , manarac huahuata charishpami huañurca .
42020031	Ashtahuan quipa huauqui chai huarmihuan cazarashpapish manarac huahuata charishpami huañurca . Chashnami canchis huauquicuna manarac huahuata charishpa huañurca .
42020032	Quipaca huarmipish huañurcami .
42020033	Canchis huauquicunahuantac cazarashca cashcamantaca , huañushcacuna causarina punzhapica , ¿ pipac huarmitac canga ? — nirca .
42020034	Chashna tapucpimi Jesusca : — Cai pachallapimi caripish , huarmipish cazaran , shinallatac cazarachincuna ,
42020035	ashtahuanpish huañushcacuna causari punzhapica , maijanpish huiñai causaiman yaicuccunaca , caripish , huarmipish mana cazarangachu , shinallatac mana cazarachingacunachu .
42020036	Dios causachishca cashcamantaca , pai acllashcacunami canga . Shinallatac angelcuna shinami canga . Chaimanta paicunaca ña mana huañungachu .
42020037	Huañushcacuna causarinamanta Dios rupacuc zarza yuramanta rimashpaca : “ Ñucaca Abrahampac , Isaacpac , Jacobopac Diosmi cani ” nishcami .
42020038	Diosca mana huañushcacunapac Dioschu , ashtahuanpish causaccunapac Diosmi — nirca .
42020039	Mandashcacunata yachachicpuramanta maijancunaca : — Yachachic , allitami ningui — nirca .
42020040	Pi imata mana ashtahuan tapurcachu .
42020041	Chaimantami Jesusca : — ¿ Ima nishpatac Cristotaca : “ Mandac Davidpac aillupurami canga ” nincuna ?
42020042	Chaica Davidllatacmi Salmopica : “ Mandac Diosca ñucata Mandactaca : ‘ Canta piñaccunata
42020043	cambac chaqui sarunapi churangacaman , canca ñuca alli maquiman tiyacuilla ’ nin ” nirca .
42020044	Davidllatac Cristotaca : “ Ñucata Mandacmi ” nicpica , ¿ ima shinatac Cristoca Davidpac aillupurallaca cangayari ? — nirca .
42020045	Tucui chaipi caccuna uyacucpimi , Jesusca paipac yachacuccunataca :
42020046	— Mandashcacunata yachachiccuna yachachishcamanta cuidaringuichic . Paicunaca pambata aisacuc suni churanata churarishcami purinata munancuna . Plazacunapi tupaccuna paicunata manchaihuan alabachunmi munancuna . Paicunaca mai tandanacuna huasicunapipish , punta alli tiyarinacunapi tiyarinami munan . Shinallatac micungapacpish , punta alli tiyarinata mashcashpami tiyarin .
42020047	Viudacunapac huasicunatapish quichuccunami . Chashna ruhuashpaca , alli ricuringapacmi unaita Diosta mañac tucun . Chashna ruhuashcamantaca , paicunallatacmi ashtahuan llaquita apanga — nirca .
42021001	Jesusca Diosta mañana huasipi chayuccuna ofrendata churacuctami ricurca .
42021002	Shuc huaccha viudapish , ishcai ashalla valic cullquita churacuctami ricurca .
42021003	Chaimantami Jesusca yachacuccunataca : — Huaccha viudami , caishuccunamanta yalli ofrendata cushca . Chaica chashnatacmi .
42021004	Tucui chayuccunami puchushcallata ofrendata Diosman cuncuna , ashtahuanpish cai huarmica paipac causaipac charishcatami cushca — nirca .
42021005	Tauca runacuna Diosta mañana huasita sumac rumicunahuan ruhuashcamanta , pircapish sumacta allichishcamanta parlanacucucpimi ,
42021006	Jesusca : — Tucui urmachishca , rumillapish mana pircashca saquirina punzhacunami chayamucun — nirca .
42021007	Chashna nicpimi yachacuccunaca : — Yachachic , ¿ ima punzhatac chaica tucungayari ? Ña chashna tucungapacca , ¿ imacunatac ricuringayari ? — nirca .
42021008	Shina tapucpimi Jesusca : — Achcacunami ñuca shutipi shamushpa : “ Ñucami Cristoca cani ” ningacuna . Maijanca : “ Cunanmi pai cutimuna punzhaca chayamun ” ningami . Pacta paicunata pacta catinguichicman , ashtahuanpish alli yuyaihuan puringuichic .
42021009	Cancunaca llactacunapura macanacuitapish , llacta ucupi macanacuitapish uyanguichicmi . Ama mancharinguichicchu . Chai llaquicunaca cai pacha manarac tucuricpi tiyanallatacmi can . Chashna tucucpipish , cai pachaca manarac tucuringachu — nirca .
42021010	Shinallatac Jesusca : — Llactacunapurami macanacunga . Jatun mandaccunapurapish macanacungami .
42021011	Maipica , jatun allpa chucchuimi tiyanga . Yalli yarcaipish , ungüicunapish tiyangami . Jahua cielopica , jaicapi mana ricushcacunami ricuringa . Yalli manchaimi tiyanga .
42021012	Manarac caicuna tucucpimi , ñucata caticushcamantaca piñashpa prezunga . Cancunata juchanchishpami , tandanacuna huasicunaman apanga . Carcelpipish churangacunami . Llactacunata jatun mandaccunapacmanpish , quiquin llactata mandaccunapacmanpish apangami .
42021013	Chashna apacpimi , paicunamanpish ñucamanta huillanguichic .
42021014	Ama paicunapac ñaupapica : “ ¿ Imatashi nishun ? ” nishpa , chai yuyailla canguichicchu .
42021015	Ñucallatacmi cancunamanca rimana alli yuyaicunatapish cusha . Chashna allita rimacpica , cancunata piñaccunaca mana imata ni pudishpa , upalla saquiringallami .
42021016	Cancunataca ricsishcacunallatac , familiacunallatac , huauquicunallatac , taita mamacunallatacmi huañuchichun japichinga . Chashna japichicpica , maijan cancunataca huañuchingami .
42021017	Ñucata caticushcamantami , tucui gentecunapac piñashca canguichic .
42021018	Chashna cacpipish cancunapac shuc uma acchallapish mana chingaringachu .
42021019	Chashna llaquichicucpipish , tucui shunguhuan catirashpaca quishpiringuichicmi .
42021020	Jerusalén pueblota soldadocuna muyunacushpa shayacucta ricushpaca , tucui chingachishca cashca shinata yachanguichic .
42021021	Judea llactapi caccunaca urcucunapi miticugrichun . Jerusalenpi caccunapish llucshishpa richun . Chagrapi caccunapish ama cutichun .
42021022	Chai punzhacunaca , Dios quillcachishca shina llaquichina punzhacunami canga .
42021023	Chai punzhacunaca Dios cai llactapi causaccunata nina japiric shina piñarishpa llaquichinami canga . ¡ Chai punzhacunapi huicsayuc huarmicunalla , chuchucuc huahuayuc huarmicunalla , imachari tucunga !
42021024	Maijantaca espadahuanmi huañuchinga . Maijantaca huatashpami , tucui llactacunaman prezu apanga . Dios llaquichichun saquishca punzhacuna pactangacamanmi , Jerusalenpi causaccunataca shuctac llactacunaca paicuna munashcata ruhuashpa llaquichinga .
42021025	Intipipish , quillapipish , lucerocunapipish jaicapi mana ricushcacunami ricuringa . Cutin cai pachapica mama cucha yallita cuyurishpa huajiacta ricushpami yallita mancharishpa , yuyaita chingachinga .
42021026	Cai pachapi yalli llaquicuna catipi shamucpi , jahua cielopi tiyaccunapish chucchucpimi , gentecunaca yallita mancharishpa , yuyaita chingachinga .
42021027	Chashna tucucpica , Runa Tucungapac shamushca ñuca poderhuan , sumaimana achiclla cashcahuan achicyachishpa , puyupi shamucuctami ricunga .
42021028	Chai tucui llaquicuna callaricpica , Dios cancunata quishpichigricushcamanta huichaita ricushpa , cushicuihuan chaparacuichic — nirca .
42021029	Jesús cai chimbapurashca parlohuan parlashpaca : « Higo yurata , mana cashpaca ima yuracunatapish ricushpa alli yuyarichic .
42021030	Chai yuracunapi pangacuna jundarimucta ricushpaca , usyai punzhacuna chayamucushcatami cancunallatac yachanguichic .
42021031	Chai shinallatac cancunapish caicuna pactamucucta ricushpaca , Dios mandana punzhacuna ña chayamucushcatami yachanguichic .
42021032	Cunan punzha causaccuna cai ñuca huillashcacunaca tucui pactangacaman manarac huañungachu . Chashnami canga .
42021033	Cai pachapish , jahua pachapish tucuringami . Ashtahuanpish ñuca huillashcacunaca pactacungallami .
42021034	Cancunallatac alli yuyarichic . Pacta machanallapi , micunallapi , cai pachapi imatapish charinallapi yuyashpa causacunguichicman . Pacta cancuna mana yuyashca horas chai punzhaca chayamunman .
42021035	Cai pachapi causaccunataca , shuc tucllahuan japic shinami chai punzhaca chayamunga .
42021036	Chaimanta cancunaca allichirishca , ña rinalla shinami cana canguichic . Chai tucui llaquimanta quishpiringapacca , Runa Tucungapac shamushca ñucapac ñaupapi alli ricuringapac Diosta mañaracuichic » nirca .
42021037	Jesusca punzhaca Diosta mañana huasipimi yachachic carca . Tutaca Olivos urcumanmi ric carca .
42021038	Tucui gentecunami Jesús yachachishcata uyangapac utca jatarishpa , Diosta mañana huasiman shamuc carca .
42022001	Levadura illac tandata micuna Pascua fiestami chayamucurca .
42022002	Curacunata mandac curacunapish , mandashcacunata yachachiccunapish gentecunata manchashcamantami , Jesusta ima shina huañuchinata yuyarinacurca .
42022003	Chashna cacpimi , Jesuspac chunga ishcai yachacuccunapuramanta Judas Iscariotepac shungupi Satanasca yaicurca .
42022004	Judasmi curacunata mandac curacunahuan , Diosta mañana huasita cuidaccunahuan Jesusta ima shina japichinata parlangapac rirca .
42022005	Chaimantami paicunaca cushicushpa , Judasman cullquita pagashun nircacuna .
42022006	Paicuna cullquita cushun nicpica , Judasca ari nishpami , Jesusta pi mana yachacpi , pacalla japichinata yuyarishpa puricurca .
42022007	Levadura illac tandata micuna punzhami chayamurca . Chai punzhapimi Pascua fiestapac pactalla ovejata huañuchishpa micuna carca .
42022008	Chaimantami Jesús Pedrotapish , Juantapish cayashpaca : — Richic , ñucanchic Pascua fiesta micunata allichigrichic — nirca .
42022009	Shina nicpica paicunaca : — ¿ Maipitac allichigrichun ninguiyari ? — nirca .
42022010	Shina nicpimi Jesusca : — Cancuna puebloman chayacushpaca , yacu puñu aparishca shuc runahuanmi tupanguichic . Pai mai huasiman yaicungacaman catishpa ringuichic .
42022011	Shina rishpa huasiyuctaca : “ Yachachicca : ‘ ¿ Maijan ucupitac ñuca yachacuccunahuan Pascua fiesta micunata micusha ? ’ ninmi ” ninguichic .
42022012	Chashna nicpimi , chai huasiyucca sumacta allichishca jatun ucuta altopi ricuchinga . Chaipi micunata allichinguichic — nirca .
42022013	Yachacuccuna rishpaca , Jesús nishca shinallatacmi tarirca . Chaipimi Pascua fiesta micunata allichirca .
42022014	Micuna horas chayamucpimi , Jesusca paipac apostolcunahuan micungapac mizapi tiyarirca .
42022015	Chaipimi Jesusca : — ¡ Ñucaca manarac llaquita apashpami , cancunahuan Pascua fiestata micunata munacurcani !
42022016	Ñucaca ninimi : Cai micunataca Dios mandacucpi micungacaman manatac micushachu — nirca .
42022017	Jesús vaso vinota japishpa , Diosta pagui nishpaca : — Caica japichic , asha ashata ubiaichic .
42022018	Ñucaca ninimi : Cunanmanta pacha cai uvas vinotaca , Dios mandana punzhacaman manatac ubiashachu — nirca .
42022019	Shinallatac tandata japishpa Diosta pagui nishpa , chaupishpa chaupishpa cushpaca : — Caica , cancunamanta cushca ñuca cuerpomi . Ñucata yuyarishpa , cashna ruhuacunguichiclla — nirca .
42022020	Micushca quipaca , Jesús vaso vinota japishpaca : — Cai vaso vinoca , cancunamanta jichana ñuca yahuarmi . Chaihuanmi Diosca shuc mushuc ari ninacuita ruhuagrin .
42022021	Ashtahuanpish ñucata japichic runaca , ñucallahuantacmi cai mizapi micucun .
42022022	Runa Tucungapac shamushca ñucaca , Dios munashca shinami huañusha , ashtahuanpish ñucata japichic runalla , ¡ imachari tucunga ! — nirca .
42022023	Chaimantami paicunaca ‘ ¿ Maijantac paita japichicca canchic ? ’ nishpa tapunacurca .
42022024	Jesuspac yachacuccunapurami maijan ashtahuan alli mandac canamanta rimanacurca .
42022025	Chashna rimanacucucpimi , Jesusca : — Jatun llactacunata mandaccunallami , paicuna munashcata ruhuachishpa mandan . Shinallatac mandaccunallami : ‘ Allita mandacun ’ nichunmi munan .
42022026	Cancunaca ama chashna canguichicchu . Ashtahuanpish cancunapurapi maijan alli nishca casha nishpaca , quipa huiñaicuna shina cachun . Mandac cashpapish , servic runa shina cachun .
42022027	¿ Maijantac ashtahuan alli nishcaca ? ¿ Mizapi micungapac tiyaric , mana cashpaca , micunata cushpa servic ? ¿ Manachu mizapi tiyaric ashtahuan alli nishca ? Chashna cacpipish , ñucaca servic shinallami cancunapurapica cani .
42022028	Cancunaca ñuca mai llaquihuan cacpipish , ñucahuanmi carcanguichic .
42022029	Chaimantami ñuca Taita ñucata Jatun Mandacta ruhuashca shina , cancunatapish jatun mandacta ruhuasha .
42022030	Cancunaca ñuca mandacucpimi , mizapi tiyarishpa ñucahuan micunguichic , ubianguichic . Mandashpa tiyarinapi tiyarishpami , Israelpac chunga ishcai aillucunata mandanguichic — nirca .
42022031	Shinallatac Jesusca : — Simón , Simón , Satanasca trigota shushuc shina ruhuangapacmi , Cancunataca mañashca .
42022032	Chashna cacpipish , can sinchi cric cachunmi ñucaca Diosta mañarcani . Can ñucaman cutirishpaca , ñucata caticcunamanpish ñucata catichun alli yuyaita cungui — nirca .
42022033	Chaimantami Pedroca : — Apunchic Jesús , canta carcelman apacpipish , canhuanmi risha . Huañuna cacpipish , canhuanmi huañusha — nirca .
42022034	Chashna nicpimi Jesusca : — Pedro , canca cunan tutallatacmi gallo manarac cantacpi , quimsa cutin ‘ mana ricsinichu ’ nishpa negangui — nirca .
42022035	Jesús paicunata tapushpaca : — Ñuca cancunata mana cucayuhuan , mana cullquihuan , mana ushutahuan cachacpica , ¿ ima faltarcachu ? — nirca . Shina nicpimi yachacuccunaca : — Mana ima faltarcachu — nircacuna .
42022036	Shina nicpimi Jesusca : — Cunanca maijanpish cucayutapish , cullquitapish charicca , apaichiclla . Maijanpish espadata mana charicca , churanata catushpa randichic .
42022037	Ñucaca ninimi : Ñuca ima tucunamanta Dios quillcachishcapica : “ Juchayuc runacuna shinami huañunga ” nishcaca , pactanatacmi can . Ñucamanta Dios quillcachishcaca pactanami can — nirca .
42022038	Chashna nicpimi yachacuccunaca : — Apunchic Jesús , caipimi ishcai espadacuna tiyan — nirca . Chashnacpimi Jesusca : — Upallai — nirca .
42022039	Jesús chaimanta llucshishpaca , Olivos urcumanmi ric cashca shinallatac rirca . Yachacuccunapish catishpami rirca .
42022040	Ña chaiman chayashpaca : — Mana pandachishca cangapacca , Diosta mañaichic — nirca .
42022041	Chashna nishpami yachacuccunapacmanta ashata caruyashpa , Diosta mañangapac cungurirca .
42022042	Pai mañashpaca : « Ñuca Taitalla , can munashpaca , cai jayac ubiana shina llaquita ñucamanta anchuchiyari . Shina cacpipish , ama ñuca munashca shina ruhuaichu , ashtahuanpish can munashcata ruhuai » nirca .
42022043	Chashna mañacucpimi , jahua pachamanta ángel shamushpa sinchiyachirca .
42022044	Jesús yalli llaquihuan cashpami , ashtahuan Diosta mañarca . Jumbipish yahuar shinami pambaman shuturca .
42022045	Diosta mañashpa jatarishpaca yachacuccunapacmanmi cutirca . Yachacuccuna llaquihuan cashcamanta sueñucucpimi tuparirca .
42022046	Chaimantami paicunataca : — ¿ Ima nishpatac sueñucunguichic ? Mana pandachishca cangapacca Diosta mañaichic — nirca .
42022047	Jesús nicucllapitacmi achca gentecuna chayarca . Paipac chunga ishcai yachacuccunapuramanta Judasmi ñaupashpa chayarca . Pai cuchuyashpami Jesusta mucharca .
42022048	Chaimantami Jesusca : — Judas , canca Runa Tucungapac shamushca ñucataca , ¿ muchashpachu japichingui ? — nirca .
42022049	Paihuan cac yachacuccuna Jesusta japicucta ricushpaca : — Apunchic Jesús , ¿ espadahuan macanacushunchu ? — nirca .
42022050	Jesus-huan caccunamanta shucmi espadahuan huactashpa , curacunata jatun mandac curapac servicpac alli lado ringrita pitirca .
42022051	Chashna piticpimi Jesusca : — Ña chailla , saquichic — nirca . Chaimantami chai runapac ringri chugripi tuparishpa , alliyachirca .
42022052	Jesús , paita japingapac shamuc curacunata mandac curacunatapish , Diosta mañana huasita cuidaccunata mandaccunatapish , cunac yuyaccunatapish rimashpaca : — ¿ Ñucataca shuhuacta shinachu espadacunahuan , caspicunahuan japingapac shamunguichic ?
42022053	Punzhantami Diosta mañana huasipi cancunahuanca carcani . Chashna cacpipish , mana japircanguichicchu . Cunanca ñucata japina horas chayamucpimi , amsapi mandacuc supai yuyaita cucpi , ñucataca japinguichic — nirca .
42022054	Jesusta japishpaca , curacunata jatun mandac curapac huasimanmi aparirca . Pedroca caru carullatami caticurca .
42022055	Pungu pambapimi ninata japichishpa , muyundita tiyarishpa masharicurca . Pedropish paicunahuanmi masharicurca .
42022056	Pedro masharishpa tiyacucpi , shuc servic huarmi paita alli ricushpaca : — Cai runapish Jesus-huan puricmi carca — nirca .
42022057	Chashna nicpimi Pedroca : — Marmi , mana ricsinichu — nirca .
42022058	Chai quipalla , shuc runa Pedrota ricushpaca : — Canpish chai runacunapurami cangui — nirca . Shina nicpimi Pedroca : — Uyai , mana paicunapurachu cani — nirca .
42022059	Shuc hora caipac shinapi , shuc runaca : — Cai runapish Jesus-huan puricmi carca . Paipish Galilea llactallamantatacmi — nirca .
42022060	Chashna nicpipish , Pedroca : — Imamantapish nicunguichari , mana entendinichu — nirca . Pedro chashna nicucpimi , ñapish galloca cantarca .
42022061	Chashna cantacpimi , Apunchic Jesusca Pedrota tigrarishpa ricurca . Chashna ricucpimi : « Manarac gallo cantacpimi , quimsa cutin ñucataca negangui » nishpa , Apunchic Jesús nishcata yuyarirca .
42022062	Chaimantami Pedroca canzhaman llucshishpa munai huacarca .
42022063	Jesusta cuidac runacunaca pucllashpa paita huactarca .
42022064	Ñahuita pañohuan huatashpa , huactashpaca : — ¿ Maijantac huactanchic ? ¡ Huillai ! — nircami .
42022065	Shinallatac Jesustaca munai camishpami imatapish rimarcacuna .
42022066	Ña punzhayacpimi , Israel curacunata mandac curacunapish , cunac yuyaccunapish , mandashcacunata yachachiccunapish tandanacushca mandaccunapacman Jesusta aparca . Chaiman apacpica :
42022067	— ¿ Canchu Cristo cangui ? Huillai — nirca . Chashna nicpimi Jesusca : — Ari nicpipish , cancunaca mana cringuichicchu .
42022068	Cancunaman ñuca tapucpipish , cancunaca mana huillanguichicchu , shinallatac mana cacharinguichicchu .
42022069	Shina cacpipish , cunanmanta pachami , Runa Tucungapac shamushca ñucaca poderyuc Diospac alli maquiman tiyacusha — nirca .
42022070	Chashna nicpica , tucui mashna tapushpaca : — Shinashpaca , ¿ canchu Diospac Churi cangui ? — nircacuna . Shina tapucpimi paica : — Ari , cancuna nishca shinallatacmi cani — nirca .
42022071	Shina nicpimi paicunaca : — Paipac shimimantami uyashcanchic . Chaimanta mana piman ashtahuan tapunachu canchic — nircacuna .
42023001	Chaimantaca tucui chaipi caccuna jatarishpami , Jesustaca mandac Pilatopacman aparcacuna .
42023002	Paipac ñaupapica Jesustaca juchanchishpaca : — Cai runataca mandacta ama cazuchunmi gentecunata jatarichicucta japircanchic . Paica : “ Ñucami Jatun Mandac Cristo cani ” nishpami , impuestota jatun mandac Cesarman ama pagachun ninmi — nirca .
42023003	Chashna nicpimi Pilatoca : — ¿ Canchu israelcunata Jatun Mandac cangui ? — nishpa tapurca . Shina nicpimi , Jesusca : — Ari , canllatac nishcanguimi — nirca .
42023004	Pilato curacunata mandac curacunatapish , gentecunatapish : — Cai runapica , ima juchata mana tarinichu — nirca .
42023005	Shina nicpipish paicunaca : — Paica tucui Judea llactacunapi , Galilea llactamanta Jerusalén llactamanmi gentecunata mana allita yachachishpa , piñanacuipi churacun — nircacuna .
42023006	Chashna “ Galilea ” nicta Pilato uyashpaca : — Cai runaca , ¿ Galilea llactamantachu ? — nishpa tapurca .
42023007	Herodes mandacuc Galilea llactamanta cashcamantami Jesustaca mandac Herodespacman cacharca . Chai punzhacunapica , Herodespish Jerusalenpimi carca .
42023008	Herodesca “ Jesusca milagrocunatami ruhuan ” nicta uyashpami , utcamanta pacha Jesusta ricunata munacurca . Shinallatac ima milagrota ruhuacta ricunatapishmi munacurca .
42023009	Herodes caita chaita tapucpipish , Jesusca imata mana nircachu .
42023010	Curacunata mandac curacunapish , mandashcacunata yachachiccunapish Jesusta juchanchishpami chaipi carcacuna .
42023011	Herodespish , paipac soldadocunapish Jesusta burlashpa , asishpami , jatun mandac churana sumac churanata churachirca . Chashnami Pilatopacman cutichishpa cacharca .
42023012	Chai punzhamantami Pilatoca Herodes-huan alli tucurca . Ñaupamanca piñanacushcami carca .
42023013	Pilato curacunata mandac curacunatapish , mandaccunatapish , tucui gentecunatapish tandachishpaca :
42023014	— Cai runataca ‘ Gentecunatami mana allita yachachicun ’ nishpami , juchanchishpa apamushcanguichic . Cai runata cancunapac ñaupapi tapushpaca , ima cancuna juchanchishcata mana tarinichu .
42023015	Herodespish manallatac ima juchata tarircachu , chaimantami cutichishpa cachashca .
42023016	Chaimanta macachishpallami cacharigrini — nirca .
42023017	Cada huatami Pascua punzhapica shuc prezuta cacharic carca .
42023018	Tucui chaipi caccunaca shuc shinalla caparishpaca : — ¡ Chai Jesustaca huañuchilla ! ¡ Barrabasta cachari ! — nishpa caparirca .
42023019	Barrabasca mandac-huan piñarishpa gentecunata jatarichishcamanta , huañuchishcamantami carcelpi carca .
42023020	Pilatoca Jesusta cacharina yuyaihuan cashpami , cutin gentecunata tapurca .
42023021	Shina tapucpipish tucuimi : — ¡ Chacatailla , chacatailla ! — nircacuna .
42023022	Pilato quimsa cutin tapushpaca : — Paica , ¿ ima mana allitatac ruhuashcayari ? Paita huañuchingapacca , ima juchata mana tarinichu . Paitaca macachishpallami cacharigrini — nirca .
42023023	Gentecunaca “ chacatailla ” nishpa ashtahuan caparirca . Chaimantami paicuna munashcata pactachirca .
42023024	Chaimantami Pilatoca paicuna munashcata pactachishpa , Jesusta huañuchichun mandarca .
42023025	Cutin , mandac-huan piñarishpa gentecunata jatarichishcamanta , huañuchishcamanta prezu cac runataca cacharircami , ashtahuanpish Jesustaca gentecuna munashca ruhuachunmi curca .
42023026	Jesusta chacatangapac apacushpami , campomanta shamucuc Cirene pueblomanta Simonhuan tuparca . Paitami Jesuspac huashata cruzta apachishpa pusharca .
42023027	Jesuspac huashataca achca gentecunami caticurca . Huarmicunapish Jesusta llaquishpami llaquilla huacashpa caticurca .
42023028	Jesús chai huacacuc huarmicunata tigrarishpa ricushpaca : — Jerusalén huarmicunalla , ama ñucamantaca huacaichicchu , ashtahuanpish cancunamanta , cancunapac huahuacunamanta huacaichic .
42023029	Chaica : “ Huahuata mana chari pudic , mana huicsayuc tucuc , mana chuchuchic huarmicunapish cushicuichic ” nina punzhacuna chayamungami .
42023030	Chaimantami urcucunataca : “ Ñucanchic jahuapi tuñiri ” cutin lomacunataca : “ Ñucanchicta tapai ” ningacuna .
42023031	Verde yura shina ñucata cashna ruhuashpaca , chaquishca yura shina cancunatacarin , ¿ imatachari ruhuanga ? — nirca .
42023032	Ishcai millai runacunatapish Jesus-huan pacta chacatangapac aparcacuna .
42023033	Calavera nishca urcuman chayashpaca , Jesusta chacatarcami . Ishcai millai runacunatapish , shuctaca alli maquiman , shuctaca lluqui maquimanmi chacatarca .
42023034	Chashna chacatacpipish Jesusca : — Ñuca Taitalla , cai gentecunaca ima ruhuacushcata mana yachanchu . Chaimanta perdonai — nirca . Cutin Jesuspac churanacunata suerteta ruhuashpami chaupinacurca .
42023035	Gentecunaca Jesusta chaparacurcami . Cutin , mandaccuna burlashpaca : — Shuccunataca quishpichircami . Dios cachashca Cristo cashpaca , paillatac quishpirichun — nircami .
42023036	Soldadocunapish vinagreta ubiachisha nishpa burlashpaca :
42023037	— ¡ Can , israelcunata Jatun Mandac cashpaca , canllatac quishpiriyari ! — nirca .
42023038	Jesuspac uma jahua caspipica , griego rimaipi , latín rimaipi , hebreo rimaipi : « Caica Israelcunata Jatun Mandacmi » nishpami , quillcashca carca .
42023039	Chacatashca millai runaca : — ¡ Can Cristo cashpaca , canllatac quishpirishpa , ñucanchictapish quishpichiyari ! — nishpami rimarirca .
42023040	Shina nicpi , caishuc millai runaca : — Canpish pai shinallatac llaquita apacushpapish , ¿ manachu Diosta manchangui ?
42023041	Ñucanchicca millaita ruhuashcamantaca llaquita apanatacmi canchic , ashtahuanpish cai runaca ima millaita mana ruhuashcachu — nirca .
42023042	Shina nishpami chai runaca Jesustaca : — Can mandangapac shamushpaca , ñucata yuyaringuiyari — nirca .
42023043	Chashna nicpimi Jesusca : — Cunanllatacmi jahua pachapi ñucahuan cangui . Chaica chashnatacmi canga — nirca .
42023044	Chaupi punzhamanta quimsa horas chishicamanmi , tucui cai pachaca amsayarca .
42023045	Intipish amsayarcami . Diosta mañana huasi ucupi cac jatun pañopish , jahuamanta uraiman chaupita lliquirircami .
42023046	Jesús sinchita caparishpaca : — Taitalla , cambac maquipimi ñuca espirituta mingani — nirca . Shina nishpaca huañurcallami .
42023047	Mandac soldado chaita ricushpa , Diosta “ allimari cangui ” nishpaca : — Cai runaca cashcata ruhuacmi cashca — nirca .
42023048	Tucui chaipi cac gentecunapish chaita ricushpaca , llaquihuan shungupi huactarishpami cutircacuna .
42023049	Jesuspac tucui ricsishcacunapish , Galilea llactamanta Jesus-huan shamuc huarmicunapish carumantami chai tucuitaca ricucurca .
42023050	Judea llacta Arimatea pueblomanta José shuti runami tiyarca . Paica israelcunata mandacpuramanta cashcata ruhuac runami carca .
42023051	Paipish Dios mandacucta ricusha nishpami shuyacurca . Jesusta japichingapac yuyarishcatapish , imata ruhuashcatapish mana allichu nicmi carca .
42023052	Paimi mandac Pilatopacman rishpa , Jesuspac cuerpota enterrangapac mañarca .
42023053	Jesuspac cuerpota cruzmanta uricuchishpa pañohuan pillushpami , rumi quingrai jutcushca sepulturapi churarca . Chaipica pitapish manarac enterrashcami carca .
42023054	Chaica samana punzhapac allichirina punzha chishimi carca .
42023055	Galilea llactamanta Jesus-huan shamushca huarmicunapish catishpa rishpami , Jesuspac cuerpota ima shina sepulturapi churacta ricucurca .
42023056	Chai huarmicuna huasiman cutimushpaca , mishquilla ashnacuctami Jesuspac cuerpopi churangapac allichirca . Samana punzha chayamucpica , Dios mandashca shinami samarirca .
42024001	Semana callari punzha , manarac alli achicyacpimi , chai huarmicunaca ñaupaman allichishca mishquilla ashnacucta apashpa , Jesusta maipi enterrashcaman rirca .
42024002	Paicuna chayashpaca , sepulturata huichcashca rumi anchuchishcatami ricurca .
42024003	Ucuman yaicushpaca Apunchic Jesuspac cuerpota mana tarircachu .
42024004	Paicuna chaita ricushpa , manchaihuan shayacucpimi , jagan nicuc yuranlla churashca ishcai runacuna paicunapac ñaupapi ricurirca .
42024005	Paicuna manchaihuan pambacaman cumuricpimi , chai runacunaca : — ¿ Ima nishpatac causarishcataca , huañushcacunapurapi mashcacunguichic ?
42024006	Mana caipichu , ñami causarirca . Pai Galilea llactapirac cashpa , ima nishcataca yuyarichic .
42024007	Paica : “ Runa Tucungapac shamushca ñucataca , juchayuc runacuna japishpa huañuchingacunami . Huañuchicpipish , quimsa punzhapica causarishami ” nircami — nirca .
42024008	Chashna nicpimi , chai huarmicunaca Jesús chashna nishcataca yuyarirca .
42024009	Chunga shuc yachacuccunamanpish , caishuc caticcunamanpishmi tucui ima tucushcata huillarca .
42024010	Apostolcunaman huillagriccunaca , Magdala pueblomanta Mariapish , Juanapish , Jacobopac mama Mariapish , shuc huarmicunapishmi carca .
42024011	Ashtahuanpish huarmicuna huillashcaca , apostolcunamanca yanga shinallami carca . Chaimantami mana crirca .
42024012	Chashna mana cricushpapish Pedroca jatarishcahuanmi , sepulturapi ricungapac callparca . Chaiman chayashpa , ucuta ricushpaca , pillushca pañolla siricuctami ricurca . Chashna ricushpaca , yallita mancharishpami , huasiman cutimurca .
42024013	Chai punzhallatacmi , Jesusta ishcai caticcunaca Emaús puebloman ricurca . Chai puebloca Jerusalenmanta chunga shuc kilómetro shinapimi carca .
42024014	Paicunaca chai punzhacunapi tucui ima tucushcatami parlanacushpa ricurca .
42024015	Paicuna caishuc chaishuc parlanacushpa ricucpimi , Jesusca paicunahuan tandarishpa ri callarirca .
42024016	Ashtahuanpish paicunapac ñahui pacashca shina cacpimi , Jesustaca mana ricsirca .
42024017	Jesusca paicunataca : — ¿ Imamantatac parlanacushpa ricunguichic ? — nishpa tapurca . Chaimantami paicunaca llaquilla tucushpa shayarirca .
42024018	Paicunapuramanta Cleofas runaca : — Jerusalén pueblopi cai punzhacuna ima tucushcataca , tucuimi yachan . Canllami mana yachashcangui — nirca .
42024019	Shina nicpimi Jesusca : — ¿ Imatac tucushcayari ? — nirca . Chashna nicpimi paicunaca : — Nazaret pueblomanta Jesusmantami parlanacucunchic . Paica Dios ima nishcata huillac , Diospac ñaupapipish , gentecunapac ñaupapipish allita yachachic , allita ruhuacmi carca .
42024020	Paitami curacunata mandac curacunapish , llactata mandaccunapish juchanchishpa , cruzpi chacatashpa huañuchirca .
42024021	Ñucanchicca : ‘ Paimi israelcunataca quishpichinga ’ nishpami yuyacurcanchic . Shina cacpipish , paita huañuchishcaca ñami quimsa punzha tucun .
42024022	Ashtahuanpish manarac pacaricpi , ñucanchicpuramanta maijan huarmicuna maipi enterrashcapi ricumushpaca , ashtahuanmi manchachirca .
42024023	Paicuna Jesuspac cuerpota mana tarishpa , huasiman cutimushpaca : “ Angelcuna ricurishpa : ‘ Jesusca ñami causarin ’ nishpami huillan ” nircami .
42024024	Ñucanchicpuramanta maijan sepulturapi ricungapac rishpapish , huarmicuna nishca shinallatacmi ricurca . Ashtahuanpish Jesustaca mana tarircacunachu — nirca .
42024025	Chashna nicpimi Jesusca : — ¡ Cancunaca yuyai illac upacuna cashpami , Dios ima nishcata huillaccuna ñucamanta huillashcataca mana utca cringuichic !
42024026	¿ Manachu Cristoca jahua pachapi Dios alli nishca cangapacca , llaquitarac apana carca ? — nirca .
42024027	Chashna nishpami , Moisés quillcashcamanta callarishpa , Dios ima nishcata tucui huillaccuna quillcashcacamanmi paimanta huillacushcata entendichirca .
42024028	Jesusca Emaús puebloman chayacushpaca , pasaric shinami tucurca .
42024029	Chaimantami paicunaca mana cachashun nishpa : — Ñami chishi , shinallatac tutayacun . Caillapi ñucanchic-huan saquiri — nirca . Chaimantami Jesusca paicunahuan saquirishpa , samaringapac yaicurca .
42024030	Paicunahuan micungapac tiyacushpami , tandata japishpa , Diosta pagui nishpa , chaupishpa paicunaman curca .
42024031	Chai rato ñahuicuna pascaricpimi , Jesusta ricsircacuna . Chashna ricsicpica , Jesusca chingarircami .
42024032	Chaimantami paicunapura rimanacushpaca : — ¿ Manachu Dios quillcachishcata ñanpi pai huillacucpica , ñucanchic shungu rupacyarca ? — ninacurca .
42024033	Chashna ninacushpaca chai ratollatacmi Jerusalenman cutimurca . Paicuna chayashpaca , Jesuspac chunga shuc yachacuccuna caishuc caticcunahuan tandanacushcahuanmi tuparcacuna .
42024034	Chaipi caccunaca : — Apunchic Jesús causarishcatami Simonca ricushca — nishpami huillarca .
42024035	Shina nicpimi , chai ishcai caticcunaca ñanpi ima tucushcatapish , Jesús tandata chaupicucpi paita ricsishcatapish parlarca .
42024036	Jesusta ricushcata parlanacucucpi , Jesús ñapish paicunapac chaupipi ricurishpaca : — ¡ Dios cushichichun ! — nirca .
42024037	Chashna ricuricpi , paicunaca : “ ¡ Almatami ricunchic ! ” nishpa , yallita mancharirca .
42024038	Chaimantami Jesusca : — ¿ Ima nishpatac mancharicunguichic ? ¿ Ima nishpatac cancunapac shungupi caita chaita yuyacunguichic ?
42024039	Ñuca maquitapish , chaquitapish japirishpa ricuichic . Ñucallatacmi cani . ¡ Maitatac almaca , aichata , tulluta charingayari ! Cancuna ricucuc ñucaca aichayuc , tulluyucmi cani — nirca .
42024040	Shina nishpami maquitapish , chaquitapish ricuchirca .
42024041	Ashtahuanpish , paicuna yallita cushicuihuan cashpa , pai cashcata manarac cricpimi , Jesusca : — ¿ Manachu micunata caipi charinguichic ? — nirca .
42024042	Chaimantami asha challua cusashcahuan , asha abeja mishquihuan curcacuna .
42024043	Chaita japishpami , paicunapac ñaupallapitacmi micurca .
42024044	Micushca quipaca , Jesusca : — Ñucaca cancunahuan cashparacmi , Moisés mandashcacunapipish , Dios ima nishcata huillaccuna quillcashcacunapipish , Salmocunapipish ñucamanta huillashcacuna pactachunmi , chashnaca tucurca — nishpa huillarca .
42024045	Chai ratomi paicunapac yuyaita cushpa , Dios quillcachishcata alli entendichirca .
42024046	Chashna entendichishpaca : — Dios quillcachishcapica chashnami nicun . Shinaca Cristoca huañunami carca . Huañushpapish quimsa punzhapica huañushcacunapuramanta causarinami carca .
42024047	Chai shinami , Jerusalén pueblomanta callarishpa , tucui llactacunapi juchayuc cashcamanta llaquirishpa , paipac shutipi Diosman cuti richun huillashca cana can .
42024048	Cai tucui imalla tucushcata ricuccunami canguichic .
42024049	Ñuca Taita cachasha nishca Espirituta cancunapacmanca cachashami . Jahua pachamanta poderta cachangacaman cai Jerusalén pueblollapitac shuyanguichic — nirca .
42024050	Chai quipaca Jesusca Betania pueblo cuchuman paicunataca pushashpami paicunapac jahuapi maquicunata alzashpa , Dios bendiciachun nishpa mañarca .
42024051	Chashna mañashpa paicunamanta anchurishpaca , jahua pachaman Dios apacpimi chingarircalla .
42024052	Paicunaca Jesusta “ sumacmari cangui ” nishca quipaca , yallita cushicushpami Jerusalenman cutircacuna .
42024053	Chashna cutimushpaca , paicunaca Diosta mañana huasipimi punzhanta Diosta “ allimari cangui ” nicurca .
43001001	Callarillapitacmi , Rimashca Shimica ña tiyarca . Rimashca Shimica Dios-huanmi carca . Shinallatac Rimashca Shimica Diosllatacmi carca .
43001002	Paica callarimanta pachami Dios-huan carca .
43001003	Paillahuantacmi Diosca tucuita ruhuarca . Mana paihuan ruhuashcaca imatapish mana tiyanchu .
43001004	Paimantami causaica tiyarca . Chai causaimi gentecunapac Achicyachic carca .
43001005	Chai Achicyachicmi amsapi achicyachicun . Amsaca chai achictaca mana amsayachinchu .
43001006	Diosca Juan shuti runatami cacharca .
43001007	Paimi tucui gentecuna crichun , Achicyachicmanta huillangapac shamurca .
43001008	Mana Juanchu achicyachicca carca , ashtahuanpish Achicyachicmanta huillangapacmi shamurca .
43001009	Chai Achicyachicmi tucui gentecunata achicyachingapac cai pachaman shamurca .
43001010	Chai Rimashca Shimica cai pachapimi carca . Diosca chai Rimashca Shimihuanmi cai pachataca ruhuarca . Chashna cacpipish , cai pachapi causaccunaca paitaca mana ricsircachu .
43001011	Paipac gentecunapacmanmi shamurca . Ashtahuanpish paipac gentecunaca mana chasquircachu .
43001012	Paita chasquishpa , paita criccunataca , Diospac huahuacuna tucuchunmi chasquin .
43001013	Mana runacunapac munaimanta , mana cai pachapi huacharishcamantachu Diospac huahuacuna tucun , ashtahuanpish Diospac munaimantami paipac huahuacuna tucun .
43001014	Chai Rimashca Shimillatacmi runa tucushpa , ñucanchic-huan causarca . Paica yallita cuyac , cashcata nicmi . Paica Diospac shuclla Churi cashpami , yalli poderyuc carca . Chashna cactami ricurcanchic .
43001015	Juan paimanta huillashpaca : « Ñucaca : “ Ñucapac quipa shamucca ñuca manarac tiyacpimi tiyarca . Chaimantami ñucata atishpa ashtahuan poderyuc ” nishpa huillarcani . Chai huillashca runami caica » nishpa sinchita rimarca .
43001016	Pai Taitapac Churi cashcacunamantami ñucanchicca catinta catinta allicunata chasquicunchic .
43001017	Diosca , pai mandashcacunata ricuchichunca , Moisestami cacharca . Ashtahuanpish Dios cuyac , cashcata nic cashcataca , Jesucristo cachashpami ricuchirca .
43001018	Diostaca jaicapi pi mana ricushcachu . Ashtahuanpish Dios-huan causac , paipac shuclla Churimi Dios ima shina cashcataca ricsichirca . Paica Diosllatacmi .
43001019	Juan pi cashcata yachangapacmi Jerusalén pueblomanta curacunatapish , curacunata ayudac levitacunatapish tapuchun cacharca .
43001020	Shina tapucpi , Juanca mana pacashpa huillashpaca : — Ñucaca mana Cristochu cani — nirca .
43001021	Cutinllatac tapushpaca : — Shinashpaca , ¿ pitac cangui ? ¿ Huillac Eliaschu cangui ? — nirca . Shina nicpimi Juanca : — Mana paichu cani — nirca . Shina nicpica , paicunaca : — Shinashpaca , ¿ shamuna cashca Dios ima nishcata huillacchu cangui ? — nirca . Shina nicpimi Juanca : — Mana — nirca .
43001022	Shina nicpimi paicunaca : — Shinashpaca , ¿ pitac cangui ? Ñucanchicca tapuchun cachaccunaman huillanami canchic . Canllamantaca , ¿ imatatac ningui ? — nirca .
43001023	Shina nicpimi Juanca : — Dios ima nishca huillac Isaiasca : “ Quishpichic shamuna ñanta derechaichic ” nishpa , shitashca pambapi caparicuc shinami cani — nirca .
43001024	Tapuchun cashcacunaca Fariseocunami carca .
43001025	Paicuna tapushpaca : — Cristopish , Eliaspish , Dios ima nishcata huillacpish , mana cashpaca , ¿ ima nishpatac bautizacungui ? — nirca .
43001026	Shina nicpimi Juanca : — Ñucaca yacullahuanmi bautizacuni , ashtahuanpish cancunapac chaupipimi cancunapish mana ricsishca shuc runa tiyan .
43001027	Paica quipatami shamunga . Ñucaca paipac ushuta huatashcallatapish mana pascaipacmi cani — nirca .
43001028	Tucui caicunaca , Jordán yacumanta inti llucshina lado Betania llactapi Juan bautizacucpimi tucurca .
43001029	Cayandi punzhami Juanca Jesús paipacman chayamucucta ricurca . Chaimantami Juanca : « Paimi gentecunapac juchacunata anchuchichun , Dios cachashca Pactalla Ovejaca .
43001030	Paimantami ñucaca : “ Ñucapac quipa shamucca ñuca manarac tiyacpimi ña tiyarca . Pai ñucata atishpa poderyucmi ” nircani .
43001031	Ñucapish chai shamuc pai cashcataca mana yacharcanichu . Chaimantami israelcuna utca pai cashcata yachachun , yacuhuan bautizarcani » nirca .
43001032	Cutinllatac Juanca : « Diospac Espíritu jahuamanta paloma shina shamushpa , paipi tiyarictami ricurcani .
43001033	Chashna ricushpapish , shamuc pai cashcataca mana yacharcanichu . Ashtahuanpish yacuhuan bautizachun cachac Diosca : “ Maijanpi ñuca Espíritu shamushpa tiyaricta ricungui , chaimi ñuca Espirituhuanca bautizanga ” nirca .
43001034	Chaitaca ñucami ricurcani . Chaimantami : “ Paica Diospac Churimi ” nishpa , huillacuni » nirca .
43001035	Cayandi punzhaca cutinmi Juanca paipac yachacuccunahuan carca .
43001036	Jesús chaita pasacucta ricushpami Juanca : « Paimi Dios cachashca Pactalla Ovejaca » nirca .
43001037	Juanpac ishcai yachacuccuna chaita uyashpaca , Jesusta catishpa rircami .
43001038	Jesús chashna caticta tigrarishpa ricushpaca : — ¿ Imatatac mashcacunguichic ? — nirca . Shina nicpimi paicunaca : — Rabí , ¿ maipitac causangui ? — nirca . ( « Rabí » nishpaca , « Yachachic » nisha ninmi ) .
43001039	Shina nicpimi Jesusca : — Ricungapac shamuichic — nirca . Chashna rishpami , pai maipi causacta ricurcacuna . Ña chuscu horas chishi shinamantaca tutacamanmi chaipi paihuan carcacuna .
43001040	Juan rimashcata uyashpa , Jesusta catishpa ric chai ishcai yachacuccunaca , shucca Simón Pedropac huauqui Andresmi carca .
43001041	Andresca paipac huauqui Simonhuanracmi tupangapac rirca . Shina rishpaca : — Ñami Mesias-huan tuparcanchic — nirca . ( “ Mesías ” nishpaca , “ Quishpichic Cristo ” nisha ninmi ) .
43001042	Andresmi Simontaca Jesuspacman pusharca . Chashna pushacpi , Jesús Simonta ricushpaca : — Juanpac churi Simonmi cangui . Cunanmantaca Cefas shutimi cangui — nirca . ( “ Cefas ” nishpaca , “ Pedro ” nisha ninmi ) .
43001043	Jesusca cayandi punzhaca Galilea llactaman rinatami yuyarirca . Pai ricushpa , Felipehuan tupashpaca : — Ñucata cati — nirca .
43001044	Felipeca Betsaida pueblomantami carca . Chai pueblollamantatacmi Andrespish , Pedropish carca .
43001045	Felipe Natanaelta mashcangapac rishpa , paihuan tupashpaca : — Moisés mandashcacunapi quillcashpa huillashca , Dios ima nishcata huillaccuna quillcashca ñucanchic shuyacushca runahuanmi tuparcanchic . Paica Nazaret pueblomanta Josepac churi Jesusmi — nirca .
43001046	Shina nicpimi Natanaelca : — Nazaret pueblomantaca , ¿ ima allitac llucshingachu ? — nirca . Shina nicpimi Felipeca : — Canllatac shamui , ricungui — nirca .
43001047	Jesús , Natanael cuchuyacta ricushpaca : — Israel runatacmi shamushpa caipi can . Paica jaicapi mana llullanchu — nirca .
43001048	Shina nicpimi Natanaelca : — ¿ Ima shinatac ñucata ricsingui ? — nirca . Shina nicpimi Jesusca : — Can higo yura ucupi cacpi , Felipe manarac cayacpimi , cantaca ña ricurcani — nirca .
43001049	Shina nicpimi Natanaelca : — ¡ Yachachic , canca Diospac Churimi cangui , israelcunata Jatun Mandacpishmi cangui ! — nirca .
43001050	Shina nicpimi Jesusca : — ¿ Ñuca : “ Higo yura ucupi cacllapitacmi ña ricurcani ” nicllapichu cringui ? Ashtahuanpish chaimanta yallitami ricungui — nirca .
43001051	Shinallatac Jesusca : — Jahua pacha pascarictapish , Diospac angelcuna Runa Tucungapac shamushca ñucapac jahuata huichicucta , uricuctami ricunguichic . Chaica chashnatacmi canga — nirca .
43002001	Quimsa punzha quipaca , Galilea llacta Caná pueblopimi shuc boda tiyarca . Chaipimi Jesuspac mamapish carca .
43002002	Chai bodamanmi Jesustapish , paipac yachacuccunatapish cayarca .
43002003	Chai bodapi vino tucuricpimi , Jesuspac mamaca : — Vino tucurishcami — nirca .
43002004	Shina nicpimi Jesusca : — Mamita , ¿ ima nishpatac chashna ningui ? Ñuca pi cashcata ricsichina horasca manarac chayamunchu — nirca .
43002005	Shina nicpimi , mamaca serviccunataca : — Tucui pai nishcata ruhuanguichic — nirca .
43002006	Chaipica , israelcuna yacuta jundachishpa chuyayana sucta rumi tinajacunami tiyarca . Chai tinajacunaca ishcai puñu yalli yacutami apac carca .
43002007	Jesusca chai tinajacunapi , yacuta jundachichunmi serviccunata mandarca . Paicunaca tinaja shimicamanmi jundachirca .
43002008	Chaimantami Jesusca : — Cunanca , ashata llucchishpa , mizapi serviccunaman cuichic — nirca . Paicunaca serviccunaman aparcami .
43002009	Shina apacpi , yacumanta ruhuashca vinota mizapi servic mallishpaca , maimanta llucchishcata mana yacharcachu , ashtahuanpish yacuta tinajapi jundachic serviccunallami yacharca . Mizapi servic noviota cayashpaca :
43002010	— Pipish alli vinotaracmi ubiachin . Ña yallita ubiashca quipami , yangalla vinotaca ubian . Chashna cashpapish , canca alli vinotami cunancaman huacaichishpa charicushcangui — nirca .
43002011	Galilea llacta Caná pueblopimi Jesusca milagrota ruhuai callarirca . Chaipimi paica poderyuc cashcata ricuchirca . Chashna ruhuacpimi , paipac yachacuccunaca Diosmanta shamushca cashcata crircacuna .
43002012	Chai quipami , Jesusca paipac mamahuan , huauquicunahuan , yachacuccunahuan Capernaúm puebloman rirca . Chaipica , tauca punzhatami carca .
43002013	Israelcunapac Pascua fiesta ña chayamucucpimi , Jesusca Jerusalén puebloman rirca .
43002014	Chaiman chayashpaca , Diosta mañana huasipi huagrata , ovejata , palomata catucucta , shinallatac cullquita cambiacuctami ricurca .
43002015	Chaita ricushpaca , anguta patarishpami chaipi catuccunataca ovejandi , huagrandi tucui llucchishpa cacharca . Cullquita cambiaccunatapish , mizacunata tigrachishpami shic-huarca .
43002016	Shinallatac palomata catuccunataca : — ¡ Caicunata caimanta llucchichic ! ¡ Ñuca Taitapac huasitaca ama randina , catuna huasita ruhuaichicchu ! — nirca .
43002017	Chaimantami Jesuspac yachacuccunaca : “ Diosta mañana huasitaca yallitami cuyani ” nishpa , Dios quillcachishcapi David nishcata yuyarirca .
43002018	Jesús chashna ruhuacpica , maijan mandac israelcunaca : — Canta cai tucuita ruhuachun Dios cachashcata ricungapacca , ¿ ima milagrotatac ruhuashpa ricuchingui ? — nirca .
43002019	Chashna nicpimi Jesusca : — Diosta mañana huasita urmachishpa saquichic . Quimsa punzhapica cutin shayachishallami — nirca .
43002020	Shina nicpimi mandac israelcunaca : — Cai huasitaca chuscu chunga sucta huatapimi shayachirca . ¿ Maitatac quimsa punzhallapi shayachinguiyari ? — nirca .
43002021	Diosta mañana huasimanta Jesús nishpaca , paillamantatacmi nicurca .
43002022	Chaimantami paipac yachacuccunaca Jesús causaricpica , pai chashna nishcata yuyarishpa Dios quillcachishcatapish , Jesús ima nishcatapish crircacuna .
43002023	Pascua fiesta punzhacunapimi , Jesusca Jerusalén pueblopi milagrocunata ruhuarca . Chashna ruhuacta ricushpami , achcacuna paita crirca .
43002024	Chashna cacpipish , paicunapac shungu imata yuyacushcata yachashpami , Jesusca paicunataca mana crirca .
43002025	Jesusca gentecuna imata yuyacushcataca pi mana huillacpipish ña yacharcami . Gentecunapac shungu imata yuyacushcataca tucuitami yacharca .
43003001	Fariseocunapuramanta Nicodemo shuti runami tiyarca . Paica israelcunapurapica mandacmi carca .
43003002	Pai Jesuspacman tuta rishpaca : — Yachachic , canca Dios cachashca yachanchicmi . Pipish can ruhuacuc shina , milagrocunataca mana Dios-huan cashpaca , mana ruhuanmanchu — nirca .
43003003	Shina nicpimi Jesusca : — Maijanpish mana cutin huacharicca , Dios mandacuctaca mana ricungachu . Chaica chashnatacmi canga — nirca .
43003004	Shina nicpimi Nicodemoca : — ¿ Ima shinatac runaca cutin huacharingayari ? ¿ Maitatac cutin mamapac huicsapi yaicushpa huacharingayari ? — nirca .
43003005	Shina nicpimi Jesusca : — Maijanpish yacumanta , Diospac Espiritumanta mana huacharicca , Dios mandacucmanca manatac yaicungachu . Chaica chashnatacmi canga .
43003006	Aichamanta huacharicca , aichami can . Ashtahuanpish Espiritumanta huacharicca , Espiritumi can .
43003007	Ama ñuca : “ Cutin huacharinami can ” nishcamanta mancharichu .
43003008	Huairaca maimanta cashpapish pucunllami . Shina pucucpi uyashpapish , maimanta shamuctapish , maiman rictapish mana yachanguichu . Shinallatacmi Diospac Espiritumanta huachariccunaca — nirca .
43003009	Shina nicpimi Nicodemoca : — ¿ Ima shinatac chashnaca tucunyari ? — nirca .
43003010	Shina nicpimi Jesusca : — Canca israelcunata yachachicmi cangui . ¿ Chashna cashca jahuachu caita mana yachangui ?
43003011	Ñucanchicca imatapish yachashcatami ninchic , imata ricushcatami huillanchic . Ñucanchic huillashcataca mana cringuichicchu . Chaica chashnatacmi can .
43003012	Cai pachapi ima tiyashcamanta huillacpi mana crishpaca , ¿ ima shinatac jahua pachamanta huillacpica cringuichicyari ?
43003013	Jahua pachamanca pi mana rishcachu , ashtahuanpish Runa Tucungapac shamushca ñucallami jahua pachamanta shamurcani . Ñucami jahua pachapi causacca cani .
43003014	Ima shinami Moisés shitashca pambapi broncemanta ruhuashca culebrata caspipi huarcushpa ricuchirca , shinallatacmi Runa Tucungapac shamushca ñucapish , caspipi huarcushca cana cani .
43003015	Chaica , maijanpish ñucata cricca huiñai causaita charichunmi , chashnaca cana cani .
43003016	Diosca cai pachapi causaccunata yallita cuyashpami , paipac shuclla Churita cai pachaman cacharca . Pipish paita cricca ama chingarichun , ashtahuanpish huiñai causaita charichunmi , chashnaca cacharca .
43003017	Diosca mana cai pachapi causaccunata llaquiman cachachunchu paipac churitaca cacharcachu , ashtahuanpish cai pachapi causaccunata quishpichichunmi cacharca .
43003018	Maijanpish Diospac Churita cricca mana llaqui pachaman ringachu , ashtahuanpish paipac shuclla Churita mana cricmi , pai mana crishcamanta llaqui pachaman ringa .
43003019	Paicunapac mana alli ruhuacushcacuna ama ricurichunmi Achicyachic shamucpica , mana munashpa amsapi causanallata ashtahuan munarca . Chaimantami juchanchishca canga .
43003020	Tucui mana allita ruhuaccunaca , paicunapac mana allita ruhuashcacuna ama achicman ricurichunmi , Achicyachictaca piñancuna .
43003021	Cashcata ruhuashpa causaccunaca , Diosllatac ruhuachicushcata yachachunmi , achicman cuchuyancunalla — nirca .
43003022	Chai quipami , Jesusca paipac yachacuccunahuan Judea llactaman rirca . Tauca punzhacunata paicunahuan cashpami , gentecunata bautizarca .
43003023	Juanpish chai punzhacunallapitacmi , Salim llacta cuchulla Enón llactapi , chaipi achca yacu tiyashcamanta bautizacurca . Chaipimi paipacman shamuc gentecunata bautizacurca .
43003024	Juantaca manarac carcelpi churarcachu .
43003025	Chaipimi Juanpac maijan caticcunahuan , maijancunaca , Israel shuc runahuan chuyayanamanta rimanacurca .
43003026	Chaimanta Juanpacman rishpaca : — Yachachic , Jordán yacu chimbapi canhuan tupanacuc , chai can parlacuc runami bautizacun . Achca gentecunami paipacmanca shamucun — nirca .
43003027	Chaimantami Juanca : — Dios mana cucpica , pipish imata mana chasqui pudinchu .
43003028	Ñuca : “ Ñucaca mana Cristochu cani , ashtahuanpish paipac ñaupata cachashcallami cani ” nishpa huillashcata , cancunallatacmi uyarcanguichic .
43003029	Shuc bodapica , noviaca noviopacmi . Noviopac ricsishcaca , novio rimashcata uyashpaca cushicunmi . Shinallatacmi ñucapish Novio rimashcata uyashpaca , yallita cushicuni .
43003030	Paica punzhantami ashtahuan alli nishca cana can . Ashtahuanpish ñucaca punzhantami yangalla nishca cana cani — nirca .
43003031	Jahua pachamanta shamucmi tucuita yallica . Cai pachamanta cacca cai pachapi causaccuna shinallami . Chaimantami cai pachallamanta riman . Ashtahuanpish jahua pachamanta shamucmi tucuita yallica .
43003032	Paica imatapish ricushcacunallata , imatapish uyashcacunallatami huillan . Shina cacpipish , pai huillashcataca pi mana crinchu .
43003033	Maijanllapish pai huillashcata chasquicca , Diosca cashcata nic cashcatami ricuchin .
43003034	Dios cachashcami , Dios rimashcata riman . Diosca yallitami paipac Espirituta cushca .
43003035	Diosca paipac Churita yallitami cuyan . Chaimantami tucuita pai mandachun cushca .
43003036	Maijanpish paita cricca huiñai causaitami charin . Maijanpish paita mana cricca mana huiñai causaita charinchu , ashtahuanpish paitaca Diosca piñacungallami .
43004001	Fariseocunaca : « Jesusca Juanta atishpami tauca caticcunata charin , shinallatac bautizacun » nishpami puricurca .
43004002	( Jesusca mana bautizacchu carca , ashtahuanpish paipac yachacuccunami bautizac carca ) .
43004003	Fariseocuna chashna nicucta yachashpami , Jesusca Judea llactamantaca Galilea llactaman cutishpa rirca .
43004004	Chaiman rishpaca , Samaria llactatami pasana carca .
43004005	Chashna ricushpami , Samaria llacta Sicar puebloman chayarca . Chai puebloca Jacobo paipac churi Joseman cushca allpa ladopimi carca .
43004006	Chaipimi Jacobopac yacu junduca tiyarca . Chaupi punzha shina cacpimi , Jesusca shaicushpa , yacu jundu cuchupi tiyarirca .
43004007	Chaimanmi Samaria llactamanta huarmi yacuta apangapac chayarca . Chaipimi Jesusca : — Ashalla yacuta carai — nirca .
43004008	Chai horasca paipac yachacuccunaca micunata randingapacmi puebloman rishca carca .
43004009	Samaria huarmica Jesustaca : — ¿ Ima shinatac canca israelcunapura cashca jahua ñucaman yacuta mañangui ? Ñucaca Samaria huarmimi cani — nirca . ( Israelcunaca Samaria llactapi causaccunahuanca mana apanacucchu carca ) .
43004010	Shina nicpimi Jesusca : — Canca Dios imata cusha nicushcatapish , pi yacuta mañacuctapish mana yachanguichu . Yachashpaca , canracmi : “ Yacuta carai ” ninguiman . Chashna mañacpica , causaita cuc yacutami cuiman — nirca .
43004011	Shina nicpimi , chai huarmica : — Amito , yacu jundupish ucumi . Imahuan llucchinatapish mana charinguichu . ¿ Ima shinatac causaita cuc yacutaca cunguiyari ?
43004012	Cai yacu jundutaca ñucanchic taita Jacobomi saquirca . Caimantami paipish , paipac huahuacunapish , paipac animalcunapish ubiac carca . ¿ Canca taita Jacobota yallichu cangui ? — nirca .
43004013	Shina nicpimi Jesusca : — Maijanpish cai jundumanta yacuta ubiacca , cutin yacunayachingami .
43004014	Ashtahuanpish maijanpish ñuca cushca yacuta ubiacca , jaicapi mana yacunayachingachu . Ñuca cushca yacuca paipica huiñai causaita cuc , tucyacuc yacu shinami canga — nirca .
43004015	Shina nicpimi , chai huarmica : — Amito , ama cutin cai jundumanta yacuta apac shamungapac , ama cutin yacunayachingapac chai yacuta cuiyari — nirca .
43004016	Shina nicpimi Jesusca : — Ri , cambac cusata cayamugri — nirca .
43004017	Shina nicpimi , chai huarmica : — Ñucaca mana cusayucchu cani — nirca . Shina nicpimi Jesusca : — Can : “ Mana cusayucchu cani ” nishpaca , allitami nishcangui .
43004018	Canca pichca cusatami charircangui . Cunan canhuan causacucca mana cambac cusachu . Shina nishpaca , mana llullashcanguichu — nirca .
43004019	Shina nicpimi , chai huarmica : — Amito , canca Dios ima nishcata huillacmi yuyachingui .
43004020	Ñucanchic ñaupa taitacunaca cai urcupimi Diosta mañac carca . Cutin cancunaca “ Jerusalenpimi Diosta mañana canchic ” ninguichicmi — nirca .
43004021	Jesusca chai huarmitaca : — Mana cai urcullapi , mana Jerusalenllapi Diosta mañana punzhacuna chayamucunmi . Chaitaca crinami cangui .
43004022	Cancunaca pita mañacushcata mana yachanguichicchu . Ñucanchicca pita mañacushcataca yachanchicmi . Diosca israelcunapuramantami Quishpichicta cachasha nishca .
43004023	Diosta ima shina mañana cashca shina mañana punzhacuna chayamucunmi , cunanllatacmi chai punzhaca . Diospac Espíritu yuyaita cucpimi , Dios ima shina cashcata yachashpa mañanga . Chashna mañaccunatami Diosca munan .
43004024	Diosca Espiritumi . Chaimantami paita mañacca Diospac Espíritu yuyaita cucpi , ima shina mañana cashca shina mañancuna — nirca .
43004025	Shina nicpimi , chai huarmica : — Cristo nishca Mesías shamuna cashcataca yachanimi . Pai shamushpami , tucuita alli huillanga — nirca .
43004026	Shina nicpimi Jesusca : — Chaica , canhuan parlacucllatacmi cani — nirca .
43004027	Shina ratomi paipac yachacuccunaca shamurca . Jesús chai huarmihuan parlacucta ricushpami mancharirca . Chashna cacpipish pi : « ¿ Imatatac tapucungui ? ¿ Imatatac chai huarmihuanca parlacungui ? » nishpaca , mana tapurcachu .
43004028	Chai huarmi puñuta chaipi saquishpa , puebloman cutishpa , chaipi causaccunataca :
43004029	— Shamuichic , shuc runata ricunguichic . Paica tucui ñuca imata ruhuashpa causacushcatami huillan . ¿ Manachu paica Cristo canga ? — nirca .
43004030	Chaimantami gentecunaca chai pueblomantaca Jesus-huan tupangapac shamurca .
43004031	Chai gentecuna manarac chayamucpimi , Jesuspac yachacuccunaca : — Yachachic , micuiyari — nirca .
43004032	Shina nicpimi Jesusca : — Ñucaca cancuna mana ricsishca micunatami charini — nirca .
43004033	Shina nicpimi yachacuccunaca : — ¿ Pishi micunata carashca canga ? — ninacurca .
43004034	Shina nicpimi Jesusca : — Ñuca micunaca , ñucata cachac Diospac munaita ruhuanami , pai imata ruhuachun nishcata tucuchinami .
43004035	¿ Manachu cancunaca : “ Chuscu quillami cosechangapacca faltan ” nicunguichic ? Ashtahuanpish ñucaca : Chagrata alli ricushpaca , cosechanalla cashcata ricuichic , ninimi .
43004036	Granota tandacca , pagota charinmi . Chai tandashca granoca huiñai causaipacmi . Chaimantami granota tandacca tarpuc-huan cushicunga .
43004037	Gentecuna nishca shinaca shucca tarpun , shucca cosechanmi . Chaica chashnatacmi .
43004038	Ñucaca , mana cancuna trabajashca chagrata cosechachunmi cachani . Shuccunami llaquita apashpa trabajarca . Shina cacpipish , cancunami chai trabajashcamantaca japinguichic — nirca .
43004039	Chai huarmi : « Ñuca imata ruhuashpa causacushcatami huillan » nishcata uyashpami , Samaria llacta pueblopi causaccunaca Jesusta crircacuna .
43004040	Chaimantami gentecuna Jesuspacman shamushpa chaipi saquirichun mañarca . Shina mañacpimi , Jesusca ishcai punzhata chaipi saquirirca .
43004041	Jesús ima nishcata uyashpacarin , achca gentecunami crirca .
43004042	Chaimantami chai huarmitaca : — Cunancarin mana can huillashcallamantachu crinchic , ashtahuanpish ñucanchicllatacmi pai ima nishcataca uyashcanchic . Chaimantami cai pachapi causaccunata quishpichingapac shamushcata yachanchic — nirca .
43004043	Jesús Samaria llactapi ishcai punzhata cashpaca , Galilea llactamanmi rirca .
43004044	Chaica , Jesusllatacmi : “ Dios ima nishcata huillactaca quiquin llactaca mana alli chasquishcachu canga ” nishpa huillarca .
43004045	Galilea llactapi causaccunapish Pascua fiesta punzhapi Jerusalenman rishpa , tucui imallata ruhuashcata ricurca . Chaimantami , paicunapac llactaman Jesús chayacpica , cushicushpa chasquirca .
43004046	Jesusca Galilea llacta Caná pueblomanmi cutirca . Chai pueblopimi yacumanta vinota ruhuashca carca . Chaipimi jatun mandac churashca mandacpish causarca . Chai mandacpac churimi Capernaúm pueblopi ungushca carca .
43004047	Chai mandacca Jesús Judea llactamanta Galilea llactaman shamushcata yachashpami , ungushpa huañugricuc paipac churita alliyachic shamuchun mañarca .
43004048	Chashna mañacpimi Jesusca : — Milagrocunata ruhuacta manarac ricushpaca , ñucata mana cringuichicchu — nirca .
43004049	Shina nicpimi , chai mandacca : — Amito , utca jacu . Ñuca churi atishpa huañungami — nirca .
43004050	Shina nicpimi Jesusca : — Cutilla , cambac churica ñami alli — nirca . Chai mandacca Jesús nishcata crishpami huasiman cutirca .
43004051	Pai huasiman cuticucpi , paipac serviccuna tupangapac llucshishpaca : — Cambac churica ñami alli tucun — nirca .
43004052	Chashna huillacpimi , mandacca ima horas alli tucushcata tapurca . Chashna tapucpi paicunaca : — Caina chaupi punzha shinatami fiebreca pitirirca — nirca .
43004053	Chaimantami ungushca huahuapac taitaca , chai horasllapitac Jesús : « Cambac churica ñami alli » nishcata yuyarirca . Chaimantami paipish , paipac tucui huasi ucupuracunapish Jesusta crirca .
43004054	Chai ishcai milagrotami Jesusca Judea llactamanta Galilea llactaman shamushca quipa ruhuarca .
43005001	Chai quipaca , israelcunapac fiestami carca . Chaimantami Jesusca Jerusalenman rirca .
43005002	Jerusalenpimi ovejacuna yaicuna pungu ladopimi , shuc cucha tiyarca . Chai cuchaca hebreo rimaipica Betesda shutimi can . Chaimanca pichca pungutami yaicuna carca .
43005003	Chai yaicunapica tauca ungushcacunami tiyac carca . Paicunaca ñahui mana ricuccuna , suchucuna , paralisis ungushcacunami carca .
43005004	Chaica , shuc angelmi jahua pachamanta cuchaman shamushpa , maijan cutinlla yacuta cuyuchic carca . Maijanpish utca yacuman yaicushpami ima ungüimantapish alliyac carca .
43005005	Chaipica , quimsa chunga pusac huatata ungushca shuc runami tiyarca .
43005006	Jesusca chai runata ricushpaca , unai huatacunata ungushca cashcatami yacharca . Chaimantami chai runataca : — ¿ Alliyasha ninguichu ? — nirca .
43005007	Chai ungushca runaca : — Amito , yacuta cuyuchicpi , pi ñucata apacmi mana tiyan . Ñuca yacuman yaicungacamanca shuccunaracmi atishpa yaicun — nirca .
43005008	Shina nicpimi Jesusca : — Jatarishpa , canta huandumushcata apashpa rilla — nirca .
43005009	Chashna nincami , chai runaca alliyashpa , paita huandumushcata apashpa puri callarirca . Chai punzhaca samana punzhami carca .
43005010	Chaimantami mandac israelcunaca chai alliyashca runataca : — Cunanca samana punzhami . Canta huandumushcataca mana apanachu cangui — nirca .
43005011	Shina nicpimi , chai runaca : — Ñucata alliyachicmi : “ Canta huandumushcata apashpa rilla ” nirca . Chaimantami apashpa ricuni — nirca .
43005012	Shina nicpimi paicunaca : — ¿ Pitac : “ Huandumushcata apashpa rilla ” nircayari ? — nirca .
43005013	Alliyashca runaca pi alliyachishcata mana yacharcachu . Chaica , Jesusca achca gentecunapurapimi carca .
43005014	Jesús , Diosta mañana huasipi chai runahuan tupashpaca : — Uyai , ña alliyashcanguimi . Ama ashtahuan juchallinguichu . Pacta ashtahuan llaquita apanguiman — nirca .
43005015	Chai alliyashca runa rishpa , mandac israelcunaman huillashpaca : “ Jesusmi alliyachirca ” nishpami huillarca .
43005016	Samana punzhapi alliyachishcamantami mandac israelcunaca Jesusta piñai callarirca .
43005017	Ashtahuanpish Jesusca : — Ñuca Taitaca cunancamanmi caicunataca ruhuacun . Ñucapish caicunata ruhuacunimi — nirca .
43005018	Chaimantami mandac israelcunaca Jesusta huañuchinata munarca . Mana samana punzhapi alliyachishcallamantachu piñai callarircacuna , ashtahuanpish “ ñuca Taitaca Diosmi ” nishpa Dios tucushcamantami ashtahuan piñashpa , huañuchisha nicurca .
43005019	Chaimantami Jesusca : — Ñucaca Diospac Churi cashpapish , mana quiquin munaimanta ruhuanichu , ashtahuanpish ñuca Taita munashcallatami ruhuani . Imatami ñuca Taita ruhuan , chaitami ñucapish ruhuani . Chaica chashnatacmi can .
43005020	Ñuca Taitaca ñucata cuyashcamantami , tucui pai ruhuacushcata ricuchin . Ashtahuan caicunamanta yalli ruhuashcacunatami ricuchinga . Chaita ricushpaca , mancharishpami saquiringuichic .
43005021	Ima shinami ñuca Taitaca huañushcacunata causachishpa , causaita cun , chashnallatacmi paipac Churi ñucapish maijanman causaita cusha nishpaca cuni .
43005022	Ñuca Taitaca pitapish mana taripangachu , ashtahuanpish ñucatami taripachun churarca .
43005023	Chaica , maijanpish Taitata alli nic shinallatac Churita alli nichunmi chashnaca churarca . Maijanpish Churita mana alli nicca , ñucata cachac Taitami mana alli nin .
43005024	Maijanpish ñuca nishcata uyashpa , ñucata cachac Taitata cricca , huiñai causaita charinmi . Paica huañushcamanta causaiman pasashcamantami , llaquimanca mana ringa . Chaica chashnatacmi can .
43005025	Huañushcacuna Diospac Churi rimashcata uyana pachaca chayamucunmi . Chaita , cunanllatacmi . Chaita uyaccunaca causaita charingami . Chaica chashnatacmi can .
43005026	Ima shinami ñuca Taitaca quiquinllatac causaita charin , chai shinallatac ñucapish causaita cuchunmi cacharca .
43005027	Runa Tucungapac shamushca ñuca paipac Churi cashcamantami , taripachun ñucaman poderta curca .
43005028	Tucui huañushcacuna ñuca rimashcata uyana pachami chayamucunmi . Chaimanta ama cai nishcata uyashcallamanta mancharichicchu .
43005029	Allita ruhuaccunaca causaita japingapacmi causaringacuna , ashtahuanpish mana allita ruhuaccunaca Dios juchanchishca cangapacmi causaringacuna .
43005030	Ñuca munaimantaca imata mana ruhuai pudinichu . Ñucata cachac Taita nishcata uyashpami taripani . Mana ñuca quiquin munaimanta , ashtahuanpish ñuca Taita munaimantami juchanchini . Chaimantami cashcata ruhuashpa juchanchini .
43005031	Ñuca quiquinllamanta huillacucpica , ñuca huillashcaca yangallami canman .
43005032	Ashtahuanpish ñucamanta huillacca , shucmi . Chai huillacca ñuca ima shina cashcatami huillan .
43005033	Cancuna Juanman tapuchun cachacpica , paica mana llullashpami huillarca .
43005034	Mana gentecuna huillashcatachu huillani , ashtahuanpish cancuna quishpirichunmi , pai huillashcata huillani .
43005035	Juan huillashcaca luz achicyachicuc shinami carca . Cancunaca ashacamanllami achicpi canata munarcanguichic .
43005036	Ñuca ruhuashcaca Juan huillashcamanta yallimi ñucamanta huillacun . Ñuca Taita ruhuachun nishcacunallatami ruhuacuni . Chai ruhuashcacunami ñuca Taita pi cashcatapish , ñuca pi cashcatapish ricuchin .
43005037	Ñucata cachac Taitapish ñucamantami huillan . Shina cacpipish , cancunaca jaicapi paitaca mana ricushcanguichicchu , pai rimashcatapish mana uyashcanguichicchu .
43005038	Dios ñucata cachashcatapish mana cringuichicchu , pai huillashcatapish cancunapac shungupica mana charinguichicchu .
43005039	Huiñai causaita japisha nishpami , Dios quillcachishcataca allita ricushpa yachacunguichic . Chai quillcashcacunami ñucamanta huillan .
43005040	Cancunaca huiñai causaita charingapac mana ñucapacman shamushun ninguichicchu .
43005041	Gentecunalla ñucata alli nichunca mana munanichu .
43005042	Ñucaca cancuna Diosta mana cuyac cashcatami yachani .
43005043	Ñuca Taitapac shutipi shamucpipish chasquinguichicchu , ashtahuanpish maijan pai quiquinllamanta shamucpica chasquinguichicmanmi .
43005044	Cancunaca , cancunapura alli ninacunallatami munanguichic , ashtahuanpish shuclla Diospac alli nishca canataca mana munanguichicchu . Shina cashpaca , ¿ ima shinatac ñucataca cringuichicyari ?
43005045	Ñuca Taitapac ñaupapi , ñuca juchanchina cashcataca ama yuyanguichicchu . Ashtahuanpish cancuna shunguta churashpa , shuyacushca Moisesmi juchanchinga .
43005046	Moisés nishcata crishpaca , ñucatapish cringuichicmanmi . Moisesca ñucamantami quillcarca .
43005047	Pai quillcashcata mana crishpaca , ¿ ima shinatac ñuca nishcataca cringuichicyari ? — nirca .
43006001	Chai quipaca , Jesusca Galilea cucha chimba ladomanmi rirca . Chai cuchallatacmi Tiberias shutipish carca .
43006002	Ungushcacunata alliyachishcata ricushpami , achca gentecuna paita catishpa rircacuna .
43006003	Jesusca paipac yachacuccunahuan urcuman rishpami , chaipi tiyarirca .
43006004	Israelcunapac Pascua fiestami chayamurca .
43006005	Jesusca achca gentecuna caticucta ricushpami Felipetaca : — Cai tucui gentecunaman carangapacca , ¿ maipitac micunata randishun ? — nirca .
43006006	Felipe ima nicta uyangapacllami chashnaca nirca , ashtahuanpish Jesusca imata ruhuana cashcataca ña yacharcami .
43006007	Shina nicpimi Felipeca : — Ishcai patsac denario cullquihuan randishca tandapish asha ashallami cai tucui gentecunamanca pactanga — nirca .
43006008	Simón Pedropac huauqui caishuc yachacuc Andresca :
43006009	— Caipimi shuc huambra pichca cebada tandata , ishcai challuata charicun . Caillaca cai tucui gentecunamanca , ¿ imatac pactangayari ? — nirca .
43006010	Shina nicpimi Jesusca : — Gentecunata tiyarichun nichic — nirca . Chaipi tiyariccunaca caricunallami pichca huaranga shinami carca . Chai pambapica achca quihuami tiyarca .
43006011	Jesusca chai tandata japishpa , Diosta pagui nishpaca , yachacuccunamanmi raquichun curca . Challuata japishpapish , chashnallatacmi ruhuarca . Chashna ruhuacpica , mana nictami micurcacuna .
43006012	Gentecuna mana nicta micushca quipami , Jesusca paipac yachacuccunataca : — Ama yangamanta cachun , tucui puchushcacunata tandachichic — nirca .
43006013	Paicuna tandachishpaca , chunga ishcai taza jundatami chai pichca cebada tandamanta puchushcataca tandachirca .
43006014	Jesús chai milagrota ruhuacta gentecuna ricushpaca : « Cai runaca cai pachaman shamuna cashca Dios ima nishcata huillacmi » nirca .
43006015	Jesusca gentecuna jatun mandac cachun pushagricushcata yachashpami , cutinllatac urcupi pailla cangapac rirca .
43006016	Ña tutayamucucpica , cutinllatacmi Jesuspac yachacuccunaca cuchaman shamurca .
43006017	Chaipimi canoapi huichicushpa , Capernaúm puebloman cuchata pasacurca . Ñami tuta carca . Jesusca manarac paicunapacman cutimurcachu .
43006018	Sinchi huaira cacpimi , cucha yacuca yallita cuyuri callarirca .
43006019	Pichca huaranga metro shinata barcopi ricushpami , yachacuccunaca Jesús yacu jahuata purishpa , paicunapacman shamucucta ricurca . Chaita ricushpami , mancharicurca .
43006020	Shina mancharicucpimi Jesusca : — Ama mancharichicchu , ñucami cani — nirca .
43006021	Shina nicpimi , paicunaca cushilla canoapi huichicuchinata munarca . Shina cacpipish , ñami paicuna maiman ricushcamanca chayarca .
43006022	Cayandi punzhaca caishuc ladopi cac gentecunaca chaipi shuclla canoa cashcata , Jesuspish mana paipac yachacuccunahuan rishcatami yachac chayarcacuna .
43006023	Chaimanmi Tiberias pueblomanta canoacuna shamushpa chai yacu patapi shayarirca . Chaipimi Jesusca Diosta pagui nishpa , tandata carashca carca .
43006024	Gentecunaca Jesuspish , paipac yachacuccunapish mana chaipi cacta ricushpami , canoacunapi huichicushpa , Capernaúm pueblopi Jesusta mashcangapac rircacuna .
43006025	Gentecuna yacu cuchata pasashpa Jesus-huan tupashpaca : — Yachachic , ¿ ima horastac caimanca shamurcangui ? — nirca .
43006026	Shina tapucpimi Jesusca : — Cancunaca mana milagrocunata ruhuashcamantachu mashcacunguichic , ashtahuanpish mana nicta micushcallamantami mashcacunguichic . Chaica chashnatacmi can .
43006027	Cancunaca ama chingariclla micunata mashcaichicchu , ashtahuanpish huiñai causaita cuc micunata mashcaichic . Chai micunataca Runa Tucungapac shamushca ñucallami cusha . Chaita cuchunmi Diosca ñucataca cacharca — nirca .
43006028	Shina nicpimi paicunaca : — Dios munashcata ruhuangapacca , ¿ imatatac ruhuana canchic ? — nirca .
43006029	Shina nicpimi Jesusca : — Pai munashcata ruhuanaca , pai cachashca churita crinami — nirca .
43006030	Shina nicpimi paicunaca : — Ñucanchic ricushpa canta crichunca , ¿ ima milagrotatac ruhuashpa ricuchinguiyari ?
43006031	Ñucanchic ñaupa taitacunaca maná tandatami shitashca pambapi micurca . Dios quillcachishcapica : “ Jahua pacha tandatami cararca ” ninmi — nirca .
43006032	Shina nicpimi Jesusca : — Moisesca mana jahua pacha tandatachu curca , ashtahuanpish ñuca Taitami jahua pachamantatac tandata cun . Chaica chashnatacmi can .
43006033	Dios cushca tandaca jahua pachamanta shamucmi . Chai tandami cai pachapi causaccunaman huiñai causaita cun — nirca .
43006034	Chaimantami paicunaca : — Shinashpaca , chai tandata punzhanta caraiyari — nirca .
43006035	Shina nicpimi Jesusca : — Ñucami huiñai causaita cuc tandaca cani . Maijanpish ñucapacman shamucca manatac yarcachingachu . Maijanpish ñucata cricca manatac yacunayachingachu .
43006036	Ña nishca shina , ñucata ricushpapish , mana cringuichicchu .
43006037	Tucui ñuca Taita cushcacunami ñucapacman shamun . Chai shamuccunataca manatac cutichishpa cachashachu .
43006038	Mana ñuca munashcata ruhuangapacchu jahua pachamanta shamurcani , ashtahuanpish ñucata cachac Taita munashcata ruhuangapacmi shamurcani .
43006039	Ñucata cachac Taitaca tucui ñucaman cushcacunata shucllatapish mana chingachishpa , tucuri punzhapi causachichunmi munan .
43006040	Taitaca paipac Churita maijanpish ricushpa crishpaca , huiñai causaita charichunmi munan . Ñucami tucuri punzhapi paicunataca causachisha — nirca .
43006041	Jesús : « Ñucami jahua pachamanta shamushca tandaca cani » nishcamantami , israelcunaca Jesusta piñai callarircacuna .
43006042	Shina piñarishpaca : — ¿ Caica manachu Josepac churi Jesús ? Paipac taita mamatapish ricsinchicmi . ¿ Imamantatac : “ jahua pachamantami shamurcani ” ninyari ? — ninacurca .
43006043	Chaimantami Jesusca : — Ama huashalla rimanacuichicchu .
43006044	Ñucata cachac Taita mana pushamucpica , pi ñucapacman mana shamunchu . Chai shamuccunataca tucuri punzhapi causachishami .
43006045	Dios ima nishcata huillaccuna quillcashcapica : “ Tucuimi Dios yachachishca canga ” nin . Chaimantami , maijanpish Dios ima nishcata uyashpa , paimanta yachacucca , ñucapacman shamunga .
43006046	Pipish Diosta mana ricushcachu , ashtahuanpish paipacmanta shamushca ñucallami ricurcani .
43006047	Maijanpish ñucata cricca , huiñai causaitami charin . Chaica chashnatacmi can .
43006048	Ñucami causaita cuc tandaca cani .
43006049	Cancunapac ñaupa taitacunaca shitashca pambapimi maná tandata micurca . Shina micushpapish huañurcacunami .
43006050	Caimi jahua pachamanta shamushca tandaca . Maijanpish cai tandamanta micucca mana huañungachu .
43006051	Ñucami jahua pachamanta shamushca , causaita cuc tandaca cani . Maijanpish cai tandata micucca , huiñaita causangami . Cai tandaca ñuca quiquin aichami . Chaitaca cai pachapi causaccuna huiñai causaita charichunmi cusha — nirca .
43006052	Chaimanta israelcuna paicunapura rimanacushpaca : — ¿ Ima shinatac paipac quiquin aichataca carangayari ? — ninacurca .
43006053	Shina nicpimi Jesusca : — Runa Tucungapac shamushca ñuca aichata cancuna mana micushpa , ñuca yahuarta mana ubiashpaca , mana causaita charinguichicchu . Chaica chashnatacmi can .
43006054	Maijanpish ñuca aichata micucca , ñuca yahuarta ubiacca , huiñai causaita charinmi . Ñucami tucuri punzhapica causachisha .
43006055	Chaimanta ñuca aichami micunatac can , ñuca yahuarmi ubianatac can .
43006056	Maijanpish ñuca aichata micucca , ñuca yahuarta ubiacca , ñucahuanmi causan . Ñucapish paihuanmi causani .
43006057	Ñucata cachac Taitaca causaiyucmi . Chaimantami ñucaca paimanta causani . Ñuca aichata micucca , ñucamantami causanga .
43006058	Caimi jahua pachamanta shamushca tandaca . Cai tandaca mana cancunapac ñaupa taitacuna micushca maná tanda shinachu . Paicunaca chai tandata micushpapish huañurcami . Maijanpish cai tandata micucca , huiñai causaitami charinga — nirca .
43006059	Jesusca caicunatami Capernaúm pueblo , israelcuna tandanacuna huasipica yachachirca .
43006060	Jesús chashna yachachishcata tauca paita caticcuna uyashpaca : — Cai yachachishcacunaca sinchimi . ¿ Pitac caitaca entendingayari ? — ninacurca .
43006061	Chashna nishcamanta , huashalla parlanacucucta Jesús yachashpaca : — ¿ Cai nishcaca llaquichinchu ?
43006062	Runa Tucungapac shamushca ñuca ñaupa maipi cashcaman ricta ricushpaca , ¿ imashi tucunguichic ?
43006063	Diospac Espiritumi causaita cun . Gentecunallaca imata ruhuai pudinchu . Tucui ñuca nishcacunaca , causaita cuc Diospac Espiritumantami .
43006064	Shina cacpipish , cancunapuramanta maijancunaca mana cringuichicchu — nirca . Jesusca utcamanmi maijanlla paita mana crigricushcatapish , maijan japichigricushcatapish yacharca . Chaimantami chashna nirca .
43006065	Shinallatac Jesusca : — Chaimantami ñucaca : “ Taita mana pushamucpica , pi mana ñucapacman shamungachu ” nishpa , yachachircani — nirca .
43006066	Chaimanta pachami Jesusta caticcunaca caruyashpa , mana Jesus-huan purirca .
43006067	Chaimantami Jesusca chunga ishcai yachacuccunataca : — ¿ Cancunapish shitashpa rishun ninguichicchu ? — nirca .
43006068	Shina nicpimi , Simón Pedroca : — Apunchic Jesús , ¿ pipacmantac rishunyari ? Cambac rimashca shimicunaca , huiñai causaita cucmi .
43006069	Ñucanchicca cantaca crishcanchicmi . Dios cachashca Jucha Illac cashcatapish yachanchicmi — nirca .
43006070	Shina nicpimi Jesusca : — ¿ Manachu cancunataca chunga ishcaita acllarcani ? Shina cacpipish , cancunapuramanta shucca diablohuanmi — nirca .
43006071	Chashna nishpaca , Simón Iscariotepac churi Judasmantami Jesusca nicurca . Paica chunga ishcai yachacuccunapuramantami carca . Paimi quipata Jesusta japichirca .
43007001	Chai quipaca , Jesusca Galilea llactapimi puricurca . Mandac israelcuna huañuchishun nishcamantami , Judea llactapi canataca mana munarca .
43007002	Israelcunapac chuclla ruhuana fiesta punzhacunami chayamucurca .
43007003	Jesuspac huauquicunaca Jesustaca : — Ama caipi caichu , canta caticcuna can imalla ruhuashcata ricuchun , Judea llactaman ri .
43007004	Maijanpish gentecunaman ricsichisha nishpaca , mana pacallapi imatapish ruhuanchu . Shuctac llacta gentecunamanpish milagrota ruhuashpa ricuchiyari — nirca .
43007005	Quiquin huauquicunapish Jesusta mana crircacunachu . Chaimantami Jesusca :
43007006	— Ñucapac horasca manarac chayamunchu . Cancunamanmi ima horaspish alli .
43007007	Cai pacha gentecunaca cancunataca mana piñanchu , ashtahuanpish paicuna mana allita ruhuashcata ñuca huillashcamantami , ñucataca piñancuna .
43007008	Chai fiestamanca richiclla . Ñucapac horas manarac chayamushcamantami , ñucaca mana rini — nirca .
43007009	Chashna nishpami , Galilea llactallapitacmi saquirirca .
43007010	Paipac huauquicuna fiestaman rishca quipaca , Jesuspish rircami . Shina rishpapish , mana pi yachacllapimi pacalla rirca .
43007011	Mandac israelcuna Jesusta mashcashpaca : — Chai runaca , ¿ maipishi canga ? — nishpami mashcacurca .
43007012	Gentecunapurapi maijan huashalla parlanacushpaca : “ Chai runaca alli runami ” , cutin maijancunaca : “ Paica mana alli runachu . Gentecunata umashpami purin ” ninacurca .
43007013	Shina ninacushpapish , mandac israelcunata manchashcamantami , pipish Jesusmanta imata mana nishpa , picunapuralla parlanacurca .
43007014	Chai fiesta punzhacuna ña chaupiyamucucpimi , Jesusca Diosta mañana huasipi yachachi callarirca .
43007015	Jesús shina yachachicpimi israelcunaca : — ¿ Ima shinatac cai runaca yachachicllapish mana rishpa , cai tucuita yachanlla ? — nishpa mancharirca .
43007016	Shina nicpimi Jesusca : — Ñuca yachachishcaca mana ñuca munaimantachu , ashtahuanpish ñucata cachac Diosmantami .
43007017	Maijanpish Dios munashcata ruhuanata munaccunami , ñuca yachachishcaca ñuca munaimanta cashcata , mana cashpaca Diosmanta cashcata yachac chayancuna .
43007018	Quiquin munaillamanta rimacca , jatun tucunallatami munan . Shina cacpipish , Cachacta jatunyachicmi , cashcata nin . Paica jaicapi mana llullanchu .
43007019	Moisesmi mandashcacunataca curca . Ashtahuanpish cancunaca shucllapish mana cazunguichicchu . ¿ Ima nishpatac ñucataca huañuchishun ninguichic ? — nirca .
43007020	Shina nicpimi gentecunaca : — ¡ Supai japishcami cangui ! ¿ Pitac cantaca huañuchisha nicun ? — nirca .
43007021	Shina nicpimi Jesusca : — Shuc milagrota ñuca ruhuashcamantami mancharishpa saquiringuichic .
43007022	Moisesmi circuncisionta ruhuachun mandarca . Chaitami samana punzha cacpipish , cari huahuacunata circuncisionta ruhuachinguichic . Chai mandashcacunaca mana Moisesmantachu shamurca , ashtahuanpish ñaupa taitacunami chaitaca ruhuachiccuna carca .
43007023	Moisés mandashcata mana paquingaraicumi , samana punzhapipish circuncisionta ruhuanguichic . Shinashpaca , ¿ ima nishpatac samana punzhapi ungushca runata ñuca alliyachishcamantaca piñaringuichic ?
43007024	Ama ñahuita ricushpalla juchanchichicchu . Ashtahuanpish cashcata ruhuashpa juchanchichic — nirca .
43007025	Jerusalén pueblo maijan israelcuna parlanacushpaca : — ¿ Manachu cai runaca huañuchingapac mashcacushca ?
43007026	Riquichic , tucuipac ñaupapimi rimaricun . Pipish imata mana ninchu . ¿ Mandaccunapish “ Cristomi ” nishpachu crincuna ?
43007027	Ashtahuanpish pai maimanta cashcataca yachanchicmi . Shamuna cashca Cristo shamucpica , maimanta shamushcataca pi mana yachangachu — ninacurca .
43007028	Jesús Diosta mañana huasipi yachachishpaca : — ¿ Ñuca maimanta cashcatapish , pi cashcatapish yachanguichicchu ? Mana ñuca quiquinllamantachu shamurcani , ashtahuanpish cashcata ruhuac Dios cachacpimi shamurcani . Paitaca cancunaca mana ricsinguichicchu .
43007029	Ñucataca Diosmi cacharca . Paimanta shamushca cashpami , paitaca ricsini — nirca .
43007030	Jesusta prezushun nicushpapish manarac prezuna horas cacpimi , pi mana japirca .
43007031	Ashtahuanpish achca gentecuna paita crishpaca : — Cristo shamushpaca , ¿ cai runa ruhuashcamanta yallichu milagrocunata ruhuanga ? — nircacuna .
43007032	Fariseocunaca gentecuna Jesusmanta parlanacuctami uyarca . Chaimantami fariseocunapish , curacunata mandac curacunapish Jesusta japichun soldadocunata cacharca .
43007033	Chaimantami Jesusca : — Ashacamanllami cancunahuan casha . Quipataca ñucata Cachacpacmanmi risha .
43007034	Ñucata mashcashpapish mana taringuichicchu . Ñuca maipi cashcamanca mana chayai pudinguichicchu — nirca .
43007035	Chaimanta israelcunaca caishuc chaishuc tapunacushpaca : — Ñucanchic mana tarichunca , ¿ maimanshi ringa ? ¿ Ñucanchicpuramanta Grecia llactaman rishcacunapacmanchu risha nin ? ¿ Chaipichu israelcunata yachachisha nin ?
43007036	Pai : “ Ñucata mashcashpapish mana taringuichic . Ñuca maipi cashcamanca mana chayai pudinguichicchu ” nishpaca , ¿ imatatac nisha nin ? — ninacurca .
43007037	Fiesta tucuri jatun punzhapi Jesús jatarishpa sinchita rimashpaca : — Maijanpish yacunayachicca ñucapacman shamushpa , yacuta ubiaichic .
43007038	Dios quillcachishcapi nishca shina , maijanpish ñucata cricpac shungumantaca , causaita cuc yacumi llucshinga — nirca .
43007039	Jesusca , paita criccuna Diospac Espirituta chasquina cashcamantami chashna nirca . Jesusta Dios manarac jahua pachaman pushacpimi , Diospac Espirituca manarac shamushca carca .
43007040	Chaita uyashpami maijan gentecunaca : « Cai runaca ñucanchic shuyacushca Dios ima nishcata huillacmi » ninacurca .
43007041	Cutin shuccunaca : « Paica Cristomi » ninacurca . Shina cacpipish maijancunaca : « ¿ Cristoca Galilea llactamantachu shamunga ?
43007042	¿ Manachu Dios quillcachishcapica : “ Cristoca mandac Davidpac aillupuramanta , pai huacharishca Belén pueblomanta shamunga ” nin ? » ninacurca .
43007043	Paimanta gentecunapura shucca shuctac , shucca shuctac ninacushpa chicanyarinacurca .
43007044	Maijancuna Jesusta prezushun yuyacushpapish , mana imata ruhuarcachu .
43007045	Japichun cachashca soldadocuna fariseocunapacman , curacunata mandac curacunapacman cutimucpi paicunaca : — ¿ Ima nishpatac Jesusta mana japimunguichic ? — nirca .
43007046	Shina nicpimi soldadocunaca : — Chai runa shinaca , jaicapi pi mana rimashcachu — nirca .
43007047	Shina nicpimi fariseocunaca : — ¿ Cancunatapish crichircachu ?
43007048	¿ Mandac israelcunapish , fariseocunapish paita crishcachu ?
