43007049	¡ Chai gentecunaca Moisés mandashcacunata mana yachanchu ! Chaimantami paicunaca llaquita apanga — nirca .
43007050	Shuc tuta Jesuspacman ric , fariseocunapuramanta Nicodemomi chaipi carca . Paica :
43007051	— Mandashcapi nishca shinaca , ima ruhuashcata manarac alli yachashpaca , pitapish mana juchanchinallachu canchic — nirca .
43007052	Shina nicpimi paicunaca : — ¿ Canpish Galilea llactamantachu cangui ? Dios quillcachishcata ricui . Chaipica : “ Galileamantaca pi huillac mana shamushcachu ” ninmi — nirca . [
43007053	Chai quipaca quiquin huasimanmi rircacuna .
43008001	Jesusca Olivos urcumanmi rirca .
43008002	Chai cayandi punzha pacarimucucpimi , Diosta mañana huasiman cutirca . Chaiman gentecuna chayacpimi , Jesusca tiyarishpa yachachi callarirca .
43008003	Chaimanmi mandashcacunata yachachiccunapish , fariseocunapish shuc huarmi huainayacucta japishpa , apamurca . Chai huarmita gentecunapac chaupipi
43008004	shayachishpaca : — Yachachic , cai huarmitaca huainayacuctami japimunchic .
43008005	Moisés mandashcapica , cai shina mana allita ruhuac huarmicunataca rumihuan shitashpa huañuchichun ninmi . Canca , ¿ imatatac ningui ? — nirca .
43008006	Jesús mana allita nicpica , juchanchingapacmi chashnaca tapurca . Ashtahuanpish Jesusca cumurishpami , maqui dedohuan pambapi quillcacurca .
43008007	Chashna tapushpa caticpi , Jesús jatarishpaca : — Cancunapuramanta maijan jucha illac cashpaca , pairac rumihuan shitachun — nirca .
43008008	Shina nishpaca , cutinllatacmi cumurishpa pambapi quillcashpa catirca .
43008009	Chaita uyashpaca , shungupi nanarishpami shucllancaman shucllancaman rirca . Yuyacmanta callarishpami chai huarmillata Jesus-huanca saquishpa rircacuna .
43008010	Jesús shayarishpa , pitapish mana ricushpa , huarmilla chaipi shayacucpica : — Uyai , ¿ maipitac chai juchanchiccunaca ? ¿ Manachu maijan juchanchirca ? — nirca .
43008011	Shina nicpimi , chai huarmica : — Amito , mana pi juchanchircachu — nirca . Shina nicpimi Jesusca : — Ñucapish mana juchanchinichu . Rilla , cutinca ama juchallinguichu — nirca . ]
43008012	Cutinllatac Jesusca israelcunataca : — Ñucami tucui cai pachapi causaccunapac achicyachic luz cani . Maijanpish ñucata caticca mana amsapi puringachu , ashtahuanpish causaita cuc luztami charinga — nirca .
43008013	Shina nicpimi fariseocunaca : — Canllamantatacmi huillacungui . Chaimanta can huillashcapish yangallami — nirca .
43008014	Shina nicpimi Jesusca : — Ñucaca maimanta shamushcatapish , maiman ricushcatapish yachanimi . Chaimantami ñucallamanta huillacushcapish , mana yangalla can . Ashtahuanpish cancunaca ñuca maimanta shamushcatapish , maiman ricushcatapish mana yachanguichicchu .
43008015	Cancunaca gentecuna yuyashca shinami juchanchinguichic . Ashtahuanpish ñucaca pita mana juchanchinichu .
43008016	Ñucaca mana ñucallachu juchanchini , ashtahuanpish ñucata cachac Taitahuanmi juchanchini . Chaimantami ñucaca cashcata ruhuashpa juchanchini .
43008017	Moisés mandashcacunapica : “ Ishcai huillaccuna tiyacpimi , cierto cashcata yachana ” ninmi .
43008018	Ñuca quiquinmantami huillacuni . Ñucata cachac Taitapish ñucallamantatacmi huillan — nirca .
43008019	Shina nicpimi paicunaca : — ¿ Maipitac cambac taitaca ? — nirca . Chaimantami Jesusca : — Cancunaca ñucatapish , ñuca Taitatapish mana ricsinguichicchu . Ñucata ricsishpaca , ñuca Taitatapish ricsinguichicmanmi — nirca .
43008020	Jesusca caicunataca Diosta mañana huasipi , ofrenda churana ladopimi yachachirca . Paita japina horas manarac chayamucpimi , paitaca pi mana japirca .
43008021	Cutinllatac Jesusca : — Ñucaca rigrinimi . Cancunaca mashcanguichicmi . Ñuca ricushcamanca mana ri pudinguichicchu Cancunapac juchallapitacmi huañunguichic — nirca .
43008022	Chaita uyashpami mandac israelcunaca : — ¿ Pai : “ Ñuca ricushcamanca mana ri pudinguichicchu ” nishpaca , paillatac huañunamantachu nicun ? — ninacurca .
43008023	Shina nicpimi Jesusca : — Cancunaca caimantami canguichic . Ñucaca jahua pachamantami cani . Cancunaca cai pachamantami canguichic . Ñucaca mana cai pachamantachu cani .
43008024	Chaimantami “ cancunapac juchallapitacmi huañunguichic ” nircani . Ñucata cancuna mana crishpaca , cancunapac juchallapitacmi huañunguichic — nirca .
43008025	Chaimantami Jesustaca : — Canca , ¿ pitac cangui ? — nirca . Shina tapucpimi Jesusca : — Ñuca pi cashcataca callarillapitacmi huillarcani .
43008026	Cancunata juchanchishpa , tauca ninacunatami charini . Shina cashpapish ñucata Cachacca imatapish cashcatami nin . Ñucaca pai imata nishcallatami nini — nirca .
43008027	Paicunaca Diosmanta Jesús huillacushcata mana entendircachu .
43008028	Chaimantami Jesusca : — Runa Tucungapac shamushca ñucata chacatashpami , ñuca pi cashcata , ñuca munaimanta imatapish mana ruhuac cashcata , ashtahuanpish ñuca Taita yachachishcata nic cashcata yachanguichic .
43008029	Ñucata Cachacca ñucahuanmi . Ñucaca pai munashcallatami ruhuani . Chaimantami paica mana ñucallata saquin — nirca .
43008030	Chaicunata Jesús nicpica , achcacunami crircacuna .
43008031	Jesusca paita cric israelcunataca : — Cancunaca ñuca rimashcata cazushpaca , ñuca yachacuccunatacmi canguichic .
43008032	Chashnami cashcata nic cashcata ricsinguichic . Chai cashcata nic rimashcami cacharichinga — nirca .
43008033	Shina nicpimi paicunaca : — Ñucanchicca Abrahampac huahua huahuacunami canchic . Jaicapi huatashca shina servicca mana canchicchu . ¿ Ima nishpatac cacharichingami ninguiyari ? — nirca .
43008034	Shina nicpimi Jesusca : — Maijanpish juchata ruhuacca juchapi huatashca shinami . Chaica chashnatacmi can .
43008035	Shuc servicca mana amopac huasipi huiñaita causanchu , ashtahuanpish churimi taitahuan causacungalla .
43008036	Chaimanta Diospac Churi cancunata huatashca shinamanta cacharichicpica , cacharishcatacmi canguichic .
43008037	Cancuna Abrahampac huahua huahuacuna cashcataca yachanimi . Chashna cacpipish , ñuca yachachishcata mana entendishpami , ñucataca huañuchishun nicunguichic .
43008038	Ñucaca , ñuca Taitahuan cashpa , ricushcallatami huillani . Cancunaca cancunapac taita nishcallatami ruhuanguichic — nirca .
43008039	Shina nicpimi paicunaca : — Ñucanchic taitaca Abrahammi — nirca . Shina nicpimi Jesusca : — Cancuna Abrahampac huahuacuna cashpaca , Abraham ruhuashcatachari ruhuanguichicman .
43008040	Ñuca Diosmanta uyashcata , cashcata nishcata nicucpipish cancunaca huañuchishun ninguichicmi . Abrahamca jaicapi mana chashna ruhuarcachu .
43008041	Cancunaca cancunapac taita ruhuashcatami ruhuanguichic — nirca . Shina nicpimi paicunaca : — ¡ Ñucanchicca mana huainapac huahuacunachu canchic , ashtahuanpish shuc taitallatami charinchic ! ¡ Chaica Diosmi ! — nirca .
43008042	Shina nicpimi , Jesusca : — Dios cancunapac taita cacpica , cuyanguichicmanmi . Ñucaca Diosmantami shamurcani . Mana ñuca munaimantachu shamurcani , ashtahuanpish Diosmi cacharca .
43008043	¿ Ima nishpatac ñuca rimashcataca mana entendinguichic ? Ñuca rimashcata mana uyashun nishpami , mana entendinguichic .
43008044	Cancunaca diablopac huahuacunami canguichic . Chaimantami pai munashcata ruhuanguichic . Diabloca callarimanta pachami huañuchic , llullac cashca . Paica jaicapi mana cashcata ninchu . Paica llullapac taitami . Pai llullashpaca , pai ima shina cashca shinallatacmi ricuchin .
43008045	Chaimantami ñuca imapish cashcallata nicpica , mana cringuichic .
43008046	¿ Cancunapuramanta maijantac ñuca juchayuc cashcataca ricuchinguichic ? Diosmanta ñuca huillacpica , ¿ ima nishpatac mana cringuichic ?
43008047	Maijanpish Diospac huahua cashpaca , pai rimashcatami uyasha nin , ashtahuanpish cancunaca mana Diospac huahua cashpami , pai rimashcataca mana uyashun ninguichic — nirca .
43008048	Chaimantami mandac israelcunaca Jesustaca : — Ñucanchic : “ Canca Samaria llactamantami cangui , shinallatac supaihuanmi cangui ” nishpaca , allitami nishcanchic — nirca .
43008049	Shina nicpimi Jesusca : — Ñucaca mana supaihuan canichu . Ñucaca Taitatami jatunyachini , ashtahuanpish cancunaca ñucataca mana jatunyachinguichicchu .
43008050	Gentecuna ñucata alli nichunca mana munanichu , ashtahuanpish ñuca Taitata alli nichunmi munan . Paillami taripanga .
43008051	Maijanpish ñuca nishcata cazucca mana huañungachu . Chaica , chashnatacmi canga — nirca .
43008052	Shina nicpimi , mandac israelcunaca : — Cunancarin supaihuan cashcata yachanchictacmi . Abrahampish , Dios ima nishcata huillaccunapish huañurcami . Shina cacpica , ¿ ima nishpatac canca “ maijanpish ñuca nishcata cazuccunaca mana huañungachu ” ninguiyari ?
43008053	¿ Canca Abrahamta yallichari cangui ? Paipish , Dios ima nishcata huillaccunapish huañurcami . Canca , ¿ ima nishpatac chashnaca nicunguiyari ? — nirca .
43008054	Shina nicpimi , Jesusca : — Ñucallata “ allimi cani ” nirishpaca , chaica yangami canman . Ñucata alli nicca , ñuca Taitami . Paillatatacmi cancunaca “ ñucanchic Dios ” ninguichic .
43008055	Cancunaca paitaca mana ricsinguichicchu . Ñucaca ricsinimi . Ñuca “ mana ricsinichu ” nishpaca , cancuna shinallatac llullacmi caiman . Ñucaca ricsinitacmi . Chaimantami pai ima nishcataca cazuni .
43008056	Taita Abrahamca ñuca cai pachaman shamuna punzhata ricushpami cushicurcami . Ña ricushpaca , ashtahuanmi cushicurca — nirca .
43008057	Shina nicpimi , mandac israelcuna Jesustaca : — Manarac pichca chunga huatatapish charinguica . ¿ Ima shinatac taita Abrahamta ricurcangui ? — nirca .
43008058	Shina nicpimi Jesusca : — Manarac taita Abraham tiyacpimi , ñucaca ña tiyarcani . Chaica chashnatacmi can — nirca .
43008059	Shina nicpimi , paicunaca rumihuan shitangapac rumicunata japircacuna . Ashtahuanpish Jesusca miticushpami , Diosta mañana huasimanta llucshishpa rirca .
43009001	Chaimanta Jesús rishpaca , huacharishca pachamanta ñahui mana ricuc runatami ricurca .
43009002	Yachacuccuna Jesustaca : — Yachachic , cai runa ñahui mana ricuc huacharichunca , ¿ taita mamachu juchallirca ? ¿ Mana cashpaca paipac juchallamantachu chashna tucushca canga ? — nirca .
43009003	Chaimantami Jesusca : — Mana paipac juchamantachu , shinallatac mana taita mamapac juchamantachu chashnaca tucushca , ashtahuanpish Dios munashcata cai runapi ricuchingapacmi , chashnaca huacharirca .
43009004	Punzha tiyacpiracmi , ñucata Cachac Diospacta ruhuana canchic . Ña tutayacpica , pi imata mana ruhuai pudinchu .
43009005	Cai pachapi cashcacamanca , cai pachapi causaccunata achicyachic luzmi cani — nirca .
43009006	Chaita nishpami , pambapi tucashpa , turuta ruhuashpa chai runapac ñahuipi llutarca .
43009007	Shina llutashpaca : — Cunanca , Siloé uchilla cuchapi jahuaringapac ri — nirca . ( “ Siloé ” nishpaca , “ cachashca ” nisha ninmi ) . Chai runa jahuaringapac rishpaca , ñahui ricucucmi cutirca .
43009008	Chaimantami vecinocunapish , mañashpa tiyacta ricuccunapish : — Cai runaca , ¿ manachu mañashpa tiyacuc runa ? — ninacurca .
43009009	Maijanca : — Ari , paimi — nirca . Maijanca : — Mana paichu . Shuc pailaya runami — ninacurca . Shina ninacucpimi paica : — Ari , ñucallatacmi cani — nirca .
43009010	Shina nicpimi paicunaca : — ¿ Ima shinatac ñahuica pascarirca ? — nirca .
43009011	Shina nicpimi paica : — Jesús shuti runami turuta ruhuashpa , ñahuipi llutashpaca : “ Siloé cuchapi jahuarigri ” nirca . Siloeman rishpa , ñahuita jahuarishpaca , ña ricurcanillami — nirca .
43009012	Chashna nicpimi paicunaca : — ¿ Maipitac chai runaca ? — nirca . Shina nicpimi paica : — Mana yachanichu — nirca .
43009013	Chai alli tucushca runataca fariseocunapacmanmi pusharcacuna .
43009014	Jesusca samana punzhapimi chai runataca alliyachishca carca .
43009015	Fariseocunaca ima shina alliyashcatami tapurca . Shina nicpimi paica : — Turutami ñahuipi llutarca . Quipaca jahuarircanimi . Cunanca ñami ricucuni — nirca .
43009016	Shina nicpi , maijan fariseocunaca : — Samana punzhata mana cazunchu , paica mana Diosmantachu shamushca — nirca . Cutin maijanca : — Shuc juchayuc runaca , ¿ ima shinatac milagrocunataca ruhuangayari ? — nirca . Chashna ninacushpami , paicunapura chicanyarinacurca .
43009017	Cutinllatac alliyashca runata fariseocunaca : — Ñahuita alliyachic runataca , ¿ canca imatatac ningui ? — nirca . Shina nicpimi paica : — Dios ima nishcata huillacmi — nirca .
43009018	Mandac israelcunaca pai ñahui mana ricuc cashcatapish , alliyashcatapish mana crircacunachu . Chaimantami paipac taita mamata
43009019	cayachishpa : — ¿ Paichu ñahui mana ricuc huacharishca cancunapac huahua ? ¿ Ima shinatac cunanca ricucunyari ? — nirca .
43009020	Chaimantami taita mamaca : — Ari , caica ñucanchic huahuami . Pai ñahui mana ricuc huacharishcataca yachanchicmi .
43009021	Cunan ima shina alliyashcatapish , pi alliyachishcatapish , mana yachanchicchu . Paillamantac tapuichic . Paica ña juizhu runami . Paimi ima cashcata ninga — nirca .
43009022	Fariseocuna : “ Maijanpish ‘ Jesusca Cristomi ’ nishpa huillacpica , israelcunapac tandanacuimanta llucchishpa cachashcami canga ” nishpami , ñaupaman yuyarinacushca carca . Chaimantami mandac israelcunata manchashpa , taita mamaca chashna nirca .
43009023	Chaimantami paipac taita mamaca : “ Paillamantac tapuichic . Paica juizhu runami ” nirca .
43009024	Shina nicpimi , cutin alliyashca runata mandac israelcuna cayashpaca : — Diospac shutipi huillai . Ñucanchicca chai Jesús runataca juchayuc cashcatami yachanchic — nirca .
43009025	Shina nicpimi paica : — Chai runa , juchayuc cashcata , mana juchayuc cashcata mana yachanichu , ashtahuanpish ñuca ñahuita alliyachicpi , cunan ricucushcallatami yachani — nirca .
43009026	Shina nicpimi , cutinllatac tapushpaca : — ¿ Imatatac ruhuarca ? ¿ Ima shinatac ñahuita alliyachirca ? — nirca .
43009027	Shina nicpimi paica : — Ña huillanica , ¿ manachu uyarcanguichic ? ¿ Cutinchu huillachun ninguichic ? ¿ Cancunapish paita caticcunachu tucushun ninguichic ? — nirca .
43009028	Shina nicpi , paicuna piñarishpaca : — Canmi paita catic cangui . Ñucanchicca Moisesta caticcunami canchic .
43009029	Dios rimashcata Moisés huillashcallatami yachanchic , ashtahuanpish chai runa maimanta cashcataca mana yachanchicchu — nirca .
43009030	Shina nicpimi , chai runaca : — Cancuna pai maimanta shamushcata mana yachanaca shuc mancharinami . Paimi ñuca ñahuita alliyachirca .
43009031	Diosta mana cazuccuna mañashcata mana uyac cashcataca allimi yachanchic . Ashtahuanpish paita manchacta , pai munashcata ruhuac mañashcataca uyanmi .
43009032	Huacharishcamanta pacha ñahui mana ricuc runata alliyachishcataca , jaicapi pi mana uyashcachu .
43009033	Chai runa mana Diosmanta shamushca cashpaca , imatapish mana ruhuanmanchu — nirca .
43009034	Shina nicpimi paicunaca : — Canca juchasapami huacharircangui . ¿ Chashna cashca jahuachu ñucanchicta yachachisha ningui ? — nirca . Chashna nishpami , paitaca tandanacuna huasimanta llucchishpa cacharca .
43009035	Chai alliyashca runata tandanacuimanta llucchishpa cachashcata Jesús yachashpami , paita mashcarca . Ña tupashpaca : — ¿ Canca Runa Tucungapac shamushcataca cringuichu ? — nirca .
43009036	Shina nicpimi paica : — Amito , ¿ pitac chaica , ñuca paita cringapac ? — nirca .
43009037	Shina nicpimi Jesusca : — Ña ricucunguimi . Canhuan rimacucllatacmi cani — nirca .
43009038	Shina nicpimi paica : — Apunchic Jesús , crinimi — nishpa , cungurishpa , Jesusta alli nirca .
43009039	Chashna nicpimi Jesusca : — Ñucaca taripangapacmi cai pachaman shamurcani . Ñahui mana ricuccunata alliyachingapac , cutin ricuccunataca ñahui mana ricucta ruhuangapacmi shamurcani — nirca .
43009040	Maijan fariseocuna chaita uyashpaca : — ¿ Shinashpaca ñucanchicpish ñahui mana ricuccunachu canchic ? — nircacuna .
43009041	Shina nicpimi Jesusca : — Ñahui mana ricuccuna cashpaca , manachari juchayuccuna canguichicman . Ashtahuanpish “ ricushpami causacunchic ” nishcamantacarin , juchayuccunami canguichic — nirca .
43010001	Jesusca : — Maijanpish oveja corralman mana punguta yaicucca shuhuac , huañuchicmi . Chaica chashnatacmi can .
43010002	Ashtahuanpish pipish punguta yaicucmi oveja michicca can .
43010003	Chai michic chayacpica , corral punguta cuidacca punguta pascanmi . Ovejacunaca Michic rimashcata uyanmi . Paica ovejacunataca shutipi cayashpami , corralmanta llucchin .
43010004	Ña tucui llucchishpaca , ovejacunapac ñaupatami paica rin . Ovejacunaca michicpac rimashcata ricsishcamantami catin .
43010005	Ashtahuanpish mana ricsishca runapac rimashcata uyashpaca , mancharishpami rin , paitaca mana catinchu — nirca .
43010006	Cai chimbapurashca parlohuan Jesús yachachishpaca , imata nisha nishcataca mana entendircacunachu .
43010007	Jesús cutinllatac rimashpaca : — Ñucami ovejacuna yaicuna punguca cani . Chaica chashnatacmi can .
43010008	Manarac ñuca shamucpi , tucui shamuccunaca shuhuaccunami , huañuchiccunami carca , ashtahuanpish ovejacunaca mana catircacunachu .
43010009	Ñucami punguca cani . Maijanpish ñucamanta yaicucca quishpiringami . Paica llucshic , yaicucmi puricunga . Micunatapish taringami .
43010010	Shuhuacca shuhuangapac , huañuchingapac , chingachingapacmi yaicun . Ñucaca causaita cungapac , yalli causaita cungapacmi shamurcani .
43010011	Ñucami alli michicca cani . Alli michicca , ovejacunamanta huañuna cacpipish huañungalla .
43010012	Ashtahuanpish cullquillamanta michicca mana alli michicchu . Mana paipac ovejacuna cashcamantaca atuc shamucpica , shitashpa rinllami . Atucca ovejacunata manchachishpa , maitapish shic-huashpa cachanllami .
43010013	Cullquillamanta michicca ovejacunata mana llaquishpa shitashpa rinllami . Paica ovejacunata mana llaquinchu .
43010014	Ñucami alli michicca cani . Ima shinami ñuca Taita ñucata ricsin , shinallatacmi Taitataca ricsini . Chashnallatacmi ñuca ovejacunapish ñucata ricsin . Ñuca ovejacunamantaca huañuna cacpipish huañushallami .
43010015	
43010016	Shinallatac mana cai corralpi cac shuctac ovejacunatapish charinimi . Paicunatapish pushamunami cani . Paicunaca ñuca rimashcata uyangacunami . Chashna uyashpa tandarishpaca , shuc shinallami tucunga , shinallatac shuc michicllami tiyanga .
43010017	Ñucaca huañuna cacpipish , huañushpa causarishami . Chaimantami ñuca Taitaca cuyan .
43010018	Pipish ñuca causaita mana quichungachu , ashtahuanpish ñucallatacmi cusha . Huañungapacpish , causarinatapish poderta charinimi . Chashna ruhuachunmi , ñuca Taitaca mandarca — nirca .
43010019	Israelcuna chaita uyashpaca , paicunapurami cutinmi chicanyarinacurca .
43010020	Paicunapuramanta taucacunami : — ¿ Ima nishpatac paita uyanguichic ? Paica supaihuanmi , shinallatac yuyai illacmi — ninacurca .
43010021	Ashtahuanpish maijancunaca : — Supaihuan cashpaca , mana chashna rimanmanchu . Maijanpish supaihuan cashpaca , ñahui mana ricuctaca mana alliyachinmanchu — ninacurca .
43010022	Chai punzhacunaca Jerusalenpica Diosta mañana huasita mingana fiestami carca . Chai punzhacunaca tamya punzhacunami carca .
43010023	Jesusca Diosta mañana huasipimi Salomón ruhuashca pungu pambapi puricurca .
43010024	Chaipi Jesuspac muyundipi israelcuna shayarishpaca : — Can Cristo cashpaca , cunanllatac alli huillai : ¿ Ima horascamantac can pi cashcata mana yachashpa puricushunyari ? — nirca .
43010025	Chaimantami Jesusca : — Ña nircanica . Chashna nicpipish , mana crircanguichicchu . Ñuca Taitapac poderhuanmi imatapish ruhuani . Chai ruhuashcacunami ñuca pi cashcataca ricuchicun .
43010026	Cancunaca mana ñuca ovejacuna cashpami , chaita ricushpapish mana cringuichic .
43010027	Ovejacunaca ñuca rimashcata uyanmi . Ñucapish paicunataca ricsinimi .
43010028	Ñucaca huiñai causaitami paicunamanca cuni . Paicunaca mana chingaringachu , pipish ñuca maquimantaca mana quichungachu .
43010029	Paicunata ñucaman cuc Taitaca tucuimanta yallimi . Paipac maquimantaca pi mana quichungachu .
43010030	Ñuca Taitahuanca shuc shinallami canchic — nirca .
43010031	Shina nicpimi , israelcunaca Jesusta shitangapac rumita japircacuna .
43010032	Chashna cacpipish Jesusca : — Ñuca Taitapac poderhuanmi tauca allicunata ruhuarcani . ¿ Maijan ruhuashcacunamantatac rumihuan shitashun ninguichic ? — nirca .
43010033	Shina nicpimi israelcunaca : — Mana allicunata ruhuashcamantachu rumicunahuan shitashun ninchic , ashtahuanpish Dios tucushpa , paita piñachishcamantami shitashun ninchic . Canca ñucanchic shina runallami cangui . Chashna cashpapish Dios shina tucusha nishpami , chashnaca nicungui — nirca .
43010034	Chashna nicpimi Jesusca : — Dios quillcachishcapica : “ Cancunami dioscuna canguichic ” nicunmi .
43010035	Dios quillcachishcataca mana llullanchu . Chaitaca yachanguichicmi . Diosca pai rimashcata uyaccunataca “ cancunami dioscuna canguichic ” nircami .
43010036	Diosca chicanyachishpami , ñucataca cai pachaman cacharca . ¿ Chashna cashca jahuachu ñucataca : “ Diospac Churimi cani ” nishpaca , “ Diostami piñachicun ” ninguichic ?
43010037	Ñuca Taita ruhuachun nishcacunata mana ruhuacpica , ama cringuichicchu .
43010038	Ñucaca ñuca Taita mandashcallatami ruhuani . Ñucata mana crishpapish , ñuca ruhuashcacunata crichicyari . Chashna crishpami , ñuca Taitaca ñucahuan , ñucaca paihuan cashcata alli yachanguichic — nirca .
43010039	Chaimantami israelcunaca cutinllatac Jesusta japishun nircacuna . Shina cacpipish , paica paicunapac chaupimanta rircallami .
43010040	Jesusca Jordán yacu chimba ladoman cutishpami , chaipi saquirirca . Chaipimi Bautizac Juan utcaman bautizac carca .
43010041	Chaipi achca gentecuna paipacman shamushpaca : — Juanca milagrocunataca mana ruhuarcachu . Shina cacpipish , Juan cai runamanta huillashcaca chashnatacmi cashca — ninacurca .
43010042	Chaipica achca runacunami Jesusta crircacuna .
43011001	Betania pueblomanta Lázaro runami ungushca carca . Paica , paipac panicuna Mariahuan , Martahuanmi chai pueblopi causarca .
43011002	Chai Mariami quipamanca Jesuspac chaquicunapi mishquilla ashnacucta churashpa , acchahuan chaquichirca .
43011003	Lazaropac panicuna Jesuspacman cachashpaca : — Apunchic Jesús , canhuan apanacuc Lazaromi ungushca — nichun cacharca .
43011004	Jesús chaita uyashpaca : — Chai ungüica mana huañuchic ungüichu , ashtahuanpish Diostapish , paipac Churi ñucatapish jatunyachingapacmi — nirca .
43011005	Jesusca Mariatapish , Martatapish , Lazarotapish mai cuyacmi carca .
43011006	Jesusca Lázaro ungushcata yachashpapish , ishcai punzhacamanmi chaillapitac saquirirca .
43011007	Chai quipami , Jesusca paipac yachacuccunataca : — Cutinllatac Judea llactaman jacuchic — nirca .
43011008	Shina nicpimi yachacuccunaca : — Yachachic , sarunllami israelcunaca rumihuan shitashun nircacuna . ¿ Chashna cashca jahuachu cutin chaillamantac risha ningui ? — nirca .
43011009	Shina nicpimi Jesusca : — ¿ Manachu punzhaca chunga ishcai horasta charin ? Maijanpish punzhapi puricca , mana mitcarinchu .
43011010	Maijanpish tuta purishpaca , luzta mana charishcamantami mitcarin — nirca .
43011011	Chaita nishca quipaca Jesusca : — Ñucanchic-huan apanacuc Lazaromi sueñushca . Paitami ricchachingapac rigrini — nirca .
43011012	Yachacuccuna chaita uyashpaca : — Apunchic Jesús , sueñucushpaca alliyangami — nirca .
43011013	Ashtahuanpish Jesusca , Lázaro huañushcamantami chashna nicurca . Cutin yachacuccunaca sueñunamantami nicurca .
43011014	Chaimanta Jesús alli entendichishpaca : — Lazaroca huañushcami .
43011015	Ñucaca chaipi mana cashcamantaca cushicunimi . Paica cancuna ashtahuan ñucata crichunmi huañushca . Chaimi cancunamanca ashtahuan alli . Cunanca jacuchic , ricushun — nirca .
43011016	Shina nicpimi , ishcaipura huacharishca Tomasca caishuc yachacuccunataca : — Ñucanchicpish Jesus-huan huañungapac jacuchic — nirca .
43011017	Jesusca Lazarota ña chuscu punzhata enterrashca cacpimi chayarca .
43011018	Betania puebloca Jerusalenmanta quimsa kilómetro shinallapimi carca .
43011019	Martapac , Mariapac turi huañushcamantaca , tauca israelcunami llaquinacungapac shamushca carcacuna .
43011020	Jesús shamucucta Marta uyashpaca , tupangapacmi llucshirca . Ashtahuanpish Mariaca huasipimi saquirirca .
43011021	Chashna tupangapac llucshishpami Martaca : — Apunchic Jesús , can caipi cashca cacpica , ñuca turica mana huañunmanchu carca .
43011022	Shina cacpipish , Diosta mañacpica , Diosca uyangami — nirca .
43011023	Shina nicpimi Jesusca : — Cambac turica causaringami — nirca .
43011024	Shina nicpimi Martaca : — Ari , tucuri punzhapica causaringami . Chaitaca yachanimi — nirca .
43011025	Shina nicpimi Jesusca : — Ñucami causaita cucpish , huañushcacunata causachicpish cani . Ñucata cricca huañushpapish causaringami .
43011026	Maijanpish causacushpa , ñucata cricca , mana huiñaita huañungachu . ¿ Chaitaca cringuichu ? — nirca .
43011027	Shina nicpimi Martaca : — Ari , Apunchic Jesús crinimi . Canca Diospac Churimi cangui . Cai pachaman shamuna cashca Cristomi cangui — nirca .
43011028	Chaita nishca quipa , Marta huasiman tuctishpa , paipac ñaña Mariata pacallaman cayashpaca : — Yachachicmi caipi . Cantami cayacun — nirca .
43011029	María chaita uyashpaca , utcami Jesus-huan tupangapac rirca .
43011030	Jesusca manarac chai puebloman yaicurcachu . Martahuan tupashca pushtupimi carca .
43011031	Huasipi cushichishpa , compañashpa tiyacuc israelcuna María jatarishpa , utca ricta ricushpaca : — Enterrashcapimi huacangapac rin — nishpami , catishpa rircacuna .
43011032	María Jesuspacman chayashpa , paipac ñaupapi cungurishpaca : — Apunchic Jesús , can caipi cashca cacpica , ñuca turica mana huañunmanchu carca — nirca .
43011033	Mariapish , paita compañac israelcunapish huacacucta Jesús ricushpa , shungupi llaquirishpaca :
43011034	— ¿ Maipitac enterrarcanguichic ? — nishpa tapurca . Shina nicpimi paicunaca : — Apunchic Jesús , shamui , ricungui — nirca .
43011035	Jesuspish huacarcami .
43011036	Chaimantami israelcunaca : — Riquichic , Lazarota yallitami cuyashca — ninacurca .
43011037	Ashtahuanpish maijancunaca : — Cai runaca ñahui mana ricuc runataca alliyachircami . Shina cashpaca , ¿ ima nishpatac Lázaro ama huañuchunca imata mana ruhuarca ? — nirca .
43011038	Cutinllatacmi Jesusca shungupi llaquirishpa , chai enterrashca cuchuman rirca . Chai jutcuca quingraipimi jatun rumihuan jarcashca carca .
43011039	Chaipimi Jesusca : — Rumita cutichichic — nirca . Shina nicpimi , chai huañushcapac pani Martaca : — Apunchic Jesús , pai huañushcaca ñami chuscu punzha , ashnacungami — nirca .
43011040	Shina nicpimi Jesusca : — ¿ Manachu ñucaca : “ Crishpaca , Dios imatapish ruhuaclla cashcata ricunguimi ” nircani ? — nirca .
43011041	Jesús shina nicpimi , enterrashcata tapashca rumita cutichirca . Jesús jahua pachata huichailla ricushpaca : — Taitalla , ñuca mañashcata uyashcamanta pagui ninimi .
43011042	Ñuca mañashcata can uyac cashcataca yachanimi . Caipi ñucahuan cac gentecuna ñucata can cachashcata crichunmi , cashna nini — nirca .
43011043	Chaita nishca quipaca : — ¡ Lázaro , chaimanta llucshi ! — nishpami , sinchita caparirca .
43011044	Chashna caparicpimi , chai huañushcaca chaqui , maqui pillushca , umapish lienzohuan pillushca llucshimurca . Shina llucshimucpimi Jesusca : — Pai purichun , pillushcata pascaichic — nirca .
43011045	Mariata compañac tauca israelcuna Jesús imata ruhuashcata ricushpaca , paita crircacunami .
43011046	Cutin maijancunaca fariseocunamanmi Jesús imata ruhuashcata huillangapac rircacuna .
43011047	Shina huillacpi , curacunata mandac curacunapish , fariseocunapish mandaccunapura tandanacushpaca : — Chai runataca , ¿ imatatac ruhuanchic ? Paica tauca milagrocunatami ruhuacun .
43011048	Chashnalla saquicpica , tucuimi paita cringacuna . Shina cacpica , Roma llacta gentecuna shamushpami Diosta mañana huasitapish , ñucanchic gentecunatapish tucuchinga — nirca .
43011049	Shina nicpi , paicunapuramanta chai huatapi curacunata mandac Caifasca : — Cancunaca imatapish mana yachanguichicchu .
43011050	Ñucanchic llacta tucui gentecuna tucurinapac randica , shuc runalla tucui israelcunamanta huañunami ashtahuan alli . ¿ Chaitaca manachu yachanguichic ? — nirca .
43011051	Chaitaca mana paipac yuyaimantachu nirca , ashtahuanpish chai huatapi curacunata jatun mandac cashcamantami , Dios yuyaita cucpi , israelcunamanta Jesús huañuna cashcata huillarca .
43011052	Mana chai llactallamantachu huañuna carca , ashtahuanpish caita chaita rishpa causacuc Dios acllashcacunata tandarishpa , shucllata ruhuangapacmi huañuna carca .
43011053	Chai punzhamanta pachami , Jesusta ima shina huañuchinata yuyarinacurca .
43011054	Chaimantami Jesusca israelcunapurapica ña mana purirca , ashtahuanpish chaimanta llucshishpa , shitashca pamba cuchulla Efraín puebloman rishpa , chaipi paipac yachacuccunahuan carca .
43011055	Israelcunapac Pascua fiesta punzhacunaca ñami caillapi carca . Chaimantami chai punzhacuna manarac chayamucpi , achca gentecuna chuyayangapac Jerusalenman rircacuna .
43011056	Chaipi Jesusta mashcashpa , Diosta mañana huasipi yaicushpaca : — ¿ Imatatac ninguichic ? ¿ Manachu fiestaman shamunga ? — ninacurca .
43011057	Fariseocunapish , curacunata mandac curacunapish Jesusta japingapacmi , maijan ricushpaca , paicunaman huillachun mandarca .
43012001	Pascua fiestapac sucta punzha siricpimi , Jesusca Betania puebloman rirca . Jesús causachishca Lazaropish chaipimi causarca .
43012002	Chaipimi Jesusman shuc cenata ruhuarca . Chaitaca Martami caracurca . Lazaropish Jesus-huanmi mizapi micushpa tiyacurca .
43012003	Chaipimi Mariaca achca valishca chaupi litro nardo nishca mishquilla ashnacucta apamushpa , Jesuspac chaquita cahuirca . Chaimantaca acchahuanmi chaquichirca . Chashna cahuicpica , tucui huasi ucumi mishquilla ashnacuc saquirirca .
43012004	Chashna ruhuacpimi , yachacuccunapuramanta quipaman Jesusta japichigricuc Judas Iscarioteca :
43012005	— Cai mishquilla ashnacuctaca , quimsa patsac denario cullquipi catushpa huacchacunaman cunachari , ashtahuan alli canman carca — nirca .
43012006	Judasca mana huacchacunata llaquishcamantachu chaitaca nirca , ashtahuanpish shuhuac cashcamantami chashna nirca . Paimi cullquita tandashpa huacaichic carca . Chashnami maijan cutinca shuhuac carca .
43012007	Shina nicpimi Jesusca : — Paica ñuca enterrana punzhapacmi mishquilla ashnacucta huacaichishpa charicushca , saquilla .
43012008	Huacchacunaca punzhantami cancunahuan . Ashtahuanpish ñucaca mana cancunahuan causacushallachu — nirca .
43012009	Tauca israelcunami Jesús Betaniapi cashcata chayac chayashpaca , chaiman rircacuna . Mana Jesusta ricungapacllachu rircacuna , ashtahuanpish Jesús causachishca Lazarota ricuna yuyaihuanpishmi rircacuna .
43012010	Curacunata mandac curacunaca Lazarota huañuchinatami yuyarinacurca .
43012011	Chaica , Lázaro causarishcamantami achca israelcuna paicunamanta caruyashpa , Jesusta crircacuna .
43012012	Quipa punzha , Jerusalén Pascua fiestaman ric achca gentecuna Jesús Jerusalenman shamucucta uyashpami ,
43012013	ramacunata pitishpa tupangapac llucshirca . Chashna llucshishpaca : — ¡ Quishpichicca alli nishca cachun ! ¡ Mandac Diospac shutipi shamuc , israelcunata Jatun Mandacca tucuipac alli nishca cachun ! — nishpami caparirca .
43012014	Dios quillcachishcapi nishca shinami , Jesusca pactalla burropi tiyarishpa shamurca .
43012015	Chai quillcashcapica : « Sión pueblopi causaccunalla , ama mancharichicchu . Jatun Mandacca shuc pactalla burropimi montashpa shamucun » ninmi .
43012016	Cai nishcataca yachacuccunaca chai horasca mana entendircacunachu . Ashtahuanpish Jesús causarishca quipami , paimanta ñaupaman quillcachishca pactashcataca yuyarircacuna .
43012017	Jesus-huan cac gentecunaca Lazarota enterrashca jutcumanta cayashpa , causachishcatami tucuiman huillashca huillarca .
43012018	Chaimantami gentecunaca Jesús milagrota ruhuaclla cashcata yachashpa , paihuan tupangapac llucshirca .
43012019	Ashtahuanpish fariseocuna parlanacushpaca : — Riquichic , tucuimi paita caticun . Ñucanchicca imata mana ruhuai pudinchicchu — nicurca .
43012020	Jerusalén fiestapi Diosta alli ningapac riccunapurapica , maijan griego gentecunapishmi carca .
43012021	Paicunami Galilea llacta Betsaida pueblomanta Felipepacman chayarca . Chashna chayashpaca : — Amito , Jesus-huanmi tupashun ninchic — nirca .
43012022	Felipeca Andresmanmi huillarca . Chaimantami ishcai tucushpa Jesusman huillarca .
43012023	Shina huillacpimi Jesusca : — Runa Tucungapac shamushca ñucata jatunyachina punzhami chayamushca .
43012024	Trigo muyu allpapi mana urmashpa , mana huañushpaca paillami saquirin . Ashtahuanpish allpapi urmashpa , huañushpaca achcatami pucun . Chaica chashnatacmi can .
43012025	Maijanpish quiquin causaita cuyacca chingaringami . Ashtahuanpish maijanpish quiquin causaita cai pachapi mana cuyacca huiñaitami causanga .
43012026	Maijanpish ñucata servisha nicca ñucata catichun . Ñucata servicca maipimi ñuca cani , chaipimi canga . Maijanpish ñucata servictaca ñuca Taitami alli ninga .
43012027	Cunanca yallita llaquillami cani . ¿ Cunanca imatac nisha ? ¿ Taitalla , cai llaquimanta anchuchiyari nishachu ? Mana chashna nishachu , llaquita apangapacmi shamurcani .
43012028	¡ Taitalla , cambac shutita jatunyachiyari ! — nirca . Shina nicpi , jahua pachamantaca : « Ña jatunyachircanimi . Cutinpish ricuchishami » nishcami uyarirca .
43012029	Chaipi cac maijan caccuna chaita uyashpaca : “ Urcumi tulun ninacun ” nircami . Cutin shuccunaca : “ Angelmi rimacun ” ninacurca .
43012030	Chaimantami Jesusca : — Cai rimashcaca mana ñucamantachu uyarin , ashtahuanpish cancunamantami uyarin .
43012031	Cunanmi cai pachapi causaccunaca taripashca canga . Cunanmi cai pachata mandactapish llucchishpa shitashca canga .
43012032	Caspipi jahuaman huarcushca cashpami , tucuita ñucapacman pushamusha — nirca .
43012033	Chaitaca pai ima shina huañuna cashcata entendichingapacmi nirca .
43012034	Chaipi caccunaca : — Dios quillcachishcapica “ Cristo huiñaitami causanga ” ninmi . ¿ Ima nishpatac canca : “ Runa Tucungapac shamushcaca caspipi huarcushcami canga ” nicungui ? ¿ Pitac chai Runa Tucungapac shamushcaca ? — nirca .
43012035	Chaimantami Jesusca : — Asha punzhacamanllami Achicyachicca cancunahuan canga . Achicyachic cancunahuan cashcacamanca , achicpi purichic . Amsapi puricca maiman ricushcatapish mana yachanchu .
43012036	Cancunahuan Achicyachic cacpirac Achicyachicta crichic . Chashnami Achicyachicpac huahua canguichic — nirca . Shina nishca quipaca , Jesusca paicunapacmanta rishpa chingarircallami .
43012037	Jesús tauca milagrocunata ruhuacucpipish , israelcunaca mana crircacunachu .
43012038	Dios ima nishcata huillac Isaías huillashca pactachunmi chashna tucurca . Pai huillashpaca : « Dioslla , ¿ pitac huillashcataca crishcayari ? Diospac podertaca , ¿ pitac ricushcayari ? » nishcami .
43012039	Chaimantami mana crircacuna . Chaica , Isaiasllatacmi :
43012040	« Paicunapac ñahuita huichcarcami . Paicunapac shungutapish sinchiyachircami . Ñahuicunahuan ama ricuchun , paicunapac shungu ama yuyaita japichunmi cashna ruhuarca . Chaimantami ñucapacman mana cutimunga . Paicunataca mana alliyachishachu » nishcami .
43012041	Isaiasca Jesuspac sumaimana cashcata ricushpami , paimanta chashna huillarca .
43012042	Chashna cacpipish , mandac israelcunacamanmi taucacuna crirca . Ashtahuanpish tandanacuna huasimanta fariseocuna llucchishpa cachanata manchashpami , mana piman huillarca .
43012043	Paicunaca Dios alli nishca canapac randica , gentecunapac alli nishca canatami ashtahuan munarca .
43012044	Jesús sinchita rimashpaca : — Maijanpish ñucata cricca mana ñucallatachu crin , ashtahuanpish ñucata cachac Taitatami crin .
43012045	Maijanpish ñucata ricucca , ñucata cachac Taitatami ricun .
43012046	Maijanpish ñucata cricca ama amsapi cachunmi , ñucaca achicyachic luz shina cai pachaman shamurcani .
43012047	Maijanpish ñuca rimashcata uyashpapish mana cazuctaca , mana ñucachu taripasha . Mana cai pachapi causaccunata juchanchingapacchu shamurcani , ashtahuanpish quishpichingapacmi shamurcani .
43012048	Maijanpish ñucata piñashpa ñuca rimashcata mana cazucca , taripashcami canga . Ñuca rimashcallatacmi , tucuri punzhapica juchanchinga .
43012049	Mana ñuca munaimantachu rimacuni , ashtahuanpish ñucata cachac Taita imata mandashcallatami huillashpa rimani .
43012050	Ñuca Taita mandashcacunaca huiñai causaita cuc cashcatami yachani . Chaimantami ñuca rimashpaca , ñuca Taita mandashcallata huillacuni — nirca .
43013001	Pascua fiesta punzhacuna manarac chayacpimi , Jesusca cai pachamanta paipac Taitapacman rina horas chayashcata yacharca . Cai pachapica paita caticcunataca yallitami Jesusca cuyarca . Shinami tucuringacaman cuyarca .
43013002	Jesús manarac paipac yachacuccunahuan micungapac tiyaricpimi , diabloca Simonpac churi Judas Iscariotepac shungupi Jesusta japichina yuyaita churashca carca .
43013003	Jesusca paiman Dios poderta cushcatapish , Dios cachashca shamushcatapish , paipacman cutina cashcatapish yacharcami .
43013004	Chaimanta jatarishpami , Jesusca jahualla churanata anchuchishpa , shuc lienzota cinturapi churarca .
43013005	Chashnashpaca , yacuta bateapi churashpami , yachacuccunapac chaquita jahuashpa , lienzohuan chaquichi callarirca .
43013006	Simón Pedropac chaquita jahuagricpimi paica : — Apunchic Jesús , ¿ canchu ñuca chaquita jahuagringui ? — nirca .
43013007	Shina nicpimi Jesusca : — Ñuca cashna ruhuacushcataca manarac entendinguichu , quipamanmi entendingui — nirca .
43013008	Shina nicpimi Pedroca : — ¡ Jaicapi ñuca chaquita jahuachun , mana saquishachu ! — nirca . Shina nicpimi Jesusca : — Cambac chaquita ñuca jahuachun , mana saquishpaca , mana ñuca yachacucchu cangui — nirca .
43013009	Shina nicpimi , Simón Pedroca : — Shinashpaca Apunchic Jesús , ama chaquillata jahuaichu . Umatapish , maquitapish jahuaiyari — nirca .
43013010	Shina nicpimi Jesusca : — Maijanpish ña armarishcaca chuyanllami , ashtahuanpish chaquillatami jahuana can . Cancunaca ña chuyanllami canguichic . Shina cashpapish , mana tucuichu chuyanlla canguichic — nirca .
43013011	Jesusca maijan paita japichigricushcata yachashcamantami : “ Mana tucuichu chuyanlla canguichic ” nirca .
43013012	Jesús chaquita ña jahuashpa , churanata churarishpa , cutin mizapi tiyarishpaca : — ¿ Imamantatac caita ruhuashcataca entendinguichicchu ?
43013013	Cancuna ñucata ‘ Yachachic ’ shinallatac ‘ Apunchic Jesús ’ nishpaca , allitami ninguichic . Chaica , chaimi cani .
43013014	Ñuca Mandac cashpapish , Yachachic cashpapish , cancunapac chaquita jahuashcanimi . Chaimanta cancunapish , caishucpac , chaishucpac chaquita jahuaichic .
43013015	Cancunapish chashnallatac ruhuachunmi , ñucaca chashna jahuashpa ricuchini .
43013016	Servicca mana amota yallichu . Cachashcapish mana cachacta yallichu . Chaica chashnatacmi can .
43013017	Caicunata entendishpa , chaitatac ruhuashpaca , mai cushicuimi canguichic .
43013018	Mana tucui cancunamantachu nicuni . Maijanlla ñuca acllashca cashcataca yachanimi . Dios quillcachishcapi : “ Ñucahuan micucucllatacmi ñucataca piñanga ” nishca pactachunmi , chashnaca tucunga .
43013019	Manarac chaicuna pactacpimi , ñuca pi cashcata cancuna crichun , cunanmanta pacha huillacuni .
43013020	Maijanpish ñuca cachashcata chasquicca , ñucatami chasquin . Ñucata chasquicca , ñucata Cachactami chasquin . Chaica chashnatacmi can — nirca .
43013021	Chaita nishca quipa , Jesús shungupi yallita llaquirishpaca : — Cancunapuramanta shucmi ñucata japichigrin . Chaica chashnatacmi can — nirca .
43013022	Chaimantami yachacuccunaca pimanta nicushcata mana yachashpa , caishuc chaishuc ricunacurca .
43013023	Jesuspac shuc cuyashca yachacucmi paihuan quimirishpa tiyacurca .
43013024	Paitami Simón Pedroca pimanta chashna nicushcata tapuchun señata ruhuarca .
43013025	Chai yachacuc Jesuspacman ashtahuan cuchuyashpaca : — Apunchic Jesús , ¿ pitac chai japichicca ? — nirca .
43013026	Chashna nicpimi Jesusca : — Maijanmanmi tandata jucuchishpa cuni , chaimi — nirca . Jesusca tandata jucuchishpami , Simón Iscariotepac churi Judasman curca .
43013027	Judas tandata japincami , Satanasca paipac shungupi yaicurca . Chaimantami Jesusca : — Can imata ruhuagricushcataca utca ruhuailla — nirca .
43013028	Imamanta Jesús chashna nishcataca , chai mizapi tiyacuccunaca pipish mana entendircachu .
43013029	Judasca cullquita tandacmi carca . Chaimantami maijan yachacuccunaca : « Judastami fiestapac imallata randichun nicunga , mana cashpaca , huacchacunaman cullquita cuchunmi nicunga » nishpa yuyacurca .
43013030	Judas tandata japishcahuanmi , llucshishpa rirca . Chashna llucshicpica , ñami tuta carca .
43013031	Judas llucshishpa ricpimi Jesusca : — Cunanmi Runa Tucungapac shamushca ñucaca jatunyachishca cagrini . Diospish ñucamantami jatunyachishca canga .
43013032	Dios ñucamanta jatunyachishca cashpaca , Runa Tucungapac shamushca ñucatapish jatunyachingami . Chaitaca utcami ruhuanga .
43013033	Cuyashca yachacuccunalla , ashacamanllami cancunahuan cagrini . Cancunaca ñucata mashcanguichicmi . Mandac israelcunata nishca shinami cancunatapish nini : Ñuca maiman ricushcamanca , mana ri pudinguichicchu .
43013034	Mushuc mandashcatami saquini : Caishuc chaishuc-huan cuyanacuichic . Ñuca ima shinami cuyani , chashnallatac cancunapish cuyanacuichic .
43013035	Cancuna caishuc chaishuc-huan cuyanacucpimi , tucui cai pachapi causaccunaca ñucapac yachacuccuna cashcata yachangacuna — nirca .
43013036	Simón Pedro Jesusta tapushpaca : — Apunchic Jesús , ¿ maimantac rigringui ? — nirca . Chashna nicpimi Jesusca : — Ñuca maiman ricushcamanca mana cati pudinguichu , ashtahuanpish quipatami catingui — nirca .
43013037	Chashna nicpimi Pedroca : — Apunchic Jesús , ¿ ima nishpatac cunanca mana cati pudini ? ¡ Ñucaca canmanta huañuna cacpipish huañushallami ! — nirca .
43013038	Chashna nicpimi Jesusca : — ¿ Ñucamantachu huañugringui ? Manarac gallo cantacpimi , quimsa cutin ñucata negangui . Chaica chashnatacmi canga — nirca .
43014001	Jesusca : — Ama shungupi llaquiringuichicchu , ashtahuanpish Diostapish , ñucatapish cringuichic .
43014002	Ñuca Taitapac huasipica achca causanami tiyan . Mana chai shina tiyacpica , huillaimanmi carcani . Cancuna causanata allichingapacmi rigrini .
43014003	Ñuca rishpaca cancuna causanata allichishpami cancunata apangapac cutimusha . Maipimi ñuca causani , chaipimi cancunapish ñucahuan causanguichic .
43014004	Ñuca maiman ricushcatapish yachanguichicmi , ñantapish ricsinguichicmi — nirca .
43014005	Shina nicpimi Tomasca : — Apunchic Jesús , can maiman rictapish mana yachanchicchu . ¿ Ima shinatac ñantacarin yachashunyari ? — nirca .
43014006	Shina nicpimi Jesusca : — Ñucami cashcata nicpish , ñanpish , causaita cucpish cani . Maijanpish ñucallamantami Diospacman chayanga .
43014007	Cancuna ñucata ricsishpaca , ñuca Taitatapish ricsinguichicmanmi . Cunanmanta pachami Taitataca ricsinguichic , ricunguichic — nirca .
43014008	Chaimantami Felipeca : — Apunchic Jesús , Taitata ricuchiyari . Chaillatami munanchic — nirca .
43014009	Shina nicpimi Jesusca : — Ña unaitami cancunahuan cani . Felipe , ¿ chashna cashca jahuachu ñucata mana ricsingui ? Maijanpish ñucata ricucca ñuca Taitatapish ricunmi . ¿ Ima nishpatac canca : “ Taitata ricuchi ” ningui ?
43014010	¿ Manachu ñucaca Taitahuan , Taitaca ñucahuan shuclla cashcataca cringui ? Ñucaca , mana ñuca munaimantachu rimani , ashtahuanpish ñuca Taita ñucapi cashpami , pai munashcata ruhuachicun .
43014011	Ñucaca Taitahuan , Taitaca ñucahuan shuclla cashcata crichicyari . Ñucata mana crishpaca , ñuca ima ruhuashcata ricushpa crichicyari .
43014012	Ñucaca Taitapacmanmi rini . Chaimantami maijanpish ñucata cricca , ñuca ruhuashca shina ruhuanga . Chaicunapish yallitami ruhuanga . Chaica chashnatacmi canga .
43014013	Ñucapac shutipi imatapish mañacpica , ñuca Taita jatunyachishca cachunmi cusha .
43014014	Imatapish ñuca shutipi mañacpica , chaitami cusha .
43014015	Ñucata cuyashpaca , ñuca mandashcacunata cazunguichic .
43014016	Ñuca Taitaman mañacpica , shuctac Cushichictami cachanga . Chai Cushichicca huiñaitami cancunahuan canga .
43014017	Paica cashcata nic Espiritumi . Paitaca cai pacha runacunaca mana ricunchu , mana ricsinchu . Chaimantami mana chasqui pudin . Shina cacpipish , cancunaca ricsinguichicmi .
43014018	Mana cancunallata saquishachu , cancunapacman cutimushami .
43014019	Cai pachapi causaccunaca asha punzhacuna quipaca mana ñucata ricungachu . Shina cacpipish cancunaca ricunguichicmi . Chaica , ñucaca causacunimi , cancunapish causacunguichicmi . Chaimantami ricucunguichic .
43014020	Chai punzhami ñucaca Taitahuan shuclla cashcata , cancunaca ñucahuan , ñucaca cancunahuan shuclla cashcata yachanguichic .
43014021	Maijanpish ñuca mandashcacunata chasquishpa cazucmi ñucata cuyan . Ñucata cuyactaca Taitapish cuyanmi . Ñucapish cuyashpami Taitaman ricsichisha — nirca .
43014022	Shina nicpimi chaishuc Judasca : — Apunchic Jesús , ¿ ima nishpatac ñucanchicllaman ricurishpa , mana tucui gentecunaman ninguiyari ? — nirca .
43014023	Shina nicpimi Jesusca : — Maijanpish ñucata cuyacca , ñuca rimashcacunatami cazun . Paitaca ñuca Taitapish cuyanmi . Chaimantami paihuan causangapac shamushun .
43014024	Maijanpish ñucata mana cuyacca , ñuca rimashcacunataca mana cazunchu . Cancuna uyacuc ñuca rimashcacunaca mana ñuca munaimantachu , ashtahuanpish ñucata cachac Taitamantami .
43014025	Tucui caicunataca cancunahuan cashpami nicuni .
43014026	Chaica , Dios ñucapac shutipi cachagricuc Cushichic Espíritu shamushpami , tucuita yachachinga , tucui ñuca nishcacunatapish yuyachinga .
43014027	Sumac cushicui causaitami cuni , sumac cushicui causaitami saquini . Ñucaca mana gentecuna cushca cushi causaitachu cuni . Chaimanta ama llaquirichicchu , ama manchaichicchu .
43014028	Cancunaca ñuca : “ Ñuca rishpapish cancunapacman cutishami ” nishcataca , uyarcanguichicmi . Ñuca Taitaca ñucata yallimi . Ñucaca Taitapacmanmi rigrini nishcamantaca ciertota ñucata cuyashpaca cushicunguichicmanmi .
43014029	Chaicuna tucucta ricushpa ñucata crichunmi , utcashpa huillacuni .
43014030	Mana ashtahuan cancunahuan parlacushallachu . Chaica , ñami cai pachata mandac shamucun . Paica ñucata mana ati pudinchu .
43014031	Ñuca Taitata cuyac cashcata , Taita mandashcata pactachicusha . Cai pachapi causaccuna yachachunca , chashnallatacmi cana can . Jatarichic , caimanta jacuchic — nirca .
43015001	Jesusca : — Ñucaca alli pucuc uvas yurami cani . Ñuca Taitaca uvas chagrata tarpucmi .
43015002	Ñucapi cac , mana pucuc ramacunataca tucuitami pitinga . Cutin alli pucuc ramataca ashtahuan pucuchunmi , sumacta allichinga .
43015003	Cancunaca ñuca yachachishcata uyashcamantaca , ñami chuyayashca canguichic .
43015004	Ñucahuan shuc shina caichic , ñucapish cancunahuan shuc shinami casha . Ramaca yurapi mana cashpaca , mana pucui pudinchu . Chashnallatacmi cancunapish ñucahuan mana cashpaca , imata mana ruhuai pudinguichic .
43015005	Ñucaca uvas yurami cani . Cancunaca ramacunami canguichic . Cancunaca ñucahuan shuc shina cashpaca alli pucuc shinami canguichic . Ñucapish shuc shinami cancunahuan casha . Ñucamanta caruyashpaca imata mana ruhuai pudinguichicchu .
43015006	Maijanpish ñucahuan mana cactaca , mana pucuc ramata shinami pitinga . Ña chaquicpica , tandashpami ninapi rupachingami .
43015007	Ñucahuan shuc shina cashpa , yachachishcacunatapish cazushpaca mañaichiclla . Tucui mañashcatami Taitaca cunga .
43015008	Chashna alli pucuc ramacuna shina cacpimi , ñuca Taitaca jatunyachishca canga . Shinallatac ñuca yachacuccuna cashcatapish ricuchinguichicmi .
43015009	Ñuca Taita ñucata cuyac shinallatacmi , cancunatapish cuyani . Chashna cuyanacushpa catichiclla .
43015010	Ima shinami ñuca Taita mandashcacunata pactachishpa , paipac cuyashca cani , chai shinallatacmi cancunatapish ñuca mandashcacunata pactachicpica cuyasha .
43015011	Ñuca cushicuc shina cancunapish cushicuchun , shinallatac yallita cushicuihuan causachunmi , caicunataca nini .
43015012	Caitami ñucaca mandani : Ñuca cancunata cuyashca shina , caishuc chaishuc cuyanacuichic .
43015013	Maijanpish quiquin amigomanta huañucmi , yallita cuyashcataca ricuchin .
43015014	Cancuna ñuca mandashcacunata pactachishpaca , ñuca amigocunami canguichic .
43015015	Servicca amo imata ruhuacushcata mana yachanchu . Chaimantami cancunataca mana serviccuna nishpaca , cayani . Tucui ñuca Taita nishcacunatami cancunaman huillashcani , chaimantami cancunataca ñuca amigocuna nishpa cayani .
43015016	Mana cancunachu ñucataca acllarcanguichic , ashtahuanpish ñucami cancunataca acllarcani . Cancuna rishpaca , allita , huiñaita pucuc yura shina causaichic , Shina causashpa , ñuca shutipi imata mañacpica , ñuca Taitaca cungallami .
43015017	Caishuc chaishuc cuyanacuichic nishpami , mandani .
43015018	Cai pachapi causaccuna piñacpica , ñucatarac piñashcata yuyanguichic .
43015019	Cancuna cai pachapac causacpica , cai pachapac causaccunaca cuyanmanmi . Ashtahuanpish cancunata paicunapuramanta ñucaca acllashcamantami cai pachapac causaccunaca piñancuna .
43015020	Ñuca : “ Shuc servicca mana amota yallichu ” nishcata yuyarichic . Ñucatapish llaquichircacunami . Cancunatapish llaquichingami . Ñuca rimashcata cazushpaca , cancuna rimashcatapish cazungami .
43015021	Ñucata Cachacta mana ricsincunachu . Chaimantami cancunataca ñucata caticushcamanta llaquichingacuna .
43015022	Ñuca mana shamushca cacpi , paicunata mana rimashca cacpica , mana juchayucchu canman carca . Ashtahuanpish cunanca paicunapac juchamantaca mana quishpiri pudincunachu .
43015023	Maijanpish ñucata piñaccunaca , ñuca Taitatapish piñanmi .
43015024	Pi mana ruhuaipaccunata paicunapac ñaupapi ñuca mana ruhuashca cacpica , paicunaca mana juchayucchu canman carca . Ashtahuanpish cunanca ñuca ruhuashcacunata ricushpapish ñucatapish , ñuca Taitatapish piñancuna .
43015025	Chaica mandashpa quillcashcapi : “ Manapish juchayuc cacpimi , piñarca ” nishca pactachunmi , chashnaca tucurca .
43015026	Ashtahuanpish Taitamanta ñuca cachashca Cushichic Diospac Espíritu shamushpami , ñucataca ricsichinga . Paica cashcata nicmi .
43015027	Cancunaca callarimanta pacha ñucahuan cashcamantami ñucamanta huillaccuna canguichic .
43016001	Caicunataca ñucata crinata ama saquichunmi huillacuni .
43016002	Tandanacuna huasicunamanta llucchishpa cachangami . Shinallatac cancunata huañuchishpa , Diosmanmi alli ruhuanchic nina punzhami chayamunga .
43016003	Ñuca Taitatapish , Ñucatapish mana ricsishcamantami chashna ruhuanga .
43016004	Caicunataca chai punzhacuna shamucpi , ñuca utcaman nishcata yuyarichunmi nicuni . Ñuca cancunahuan cashcamantami , caicunataca callaripica mana huillarcani .
43016005	Cunanca ñucata cachac Taitapacmanmi rigrini . Shina cacpipish pipish : “ ¿ Maimantac ringuichic ? ” nishpa mana tapunguichicchu .
43016006	Ashtahuanpish caicunaman chashna huillashcamantami yallita llaquiringuichic .
43016007	Shina cacpipish , cancunapac allipac rinami cani . Chashna ñuca mana ricpica , cancunata Cushichicca mana cancunapacman shamungachu . Ñuca rishpami , paitaca cachasha . Chaica chashnatacmi canga .
43016008	Pai shamushpami , cai pachapi imami jucha cashcatapish , mana jucha cashcatapish , Dios taripana cashcatapish ricuchinga .
43016009	Paimi ñucata mana crishpaca juchayuc cashcata ricuchinga .
43016010	Ñuca Taitapacman rishpa , mana ricuricpimi , imami cashcata ruhuanata ricuchinga .
43016011	Cai pachata mandacta Dios ña juchanchishca cashcamantami , imami taripana cashcataca ricuchinga .
43016012	Cancunaman imata ninata chariniracmi . Shina cacpipish , cunanca mana tucui entendinguichicchu .
43016013	Cashcata nic Diospac Espíritu shamushpaca , mana paipac munaillamantachu rimanga , ashtahuanpish imata uyashcallatami huillanga . Chaimantami cashcata ruhuanata yachachinga . Shinallatac tucui imalla tucugricushcatapish yachachinga .
43016014	Paica ñucamanta chasquishpami cancunaman yachachinga . Chaimantami ñucata jatunyachinga .
43016015	Tucui imapish Taitapac cacca ñucapacmi . Chaimantami “ Diospac Espirituca ñucamanta chasquishpa , cancunamanca yachachinga ” nircani .
43016016	Asha pacha quipaca ñucata mana ricunguichicchu . Shina cacpipish , asha quipami cutin ricunguichic — nirca .
43016017	Chaimanta maijan Jesuspac yachacuccuna tapunacushpaca : — Pai : “ Ñuca Taitapacmanmi rigrini , asha quipaca mana ricunguichicchu , asha quipami cutin ricunguichic ” nishpaca , ¿ imatatac nisha nin ?
43016018	Pai : “ Asha quipaca ” nishpaca , ¿ imatatac nisha nin ? Chaitaca mana entendinchicchu — ninacurca .
43016019	Paicuna tapunata munacucta yachashpami , Jesusca : — Ñuca : “ ¿ Asha quipaca ñucata mana ricunguichicchu , cutin asha quipami ricunguichic ” nishcamantachu tapunacucunguichic ?
43016020	Cancuna llaquilla cacpipish , huacailla cacpipish , cai pachapac causaccunaca cushicungami . Shina cacpipish , cancunapac llaquica cushicuimi tucunga .
43016021	Shuc huarmica sajuarina punzha chayacpica , nanaihuanmi llaquirin . Shina cacpipish sajuarishca quipaca , shuc huahua cai pachaman apamushcamantami tucui nanaita cungarishpa cushicun .
43016022	Shinallatacmi cancunaca llaquiringuichic . Shina cashpapish , ñuca cutimucpica , cancunapac shungupi yallitami cushicunguichic . Chai cushicuitaca pi mana quichungachu .
43016023	Chai punzhacunapica ña mana ashtahuan imata tapunguichicchu . Ñuca shutipi ñuca Taitaman mañacpica paica cungami . Chaica chashnatacmi canga .
43016024	Cunancamanca , ñuca shutipi imata mana mañashcanguichicchu . Cancunapac shungupi yallita cushicui tiyachun mañaichic , chasquinguichicmi .
43016025	Tucui caicunataca chimbapurashpallami parlarcani . Ña mana ashtahuan chimbapurashpa parlana punzha chayamucpica , ñuca Taita ima shina cashcatatacmi huillasha .
43016026	Chai punzhacunapica cancunallatacmi ñuca shutipi mañanguichic . Ña mana cancunamanta ñuca Taitata mañashachu ,
43016027	ashtahuanpish ñuca Taitallatacmi cancunataca cuyan . Chaica , ñucata cuyashcamanta , ñuca Diosmanta shamushca cashcata crishcamantami chashna cuyan .
43016028	Ñuca Taitapacmantami cai pachaman shamurcani . Cunanca cai pachata saquishpami , ñuca Taitapacman cutigrini — nirca .
43016029	Shina nicpimi yachacuccunaca : — Cunanmi entendinallatac parlacungui , ashtahuanpish ña mana chimbapurashpachu parlacungui .
43016030	Cunanmi can tucuita yachac cashcata yachanchic . Pipish manarac tapucpimi , canca yachangui . Chaimantami cantaca Diosmanta shamushca cashcata crinchic — nirca .
43016031	Shina nicpimi Jesusca : — ¿ Cunanca cringuichicchu ?
43016032	Chai punzhaca chayamun , ña caillapimi . Cancunaca ñucallata saquishpa , caita chaita ringuichic . Shina cacpipish , mana ñucallachu cani , ashtahuanpish ñuca Taitaca ñucahuanmi .
43016033	Tucui caicunataca ñucahuan yallita cushicuita charichunmi nini . Cai pachapica llaquita apanguichicmi . Shina cacpipish , cai pacha mana allicunata ñuca atishcamanta ñucata crichic — nirca .
43017001	Chaicunata nishca quipa Jesús jahua pachata huichailla ricushpaca : — Ñuca Taitalla , ñucata japichina pachaca ñami chayamushca . Chaimanta cambac Churi canta jatunyachichun , cambac Churitapish jatunyachiyari .
43017002	Canca ñucaman cushcacunaman huiñai causaita cuchunmi , tucui gentecunata ñuca maquipi churarcangui .
43017003	Cai huiñai causaitaca , shuclla Dios cashcata crishpa , Jesucristoca Dios cachashca cashcata crishpami chasquinga .
43017004	Ñucaca cai pachapica canta jatunyachishcanimi , shinallatac imata ruhuachun nishcatapish tucuchishcanimi .
43017005	Cunanca ñuca Taitalla , cai pacha manarac tiyacpi , ima shinami cambac ladopi jatunyachishca carcani , Chashnallatac cunanpish jatunyachiyari .
43017006	Cai pacha gentecunamanta can acllashpa , ñucaman cushcacunamanca , ñami can pi cashcataca huillashcani . Cambacmi carcacuna , canmi ñucaman curcangui . Paicunaca can rimashcacunata cazushcacunami .
43017007	Cunanca tucui ñucaman cushcacunaca , canmanta shamushca cashcatami yachancuna .
43017008	Can huillachun nishcata huillarcani . Paicuna chasquishpami , ñucataca Dios cachashcata yachac chayashpa crincuna .
43017009	Ñucaca paicunamantami mañani . Mana cai pachapac caccunamanta mañanichu , ashtahuanpish ñucaman cushcacunaca cambac cashcamantami paicunamanta mañani .
43017010	Tucui cambac cashcacunaca ñucapacmi , ñucapac cashcacunaca cambacmi . Paicunamantami jatunyachishca cani .
43017011	Ñucaca ña mana cai pachapi cagrinichu , cambacmanmi rigrini . Ñucata caticcunaca cai pachapimi saquirin . Jucha illac Taitalla , ima shinami canhuan shuc shinalla canchic , chai shinallatac paicunapish shuc shinalla cachun , cambac poderhuan cuidaiyari .
43017012	Cai pachapi paicunahuan cashpaca , cambac poderhuanmi cuidarcani . Can cushcacunataca tucuitami cuidarcani . Shucllapish mana chingarircachu , ashtahuanpish chingaringapac cashca runallami can quillcachishcapi nishca shina pactachun chingarirca .
43017013	Can maipi cashcamanmi rini . Ñuca shinallatac paicunapish yallita cushicuchunmi , cai pachapi cashparac cashna mañani .
43017014	Can rimashcata paicunaman huillashcanimi . Chaimantami cai pachapac caccunaca paicunata piñancuna . Paicunaca ña mana cai pachamantachu , ñucapish mana cai pachamantachu cani .
43017015	Mana cai pachamanta paicunata anchuchichunchu mañanichu , ashtahuanpish tucui millaimanta huacaichichunmi mañani .
43017016	Paicunaca mana cai pachamantachu , ñucapish manallatac cai pachamantachu cani .
43017017	Paicunata cambaclla cachun cambac rimashca shimihuan millaimanta huacaichingui . Canca cashcata nicmi cangui .
43017018	Ima shinami cai pacha gentecunapacman cacharcangui , chashnallatacmi paicunatapish cai pacha gentecunapacman cachacuni .
43017019	Paicunapish cashcata nic rimashcahuan cambaclla tucuchunmi , ñucapish paicunapac allipac cambaclla tucuni .
43017020	Mana paicunallamantachu mañani , ashtahuanpish paicunapac huillashcata uyashpa , ñucata criccunamantapishmi mañani .
43017021	Taitalla , ima shinami ñucaca canhuan , canca ñucahuan shuc shinalla canchic , chai shinallatac paicunapish ñucanchic-huan shuc shinalla cachunmi mañani . Cai pachapi causaccuna can ñucata cachashcata crichunmi , chashna mañani .
43017022	Canca ñucata jatunyachishcanguimi . Ñucanchic ima shinami shuc shinalla canchic , chai shinallatac paicunapish shuc shinalla cachunmi paicunatapish jatunyachini .
43017023	Ñucaca paicunahuan , canca ñucahuan cacpimi , paicunaca shuc shinalla canga . Shina cacpimi , cai pachapi causaccunaca can cachashcata , shinallatac ñucata ima shinami cuyangui , chashnallatac paicunatapish cuyac cashcata yachangacuna .
43017024	Taitalla , cai pacha manarac tiyacpimi , ñucataca cuyashcangui . Chaimantami can cushcacunaca ñuca maipimi cani , paicunapish chaipi cachun munani . Chaipi cashpami ñuca jatunyachishca cashcata ricunga .
43017025	Cashcata ruhuac Taitalla , cai pachapac causaccuna canta mana ricsicpipish , ñucaca ricsinimi . Can ñucaman cushcacunapish , can ñucata cachashcata yachanmi .
43017026	Can ñucata cuyac shinallatac paicunapish cuyanacuchun , shinallatac ñucahuan shuc shinalla cachunmi , can rimashcacunataca ricsichini , shinallatac ricsichishpa catishami — nirca .
43018001	Jesusca chashna nishca quipaca , paipac yachacuccunahuanmi Cedrón yacu chimbaman rirca . Chaipimi shuc huerta tiyarca . Chaimanmi Jesusca paipac yachacuccunahuan yaicurca .
43018002	Jesusca tauca cutinmi paipac yachacuccunahuan chaipi tandanacuc carca . Chaimantami , japichic Judaspish chai huertata ricsirca .
43018003	Chaimanmi Judasca achca soldadocunahuan , curacunata mandac curacunahuan , fariseocuna cachashca Diosta mañana huasita cuidaccunahuan chayarca . Paicunaca macanacunahuan , lamparacunahuan , linternacunahuanmi chayarca .
43018004	Jesusca , pai ima tucunata ña yachashpami paicunataca : — ¿ Pitatac mashcacunguichic ? — nirca .
43018005	Shina nicpimi paicunaca : — Nazaret pueblomanta Jesusta — nirca . Shina nicpimi Jesusca : — Ñucami cani — nirca . Jesusta japichic Judaspish chaipimi paicunahuan carca .
43018006	Jesús : “ Ñucami cani ” nicpica , huashaman cutirishpami , azhacman urmarcacuna .
43018007	Jesús cutinllatac tapushpaca : — ¿ Pitatac mashcacunguichic ? — nirca . Shina nicpimi , paicunaca : — Nazaret pueblomanta Jesusta — nirca .
43018008	Chaimantami Jesusca : — Ña : “ Ñucami cani ” nircanica . Ñucata mashcacushpaca , cai ñucata caticcuna richun saquichic — nirca .
43018009	Jesusca utcaman : “ Taitalla , can cushcacunataca shucllapish mana chingarircachu ” nishca pactachunmi , chashnaca nirca .
43018010	Chaimantami Simón Pedroca paipac espadata llucchishpa , jatun mandac curata servic Malco runapac alli lado ringrita huactashpa pitirca .
43018011	Chaimantami Jesusca Pedrotaca : — Espadata maipi charicushcallapitac huacaichi . Ñuca Taita cushca cai jayac ubiana shina llaquitaca ¿ manachu apana cani ? — nirca .
43018012	Shinami soldadocunapish , soldadocunata mandacpish , Diosta mañana huasita cuidaccunapish Jesusta japishpa huatashpa ,
43018013	puntaca Anaspacman aparcacuna . Anasca Caifaspac suegromi carca . Caifasca chai huatapica , curacunata jatun mandac curami carca .
43018014	Utcamanmi Caifasca mandac israelcunataca : “ Tucui israelcuna chingarinapac randica , shuc runallami huañuna alli canga ” nishpa , yuyaita cushca carca .
43018015	Simón Pedropish , caishuc yachacucpishmi Jesustaca catishpa rirca . Chai yachacucca , curacunata jatun mandac curapac ricsishca cashpami , Jesus-huan jatun mandac curapac huasi ucuman yaicurca .
43018016	Ashtahuanpish Pedroca canzhallapimi saquirirca . Chaimantami jatun mandac curapac ricsishca yachacucca canzhaman llucshishpa , huasita cuidac huarmihuan parlashpa Pedrotaca ucuman yaicuchirca .
43018017	Chashna yaicucpimi , chai huasita cuidac huarmica Pedrotaca : — ¿ Manachu canpish chai runapac yachacuc cangui ? — nirca . Shina nicpica Pedroca : — ¡ Mana chaichu cani ! — nirca .
43018018	Yalli chiri cashcamantami Diosta mañana huasita cuidaccunapish , serviccunapish ninata japichishpa masharicurca . Pedropish chaillapitacmi paicunahuan masharicurca .
43018019	Curacunata mandac Anasmi paipac yachacuccunamanta , paipac yachachishcamanta Jesusta tapurca .
43018020	Chashna tapucpimi Jesusca : — Ñucaca tandanacuna huasicunapipish , Diosta mañana huasipipish tucuipac ñaupapimi yachachircani . Mana pacalla yachachishcanichu .
43018021	¿ Imamantatac ñucata tapungui ? Ñuca nishcata uyaccunaman tapui . Paicunami imata nishcataca yachancuna — nirca .
43018022	Jesús chashna nicpica , Diosta mañana huasita cuidac shuc runami : — ¿ Chashnachu mandac curata ningui ? — nishpa , ñahuipi huactarca .
43018023	Chashna huactacpimi Jesusca : — Mana alli rimashca cacpica , ima mana allita rimashcata ni . Ashtahuanpish allita nishca cacpica , ¿ imamantatac huactangui ? — nirca .
43018024	Anasca curacunata jatun mandac Caifaspacmanmi Jesusta huatashpa cacharca .
43018025	Pedroca ninapi masharishpami shayacurca . Chaipimi paihuan caccunaca : — ¿ Manachu canpish chai runapac yachacuc cangui ? — nirca . Chashna nicpi , Pedro negashpaca : — ¡ Ñucaca mana chaichu cani ! — nirca .
43018026	Cutinllatacmi curacunata jatun mandacpac servicca : — ¿ Manachu cantapish Jesus-huan ricurcani ? — nirca . Paica Pedro ringrita pitishca runapac aillumi carca .
43018027	Cutinllatacmi Pedro negarca . Chai ratomi galloca cantarca .
43018028	Curacunata mandac Caifaspac huasimantaca , Roma llactata mandashpa tiyana huasimanmi Jesusta aparcacuna . Ña tutamantami carca . Chaimantami Pascua micuita micungapacca ama mapayashun nishpa , israelcunaca jatun mandacpac ucuman mana yaicurca .
43018029	Chaimantami mandac Pilato llucshishpaca : — ¿ Cai runataca imamantatac juchanchishpa apamunguichicyari ? — nirca .
43018030	Shina nicpimi paicunaca : — Cai runa ima millaita mana ruhuashca cacpica , manachari apamunchic carca — nirca .
43018031	Chaimanta Pilatoca : — Cancunapac mandashcapi nishca shina , taripashpa llaquichingapac apaichic — nirca . Shina nicpimi , mandac israelcunaca : — Ñucanchicca mana pita huañuchinallachu canchic — nirca .
43018032	Chashnami , Jesús pai ima shina huañunata huillashcaca pactarca .
43018033	Pilato pai mandashpa tiyana ucuman cutin yaicushpa , Jesusta cayashpaca : — ¿ Canchu israelcunata Jatun Mandac cangui ? — nirca .
43018034	Chashna nicpimi Jesusca : — ¿ Cambac yuyaimantachu chashna ningui ? Mana cashpaca , ¿ maijanchu chashnaca huillarca ? — nirca .
43018035	Shina nicpimi Pilatoca : — ¿ Ñucaca Israel runachu cani ? Cambac llacta gentecunallatacmi curacunata mandac curacunahuan ñucapacman apamurca . ¿ Imatatac ruhuarcanguiyari ? — nirca .
43018036	Shina nicpimi Jesusca : — Ñuca mandanaca mana cai pachapichu . Cai pachapi mandana cacpica , ñucata caticcuna macanacushpa , israelcuna japichun mana saquinmanchu . Ñuca mandanaca mana caipichu — nirca .
43018037	Chaimantami Pilatoca : — Shinashpaca , ¿ canca jatun mandacchu cangui ? — nirca . Shina nicpimi Jesusca : — Ari , can nishca shinallatacmi cani . Ñucaca cashcata huillangapacmi cai pachapi huacharingapac shamurcani . Cashcata rimashcata cazuccunallami , ñuca rimashcata uyancuna — nirca .
43018038	Chaimantami Pilatoca : — ¿ Imatac chai cashcata ninaca ? — nirca . Shina nishpami , Pilatoca cutin llucshishpa israelcunataca : — Ñucaca ima mana allita mana cai runapi tarinichu .
43018039	Shina cacpipish , cancunaca Pascua fiestapi shuc prezuta cacharichun ninatami yachanguichic . ¿ Manachu israelcunata Jatun Mandacta cacharichun ninguichic ? — nirca .
43018040	Shina nicpi , tucui mashna caparishpaca : — ¡ Paitaca ama cacharichu , Barrabasta cachari ! — nircacuna . Barrabasca millai shuhuacmi carca .
43019001	Chaimantami Pilatoca Jesusta macachirca .
43019002	Soldadocunaca casha angumanta ahuashca shuc coronata umapi churachishpami , morado churanatapish Jesusman churachirca .
43019003	Chaimanta paipac cuchuman chayashpaca : — Israelcunata Jatun Mandac alli nishca cachun — nishpa , ñahuipi huactarca .
43019004	Pilato cutin llucshishpaca : — Riquichic , ima juchata paipica mana tarinichu , chaita yachaichic — nirca .
43019005	Jesús casha coronata umapi churashca , morado churanatapish churashcami llucshirca . Chashna llucshimucpimi Pilatoca : — Caipimi chai runaca — nirca .
43019006	Chaita curacunata mandac curacunapish , Diosta mañana huasita cuidaccunapish ricushpaca : — ¡ Paitaca chacatailla , chacatailla ! — nishpami caparircacuna . Shina caparicpimi Pilatoca : — Ñucaca paipica ima juchata mana tarinichu . Cancunallatac apashpa chacatagrichic — nirca .
43019007	Shina nicpimi israelcunaca : — Pai ‘ Diospac Churimi cani ’ nishcamantaca , ñucanchicta mandashcapi nishca shinaca , huañunami can — nirca .
43019008	Pilato chaita uyashpaca ashtahuan mancharishpami ,
43019009	mandashpa tiyana ucuman yaicurca . Chashna yaicushpaca Jesustaca : — ¿ Maimantatac cangui ? — nirca . Shina tapucpipish , Jesusca imata mana nircachu .
43019010	Shina upalla cacpimi Pilatoca : — ¿ Manachu imata huillagringui ? Ñuca mandacpimi , chacatana cacpipish chacatanga , cacharina cacpipish cacharinga . Chaitaca , ¿ manachu yachangui ? — nirca .
43019011	Shina nicpimi Jesusca : — Dios mana canman cushca cacpica , ñucataca imata mana ruhuai pudinguimanchu . Shina cacpipish ñucata japichicmi canta atishpa yalli juchayucca — nirca .
43019012	Chaimanta pachami Pilatoca , ima shinapish Jesusta cacharinata munarca . Shina cacpipish israelcunaca : — ¡ Cai runata cacharishpaca , mana jatun mandac Cesarpac partechu cangui ! ¡ Maijanpish ‘ jatun mandacmi cani ’ niricca , jatun mandac Cesarta piñacmi ! — nishpa caparirca .
43019013	Pilato chaita uyashpaca , Jesusta canzhaman llucchishpami mandashpa tiyanapi tiyarirca . Chai tiyanaca Gábata nishca pambapimi carca . Hebreo rimaipica , “ rumihuan ruhuashca pamba ” nisha ninmi .
43019014	Pascua fiestapac allichirina punzha , chaupi punzhapimi Pilatoca israelcunataca : — Riquichic , caipimi Jatun Mandacca — nirca .
43019015	Shina nicpipish paicunaca : — ¡ Chacatailla , chacatailla ! — nishpami caparircacuna . Shina caparicpimi Pilatoca : — ¿ Cancunata Jatun Mandactachu chacatachun ninguichic ? — nirca . Shina nicpimi , curacunata mandac curacunaca : — Jatun mandac Cesarllatami charinchic . Shuctac mandactaca mana charinchicchu — nirca .
43019016	Shina nicpimi , Pilatoca Jesusta chacatachun paicunaman curca . Chaimantami Jesusta apashpa rircacuna .
43019017	Jesusca cruzta aparishpami , Gólgota urcuman llucshirca . Gólgota nishpaca , Hebreo rimaipi , “ uma tullu ” nisha ninmi .
43019018	Chaipimi Jesustaca chacatarca . Ishcai runacunahuanmi shuctaca shuc ladoman , shuctaca shuc ladoman chacatashpa , Jesustaca chaupipi chacatarca .
43019019	Pilatoca shuc quillcatami cruz jahuapi churarca . Chaipica : “ Israelcunata Jatun Mandac , Nazaret pueblomanta Jesusmi ” nishpami quillcashca carca .
43019020	Jesusta chacatashcaca Jerusalén pueblo cuchullapimi carca . Chaimantami achca israelcuna chai quillcata ricurca . Chai quillcaca hebreo rimaipi , latín rimaipi , griego rimaipimi carca .
43019021	Chai quillcata curacunata mandac curacuna ricushpa Pilatotaca : — Ama ‘ Israelcunata Jatun Mandacmi ’ nishpa quillcaichu , ashtahuanpish ‘ Israelcunata Jatun Mandacmi cani ’ nishpa quillcai — nirca .
43019022	Chaimantami Pilatoca : — Ña quillcashcaca , chashnatacmi cana can — nirca .
43019023	Ña chacatashca quipaca , soldadocunaca Jesuspac churanacunata chuscu partepi chaupishpami cada shuc japinacurca . Jesuspac ucu churana mana sirashca , shucllami carca .
43019024	Chaimantami soldadocunaca : — Ama lliquishun , ashtahuanpish suerteta ruhuashpa , japishun — ninacurca . Chashnami Dios quillcachishcapi : « Ñuca churanacunataca chaupinacurcami . Cutin ucu churanataca suerteta ruhuashpami japirca » nishcaca pactarca . Chashnami soldadocunaca ruhuarca .
43019025	Jesusta chacatashca cuchupica paipac mamapish , paipac mamapac ñañapish , Cleofaspac huarmi Mariapish , Magdala pueblomanta Mariapishmi carca .
43019026	Jesús paipac mamata , paipac cuyashca yachacucta ricushpa , paipac mamataca : — Mama , caipimi cambac huahuaca — nirca .
43019027	Chai quipaca , paipac yachacuctapish : — Caipimi cambac mamaca — nirca . Chaimanta pachami chai yachacucca Jesuspac mamata huasiman pusharca .
43019028	Chai quipami , Jesusca tucuita pactachishcata ña yachashpa , Dios quillcachishcapi nishca pactachun “ yacunayanmi ” nirca .
43019029	Chaipica , vinagre jundachishca shuc mangami tiyacurca . Chaipi shuc hisopo caspipi esponjata huatashpa satishpa , Jesuspac shimiman chayachirca .
43019030	Chai vinagreta Jesús ubiashpaca : “ Ña tucuchishcami ” nircami . Chashna nishpaca , umata huarcushpa , paipac espirituta Diosman mingashpa huañurcallami .
43019031	Chai punzhaca Pascua fiestapac allichina punzhami carca . Chaimantami israelcunaca samana punzhapi huañushcacuna cruzpi cainachun mana munarcacuna . Chai punzhaca israelcunamanca jatun punzhami carca . Chaimantami chacatashcacunapac changacunata paquishpa , chaimanta anchuchichun Pilatota mañarca .
43019032	Chaimantami soldadocuna rishpa , chacatashcacunataca caishuctapish chaishuctapish changacunata paquirca .
43019033	Ashtahuanpish Jesuspacman chayashpaca , ña huañushcata ricushpami , mana changacunata paquirca .
43019034	Shina cashpapish , shuc soldadoca lanzahuanmi Jesuspac costillasta chugrichirca . Chai chugrimantaca yacupish , yahuarpish llucshircami .
43019035	Tucui caicunata ricushpami , mana llullashpa huillacuni . Cai huillashcaca mana llullachu . Cancuna crichunmi , imatapish cashcata yachashpa huillacuni .
43019036	Caicunaca Dios quillcachishcapi : “ Shuc tullullatapish mana paquingachu ” nishcami pactarca .
43019037	Shuctac quillcachishcapica : “ Lanzahuan chugrichishcatami ricungacuna ” ninmi .
43019038	Chai quipami , Arimatea pueblomanta José Pilatopacman rishpa , Jesuspac cuerpota enterrangapac mañagrirca . Chai Joseca mandac israelcunata manchashcamantami , pacalla Jesusta caticurca . Pilato apachun nicpimi , Jesuspac cuerpota aparca .
43019039	Shinallatac shuc tuta Jesus-huan parlanacuc Nicodemopish mirrahuan , aloehuan chapushca shuc quintal shina mishquilla ashnacuctami apamurca .
43019040	Chashnami Jesuspac cuerpota apashpa , mishquilla ashnacucta churashpa , lienzohuan pillurca . Chashnami israelcunaca enterrac carca .
43019041	Jesusta chacatashca cuchupica , shuc huertami tiyarca . Chai huertapica pitapish manarac enterrashca , shuc mushuc sepulturami tiyarca .
43019042	Israelcuna Pascua fiestapac allichirina punzha chayamucushcamanta , chai sepultura cuchullapi cashcamantami , Jesuspac cuerpotaca utca chaillapi churarca .
43020001	Semana callari punzha , manarac alli achicyacpimi , Magdala pueblomanta Mariaca Jesusta enterrashcaman rirca . Chayashpaca enterrashca pungupi churashca rumita anchuchishcatami ricurca .
43020002	Chaimantami Simón Pedropacman , shinallatac Jesús cuyashca caishuc yachacucpacman huillangapac callparca . Paicunapacman chayashpaca : — Apunchic Jesuspac cuerpotaca , maimanchari apashcami . Maipi churashcata mana yachanichu — nirca .
43020003	Pedropish , caishuc yachacucpish maipi enterrashcapimi ricungapac rirca .
43020004	Ishcaitami callparca . Shina callpashpapish , caishuc yachacucmi Pedrota atishpa , maipi enterrashcamanca chayarca .
43020005	Ña chayashpaca , mana yaicushpami canzhallamanta cumurishpa , cuerpota pillushca lienzota ricurca .
43020006	Chai quipata Pedro chayashpaca , ucuman yaicushpami cuerpota pillushca lienzo siricucta ricurca .
43020007	Jesuspac umata pillushca lienzopish mana caishuc lienzocunahuan cashcata , ashtahuanpish chican pillushca siricuctami ricurca .
43020008	Utca ñaupashpa chayac yachacucpish ucuman yaicushpami , tucui ima tucushcata ricushpa crirca .
43020009	Paicunaca Dios quillcachishcapi : “ Paica causaringatacmi ” nishpa huillashcataca manarac entendircachu .
43020010	Chai quipaca , yachacuccunaca huasimanmi rirca .
43020011	Mariaca enterrashca pungullapitacmi huacashpa saquirishca carca . Chaipi huacashpa shayacushpami , cumurishpa ucuta ricurca .
43020012	Chashna ricushpami , ishcai angelcunata shucca Jesuspac cuerpota churashca uma ladoman , shucca chaqui ladoman yuranlla churashca tiyacucta ricurca .
43020013	Chai angelcuna tapushpaca : — ¿ Ima nishpatac huacacungui ? — nicpimi paica : — Ñucata Mandac Apunchic Jesuspac cuerpotami maimanchari apashcacuna . Maipi churashcata mana yachanichu — nirca .
43020014	Chashna nishcahuan huashata ricucpica , Jesusmi chaipi shayacushca carca . Shina ricushpapish , Jesús cashcataca mana yacharcachu .
43020015	Jesusca chai huarmitaca : — ¿ Ima nishpatac huacacungui ? ¿ Pitatac mashcacungui ? — nirca . Shina nicpi , chai huarmica “ huertata cuidacmi canga ” yuyashpami : — Amito , can maipi churangapac apashca cashpaca huillai , ñuca mashcangapac ringapac — nirca .
43020016	Chashna nicpimi Jesusca : — ¡ María ! — nirca . Shina nicpimi pai tigrarishpaca , hebreo rimaipimi : “ ¡ Raboni ! ” nirca . “ Raboni ” nishpaca , “ yachachic ” nisha ninmi .
43020017	Shina nicpimi Jesusca : — Ñucaca manarac ñuca Taitapacman huichai rinichu . Chaimanta ama ashtahuan tuparichu . Shina cacpipish ri , ñuca yachacuccunamanca : ‘ Ñucaca ñucapacpish , cancunapacpish Taitapacman , shinallatac ñucapacpish , cancunapacpish Diospacmanmi huichai rigrini ’ ninmi , nishpa huillagri — nirca .
43020018	Chashna nicpi , Magdala pueblomanta María rishpaca , Apunchic Jesusta ricushcatapish , imata pai nishcatapish tucuimi paipac yachacuccunamanca huillarca .
43020019	Semana callari chai domingo punzhapitacmi ña tutayamugricucpi , yachacuccunaca mandac israelcunata manchashcamanta pungucunata huichcarishpa , tucui tandarishpa tiyacurcacuna . Chashna cacpimi , Jesús paicunapacman chayashpa , chaupipi shayarishpaca : — Cushicuichic , ama manchaichicchu — nirca .
43020020	Chashna nishca quipami , paipac maquicunatapish , costillas quingraitapish ricuchirca . Chashna ricuchicpica , Apunchic Jesusta ricushpami cushicurcacuna .
43020021	Cutinllatac Jesusca : — Cushicuichic , ama manchaichicchu . Ima shinami ñuca Taita ñucata cacharca , chashnallatacmi cancunataca ñucaca cachani — nirca .
43020022	Chashna nishpa paicunata pucushpami : — Diospac Espirituta chasquichic .
43020023	Pipish cancunata mana allita ruhuacpi perdonacpica , paicuna juchata ruhuashcamanta perdonashcami canga . Shinallatac pipish cancunata mana allita ruhuacpi mana perdonacpica , paicuna juchata ruhuashcamantaca mana perdonashcachu canga — nirca .
43020024	Chashna cacpipish , chunga ishcai yachacuccunapuramanta ishcaipura huacharishca Tomasca , Jesús chayacpica mana paicunahuanchu carca .
43020025	Tomás chayamucpi , caishuc yachacuccunaca : — Apunchic Jesustami ricurcanchic — nircacuna . Chashna nicpimi Tomasca : — Paipac maquicunapi clavocuna yaicushcata mana ricushpa , chai clavo yaicushcapi ñuca dedota mana satishpa , shinallatac paipac costillas quingraipi chugririshcata ñuca maquihuan mana tuparishpaca , manatac crishachu — nirca .
43020026	Pusac punzha quipami , cutin yachacuccunaca chai ucullapitac tandanacushca carcacuna . Shinallatac Tomaspish chaipimi carca . Huasi pungucuna huichcashca cacpimi , Jesusca cutin paicunapacman chayashpa chaupipi shayarishpaca : — Cushicuichic , ama manchaichicchu — nirca .
43020027	Chashna nishca quipami Tomastaca : — Cambac dedota ñuca maqui chugripi satishpa ricui , shinallatac cambac maquita ñuca costillas quingrai chugripi satishpa ricui . Ama mana crishpa puricuichu , ashtahuanpish criyari — nirca .
43020028	Chashna nicpimi Tomasca : — ¡ Ñucata Mandac Apunchic Jesuslla , ñuca Dioslla ! — nirca .
43020029	Chashna nicpimi Jesusca : — Tomás , canca ricushpatacmi cringui . Manapish ricushpa criccunaca , yallita cushicuichic — nirca .
43020030	Jesuspac yachacuccuna ricucucpica , ashtahuan achca milagrocunatami ruhuarca . Chaicunaca mana tucuichu cai libropica quillcashca .
43020031	Chashna cacpipish cancuna Jesusta Quishpichic Cristo cashcatapish , Diospac Churi cashcatapish crichun , shinallatac paita crishpa huiñai causaita charichunmi , caicunataca quillcani .
43021001	Chai quipaca , cutinllatacmi Tiberias jatun cucha patapi paipac yachacuccunaman Jesusca cai shina ricurirca :
43021002	Chaipica Simón Pedropish , ishcaipura huacharishca Tomaspish , Galileapi tiyac Caná pueblomanta Natanaelpish , Zebedeopac churicunapish , shinallatac Jesuspac yachacuccunapuramanta caishuc ishcai yachacuccunapishmi carca .
43021003	Chaipi cashpami Pedroca : — Ñucaca challuatami japigrini — nirca . Chashna nicpi , caishuc yachacuccunaca : — Ñucanchicpish canhuan challuata japingapac rishun — nirca . Chashna ninacushpami , canoapi huichicushpa rirca . Shina rishpapish , chai tutaca ima challuata mana japircacunachu .
43021004	Chai tuta ña achicyamucucpimi , Jesusca yacu patapi ricurirca . Shina ricuricpipish , yachacuccunaca Jesús cashcataca mana yacharcacunachu .
43021005	Chashna cacpimi Jesusca : — Huahuacuna , ¿ manachu ima challuata japishcanguichic ? — nishpa tapurca . Chashna tapucpi paicunaca : — Imata mana japinchicchu — nirca .
43021006	Chashna nicpimi Jesusca : — Canoamanta alli ladoman linchita shitaichic . Chaipica challuacunata japinguichicmi — nirca . Chashna nicpica , pai nishca shinallatacmi linchita yacupi shitarcacuna . Chashna shitashpaca , challuacuna yallimana linchipi junda cacpimi , linchita mana llucchi pudircacuna .
43021007	Chashna tucucpimi , Jesuspac mai cuyashca yachacucca Pedrotaca : — Paica Apunchic Jesusmi — nirca . Pedroca “ Apunchic Jesusmi ” nicta uyashcahuanmi , churanata churarishpa yacuman shitarirca . Challuata japicushcamantami Pedroca lluchulla carca .
43021008	Caishuc yachacuccunaca challua junda linchitaca aisashpallami , canoahuanca yacu pataman cuchuyamurca . Paicunaca yacu patamanta patsac metro shinallapimi carca .
43021009	Paicuna canoamanta uricushpaca , nina brazas jahuapi challua cusaricuctapish , tanda chaipi tiyacuctapish ricurcacunami .
43021010	Chaipimi Jesusca : — Ñaca japishca maijan challuacunata apamuichic — nirca .
43021011	Chashna nicpimi , Simón Pedroca canoaman huichicushpa , jatun challuacuna junda linchita japishpa , aisashpalla yacu pataman cuchuyachirca . Challuacunaca patsac pichca chunga quimsami carca . Chashna cai tucui challuacunahuan cashpapish , linchica mana lliquirircachu .
43021012	Chaipimi Jesusca : — Shamuichic , micunguichic — nirca . Yachacuccunaca Apunchic Jesús cashcata yachashpami maijanllapish : “ ¿ Canca pitac canguiyari ? ” nishpaca , mana tapusha nircacuna .
43021013	Chai quipaca cuchuyashpa tandata japishpami , Jesusca paicunaman curca . Challuacunatapish shinallatacmi curca .
43021014	Jesús chaipi ricurishcahuanca , quimsa cutinmi yachacuccunamanca huañushcacunapuramanta causarishca quipaca ricurirca .
43021015	Micushca quipami , Jesusca Simón Pedroman tapushpaca : — Juanpac churi Simón , ¿ caishuccunata atishpachu ñucata cuyangui ? — nishpa tapurca .
